1.content:
You are sitting toward the back of your Mathematics class feeling bored.

Mr Kent is droning on about something. You aren't sure what it is. You stopped paying attention ages ago.

"Want to go shopping after school?" Janet whispers to you from the next seat.

"Sure." You answer. "If we don't die of boredom first."

"Miss Petersen." Mr Kent calls your name. "Are you paying attention?"

"Yes." You lie.

"Then what did I just explain about right triangles?" He quizzes you.

"Susan Petersen." Your voice is called over the PA system. "Please report to the principal's office."

"Gotta go." You tell Mr Kent. Can't keep the principal waiting.

He motions toward the door, indicating that you are free to go.
1.title: Just another day

choices: Ask if you can tell Janet
11.content:
You head straight to the office.

"Susan." The receptionist greets you. "They are waiting for you in Mr Thompson's office."

"They?" You ask. "Who's waiting for me?"

"I don't know." She says. "Just get in there."

You nervously open the door.

The principal, Mr Thompson is seated at his desk.

Four men in suits are positioned in the corners of the room and a woman is seated with her back to you.

One of the men whispers something into his wrist as you enter.

"Um." You start. "Hello."

"Susan." The woman turns and stands. "It's so good to finally meet you."

"Who are you?" You ask.

"This is Queen Charlotte of Calonia." Mr Thompson introduces the woman. "She has something to discuss with you. I'll give you some privacy."

With that he leaves. The woman signals to the four suited men and they follow the principal out of the room.

"Calonia?" You ask. "I've never heard of it."

"It is a very small country in Europe." she explains. "We don't get noticed much by the rest of the world."

"And you flew here to see me?" You ask. "Why?"

"After me, you are the next in line for the throne." she says simply.

"If I was a princess I think I'd know it." You argue.

"Your father was my cousin." She explains. "As I am unable to bear children and you are my closest living relative, you will be our next queen."

"Wow." Is all you can say.

"Come" she tells you. "Let us collect your belongings."

"We're going now?" You ask. "To Calonia?"

"Yes." She says, leading you from the room. "Come along."
11.title: Go to the principal's office.

choices: Insist that your mother come too.
111.content:
"Wait." You say. "Can I tell my friend Janet? I promised to go shopping with her after school"

The Queen signals to one of the men outside the room and has a few words with him. He leaves and soon the PA system announces "Janet Brown please report to the principal's office."

She soon arrives. "What's with the men in black?"

"I think they are my body guards." You tell her.

"What?" She asks. "Why do you have bodyguards."

"Apparently, I'm a princess." you say.

"No, really." she insists. What's going on?

"She is Princess Susan of Calonia." Queen Charlotte answers.

"And who are you?" Janet demands. "The Queen?"

"Yes." she answers.

"Look Janet." You say. "I have to go to Calonia now. I just wanted to tell you so you don't think I ditched you."

"You're leaving?" She asks. "When will you be back?"

"There is a lot to be done in Calonia." The queen answers for you.

Janet looks upset. You two are best friends. You got caught up in the excitement of being a princess you didn't think about how much you would miss her.

"Is there any way Janet can come with us?" You ask Queen Charlotte. "For a holiday."

"I'm sure my mom will say yes." Janet adds, helpfully, cheering up instantly at the idea.

A phonecall and explanations are made to Janet's parents. It takes a while to convince them of what's happening but in the end they decide if you were making it up to get away with something you'd come up with something more believable.

Flanked by the bodyguards, You, Janet and the Queen leave the office and climb into a waiting limousine. The first stop is Janet's house, where she quickly gathers some clothes for the trip.

Next the limo takes you home. Your mother is waiting there. Clearly she has been informed of what is happening and has started packing for you.

"Aren't you coming too Mom." You ask.

"I can't just leave my job and I'd need to sell the house." She says. "It's complicated."
111.title: Ask if you can tell Janet

choices: Say it doesn't matter because there's no way you're wearing diapers.
Say that it would be better having her do it than a stranger.
1111.content:
"If I'm a princess then there must be people who can sort out the house for us." you say, looking at the Queen.

The Queen nods. "Yes that can be arranged."

"See." you say. "And what's the worst that can happen about your job? They can fire you and give you a bad reference. What does that matter? You'll be living in a palace in another country."

"You're right." your mother says. "That's not the real reason."

"Then why don't you want to come?" you ask.

"They have some..." she pauses. "...strange traditions in Calonia. It's the reason your father left."

"She is referring to the fact that children wear diapers until they turn 18." the queen explains.

"What?" you ask, staring at her with your mouth open.

Janet just burst out laughing at the idea. "You wearing diapers! I've gotta see that."

"If you're coming you've gotta wear them too." you respond. "Doesn't she?" you ask Queen Charlotte.

"Well no." the queen admits. "It's not a law and we accept that other people have different traditions."

"So I don't have to wear them either." you conclude.

"No." she disappoints you. "As a member of the royal family you cannot be seen to be disregarding our traditions. Especially since you have lived your whole life so far outside of Calonia."

You look to your mother, hoping that she can get you out of this.

"That's why I didn't want to come." your mother explains. "I didn't want to embarrass you by being the one to put you back in diapers."

"Shutup." you tell Janet.

"Sorry." she says. "But this is a little funny."

"Would you still think it was funny if you were the one who had to wear diapers?" you ask.

"Fine. I'll wear them too." she says. "It's not like anyone can make fun of us there, they'll all be diapered too."

111111.content:
"You'd really wear diapers?" you ask her.

"If that's what it takes to get a free holiday in your palace then yes." she says.

"Okay." you agree. "I'll wear diapers if Janet does too."

The Queen turns to an assistant "Please fetch the princess's diaper bag and a suitable dress for each of them from the car. They might as well get ready here."

You and Janet exchange nervous looks as the woman briskly follows her orders.

The requested items are brought inside.

"I'll change her in her bedroom." Your mother suggests.

The Queen motions to the assistant. "Please take care of Janet."

You and Janet follow your mother up to the room. The assistant follows behind.

"Let's get this over with." Your mother says. Accepting a disposable diaper from the assistant. "Get undressed and lay down."

You and Janet hesitate but, after an impatient look from your mother, start undressing. It's been years since you were naked in front of your mother. You try to cover yourself with your hands as you lay next to Janet on your bed waiting for the next, more humiliating, step.

Your mother slides the diaper under you. "I didn't think I'd have to do this to you again." she tries to joke.

You offer a weak smile as she pulls the front of the diaper up between your legs and fastens the tapes. "Thanks." you blush realising that you just thanked her for diapering you.

When she helps you up you see that Janet is already standing in her own diaper. You both burst out laughing at how ridiculous the other looks.

You are both helped into the dresses chosen for you. Yours is a pastel blue and a very juvenile style, with athick ribbon tied in a bow at the back. Janet's is similar but pink. You smile, knowing that Janet hates pink. Finally, the outfits are completed with shiny black flat shoes, just as immature as the dresses.

Now all dressed, you are led back out to the queen. You are very self-conscious as you enter the living room.

"You both look adorable." Queen Charlotte compliments you.

"Um." You say, shifting uncomfortably in your thick underwear. "Thanks."

Your mother quickly packs her own bags and the whole group moves out of the house.

You, Janet, Your mother and the Queen all get into the limo and start toward the airport.

Along the way, you start to feel the need to pee.
111111.title: Agree to be diapered if Janet is too.

1111111.content:
You're going to have to get used to being in diapers so you try to pee but nothing comes out. In fact for a moment you no longer feel like you need to pee. It's almost as if your bladder retreated at the threat of ignoring years of being toilet trained.

When the pressure returns you try again, this time pushing hard. You eventually manage a trickle. The feeling of wetness against your bottom makes you panic and stop. What if the diaper leaks? You reassure yourself that it's not going to and squeeze again. It starts as a trickle, the wetness gradually expanding, then the stream becomes stronger and you are soon flooding your diaper.

"Are you okay?" Janet asks. Noticing the look of concentration on your face change to an odd relaxation.

You blush.

11112.content:
"You think it would be better to let a stranger do it?" you ask.

"No." your mother agrees. "I didn't think about it that way."

"So you're coming?" you ask.

"Yes." she says. "Alright. I'll come with you."

Your mother quickly packs her own bags and the whole group moves out of the house to the limo.

It is a short drive to the airport where a private jet is waiting for you.

"Wow." You say as you enter the plane. The interior looks like a luxury suite at a hotel.

"Please fasten your seat-belts." A stewardess directs the passengers. "I will show you to your rooms after takeoff."

You, your mother, Janet and Queen Charlotte take your seats while the bodyguards file through a doorway to another section of the plane.

As promised, after takeoff you are shown to your room. "It's the most luxurious room I've ever seen." you tell Janet.

"And this is just the plane." She points out. "You lucky bitch. Why can't I be the princess?"

"You can wear the diapers if you like" You say.

"Nah. I think I'll pass" she says. "But I can change your if you like."

You pick up a pillow and throw it at her.

The ensuing pillow fight is interrupted as Queen Charlotte enters, followed by your mother. "I think it's time to get you dressed for your arrival in Calonia. there will be photographers."

"Time to get into your diapees." Janet teases.

You give her one more whack across the face with your pillow.

The Queen lets out a frustrated breath at your un-princess-like behaviour as she opens the wardrobe and retrieves a fancy, but juvenile, blue dress. "This will be suitable." She lays it on the bed then pulls open a drawer and informing your mother. "Here are the diapers and changing supplies." With that she leaves.

"Okay honey." your mother says, picking up a large disposable diaper and turning it over in her hands. "Undress and lay on the bed."

"Okay Mom." You say. "You'll come and visit though?"

"Naturally." She says. "I'm not going to say no to a holiday in a palace."

You finish packing and say goodbye to your mother before getting back into the limo.

It's a short ride to the airport when you board a private jet.

"Wow." You say as you and Janet enter the plane. The interior looks like a luxury suite at a hotel.

"Please fasten your seat-belts." A stewardess directs you and Janet. "I will show you to your rooms after takeoff."

You, Janet and Queen Charlotte take your seats while the bodyguards file through a doorway to another section of the plane.

As promised, after takeoff you are shown to your room. "It's the most luxurious room I've ever seen." you tell Janet.

"And this is just the plane." She points out. "You lucky bitch. Why can't I be the princess?"

"You can't talk to me like that." You giggle as you throw a pillow at her. "I'm a princess. I could have you beheaded."

The ensuing pillow fight is interrupted by Queen Charlotte. "I think it's time to get you dressed for your arrival in Calonia. there will be photographers."

She opens a wardrobe, revealing a number of ornate dresses. She pauses momentarily before choosing a blue one, which she lays on the bed.

Next she opens a drawer. It takes a moment to register what you are seeing. the drawer is full of diapers and baby changing supplies like wipes and powder.

"Um." You say. "What are those for?"

"They are for you." Queen Charlotte answers. "It is tradition in Calonia that children are not potty trained until their eighteenth birthday. It reminds them that they are children and helps for strong bonds with their parents."

Janet lets out a giggle.

"That's nice for you." You say. "But I assure you I am potty trained. I won't be needing the diapers."

"It is an important tradition to our people." the queen informs you. "As the princess you can't be seen as ignoring our traditions. Especially since you were not born in Calonia."

"The people won't be able to see my underwear." You point out. "Let them believe I'm diapered."

"I'm afraid that won't work." She says. "It's difficult for the royal family to keep anything private. Such a secret would surely be leaked."

Janet bursts out laughing at her choice of words in that context. "Leaked!."

You fail to find anything to throw at her before she closes the door behind her.

You decide against resisting and raise your arms so the Queen can pull your t-shirt over your head. Next she helps you out of your shoes and jeans. Without a pause, she removes your bra and panties, leaving you completely naked.

"I'm new to this." Charlotte says, unfolding the diaper. "So be patient."

She slides the diaper under your bottom and applies powder. Next she brings the front of the diaper up firmly between your legs and fastens the tapes, sealing you into your diaper.

You are both put in a pale-blue bra, matching the colour of your dress, which the queen pulls on over your head.

Next come the shoes. Flat and shiny like a little girl would wear. You guess the Calonians aren't big on growing up fast. Your dress, although obviously expensive is also a little immature.

"Just adorable, the queen steps back to admire her work." She goes to leave the room. "Just come and find me or one of the stewardesses if you need your diaper changed."

You sit on the bed and wonder how you're going to face her. It takes a while to get comfortable with your huge skirt around you and the thick padding between your legs. You as still shifting around when there is a knock at your door.

Before you can answer, Janet lets herself in. To your relief, she is wearing a red dress similar to your own, but you're sure her underwear is different. "The queen insisted I dress up." she explains. "Did you really let her put you in diapers?"

She has you sit at the dressing table and begins brushing your hair while Janet watches.

"Susan, Janet!!! You're going to be late for school!!!" The Queen calls for you.

"I'm coming" You yell back to the Queen.

"We have to leave in 5 minutes. Come on let's go!" The Queen calls back.

Unfortunately the school has uniforms. It would have been nice of the Queen has told you earlier but that's not the end of it. The uniforms are very hard to get on and off. The girl uniform is just a one piece shirt and skirt combination. The shirt is pink with yellow flowers on it. While it's elegant, it looks like it was designed for toddlers. The skirt is also pink with a baby blue ribbon. It's also very frilly. The length is pretty dissapointing and doesn't do much for covering up your diaper. You understand that skirts make diaper changes easier, but the colors and overall babyish look of them are what really tick you off. The worst part though is that there is a zipper on the back of the uniform. This makes it impossible to take it on and off without help. Almost like a wedding dress. You can only guess that this is done to make sure that kids behave and use their diapers. Speaking off diapers, the school requires that all students must be put into extra bulky diapers in order to prevent leakage and so that the teachers won't have to clean up after every little pee pee accident. The diapers are several inches thick and make it a chore to walk. Your legs are spread really far apart which makes waddling almost impossible to avoid. Once you are finally able to get yourself situated inside of your uniform, you call for one of the maids to help you with your zipper.

While the maid help you with your zipper, the Queen finds you and starts to go over what you need for school.

"Did you remember to pack up your book Susan? How about your Crayons?"

"Yes Queen." You tell the Queen. "I've already packed up everything you asked for."

"Okay, here's your lunch." The Queen says as she hands you a lunch box. "Oh and here." The Queen takes out a blue ribbon from her pockets and ties it into your hair. "The bus should be here soon Susan. Hurry up or you'll be late."

The Queen practically pushes you out of the door. Once outside, the Queen grabs you by the hand and walks you to your bus stop.

"Wait, what about Janet?" You ask the Queen.

"We decided that it would be best to homeschool her until she is, um...better adjusted to our traditions." The queen tells you.

When you arrive at the bus stop, the Queen finally let's go of your hand. After a minute of waiting with her, the Queen says something.

"Susan, the bus should just be a few blockes away. I have a meeting to attend to so I won't be able to see you off. Have a great first day of school honey." The Queen gives you a hug and walks back to the palace.

You can see the bus now. It's a very bright shade of yellow and has pictures of teddy bears or something on it. You're beggining to have second thought about this. It's never to late to ditch school you know.

The boys sit on the blue side and the girls sit on the other. Instead of normal seats, each row contains two toddler seats with belt buckles and everything. You sit alone near the back of the bus. You sit down on the toddler seat and buckle your self in. This has got to be the most embarrassing bus you've ever rode in. The conversations the other kids on the bus you can hear are both childish and really boring. There is no talk of gossip, of fashion, or even of cute boys. It's just dumb stuff like, "Look what my mom packed me for lunch." or "Do you want to play at my house after school?". None of these kids are mature in the slightest. Eventually the bus stops at the school. You look out the window and see...
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.title: Get on the bus

choices: Ask the teacher for a diaper change.
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.content:
You sigh in relief that the school looks mostly normal. But then you freak out a little. The bus looks normal on the outside, but the interior is babyish. What if the school is the same? You cross your fingers and hope not.

All the kids pile off the bus, you being last. To your surprise a lot of them groan. At least they don't like school like normal kids. You try to walk into the building and groan at your waddle. You blush in embarrassment and wonder how you are going to survive the next four years.

An odd thought crosses your mind as you step into the school. The students are talking to each other as they walk through the halls, and they're waddling as much as you are. The girls are all wearing the same uniform as you, and the boys are wearing shorts that show off their diapers. Some boys aren't even wearing shorts and are just wearing diapers. You blush at the sight of some boys bear legs a realize they are one un-taping away from being naked. They're dealing with this too. You aren't alone. This thought gives you some joy, realizing that no one is going to make fun of you. You at least have that to look forward to.

You pull out a slip of paper from your backpack that tells you where your homeroom is. You make your way around the school until you find your class. You peak inside and am glad to see that the room isn't that different than your old school.

The teacher, a friendly looking woman who you guess to be in her thirties, smiles and waves at you. "Hello. You must be my new student."

You shrink back as the whole class looks at you. The teacher walks over and gently pulls you in. "Don't be shy. now. Class, this is Susan. I'm sure you all know about it."

"She's the new princess!" one student said.

"I saw it on the news," added another.

You are surprised and embarrassed. They all saw you at t.v. while you wet yourself. On the other hand, they apparently watch the news. That's a bit more mature than some of your friends back home.

"That's right, Susan is out country's princess. She's also new to our customs, so be nice to her as she is still learning."

One girl raised her hand.

"Yes, Mary?" the teacher asked.

"Can I ask Susan a question?"

The teacher turns to you. "Susan?"

"Uh, sure," you say.

"Is it true they don't make you wear diapers where you're from?"

You sigh. "Yes. They actually make you stop when you're two or three."

The students eyes widen. The girl that asked you said, "They make you? as in they force you to stop?"

You blink. "They don't make you stop here?"

The teacher shakes her head. "Nope. In fact, some people never stop wearing them." She blushes. "But enough chit chat. It's time to get started with class. Your seat is in the second row."

You waddle over to it and sort of zone out as you process this new information. Some of the people don't even stop wearing diapers? This place is so weird. But as you sit on the soft padding, you realize that this situation isn't nearly as bad as you thought. You still wish you weren't wearing a diaper, but it's not that bad if everyone else is doing it. Besides that, you are a princess and eventual queen. Having to wear diapers isn't such a terrible trade off for that.

After about an hour of pretty normal school dealings, you suddenly wet your diaper. No warning, no feelings of pressure. You just go and fill your diaper. You stifle a gasp. How could this have happened? Then you remember your dealings with the spa treatments and the pill that had side effects. This must be one, complete loss of your bladder control. You wonder in horror if that includes your bowls as well. You touch your diaper and feel it squish. It's even bigger than it was before, but can still take more. You look around and see that no one seems to have noticed. However, you notice that several other girls have wet diapers. What are they going to do about it, you wonder. Should you ask or just wait?
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.title: A typical looking school

1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.content:
You decide not to mention your soaked diaper and continue working on the suprisingly familiar math work.

After what felt like forever, the bell rings and everyone gets up for recess. Back at your old school, you remember that your own high school didn't have a recess, and decide that this may be another quirk to the new school worth trying.

You follow your class in line through the door to the outside, feeling the wet sensation of your diaper rubbing up against your groin strangely comforting. You block the sun with your hand as your eyes adjust to the sudden light, only to see what must have been the largest playground you might ever see.

It was tall. Really tall. It was like a McDonald's playground painted in baby blue and pink. The slides were long with a padding at the very end to prevent injury. Monkey bars made from metal and reinforced plastic, also with padding. A swing-set on the side where a diapered boy was pushing a diapered girl, almost like it was a date.

All the kids were laughing and playing. You watch, feeling somewhat alienated. You didn't know anyone, and you started feeling like crying, unsure why you wanted to cry when you didn't with this feeling at your old school.

"Princess Susan?" You look beside you and see your teacher looking down at you. Her eyes scroll lower and see the incredibly thick diaper just below your waist. "Do you need a diaper change?"
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.title: Don't say anything.

choices: You try to introduce yourself to the others
You try to keep attention from yourself
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.content:
You stand there, twiddling your thumbs behind you back. You avert your eyes and blush wildly in embarrassment.

"Yes" you squeek. She takes your hand and leads you to the corner of the area, where there appears to be a comfortable leather mat on the ground, with a set of shelfs mounted by the wall, filled with baby powder, baby wipes, a diaper pail and lots and lots of thick school-grade diapers. She lays you down on the leather mat and lifts up your skirt, revealing your wet, bulging diaper in between your thighs.

She begins to untape your diaper and clean you up. You cover your face in embarrassment. You peek through your fingers, only to realize that one of the boys from the playground was standing over you, watching you passively. Even worse, you realize that he was the front of a line of kids your age, waiting to have their diaper changed too.

"Alright, all done." The teacher said, as she helped you up as the boy at the front of the line layed down where you were. The teacher untaped his diaper, you turning around immediately trying not to see his exposed groin. You waddle towards the playground to keep your mind off it.
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.title: Yes

1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.content:
"No, ma'am, I'm okay," you reply.

The teacher 'hmms' for a moment. "Well, I need to check to be sure." Without even giving you a chance to respond, she reaches her hand to your diaper and gives it a little push and squeeze. You feel your face go red from the embarrassment of another person suddenly grabbing at your crotch.

"Hmm, only half full. Well, go have fun, then," the teacher says with a smile.

You stand there, a little dumbfounded, as the teacher goes to sit and supervise. You feel shame, but also some satisfaction and curiosity. You suddenly remembered that you're wearing school-bulk diapers, made to hold more so that changes were less frequent. That was way nobody raised their hand in class. You feel really weird and conflicted. You've been spared the embarrassment of getting changed, but now you have to walk around in a pee-filled diaper until it's full.

You turn to the playground and finally submit; this looks like a lot of fun. You take in a breath and move toward the playground, listening to the laughter and cheers from the other kids. Teens you force yourself to think. They're so unlike the teens you knew. Memories flood into your mind, of times when you were younger and would play in the McDonald's playground, crawling through the plastic and rope tunnels, going down the slide that seemed so large back then, goofing around with any other kid that happened to be there. This was like that, only fitted for someone your size.

You crawl up one of the towers, slipping and pulling your whole body, using your legs to lift yourself up in a way you hadn't done for a long time, making you feel small and a little giddy. You reach to top and see a long plastic tunnel. It's just big enough that you could stand up in a hunched over position. Again, you were reminded of being a five year old at McDonald's. Against your will, you giggle.

As you meander around in your memories, someone bumps into you. More specifically, they try to crawl up the tower and your butt is in the way, meaning their face collides with your padded rear and creates an audible squish noise. You tip forward and land on your hands and knees.

"Oh my gosh, I'm sorry," a boy says. You look over your shoulder to see a guy sticking his head up over the ledge you just crawled up. "Are you okay?"

You blush as much as the boy. You're trying not to think about how stimulating it was for a boy to stick his face into your diapered butt. "I'm... I'm fine."

The boy gasped and crawled the rest of the way up. You see that he's one of the boys who doesn't wear the shorts, meaning you can see all of his hairless legs, and you're forced to think about how close to being naked he is. "Wow. You're the princess, right?"

You turn your whole body to him, but only nod.

The boy blushed a little harder. "You're a lot prettier up close."

You gasp and feel your stomach flutter. "I-I'm Susan."

"My name's Tristan," he says back. "Would you, ah, like to play with me?"

You feel a lot more joy at hearing that then you knew you should. You remember how alone and scared you were just fives minutes ago and how you wanted to cry. Not, all of a sudden, you want to cheer. You restrain yourself, though. "Um, sure, I guess. What do you want to do?"

He grins. "Well, if you want, we can go to the hidden corner and have a snack. Then we could ride the slide and swim in the pall pit."

A ball pit, you think. You hadn't noticed one before. More memories come back to you, all of them happy. "Okay..." you say slowly. You let him go past you and follow him, both of you crawling through the tunnels. He leads you to a cube shaped area with a window the overlooks the playground. It's so high up, you can see a great deal more of the city then before.

Tristan sits on his padded rear with a plop. You follow suit, except your diaper makes a squish noise beneath your bottom. He then reaches into the front of his diaper and pulls out a snack sized packet of Oreos. He laughs at the face you make. "What's the matter?"

"Those were in you diaper!" You shout.

"Shh!" He says. "How else am I supposed to sneak snacks in here? It's not like the school uniform has pockets." He blushes. "But I promise I haven't wet my diaper yet. I always put my snacks away if I'm about to. Most times I don't get to have snacks."

"Well at least you aren't completely disgusting," you say with a huff. He opens the pack and gives you some cookies. You feel weird again as you munch on the treat. This was the height of 'breaking the rule's for the teens here. Somehow, you still felt incredibly naughty for eating when it wasn't lunch time.

"Others don't come here often," Tristan said after he swallowed a cookie. "So it's a great place to think."

You raise a brow. "What kind of things do you think about?"

He laughed. "Probably pretty silly stuff to you, not knowing our customs. I've seen pictures of the rest of the world, and I like to think about how much I'd like to be out there in one of your schools." He paused. "I don't think I'd like it very much. Other kids seem scary there, like they are all bullies who don't treat people right. I couldn't imagine oogling over pretty girls unless I got to know them first. I was always taught you need to respect a girl before you date one."

Your mind has frozen in shock at his response. You aren't sure what to think about it. You desperately want to believe he's immature and doesn't know what he's talking about, but you know in your heart that what he just said was what you had always wanted in a boy; a guy who would treat you nicely. You begin to wonder if the teens here aren't as immature as you thought, just raised differently.

"Hey, are you okay?" he asks. You suddenly realize that you were sniffling. What was happening to you!? Your feeling all sorts of things you knew you shouldn't be feeling and wanting to cry at things only babies would cry at. But... you suddenly know why you're crying. You're thinking of all the boys you had broken up with because they had gotten bored and how much you wanted them to last.

It's that spa treatment and pill again, you think. It's making you think more innocently and more reactive to your feelings. You wipe your eyes and say, "I'm fine. I'm just thinking about how right you are. I wish that..." you stop yourself before you say anymore.

He looks at you with confusion and maybe a little pity. "Well, uh, want to go to the ball pit?"

You sniff again and smile. "Sure." You follow him again and he leads you to a slide. "Ladies first," he says. You giggle and go down. The rush you feel is amazing, like what you'd get at a water park slide. You suddenly realized how much you missed playgrounds, and you're disappointed when you hit the plastic padding at the end. You're happy, though, after climbing around like a toddler.

Tristan comes down and the second he lands, he grabs your hand and pulls you along along, both of you almost falling since you're wadding in the super thick diapers. He take you to a structure behind the playground, the ball pit. "Come on!" He shouts. The ball pit is swimming pool sized to compensate for the size of the babies- er, people- playing in them. You have to climb a flight of stairs to get to the edge.

"Ready?" Tristan asked.

"Yes?" you half ask.

He gives you a push and you fall into the balls face first. You aren't hurt, but you are annoyed. You hear him jump in. You reposition yourself in the balls, the familiar sound of them rattling pleasant to you. But you have other business. You pick up a ball and throw it at Tristan, knocking him in the face. "You jerk!" you shout.

"Hey, you're not hurt," he laughs. He pick up some balls and throws them all at once at you. "Now come on and fight back or I'll bury you."

You grin and begin to chuck the plastic balls at him while trying to dodge his attacks. You're having so much fun, you've completely forgotten that you were ever embarrassed, though you wet diaper is still a firm reminder of a few things. Halfway through one throw, you stop and groan. Your stomach churns and, before you know it, you've messed in your diaper as wet it some more.

"Hey, are you okay?" He asks at your pause.

"I... messed my diaper.

He nods. "Well, hurry and get changed, then. There's only fifteen minutes of recess left." He takes your hand and leads you out of the ball pit. Your face is red once you're out. Your full diaper is very visibly sagging and sloshing now with each waddling step you take. You feel the warm poop and pee rub against your crotch. You find that you're sobbing all of a sudden.

"What's wrong?" he asks.

"I... I feel like I've lost control of everything!" You cry. "This isn't like my home at all! Teens aren't supposed to where diapers and use them like babies But even worse is that I'm getting used to it." You sniffle. "I love this playground, and the attention I've been getting, and you sweet you are. But I'm not the one deciding to do this."

He pulls you into a gentle hug. "I know I'm not like boys where you're from, but I get it. It's frustrating to not have control. Do you want me to come with you to get changed?

You think about it a moment...
1112111112111212112121121121122221221111.title: No, I'm okay

1112111112111212112121121121122221221221.content:
The two well dressed bodyguards walked into the room, one of whom was pushing an expensive looking stroller. To both of their shock strapped inside was a toddler Queen Charlotte who looked like she wasn't a day over two. She was dressed in a small gown that was made to fit a small child and instead of her crown a smaller tiara rest on her head.

To their even greater surprise the baby Queen was at the moment nursing on a baby bottle filled with what looked like apple juice. However she quickly finished it off a few seconds later.

"All done" she said waving the empty bottle in the air, "Can one of you please burp me now."

One of the bodyguards took away the baby bottle while the other unstrapped the Queen from her stroller. Lifting her up over his shoulder the man gently patted the infant ruler's back and a few seconds later the baby girl let out a loud burp.

"Thank you that feels much better" the Queen said as she was lowered to the floor.

She then turned to face you and Janet, the both of your mouths hanging open at the scene you just witnessed.

"I'm sure the both of you have questions" the Queen said simply.

"Uh yeah we have questions, like why are you a baby now?" Janet asked voicing the question that was on your mind too.

"Well you see after seeing Princess Susan here regain her youth and choose to stay five years old it made me realize that I wished to regain my youth as well. So after putting the two of you down for your naps I paid a little visit to the spa and had a few of the extra deluxe treatments myself. I had actually intended to make myself the same age as you two but unfortunately they took off more than expected regressing me further than what I planned. However I am okay with my new age, I have my youth back but more importantly I am more than young enough to be able to wear diapers again" she explained.

"Wait, you're wearing diapers now too?" you asked curiously.

"Yes" she said and reached down lifted up the bottom of her dress to reveal she was wearing a diaper similar to their own underneath.

Letting her dress fall back down she continued, "Not only am I wearing them I need them now too. As I'm sure you already guessed I'm no longer potty trained at this age and given our country's laws I won't be for quite some time. Nor do I want to be since like Princess Susan I've taken quite a liking to them. Anyway after leaving the spa I had my new nanny change my wet diaper and put me down for a nap so I wouldn't be cranky for tonight's dinner. I myself just woke up half an hour ago and had a quick snack on the way here."

"Yeah why are you here exactly?" Janet asked.

"So the two of you won't be surprised when I reveal the new me at the party. It will be quite a shock to more than a few to see their host is now a diapered toddler. But it shouldn't be too bad given I already told of Susan's predicament."

Not really paying attention to what she was saying you grin as you now have another baby friend to play with. You were busying thinking of the fun games you could play now that the Queen was a baby when all of a sudden she...

After dusting the baby girl’s bottom with sweet smelling powder the man pulled out a fresh disposable diaper and slid it under her butt. Charlotte smiled behind her pacifier as the guard taped her up, kicking her legs in satisfaction at the feeling of a new diaper.

At that moment your best friend asks a question that gets your attention.

“Wait a second they just changed her so why does it still stink in here?” Janet asked confused by the stinky smell that was still in the air.

Remembering your own diapers you and Janet quickly check yourselves to find out that Charlotte wasn’t the only poopy pants in the room.

You turn your attention to Janet, who despite complaining just moments ago, has become suspiciously silent. Her cheeks appear more vibrant than her typical complexion.

"What's wrong Janet?" You ask innocently.

Your friend refuses to answer. She's looking down, avoiding eye contact with the other occupants of the room.

You catch the guards exchanging glances with one another; they both approach Janet. One of the guards kneels down to Janet's height, who is unable to flee due to the presence of the other guard. Bypassing any decency for the poor girl, the first guard lifts up Janet's skirt, and peers into her diaper.

"Just as I thought, the fussy one pooped herself." The guard complains.

At that moment, Janet began to tear up.

"Can...can you at least change me in the other room?" Janet chocked out.

The same guard sighed. He took Janet by the hand, and lead her out of the room.

When the commotion settled, Queen Charlotte burst into laughter.

"OH MY GOD! Your friend is such a baby. That was adorable."

You laughed with the Queen, but still felt a bit guilty for Janet's situation.

"Susan, as a princess, you hold more authority than you think." Queen Charlotte crawled towards your side of the bed. "If you wanted, I could have the guards treat Janet as if she were an infant such as myself."

You're perplexed by the Queen's proposal.

"Why would I do that to my friend?" You ask.

"She'll have to get use to this lifestyle eventually. You saw how she was acting earlier. It's because she's going from the life of a teenager, to the life of a child. The whiplash is affecting her negatively. If she were put into the lifestyle of an infant: pacifiers, diapers, breastfeeding and all; childhood would seem better by comparison. Then the two of you could play without worry or care."

You weren't sure at first, but the Queen was certainly skilled at persuasion, even as a toddler. Should you help Janet adjust by having the royal staff treat her as an infant?

1112111112111212112121121121122221221221.content:
“No, even if what you’re saying is true I don’t want to force my best friend to do something she isn’t ready for” you said with an air of finality after some thought.

“But don’t you want a baby playmate whose into and enjoys the same things you do?” the Queen pressed the subject, “I know you’re sad she doesn’t share the same appeal to such things as wearing and using diapers like you do.”

“I do but not like this, I want it to be her choice to embrace the baby lifestyle. And yeah I am sad about that but I care about her feeling more than mine” you stated firmly.

“Did you really mean all that?” a young voice said out loud from across the room.

You and Queen Charlotte both turn your heads to see a freshly diapered Janet being held by one of the two guards who were standing in the open doorway. The five year old had a stunned look on her face and it was safe for you to assume she heard everything, or mostly everything.

“How much did you hear?” Charlotte asked voicing the first question that came to your mind.

“All of it actually, your guards here changed me pretty quickly” she replied with a faint blush as she was carried over and placed back on the bed before remembering her previous words.

“So did you really mean all of that Susan?”

“Yeah of course I did” you answered with a smile, “You’re my best friend.”

Janet slowly smiled back, “Thanks…and I’m sorry I haven’t been accepting of you wanting to go back to being a baby again or of your recent babyish activities like when you cried after pooping yourself”

You giggle and gave her a warm hug, “That’s okay I forgive you.”

You’re surprised when she pulls away, “No it’s not okay. I heard what the Queen said about me needing to adjust to this lifestyle eventually and to be honest…” She fingered the edges of her dress, “I’m starting to warm up to the idea of being a baby again. When I pooped myself I had actually gone much earlier then you both thought, I just didn’t say anything because I really enjoyed sitting in my messy diaper and pretended to hate it when you both found out” Janet shamefully confessed.

Seeing that she felt bad about her previous actions you decide to forgive and forget in the form of another hug.

“Really? You’re not mad at me for being a hypocrite?” Janet asked.

“I’m just glad I’m going to have a baby friend after all” you say with glee.

“Wow, you really are my best friend” Janet said as she returned the hug.

It was at this point in the conversation that Charlotte interjected.

“I’m glad that you two are back to getting along and also that you’re starting to see things our way Janet. Trust me when I say you’ll enjoy being a baby more than an adult; you get to take long naps, watch TV and play all day, drink from a baby bottle, and make poo poo in your diapers as much as want and someone else change you, just like I did a while ago” she grinned listing off all the great perks of being a toddler.

Janet blushed as she had to admit all of that sounded really good.

The toddler Queen then turned her attention back to you.

“And as for you, I’m actually a little proud that you rejected my earlier proposal Susan. It shows that you’re willing to think of other people’s feelings before your own and that’s a mark of a great ruler. If I ever decide to step down from the throne I’m sure you’d make a great Queen” she said causing you to beam at the praise.

“Don’t count on it happening anytime soon. I rather like sitting on my throne especially with added cushioning of my diapers” Charlotte said as she plopped down on her rear and lifted up the front of her gown to once again inspect her padding.

“I still find it kind of weird that despite being back in them and now being a two year old you’re still Queen of this country” Janet said with disbelief.

“Oh please, there have been plenty of kings and queens throughout history who succeeded to their thrones before they were out of diapers” the Queen retorted sticking out her tongue in a childish manner, “Age, or rather lack of it, has never been much of an obstacle to high office.”

“Still feels weird” Janet replied.

It was at this point that you interjected; having had something important you wanted to talk to the Queen about.

“Um Queen Charlotte…”

“You and your friend don’t need to be so formal around me, just call me “Charlotte” from now on” she smiled showing off her baby teeth.

“Okay Charlotte can I ask you a favor?” you asked.

“Of course, you are the Princess after all. Whatever it is you want, as long as it’s within reason you shall receive” Charlotte replied.

“I want to…”

“The words of a tired baby in a full diaper, please don’t not take her last words serious. I think it is time for the Princess to go home and take her nap. Thank you Gentlemen.”

More cameras are clicking, when the Queen takes your hand and lead you to a big limousine, while you suck on your pacifier to calm down. Janet follows behind and is shaking her head.
A maid, who waits in the car straps you into a car seat, while the Queen and Janet sits down in front of you. You are jealous at Janet, since she is has much more freedom than you.

“Oh Susan, please be more careful what you say!” The Queen says, calm and controlled, but clearly disappointed. Millions of boys and girls are wearing and using diapers and are treated like you – and you say that is insane?! We have to wait what the press will print before we can think about ways to solve the mess you created.

“I am sorry.” You whisper around your pacifier. “I wet myself and got distracted.”

“That is not an excuse. I noticed it right away when you went in your diaper, but you had clear instructions and clearly did NOT follow my orders.” The Queen says and looks out of the tinted window for the rest of the ride.

Finally you arrive at the palace. The Queen sighs and takes your hand.
“Okay, we deal with that later. Now it is time to…
111212222223131.title: "I threw a tantrum about the color of the d...

choices: Silently wait that she finish changing your diaper
1112122222231311.content:
... get you changed.”
Still holding your hand, she guides you inside the palace. Janet, of course, is right behind you.
In the palace work a lot of servants. The all great you as you pass by.
As you reach a great door, the queen speak to Janet, saying “You can wait here.”
Janet nod, while you scan the door. It is a very well crafted wooden door. You aren't an expert, but even you can say it's made of a valuable wood. On the door there is a golden plate, on which is engraved an inscription: "Nursery".
Queen Charlotte open the door. Inside, there is simply a nursery. It contains a changing table, a crib and a lot of baby supplies, like every other nursery. There is just one little detail: everything is oversized.
A maid awaits you there. The queen let your hand go, hand says to the maid “The princess needs a diaper change.”
The maid take a bow, saying “Of course, your majesty.”
The queen then turns her head toward you, and says “After the change, you will take a nap. I’ll come to wake you up when it’s time.”
Without giving you the time to answer, the queen leaves the room, closing the door behind her. You are left alone with the maid.
She is wearing a typical French maid outfit: a black dress with white trim with a full skirt, a white half-apron with ruffle, a white ruffled headpiece, black long tights, black high-heeled shoes and a white garter around the left leg.
“Greetings, princess.” she says to you “My name is Rose Fletcher, the maid in charge of the nursery. You can call me Rose on normal circumstances, but if you’ve been naughty you will address me as Miss Fletcher. It’s that clear?”
You blush a little, answering “Yes, Miss Fletcher.”
She gives you a smile, and says “You are very polite, I like it. Now get on the changing table. If we wait too long to change it, you can get a diaper rash.”
You do as you’re told. When you are on the changing table, Rose unlock the lock of your onesie, saying “Someone has been naughty, uh? I hope you’ll be on your best behaviour from now on, because I’m not afraid to use the carpet beater on naughty buttocks.”
You gulp, nervously sucking your pacifier, as Rose remove your onesie and is about to change your diaper.
1112122222231311.title: Get you changed.”

choices: You wake up alone, desperate to pee.
11121222222313112.content:
You blush and look down at the used diaper, which hang heavy between your legs.
“Ha Ha, yes a carpet beater – that is a classic… it is a joke, isn’t it?” you say and spin the pacifier around your finger.

Rose tips you on the nose and make you lay down on the changing table. She does not say a word about the mess you made or about the bit amount of pee, but she explains:
“No Princess that is not a joke. I own one to get naughty princesses back in line, but I have other things I like better. My favorite is an old wooden hairbrush. That one works perfectly when I have to take a little one over my knees.”

You laugh out, not realizing she is dead serious.
“Oh, you will not take me over the knees. The queen hat trouble to do that and I will not let a maid repeat that.”

Rose wipes your behind and crotch and makes sure you are clean – everywhere – what feels very good and is distracting you. You blush and a little moan escapes you.

“Oh I see, you think you are in charge, Princess. But in the nursery I am in charge and all permissions to make sure you stay in line.” She slides a thick diaper under your behind and rub a good amount of oil between your legs. She takes her time and it feels more and more like she is teasing your sensitive parts with full intention. But then, while it begins to feel REAL good, she stops and tapes the diaper close. You huff in frustration and now she laughs out.
“Oh yes, I have ways to make sure you behave.” She says and pull some lockable plastic pants over your diaper. “I can give you various spankings, treat you with an enema or suppository or deny you to have naughty fun.”
She give your diaper a little pat and you realize that she is right. With the diaper and plastic pants, you have no access to your… crotch and cannot relief your stress like you usually do.

She helps you to sit up and helps you into a pink romper, with a kitten on the chest, before she helps you down from the changing table and lift you into the crib.
“I know you need to learn a lot, especially in the beginning, but you should be more careful with your words and obey me – but for sure the queen.” She takes your pacifier from your finger and push him into your mouth.
“Those for example stay in until an adult takes them out or allows it. You, my little princess will keep yours in during the nap – except you like to take a sip from the bottle.”

You look around the crib and see the baby bottle that is filled with some milky liquid. When you look back at Rose you nod your head.
“Yeth, Mths. Fehtscher.” You mutter around the pacifier.

She smiles, nods and tuck you in, before she close the blinds and leaves the room.

You sigh in the darkness and try a sip from the baby bottle.
“Oh I am happy that Janet does not see me like this.” You think, as you drink the tasty baby formula, before you put the bottle back in the cover of the crib. You blush and smile when you find the stuffed rabbit and hug him tightly, while you close your eyes and fall asleep.

Two hours later…
11121222222313112.title: Ask about the carpet beater

111212222223131121.content:
… while you are absorbed in your dreams, you feel something touching you. You try to ignore it, but it persists. So, you decide to open your eyes.
The light violently overwhelms them. After a short time, you can see perfectly, and you see queen Charlotte, who’s brightly smiling. She is touching your shoulder, waking you up.
“Good afternoon, princess. Are still asleep or are you already awake?” she asks, removing your pacifier.
After making a loud yawn, you reply “Yes, I’m awake.”
“Good. Now let me check if you’re dry.” she says.
You instantly blush, as she checks your diaper. Luckily, you’re dry.
“Ok. You’re dry.” she states “Get dressed, please. You have a meeting to attend to.”
She helps you coming out from the crib. Rose approach you, and helps you removing your romper. She offers you pink babyish outfit, very similar to the onesie you were wearing before. This one, however, don’t have a unicorn head on it, but a fairy. She helps you putting it on, and then put the lock on it once again.
“The lock? Again?” you ask.
“It will be permanently removed tomorrow morning, princess.” explains Rose “Until you misbehave again, of course.”
She then sit on a chair, asking “Ok, all done. Are you ready for your maintenance spanking?”
In hearing this, you suddenly freeze.
“Maintenance spanking?” you ask her.
“If you misbehaved and got the lock, you will receive a maintenance spanking after your nap. That’s the rule.” intervenes the queen.
“Don’t be afraid, princess.” says Rose “It’s a light spanking with the hand over your diaper.”
Reluctantly, you lay yourself over her knees. She unbuttons the seat of the onesie and opens it, revealing your diaper. She then gives you twenty spanks with her bare hand over it. You feel almost no pain, just a great shame in being spanked over your diaper like a little baby.
After the spanking, she buttons up your onesie.
“Done.” she states, letting you go.
You then reach the queen, who is waiting for you. Together, you leave the nursery.
Queen Charlotte is leading you through the corridors. During this time, you ask her “Are we going to have lunch?”
She turns to you, and answers “Haven’t you already lunched? Rose told me you have sucked your baby bottle.”
“Was that my lunch?” you say, shocked.
“Of course.” she replies “That wasn’t milk, but a formula studied for older kids. Are you really hungry?”
You realize that you are not hungry at all. She is saying the truth.
After a while, you find yourself in front of a door.
“This is prime minister’s office.” says the queen “She is waiting to meet you.”
Nervously, you say …
111212222223131121.title: The queen wakes you up

1112122222231311212.content:
“Are you coming too?” you ask, stepping from one foot to the other.

“No little one. The prime minister asked to see you and you alone. It would be rude if I ignore her request. Only make sure you know that your place is and it will be fine. She is a very clever lady and I am sure she will try to test you – but I am confident that you will do great.” The queen says and pushes you forward.

That words are NOT helping you to feel better. You hate all kind of tests and you are sure that you can’t cheat in this one.

“Hello Princess Susan, I am very happy that you could make it on such a short notice.” The prime minister says. She is a tall black haired woman in the 50th. You have expected her to wear a kind of suit, but she wears an elegant dress – obviously it is okay to be very feminine, even in powerful positions. You like that idea and think about it for a second, until you realize, that you should answer her – now!

“Uhm, yes, of course Ma’am. It is an honor for me.” You say. You are not sure what to do, shake her hand or bend, kiss her hand,… .

“You are the princess and will be Queen, so you do not need to stress yourself. You can call me Lady Kent, that is fine.” The prime minister says and shake your hand.

You smile in return and feel terrible underdressed next to her. She guides you to a table and sit down across of it. “You are not used to our culture, but you must adapt quickly. Millions of people trust in you and nobody wants to change the way we life. It might be strange for somebody like you, but we are very happy and have almost no crime – and we are very sure that is because of your – culture.”

You nod your head, having no clue about crime-rates or anything. You only listens as the prime tells you how peaceful and happy everybody in this country is. After a while she takes a sip from a glass of water and asks you, if you like something to drink as well. You nod your head and she calls in a maid.

Suddenly you are faced with a silver plate, with a baby bottle of a milky liquid, a cup of hot chocolate and a tall glass of water.
“Please princess, take what you like.” Lady Kent is offering and you choose the..
1112122222231311212.title: "Are you coming too?"

choices: "I'm sorry, I'm really really sorry! Please forgive me!"
"It wasn't my fault, dammit! My diaper was full!"
11121222222313112122.content:
... the thing that you think is most appropriate.
At first, you thought not to choose at all. But then you thought it would be a good way to end up on the minister's lap, so you made a choice.
Your hand leans forward, taking the cup of hot chocolate.
You are not sure of it, but you think you saw Lady Kent smiling with the corner of the eye.
“I hope you will like our country, princess.” she says, while you drink your chocolate, which is very tasty “You will rule it as the queen one day.”
Looking at her, you say “Can I ask you a question?”
“Of course. Ask everything you want to know.” she replies.
Hesitating, you ask “How can I learn to be queen if I’m kept in diapers and treated like a baby?”
“You are still very young, princess Susan.” she states “Queen Charlotte is not old herself, so you will have a lot of time to learn how to be queen before you can take the throne. You are not even eighteen.”
You are forced to admit it: that makes perfect sense.
“My second question ...” you say, blushing “... maybe is a stupid one.”
“There are no stupid questions, Susan. Please ask.” she says.
After a little moment of silence, you ask “Is the nursery maid really authorized to spank me with implements?”
Lady Kent smile a little, then replies “Of course. Unruly children must be kept in line. A good old fashion spanking is always the best solution. That’s one of the reasons our country is so peaceful and with so little crime. I was raised with the hairbrush, and I’m now Prime Minister. Even Queen Charlotte got spanked a lot in her youth.”
After finishing your chocolate, you finally ask “Lady Kent ... what do you think of my choice?”
She smiles at your question, replying “It was an excellent choice, Princess Susan.”
“Can I ask you why?” you ask.
“The baby formula would have been suitable for you.” she explains “But you already launched, right? If you had chosen the bottle, it would mean you are a greedy person. On the other hand, choosing the glass of water would have meant you consider yourself a grown up, which is not the case. You made the choice of a polite little one.”
You are happy: you passed the test.
At that moment, however, the Minister says “Now, about the mess you made at the conference, where you didn’t followed the Queen orders and created a problem with the press ...”
Gulping, you reply ...
11121222222313112122.title: Cup with hot chocolate

choices: “Go back to the nursery and tell Rose what you did.”
111212222223131121222.content:
The memory of the humiliation inflames your anger. You hated to stand in front of 15 strangers in a pink onesie and a messy diaper and when then – when you wet yourself on top of all this, it was simply too much for a 14year old girl. You gulp down the last sip if the tasty hot chocolate and slam the cup back on the table.
“That was NOT my fault, dammit! I had a long day, my diaper was FULL and WET and all those people with their STUPID QUESTIONS!”
You huff and fold your arms in front of your chest.

The prime minister is dead silent, while her eyes follow the thin line of hot chocolate you have created on her desk. Obviously the cup has not been completely empty.
“Oh my dear.” She sighs and starts to clean up the mess you have created.

“I… I am sorry for that.” You say quietly.

“You are sorry for your behavior now, or for the behavior in front of the press?” Lady Kent asks, while she piles up documents that needs to be re-printed and re-signed now.

“For… this.” You say stubborn, and because you feel a bit guilty you say: “I’ll l help you!” Quickly you get up and lean over the heavy oak-desk. You try to pick up the good papers, but when they are almost out of reach you seek support with your hand – tipping over the glass of water from the minister.

“Be careful!” Lady Kent has just said, but it is too late and now even her dress is wet – fortunately, only from water.

“I… I am sorry – again.” You blush and step back.

Shaking her head, Lady Kent takes your hand and guides you to the corner of the room.
“Please do not spank me.” You whisper and a weak smile appears on the minister’s face.

“Oh, I will not do that, I just want to make sure you cause no additional damage until the Queen picks you up. Still, I will write her a little letter and give her a recommendation for your – education.” She makes you stay with the nose in the corner of the room and goes back to her desk.
“For your corner time I like you to think about this: Is a full diaper a reason to be rude and break rules?”

You know the answer already, but you still chew on your bottom lip and feel bad. Lady Kent has been very kind and you ruined the work of hours, within seconds.

You stand in the corner for about 15 minutes before you head a knock on the door and Queen Charlotte comes in. She is surprised to find you in the corner.
“Lady Kent, can you explain this?”

The explanation the Lady gives is fair and detailed and she hands over a little piece of paper to the Queen. You wonder what she had written, but you do not need to wait long.
“You suggest to diaper her thicker and change her less often?” The Queen summaries the short text.

“Your highness, the young Princess has a bit of a temper and used the condition of her diaper as an excuse for her bad behavior. Maybe she only needs to get used to it.” Lady Kent says.

You cannot see if the Queen is nodding or not, but finally you are allowed to come back, out of the corner.
“So you haven’t talked about a solution to calm down the press?”

“I needed to calm down myself and the princess was not helping with that.” Lady Kent says, blushing a bit herself. “I think the two of us find a solution, without the Princess. She seems not to be ready to make wise political decisions.”

You could not blush more, when the Queen takes your hand and lead out of the office of the prime minister. Outside she stops, looks down at you and says:
111212222223131121222.title: "It wasn't my fault, dammit! My diaper ...

choices: Stop to eavesdrop at the Prime Minister's office
1112122222231311212221.content:
... “Now, Princess, you’ll go back to the nursery and you will tell to maid Rose what you did in the office.”
You instantly freeze. You don’t like the idea of going to Rose and tell her you had been a brat.
“Do I really have to?” you ask.
The queen vigorously nod, saying “Yes, Susan, you have to. You can go with your legs or I can spank you now in the middle of the hallway and then take you there holding you in my arms.”
Defeated, you sigh and say "Yes, ma'am. I will do it."
You turn around, facing the way to go back to the nursery. Behind you, you hear the door been close. The Queen entered in Minister’s office.
You arrive at the nursery and, gathering all your courage, you open the door.
Inside, Rose is cleaning a shelf with a feather duster. She turns to you as you enter, with a surprised expression on her face.
“Princess? What are you doing here? I thought the queen would let you play with your friend after the meeting.” she says.
“Miss Fletcher ... I made a mess.” you say.
“Oh, it’s that the problem? You need a diaper change, then.” she simply says, moving next to the changing table.
“Not that type of mess!” you immediately exclaim “No yet, at least.”
“Then what’s the problem?”
You proceed to tell her everything that is happened after you left the nursery, including the paper the minister gave to the queen, suggesting to diaper you thicker and change you less often.
After you have finished to talk, Rose sigh, then says “I think that’s a record, princess. You interrupted the Prime Minister, throw a tantrum about your diaper, denied that what happened at the conference was your fault, blaming our tradition for it, and ultimately made a mess in Prime Minister's office, all in few seconds. I’m surprised you didn’t burn the palace down in a fit of anger."
You are about to speak, but Rose interrupts you at once, saying “I don’t want to hear any excuses, princess. You will be punished for what happened both at the conference and in the office.”
After have said that, she reaches you and begins to undress you.
You are too ashamed to do anything, so you let her undressed you without resisting. She stops when you are left only in you diaper.
“Now bend over the changing table.” she orders.
You nervously obey her. When you are in position, you can’t see her anymore, but you can hear she is taking something from a wardrobe.
“I warned you, haven’t I?” she says, reaching you again “About the fact that I’m not afraid to use the carpet beater on naughty buttocks?”
You begin to gulp deeply, fearing what is coming.
She unfolds your diaper and lowers the back part of it. Your crotch is still covered by it, but your bottom is now fully exposed.
And then a heavy wrack hits it. You feel your bottom on fire, after a single swat. You have never been spanked with an implement before, and you really hope this is the last time. Every single swat makes your butt burn like hell. After the third swat, you are already crying.
During the punishment, you can feel your tummy go empty, as you wet the diaper still in position over your crotch.
Finally, she gives you the last swat. She spanked you 14 times with that carpet beater.
“I hope you’ve learned you lesson, princess.” she says, putting the carpet beater down, and waits that you calm yourself down.
She then let you lay on the changing table and proceeds changing you diaper. The new diaper she puts on you is much thicker, and you can barely close you leg with it on.
After re-dressing you with your onesie, with your surprise Rose hugs you tightly, whispering “It’s over now, princess. You deserved your punishment, but all is now forgiven.”
She helps you coming down from the changing table, then says “You can now go to play with your friend. You will surely find her in her room.”
After telling you the location of Janet room, she let you leave the nursery.
You politely say goodbye to Rose, then look for Janet’s room.
1112122222231311212221.title: “Go back to the nursery and tell Rose what yo...

choices: Janet smiles, holding a lock pick
11121222222313112122211.content:
You waddle out in the hallway and are super happy that nobody sees you right now. The pain is still present and the thick diaper makes walking very difficult. For a second you consider crawling, but after the first maid walks your way, you quickly cancel that idea. The maid though smiles at you and cannot hide her amusement.
“At least they don’t point fingers; like this is something they have never seen before.” You think and move on.

On your way you pass the Office of the prime minister and – to be honest – you like to know what the Queen and she are talking about. You waddle closer to the door listens carefully, until another maid walks by, stops and shakes her head.
“Princess Susan, either you enter or you move on, eavesdropping is not the appropriated behaviour for a Princess.”

You blush bright red, nod your head and walk on.
“Oh, I hope she does not tell anybody – especially not Rose. I wonder if everybody is watching me extra careful because the lock marks me as naughty – or if all “kids” are treated like this.”

Finally you arrive at Janet’s door, knock and be let in.

You best friend holds her breath when you waddle into her room. She waits until the door is closed before she laughs out.
“Oh my god, look at your diaper – that one is huge!”

You blush and almost start to cry again – almost, but then Janet sees your discomfort and quickly stops laughing.
“I am sorry, I am sorry! It is just… big. Hey… Susan… oh, come to me honey.”
She hugs you tightly and ribs your back, while you sniff and sob.
“They spanked me again, for making a mess on the prime ministers desk. They are soooo strict to me.” You howl.

Janet keeps rubbing your back until you calm down completely.
“Hush, it is okay baby.” She says, although, she is still wearing a diaper herself.

“Don’t call me baby. You are a kid for them as well.” You pout.

Janet let you go and shakes her head.
“Well, I am special. I am a guest and nobody enforce strict rules on me. To be honest I never had so much freedom before. I have a VIP card that gives me permission to eat what I like, to use the adult-bathrooms – those that have a toilet, you know – or get my diaper changed. They even bought me a games console.” She looks very happy.

“So, you have used your diaper?” You ask.

Janet smiles but shake her head. “No, I preferred the toilet – but I guess that is not an option for you, is it?”

Now you shake your head. “I think they want me to use the diapers.” You say, quiet sad.

“Come on, let’s play something. They gave me a stack of games so I am not bored when you do important Princess-Stuff.” Janet says.
The two of you sit down in front of a big TV and starts to play games. Janet offers some Potato-chips and Soda and you happily eat and drink. The best part for you is, that Janet only has glasses in her room; therefore you do not have to drink from a baby bottle in front of your best friend.

For almost two hours the two of you have a really good time, only interrupted by Janet taking her pink VIP-Card and go to the bathroom. You eat more chips and drink more and another hour of playing games further you feel the need… .
“Uhm, Janet – can I borrow your VIP-Card? I need to go.”

Janet looks uneasy. “It has my name on it and I am sure they will stop you. Susan, everybody knows you. Can’t you… you know… use the diaper?”

You blush deep red and already regret that you have asked her.
“Janet, I am almost bursting and… and I need… you know… not ONLY need to pee.”

“Oh! I am sorry. I really do not recommend it, but if it is an emergency.” Janet says and gives you her VIP-Card.

You really hope it works, as you waddle down the hallway, reaching for a bathroom. You have never seen on in this country and you deny that you haven’t asked Janet where it is. You feel some drops of pee escape into your diaper, until you finally find the bathroom. You see no guard and it has a card-reader.
“Looks good!” You say and waddle on, holding the VIP-card in one hand. Just before you reach the door, something pops up in your mind.
“The lock!” Your hand shoots to the zipper of the onesie and to the small pink lock that prevents you from taking the onesie off. “Oh stupid Susan, I should have thought about this before.” You say out loud.

“Have thought about what?” a voice behind you asks.
You gulp and slowly turn around….
11121222222313112122211.title: Go straight to her room

111212222223131121222113.content:
You are ready to accept the consequences for your actions, sure to have been spotted by a maid. You only hope it’s not Rose.
When your turn around, you realize it’s simply Janet.
“You!” you exclaim “You scared me!”
In fact, Janet had not spoken with her usual voice, but tried to seem a grown up.
Giggling, she says “I couldn’t resist.”
When you are about to answer back, you notice she is holding something.
“Having problem with the lock, little princess?” she says. In her right hand she holds a lock pick.
Seeing that, you open wide your eyes, and exclaim “Janet, I love you! Quick, unlock this damn lock, so I can take this ridiculous onesie off and use the bathroom!”
You try to hold on as much you can, while Janet open the lock.
Finally free, you remove your onesie, use the VIP-card on the door’s card-reader and finally enter the bathroom, while Janet stands guard.
Reaching the toilet, you remove your diaper and, for the first time since yesterday (it has not been a long time, but it seemed much more), use the toilet like a big girl.
After doing your needs, you accurately wipe yourself. You then put the diaper back on, followed by the onesie.
You reach Janet, smiling. She is smiling too.
You hug her, saying “Thank you, thank you, thank you! You’re the best!”
“Everything for my best friend.” she answers, hugging you back.
“Umh, Janet? Where did you find the lock pick?” you ask. Before, you where too busy trying to not mess yourself, so you haven’t thought about it, but now you realize that a lock pick is not a normal think you can find everywhere.
“I found it in a drawer in my room. I have no clue of its origins.” she replies, and begins to lock the onesie again.
For the first time here in Calonia, you succeeded in broke a rule without being punished for it. The rebel side of your personality is happy about it.
When everything seems to go in the right direction, however, a problem always appear.
“Dammit!” Janet suddenly exclaim.
“What’s the matter?” you ask.
“The lock! I can’t close it! It’s broken!”
The world crumble upon you. You are sure that if the find you without the lock on they will give you the severest punishment possible. And today you have already been spanked three times (four times with the maintenance spanking), two times with the hand and one with the carpet beater, had you mouth washed out with soap, received a suppository and you faced even corner time, as if the thick diaper, the onesie and sometimes even bottles and pacifiers weren’t enough.
“I’m in trouble.” you cry.
“Don’t give up too fast, Susan.” Janet says “I can search the place where they keep the locks and bring you a new one. I’m sure they are standards, no one will be able to say the difference.”
“What should I do?” you ask her, feeling like an helplessly baby.
“Wait for me in my room.” she states “It’s too dangerous for you to wander across the palace without your lock.”
You nod, and the two of you separate one from another.
You reach Janet's room, and close yourself in it. You sit on the bed, waiting for your friend to come back.
After a long time, you hear someone knocking at the door.
“Who is it?” you ask.
111212222223131121222113.title: Janet smiles, holding a lock pick

1112122222231311212221131.content:
You sit in Janet’s room and nibble on our nails. A very bad habit you only have, when you are much stressed. At first you try to distract yourself with playing games, but with every noise you hear you jump up and look at the door, so you quickly give up.

It is almost half an hour later when is knocks on the door and you find Janet smiling at you.
“What took you so long? The Queen can come in any minute. I am sure I will have dinner and bedtime, soon.”

Janet shrugs and holds up a little pink lock.
“Hey, relax. I got what you need, baby.” She says, talking like a drug dealer.

You reach for it, but she pulls it away.
“First you have to hear the story.” She says, holding the lock over your head.
“I walked to Miss Fletcher to get one of this. She was not in, but when I found one, I noticed that they have numbers on them. So I could not take the next one, because she would notice that one is missing. She even walked in and asked me if I need my diaper changed – and suggested that I should wear something more age-appropriated.”
She raises her voice with the last words and you can’t hold back but giggle.
“Then I walked on and finally found a supply room for baby items. I have never seen so many diapers in my whole life, not even at Walmart.” Another dramatic break and you jump up to grab the lock, but Janet pulls it away again and continues her story.
“I found some locks, with keys, but no pink ones with numbers. So I took a magic marker and wrote the number on it by hand – and I am sure this is a masterpiece!”
Finally she gives you the look and you have to agree, that is looks like the broken one.

“What about the key?” You ask. “Miss Fletcher will need to open it with hers.”

Another time Janet shows genius-skills. After she fastens the lock at your onesie, she use clear nail varnish on the keyhole.
“You see, she will not be able to insert it at all, but that happens sometimes with kids that play dress-up. She will need to break it open and use another one, but for today, you are safe.”

The plan might actually work. You are only sad that starting tomorrow you need to find another way to use the toilet.

Only a few minutes later it knocks on the door and Queen Charlotte comes in.
“Janet, the Princess need to eat dinner and go to bed. I hope you do not mind?”

Janet shakes her head and hugs you, before she run to the kitchen to see what she can eat herself.

“Is your diaper still fine, by dear?” The Queen asks and grabs the seat of your diaper.
You blush deep red and shake her off.
“I am fine. I tell you when I like to get changed.” You pout and make the Queen smile.

“Okay, but do not hold IT back too long, that is not healthy.” The Queen says and takes your hand.

You would love to say something “mind your own business", but you learned your lesson and stays silent. You hope that dinner will be something solid, after your lunch has been baby formula.

The Queen leads you…
1112122222231311212221131.title: "It's me, Janet!"

choices: Hold back. It's not worth it.
11121222222313112122211311.content:
The Queen leads you across various hallways, and finally you arrive in what seems to be a big dining room. At least, she has not took you back to the nursery.
The dining room is huge. In the middle of the room there is a large, finely carved mahogany table, with elegant chairs. On the table there is a white lace tablecloth, whose decorations are really a masterpiece.
The room itself is very well decorated, with scenes of battle and ancient daily life that were frescoed on the walls. It must be a very ancient room. There is even a wood burning fireplace, but it’s extinct.
“This is the royal dining room.” the queen explains “It has been restored, of course, but it is still like when it was built. This is in fact the oldest room in the entire Royal Palace, the only one left from the time of its construction dating back to seven centuries ago.”
You think that she is implying something like “if you do damages here, you can expect a severe punishment”, but you are not sure of it.
What you were sure of, instead, was your place at the table. Because while looking at the room you noticed an high-chair.
As if to confirm this, the queen leads you to the high-chair, lifts you and then puts you in it.
After having settled you, Queen Charlotte sits down on the head of the table, over the only chair that wasn’t made of wood, but of gold.
The Queen then claps her hand, and four maid enter in the room, carrying trays. Two of them put a plate of caviar with slices of toast and a glass of champagne in front of the Queen, while the other two put a jar of homogenized and a bottle full of milk.
“What is this?” you ask, looking at your plate.
