“It’s baby food.” explains the queen “Of course it’s not the same of younger kids. It is designed to meet the energy needs of boys and girls of your age. The bottle is simply milk, not a special formula.”
As you reluctantly start to eat the baby food (at least is solid, in some way, and no one is feeding you), the door of the room opens with a slam.
On the on the door, now open, a boy suddenly appears. It’s quite tall, and a very handsome lad. Is very well dressed, and seems to be about 22/23 years old.
“Queen Charlotte.” he says “I presume Calonian Royal House don’t awaits for their guests to start the dinner these days?”
“I didn’t even know you were in the palace, dear.” the queen says, calmly, but with an ice tone.
“It's not a problem, I don’t hold a grudge.” he replies, advancing in the hall. Without waiting for an authorization, he sits in front of you and snaps his fingers in the air, shouting without grace “Maids! I’m hungry! Bring me the usual!”
After a couple minute, a maid enters with a plate, serving him with a big and inelegant bleeding rib of beef.
Without even looking at you, he starts to eat.
Curious about this strange fellow, you ask him “Who are you, mister?”
Hearing your voice, he looks at you. His eyes seem made of ice, and his gaze is sharp like a dagger.
“Princess Susan, I presume.” he says “I’m Richard, the noble heir of Calonian Grairven House, the most important noble dynasty in Calonia. We are distant relatives of the Royal House. And if it wasn’t for you, my little princess, I would have been the next king. So at least show me some respect, little brat, or I will put you across my knees.”
You feel hurt in your pride. No one should talk to you in this way, and you want to tell him what you think of him.
Before you can say anything, however, the queen herself intervenes, saying “Richard, you may be a grown up an a noble, but even you can’t simply threat the princess without my authorization.”
Hearing that, you smile. He notices you smile and, clearly upset about it, he says “What are you smiling at, princess? You're just a stinky diaper wearer kid.”
That’s the last straw!
11121222222313112122211311.title: To a big dining room

choices: You have a long, hard way to go."
111212222223131121222113111.content:
This Richard has the ability to drive you from 0 to 100 in only 2 seconds.
You lift yourself up in the highchair and stare daggers at him.
“I am not wearing a stinky diaper and I am not a little kid. I am the Princess now and you can FORGET about the throne – you bastard!”

Bastard is a harsh insult, especially in the royal family and Richard is not taking it lightly.
“Not a little kid? Your fat diaper is pushing out on either sides of the high-chair. I bet that baby food goes straight through you and you spend the rest of the night in a wet, full and stinking diaper – you BABY!”

“Enough!” The Queen jumps in. With her hands she orders you and Richard to sit down again, what both of you do – with some resistance.
“If it is not possible to have the two of you in one room, we cannot eat together any longer. That would be a shame and I kindly ask you to calm down and continue to eat.”

With anger you take the next spoon full of baby food while Richard bites into tasty looking meat.
“This is so unfair!” you think. When he lifts his fork, shows it to you and take a bit with excessive pleasure you can’t stand his stupid face any longer.

“If he thinks I am a baby he should be prepared for this.” You think and load your “spoon-catapult” to fire a big blob of green baby mush in his direction, hitting him in the face.

“YOU LITTLE WITCH!” He yells out and jumps up. You feel so save with the Queen in one room, but he is at your high chair in no time, grabs your ear and twist it.
“Throwing your mush at me? I don’t think so! You eat it yourself!” He grabs you spoon and force it in your mouth, and another one, and another one. You have trouble to gulp it down in time, when he suddenly stops. Queen Charlotte is standing next to him and is holding his arm.
“Let her go and leave is alone, Richard.” She says with a calm voice. “You are hurting her ear.”

The pain in your ear is not that bad, but when he let it go it still stings. With delight you see him turn around and march out of the room.
“Bye bye Richard!” You say with a cheeky smile, before you look back at the Queen.

“Uhm,… he started!” You say and wipe baby food from your face.

“Susan… “. The Queen starts, but stops and shakes her head.
She goes back to her seat and slide down, looking defeated.
“You are behaving like 4 years old. Richard is a powerful noble and you will not be able to avoid him. Please Susan, I was so happy when I found you, because he will be a horrible king.”

You feel very bad, while you look at the mess you have made on the old, wonderful table.
“But you found me. I will be Queen.” You say, trying to cheer her up.

“Yes, in principle, but if you behave like this he will try to push you off the throne – saying you are not fitting in the culture or be a retard.” The Queen looks very sad and pushes away her table.
“Maids! Bring the Princess to her nursery, have Rose feed her and put to bed.”
She gets up, comes to you and gives you a kiss on the forehead.
“I am sure your behind can not stand another spanking, but do not think I will forget this. Rose will know everything and come up with a suggestion.”

You go pale as the Maids help you out of the high chair and take you by your hands, one maid on each side.
“No, I am not finished! I can feed myself! I am a big girl!” You shout over your shoulder and to your surprise – the Queen tells the maids to stop. She walks around you and bend down – but she is not letting you go back to the high chair. Instead the push a pacifier in your mouth and let the maids continue. “No shouting in the hallways.” She says quietly and goes to her private rooms, while you are dragged to Rose.

In the nursery, the maids tell Rose what had happened in the dining room. You are relived when they also tell her that the Queen does not want you to receive an additional spanking today. But when they leave you alone with Rose, you are not looking forward to the rest of the day.

Rose kneels down in front of you and looks into your eyes.
“Princess…
111212222223131121222113111.title: Verbally attack him!

choices: The queen comes to visit you
1112122222231311212221131112.content:
Rose kneels down in front of you and looks into your eyes.
“Princess... Am I failing with you ?"
You stare at her dumbfounded.
"What ?"
This was apparently not the reaction she was expecting.
"I..."
"No wait, I must have heard wrong, because we have only known each other for two days, there is no way you would ask something as STUPID ! as asking if you were failing with me right ?" You could feel yourself becoming more and more angry, so much so that you completely ignored the consequences of throwing another tantrum.
Rose was apparently taken aback by your reaction, and was struggling to find her words.
"... Oh my god, you actually said that !" You continued.
"You guys live in a country where the common sense of all the rest of the world, in which I have grown up mind you, is rendered completely useless, you announce me I'm some kind of princess, and as soon as it is said, you lock me up in diapers and treat me like I am four years old, while somehow still expecting me to make vital political decisions. I have been nothing but utterly humiliated since I came here, what the FUCK did you expect ? That I would magically come to term with it over the night ? Every one in this country can't be THAT much of an idiot right ?"
You took a deep breath, and turned to face your room, where your crib awaits.
"Then again", you said while walking, "considering your traditions are supposed to strengthen the bond between parents and child, but that my family stayed behind in the normal world and that I have experienced nothing but spankings, maybe you ARE all that stupid ! Speaking of which, I'll be going to sleep now, so you know where to find me if you want to spank me AGAIN !"
You opened the door to your room and mumbled :
"And you still spank children, what the fuck is wrong with you !"
You slammed the door, and climbed into your crib. You were still very much furious, and you now dreaded the time when Rose would come to punish you for your insolence.
But that time never came, and you finally fell asleep, your eyes drowned in tears of anger and humiliation.
1112122222231311212221131112.title: Am I failing with you?”

choices: Let her feed you, too embarassed to ask something like that.
11121222222313112122211311123.content:
You are sleeping, when suddenly you feel a hand touching you. You open your eyes to look at who had woke you up. You need some time to focus, but then you see the queen.
“It’s morning already?” you ask.
The queen nods, and without a word she takes you out from the crib. Holding you in her arms, she took you toward a chair. You sigh, ready to yet another stupid spanking. While being carried, you notice that Rose in nowhere to be found.
The queen sits down, but to your surprise she doesn’t take you across her knees, but make you sit over them, holding you in a warm embrace.
“Susan…” Charlotte says, with a sad voice “… Rose told me what you have said to her yesterday night. You don’t understand our tradition yet, and I don’t blame you for this, really. But I want to be clear: we have not kidnapped you or holding you prisoner. This palace is not supposed to be a golden cage for you. You can open your wings and fly away, if you really want it.”
You listen to her without interrupting, wanting to hear where she wants to go with her speech.
“When you asked last time, you were clearly just throwing a tantrum, and we were over a plane.” the queen continues “But if you ask me with cold mind that you want to go home to your mother in the USA… I’ll let you climb on the first flight.”
You want to reply, but before you could say anything Charlotte speaks again “If you decide you stay, you’ll have however to accept our tradition. If you can’t afford to embrace it entirely, we can make a deal to be a bit more lenient with you. But I must warn you: lord Richard would use that at his advantage to ascend the throne, creating the concrete possibility that all of this would be for nothing. These are your choices, princess.”
You think about it for a second, then say “You leave me three choices. To leave, to stay here fully embracing your stupid tradition, or to stay here only partially embracing tradition but with the concrete possibility to lose the throne.”
The queen nods, saying “Yes. These are your choices. I want you to think carefully, princess. No fit of anger, or tantrums. Think about it and give me an answer with clean and cold mind. I’ll change you in a clean diaper, and we will have breakfast, since yesterday you almost skipped dinner. Then you’ll give me your answer.”
Your diaper is indeed quite wet after the night, and so you let her take you to the changing table.
Charlotte puts you down, unlocks your pink onesie and removes it, then takes you in her arms again and place you over the changing table.
While she removes the wet diaper, you say with red cheeks “I never wetted the bed in ages.”
“Yesterday it was a really stressful day, princess.” Charlotte replies, while cleaning you with wet wipes “That and the sleeping aid contained in each baby meal combined made you wet your diaper.”
You decide to don’t say anything about how stupid you think this is.
Once you’re clean, the queen applies baby oil over your privates and slid a clean diaper under your bottom holding your legs in the hair. She then takes your legs down and submerge your lower parts in baby powder, before taping the diaper close.
“And princess…” she says, helping you down from the changing table “… if you choose to stay here, I have to tell you that you’ll be punished for all the bad things you’ve said to Rose. She has your best interests at heart, and you were extremely rude to her.”
“My best interests at heart!?” you exclaim, skeptical and shocked “She spanked me with a fucking carpet beater!”
The queen sighs, and says “Susan, stop the swearing, please.”
You try to calm yourself and take a deep breath, then saying “Ok, I’m sorry. Where is she, anyway?”
“She’s in her room. I’ll speak to her before we go to have breakfast.”
With those words, she dresses you up in a red shirt with a matching skirt attached at it. It’s the version of your size of a child outfit, but much more mature then the onesie, more for a toddler than for a baby.
Charlotte takes you by hand and lead you out of the nursery. She stops just out, in front of the door next the one you just walked through, and knocks at it.
“Rose, I’m the queen. Can I come in?”
You hear a simple yes, and the queen opens the door.
“Wait here.” she says, entering in the room closing the door at her back and leaving you alone in the hallway.
Curious as you are, you decide to eavesdrop.
“Rose, are you okay?” the queen asked.
You hear sobbing in response, followed by a soft voiced “I’m not! The princess hates me! I’m not a good nanny! I’m a failure!”
You feel a pain in your stomach in hearing that. She took your words much worse than you could have expected.
“Oh, Rosie.” the queen says, sweetly “I’m sure she was just overwhelmed by all the new things, and that she doesn’t hate you.”
“What do I did wrong?” Rose continues to sob “I followed all the rules. I spanked her and explained what she did to get her punishment, but after that I comforted her. Maybe I’m not fit for the role. I’m just a stupid commoner, I shouldn’t be here in the palace to raise a princess!”
You feel really bad now. You could have simply speak to her about how you were feeling, instead you threw a tantrum, shouted at her and called her and all of her countrymen stupid idiots. Thinking about it now, her reaction is quite natural.
“Rosie, please, take a hold of yourself.” Charlotte said “I’ll take the princess to have breakfast. Use this time to regain your composure. If she choose to leave, you won’t have to worry about her anymore. If she choose to stay, you two will have a heartfelt conversation. Ok?”
Rose seems to calm herself a bit, so you take a step back waiting for the queen. Shortly after the door open, and Charlotte appears in front of you.
“I hope you’re proud of yourself.” she says with a cold tone, closing the door “You made one of the kindest person on earth cry.”
“But she spanked me…” you try to reply, but the queen interrupts you.
“So what? What do you think? That she enjoys spanking you? Rose follows tradition, but I assure you that she would be much more happy to cuddle you than to spank you. For all the things you have done another nanny would have gave you a much more severe punishment. If you had been in the care of Samantha, the nanny that raised me, you wouldn't have been able to sit for a month. Even if you choose to leave, I expect at least that you give her an apology.”
You lower you head, feeling bad for her. You still think that spanking kids is wrong, and that this entire tradition is stupid indeed, but you unleashed your whole frustration over a faultless person.
“I’ll give her a proper a apology, I promise.” you say, still looking at your shoes.
Charlotte nods, and taking you by hand once again takes you to the dining hall.
She takes you to the high chair when you had your dinner yesterday. While she sits down on her chair, a smiling maid comes to you with a tray with a bowl of mush and a baby bottle.
She puts the tray on the table and says “Hello, princess. I’m Liz. I’m here to feed you.”
You sigh, and looking at the queen you ask “Did she really have to do it?”
The queen replies “I can ask her to let you feed yourself, but you have to ask it politely.”
You sigh again, and say “Can I feed myself, then?”
The queen shakes her head, replying “This is not polite at all. You have to ask permission to feed yourself and promise to Liz that you won’t make a mess with your food, and you have to say you’re still grateful for her offer to feed you.”
You…
11121222222313112122211311123.title: The queen comes to visit you

1112122222231311212221131113.content:
... please, don’t do that ever again. You don’t know how dangerous lord Richard Grairven can be.”
She seems sincerely worried.
Trying to speak trough your pacifier, you reply “He seemed only a spoiled boy to me.”
“He’s not. Trust me, I know former maids of his family’s manor.” she says “It’s a violent man, that doesn’t hesitate to whip his servants like in the middle-age or to eliminate those who thwart him.”
“Eliminate?” you ask, gulping.
“Not physically.” she states “But he ruined a lot of families thanks to his malevolent influence.”
“How can he have so much influence? He’s a monster.” you say.
“His family is rich and noble. We are a very happy country, princess, but no country is perfect. Not even Calonia is completely immune to corruption.” she explains “And you saw it yourself: he is a handsome lad. In private, like at your dinner before, he acts like the savage he is, but in public he acts elegant and sophisticated, using his charm on those who speak to him, especially women. He’s like a shark in a goldfish pool.”
While she speaks, you reach a conclusion: you have a goal now, which is not letting Richard ascend to the throne. This doesn’t mean you will simply fully embrace Calonian traditions, you have yet to think about it.
You are still making your considerations, when Rose says “Now, about the punishment ...”
You turn pale once again. You are at least happy that she won’t spank you.
“... normally, I would have make you give a polite apology (with a red bottom on display) to the one you have been rude to, but since we’re talking about Richard, I will not do that.” she says “And you were provoked, so I will be lenient with you. But you must learn to react to provocations like a princess, and not like a street thug.”
“What will happen?” you ask to her.
“Now you will have the rest of your dinner, and your dessert will be a bar of soap.” she states “Then you will go straight to the crib to sleep.”
And that’s exactly what happens. Rose feeds you with baby food, using a spoon to take it to your mouth. She is very delicate in doing it, but she does not stop until you have eaten all of your mush.
She then proceeds to wash out your mouth with soap. It tastes horrible.
When she try to open the lock of your onesie, the key don’t enter in the keyhole.
“Uh? What’s wrong?” you hear her wonders to herself.
“Were you playing dressing up with Janet, princess?” she then asks.
“Yes, I was.” you reply, remembering what Janet told you.
“Oh, how cute.” she says, giggling a little. While inserting the key in the keyhole with force, breaking it, she tell to you “If you want, I could take a photo of you two next time. I’d love to print it and hang in the nursery a picture frame of the cutest princess in Calonian history.”
You deeply blush hearing her words: you can feel they are sincere, but you have almost the sensation that they are words meant for little kids.
She then proceeds to remove your onesie, putting you in the pink romper you wore during your nap.
She gently puts you in the crib, gives you a kiss on the forehead and says “Good night, princess Susan.”, before turning the lights off and leave the room.
It has definitely been the most intense day of your life. You hug the stuffed rabbit and, after a few seconds, you have already fallen into a deep sleep.
The next morning, Rose wakes you up. You wake up in a ...
1112122222231311212221131113.title: be careful, Richard is dangerous!"

11121222222313112122211311131.content:
You feel a hand shake your shoulder, carefully, but still hard enough to wake you up.
“Only a few more minutes.” You muffle around your pacifier.

The hand stays and shakes you a bit more.
“Good morning Princess Susan, I am very sorry, but you have to get up.” Rose says and smiles down at you.

You turn over on your back and look at her with tired eyes – until you notice something.
“I am wet.” You whisper and your hand reaches for your padded crotch.

Rose did not understand you and takes the pacifier out of your mouth, with a wet “plop”. You blush when you realise that you had it in your mouth for the whole night.
“You are what princess?”

“I am wet. I wet my diaper, while I was sleeping.” You say in a low voice, embarrassed to the bones.

Rose giggles and lifts you out of the crib.
“Ah, cutie, and I was worried something else happened.” She says and carries you on her arm, to the changing table. She straps you down to your diaper and opens it.
“It is okay little one. Some dinner food put babies into a very deep sleep, so they do not have to wake up when they need to pee or.. do something else.”

You feel very exposed to lie naked in front of her, but you still catch her words.
“You drug kids to use their diapers in the night? That is… bad.” You say, before you can say something rude.

Rose rolls her eyes and shake her head, while she wipe you down and slide a fresh diaper under your behind. The new diaper is as thick and wide as the old one and you make a sore face when you look forward to waddle around for another day.
“We do not drug babies. We have baby food to help the little ones to relax. It is for stressful days, like the one you had yesterday - and helped you to have a restful sleep. No adult would start to wet the bed with a mild sleeping aid like this. It only works on minors, like you, princess.”

Her words make you feel small and you sulk a bit, while she applies a great amount of anti-rash cream on your behind and tapes the diaper close.
“Ihhh, I feel messy. Why have you used so much cream on me?” You ask Rose as she helps you up and starts to put a new onesie on you. It is again pink, and this one has a little fairy on the chest. Rose adds a new lock to the zipper and helps you down from the changing table.
“I am sorry princess, but it is the intention to make you feel a bit messy. You need to get used to the feeling and accept that you are not an adult jet.”

You sulk more and earn a hug and a kiss on the forehead from Rose.
“Oh, poor princess, don’t look so sad. As soon as you made a mess in your diaper, the cream will make sure you do not get a rash.”

You make a little step and feel the diaper stick to your behind, from all the cream Rose has used.
“But you will change me right away if I make a mess, will you?”

Rose winks at you and says:
11121222222313112122211311131.title: wet diaper.

choices: ... to ignore Richard comments during the interview.
... to use this opportunity to discredit Richard.
111212222223131121222113111312.content:
“Sorry Princess, not immediately.”
In hearing this answer, you feel your cheeks on fire.
“What? What do you mean?” you ask, almost shouting.
“Don’t shout at me, princess.” she sternly replies “I don’t like the idea of starting the day with a morning spanking.”
As she says the word “spanking”, you instantly calm yourself down.
“I’m sorry, Miss Flecther.” you whisper, asking again in a more polite way “Can you please explain to me why have you said that?”
Rose smile, saying “Oh, that’s my polite little girl.”, then finally answer to your question: “The Prime Minister suggested to the Queen to change you less often to let you get used to the sensation of a messy diaper. As I said, the cream will help in that, but you must also learn patience, because If you mess yourself during a formal occasion I will not be there to instantly change you.”
So that is their plan: a thick diaper, full of anti-rash cream that will make you feel like you are messy, even if you are clean. Then, when you really mess yourself they won’t change you right away to make you feel the increased messy sensation and teach you patience, sure that you won’t get a rash just because of the cream. It’s a machiavellian plan.
“Did you came up with this or is the Queen who did?” you ask.
“When you went to sleep, I discussed with the queen about your behaviour.” she explains “We discussed and we reached a solution. She suggested the large quantity of cream, I suggested to not change you right away.”
“So it’s like receiving a double punishment. It’s unfair.” you complain.
“I wouldn’t complain so much if I were in you.” she replies “The queen suggested to use a large quantity of cream and to give you numerous enemas, I suggested to not change you right away and to give you a bedtime spanking every night for a month. We reached a compromise that you should find acceptable.”
Gulping, you realize she is right. Enemas and bedtime spankings sounded much worse.
“We love you, princess.” she suddenly says, catching you by surprise “We only want the best for you. Our discipline is for your own good. I hope you understand that.”
You nod, and without even realizing it, you hug Rose.
As the maid hugs you back, the door suddenly opens.
Both of you turn to the door, and you see the queen, who is holding a newspaper.
Queen Charlotte is almost always the personification of calm, but now she seems frustrated.
“Look at the newspaper!” she exclaims, without shouting but with a tone of voice higher than usual, leaning forward the newspaper.
You try to catch it, but Rose take it first, doing a gesture of no with her finger in your direction.
She then opens the newspaper, reading aloud:
“This is what Princess Susan stated yesterday after her landing in Calonia: <<Oh I hate the diapers and it is insane I have to wear one.>>. If this is what the princess really thinks, is she really fit for Calonian throne? A noble of our country, lord Richard of House Grairven, made this statement about it: <<A stranger will never be worthy of the throne. This Princess proved to be a spoiled child. She will never handle the country like a Calonian would do. I only hope that the people and the queen herself will see the truth.>>. As all our readers know, lord Richard is a true Calonian, ready to do everything for our country. We can only ask ourselves if the future of the country belongs to us or to a child that despise our traditions.”
Rose closes the newspaper with an angry move.
“That filthy rat!” she exclaims, clearly angry “He must have ran to the newspaper’s headquarter right after the dinner.”
You look at the queen, unsure of what to do about it.
Noticing your look, Queen Charlotte says to you “With the problem of the press, I had come to a conclusion with the prime minister. One of the most important newspapers in Calonia would like to have a full interview with you, and we thought it would be perfect to show your appreciation to our traditions. What do you think?”
You nod, and suggest ...
111212222223131121222113111312.title: “Sorry Princess, not immediately.”

choices: “But only if you promise to behave.”
“Today, I like to feed you myself.”
1112122222231311212221131113122.content:
While you do not like the idea of a long interview with many questions about you and your feelings for the tradition, you like the idea of paying Lord Richard back.
“I think we can use the chance to discredit Richard himself. He will use any chance to make me look back and it is only fair if we do the same to him.” You say and hit your fist in your open hand.

“And you know how to do that as well, Susan?” The queen asks.

“Well, you need to make me look like I embrace the tradition. Dress me up in what you think is good and train me to say the right things. I know I have… issues with your tradition and I am not sure if I can get used to it, but for that interview I will pretend to love it.” You say and smile at Queen Charlotte and Rose.

The Queen looks a bit impressed, but then she addresses true point:
“So you will lie about accepting the tradition. That is quiet naughty.”

You stare at her and search for words, while your skin lost its colour.
“But… but… .”

Queen Charlotte laughs out and gives your round, padded bottom a little slap.
“It is fine Susan, I am joking. You will not be punished for that lie, since it is for a higher purpose. Still I hope you will learn to accept our culture and like it, for real.”

Relieved you nod your head.
“Sure, I… do my best. I did not complain about the diaper today!” You say, a bit proud.

“And the anti-rash cream?” The Queen asks and makes you blush. “I thought so.” She giggles.
“And for the Handsome Richard we will question HIS acceptance of the tradition if he cannot accept that he is no longer the heir of the throne.”

“Great!” You shout out and march to the door of the nursery – while your march looks very cute, since the thick diaper makes you waddle.
“Since that is solved, what do we do next?” You look over your shoulder, ready to conquer the world.

The Queen and Rose look at each other and laugh out together. Then Rose lift up a big glass of baby food and a big bottle of formula. “Breakfast?!”

You basically collapse on the stop. Making big plans does not mean you are treated like a big girl.
“Oh great… you ruined the moment… can I at least feed myself?”

The Queen looks at Rose, before she looks back at you:
1112122222231311212221131113122.title: ... to use this opportunity to discredit Richard.

choices: “You can let me wash the tablecloth myself.”
11121222222313112122211311131221.content:
“After yesterday? Not a chance, princess.” she says.
Remembering how you ruined the refined tablecloth you blush, saying “I’m sorry for the tablecloth. I promise I will also apologize to the maid in charge of cleaning it.”
The Queen seems surprised at first, than says “That’s very polite, Susan. I’m impressed.”
She gives you a kiss on the forehead and leave the room, telling you that she is quite busy and she will come to see you later in the morning.
You are left alone with Rose, that proceeds to feed you with the baby food using a spoon. You are tempted to tell her something rude when she says “Here come the airplane, yummy!”, but you succeed in restraining your tongue.
After you have finished your food, she offers you the bottle, saying “Suck a bit of this, princess. It’s healthy.”
“It’s the special formula?” you ask, sceptical.
“Oh, no. The special formula it’s only for lunch. This is just sterilized and skimmed milk.” she explains.
You don’t like skimmed milk, because you prefer full-cream milk, but decide to drink it anyway.
After your breakfast, Rose let you leave the nursery, telling you that you can go to play with Janet.
“You can do what you want during your play time.” she says, just before you leave the room “But I suggest you to do something healthy like exploring the palace or going to play outside in the Royal Gardens rather than close yourself in Janet’s room to play videogames.”
Now that you are sure about the way, you reach Janet room in very short time. You knock the door and she lets you in.
“What are we doing today, sister?” she asks, hugging you.
“Rose said we should explore the palace. It’s what I would like to do, since I have seen only a small part of it. I also have something to do in the laundry.” you explain.
“I too would have liked to explore the palace.” she answer “I even thought to a brilliant plan to hide ourselves, but since we have your nanny’s authorization it’s much easier.”
“Rose is not my nanny!” you exclaim, blushing “She’s the maid in charge of the nursery!”
She giggles, then urges you outside of the room.
“I know where the laundry is.” she says “If you like it, we can go straight there so we can explore without worries later.”
You think it’s a wonderful idea, so you let her lead to the laundry.
When you reach the laundry, you go straight to a maid and ask “I’m sorry, can you tell me who is in charge of washing what comes from the kitchen?”
She seems surprised at first, but then she points to a young, red haired maid, bent over the tablecloth you have stained.
Followed by Janet, that have no idea of what are you doing here, you reach the red haired maid, and say “Sorry, can I say you something?”
Hearing your voice, she turns immediately towards you. She opens wide her eyes, clearly surprised to see you.
“Are you the princess?” she says, in a shocked voice “What’s happened? Am I going to be fired?”
“Absolutely not!” you exclaim, then adding “I’m here to apologize to you.”
“Uh?” she seems to not understand “An apology? We never even meet each other, haven’t we?”
“It’s true, but I messed the tablecloth you are washing.” you explain, blushing a little “I am really sorry that I gave you an avoidable hard work.”
“It’s that so?” she says “I’m sorry too, princess, because it’s true that I appreciate your humility, but an apology won’t ease my work.”
Are she really refusing your apology? You want her forgiveness, it’s a matter of principle.
“What can I do to make you forgive me?” you ask.
She shakes her head, saying “You are the princess, you don’t need my forgiveness. I will simply forget this in time.”
Noticing your troubles, Janet intervenes, saying “Miss, please. I think it’s important for her.”
The maid snort, replying “What I would like you to do to make me forgive you it’s not a thing a princess can do.”
You than realise what she wants. Determined to have her forgiveness, you say:
11121222222313112122211311131221.title: “After yesterday? Not a chance, princess”

choices: Rose tells you what the plan is...
111212222223131121222113111312211.content:
You look at the big piece of tablecloth and offer:
“You can let me wash the tablecloth myself.”

The maid smiles at you and shrugs.
“Honestly Princess, I am not sure if you can do it. This is the job for an adult. But if you insist on trying it, you can.”

Her words make you angry, but you gulp it down and start to wash the big tablecloth. It is heavily soaked and hard to manoeuvre in the big bucked. You have something like a big spoon to handle it and some soak and a fine brush to work on the stains your baby food as left on it.

Janet quickly becomes bored and starts to wander around the area, chatting with other maids and looking around the attached areas. From times to times she comes back, while you stand over the bucked, your padded behind pushed out and working on the stains with the brush.
The red haired maid is not getting tired on giving you advises, no matter how unwanted they are:
Be careful princess, the fabric is very old and should not be damaged,… .” She is constantly controlling you and you regret that you wanted her apology.
After a while your bladder is too full to ignore and you look up at her and sigh.

“What is it princess? Is the job to hard for you to finish? If you are not able to complete this simple task you should not have started it.” The maid says in a very strict voice that reminds you of Rose.

You big your bottom lip and continue to rub the brush over the stains, while your diaper becomes warm and wet. You will not use it as an excuse to leave your job unfinished!

It takes you almost an hour to clean the whole tablecloth, but in the end it is spotless and the maid nods her head and shakes your tired, wet hand: “Princess, you showed a remarkable endurance I hadn’t expected. I happily accept your apologize.”

You earn more appreciating looks from other maids while you waddle out of the laundry. Janet walks beside you and clamps her hands.
“See, that was not so bad. I think you impressed her a lot! Susan,… am I mistaken or do you waddle a bit more?”

You blush and try to press your legs together, but the swollen diaper makes that impossible.
“I wet a bit. I did it while I was cleaning the tablecloth. I am sure the diaper can take more, it is only bit harder to walk.”

Janet nods her head and rubs your back a bit. “You are really trying to adapt to the rules of the country, I see.”

You weakly nod your head, not liking the squishy mess between your legs, but you know that asking for a change would be pointless. Therefore you try to ignore it and walk on with Janet.
“Hey, have you found anything cool, while I was working as a maid?”

“Yes I did! They have a beautiful garden with flowers and a kind of pond landscape. You can pass it by jumping from stone to stone. It is very nice.” Janet says very excited and pulls you out a door and into a fantastic garden. Some maids sit around and enjoy the sun and some other palace-employees walk around and talk about important stuff. When you pass by they stop and nod politely in your direction. You return the gesture, but then you run after Janet and follow her lead, jumping from stone to stone and having a great time.
It is almost lunch-time when the two of you stops and sit down on a bench.
“Oh, that was great!” You say to Janet and sit back in the sun. “I feared I would fall in the pond a couple of times. It is not so easy with such a thick diaper on.”

“But you made it!” Janet cheers and closes her eyes, enjoying the warm sun on her face.

You try to relax as well, but a specific need distracts you… . You look over to Janet and while your best friend enjoys the sun you let go and fill the seat of your diaper.
“Gosh I can’t believe I am doing this!” You think by yourself.

The sensation is not the biggest issue, but the knowledge to sit in a messy diaper is too much for you. You quickly get to your feet and say to Janet:
“Hey I… I need to get changed. I guess we see each other after lunch?!”

“Sure, if your highness has time for her best friend. Otherwise I continue exploring the palace.” Janet says and gives you a high five.

You waddle through the hallway and spread your legs as far as you can, to avoid and contact of your behind with the mess in your diaper. Like this it takes a bit longer, but finally you arrive at the nursery and find Rose, waiting at the crib with a big bottle of formula.
“Ah Princess, right in time for your lunch and naptime.”

You smile weakly and stop.
“Sure, that was the plan, but… “.

“But what princess?” Rose asks, before she notice that your diaper is more swollen and hangs a bit lower. She comes to you and pat the seat of you diaper. “Oh, did you have an accident, Princess?”

You shake her hand off and make a face. “Uags, Rose! Stop that! Yes, I peed and just went number two in the diaper – and it is disgusting! I want to get out of the diaper, NOW!”
111212222223131121222113111312211.title: “You can let me wash the tablecloth myself.”

1112122222231311212221131113122112.content:
Rose shakes her head, saying “The “I want” grass doesn’t even grow in the King’s garden. It’s an old saying from another country. It means you have to ask, not to exact.”
Stubbornly, you say “Yes, yes, I will use please instead of I want. Now, please, change me!”
She sighs heavily, before stating “No, princess. It was my intention to change you, but since you cannot ask it politely, you will stay in that diaper during your lunch and your nap.”
“What? You cannot be serious!” you loudly exclaim, stomping your right foot on the ground.
“It’s really a shame, Princess, because you had started the day quite well.” Rose says “But I’m afraid that you just earned yourself a maintenance spanking after your nap. Now, will you calm yourself down and take your bottle or do I have to give you a punishment spanking right away?”
You hate the sensations of your dirty diaper, but you realize you are behaving like a spoiled brat. You calm yourself, than say to Rose “I’m sorry, miss Fletcher. I got carried away.”
She seems a little relieved and reply “I know it’s hard for you to adapt, but you must understand that the condition of your diaper is not an excuse for bad behaviour.”
She comes close to you, and begins to undress you, leaving you only in your wet and dirty diaper. You are then leaded to your bottle, and Rose watches you as you suck it.
After that you finished your formula, she kindly dress you up with a romper. It’s not the same one you wore yesterday. This is one is bright red, with a two big inscription wrote with blue letters: “Good princesses get hugs” is written on the front, while “Naughty princesses get spankings” is written on the back.
She then proceeds to put you in the crib. The dirty diaper make you very uncomfortable, but you fall asleep anyway.
After a while, Rose wakes you up.
“Naptime is over, Princess.” she says, smiling “Time to waking up.”
Rose is very delicate in helping you out of the crib and in taking you on the changing table.
She delicately changes you diaper, with a kind smile.
“Miss Fletcher ...” you say, blushing “... I’m sorry for before. I like you, you are very kind, even if you are so strict and stern.”
Rose doesn’t open her mouth. She remains silent till she has finished your diaper change. For this, you are afraid she is mad at you, but after the diaper change procedure is over and she has helped you coming down from the changing table, she hugs you very tightly, saying “Oh, princess. I’m so happy. I thought that you hated me.”
“I do not hate you.” you reply “You are very strict and I don’t like the whole diaper thing, but I know you genuinely care about me.”
While you are still hugging each other, you hear the door knocking.
You are sure that is the queen, but no one enters.
“Who is there?” asks Rose, looking at the door.
“Maid Sophie.” answers a voice beyond the door “I have a message of Queen Charlotte for Princess Susan.”
“I’m listening!” you yell. You would prefer to keep to a minimum the number of person that has saw you naked.
“Can I come in?” asks Sophie.
Before you can answer, Rose puts a pacifier in your mouth, and exclaims “Of course, Sophie. Come in.”
And so Sophie comes in, while you are standing in the middle of the room wearing only a very thick diaper and with a pacifier in your mouth.
“Princess ...” she says, looking at you without even noticing your nudity “... the Queen informs you that she is sorry, but she cannot come to see you because she is very busy. She also says that she wants you to join Miss Spencer in her room.”
Without waiting for an answer, she leaves the room.
Rose removes you pacifier and continues to dress you, making you wear what looks like a pink kindergarten smock. If possible, is even more childish than the onesie.
While she is dressing you, you ask her “Who is Miss Spencer?”
“She is the palace teacher.” she explains “She teaches to young princes and princesses to correctly behave during formal occasions. I’m sure she will start to prepare you for your interview.”
After being dressed, you go straight to Miss Spencer office (Rose told you the way).
You arrive in front of a door that have a very severe style, with the words “Palace Teacher” engraved on a metal plate.
1112122222231311212221131113122112.title: You are NOT changed

choices: “This is unfair and you know it!”
“And what do I get for 5 demerits?”
11121222222313112122211311131221122.content:
Happy that you find the right door, you walk and look around the room.
It is a nice, big office, with a heavy desk for Miss Spencer, a chalkboard with a small table and chair and heavy shelf's with rows of books.
“Hello, I am Princess Susan and I was told to meet you.” You address the lady behind the desk. She is in her early forties and wears an elegant office suit. You notice that she is the first women you have seen that is wearing trousers. Interesting are her glasses with a thick frame that gives her a kind of evil facial expression. You really hope that is not her intention… .

“Hello? Miss Spencer?” You come closer and announce her again.

She huffs and makes a note on a white ring binder, but keep ignoring you.

“Miss Spencer? Can you hear me? I am the princess… the queen told me to meet you… .” Finally you have an idea what could upset her and you leave the room again.
Outside you carefully knock on the door and wait for a response.

“Please come in.” You hear a high voice and when you enter the room, Miss Spencer is finally looking at you.
“Good afternoon Princess Susan, I am Miss Spencer, the Palace Teacher and I have the task to prepare you for the interview and – if we should have time for that – start with your basic training.”

You gulp hard. Learning and going to school was something you had hoped to avoid in this country. Now you look at very strict looking women – that you already have upset – as your only teacher?
“I… I am very sorry for not knocking before, Miss Spencer.”

Miss Spencer nods her head and walk around her desk to look you up and down. You feel like prey.
“Very good my dear, that is a good start. Still, you have earned three demerits within two minutes.”

“What are demerits, Miss Spencer?” You ask her, while she keeps walking around you. She touches your padded behind and the little lock on your onesie and keep shaking her head.

“Demerits are minus-points. I am a teacher and cannot waste my time punishing you. That is not my job. Instead I protocol each major mistake you make and tell Miss Fletcher what punishment you have earned.” Finally Miss Spencer has stopped walking around you and lead you to the little table.
“Please sit down, so we can begin.” She says and flip open the chalkboard. It is written full with information about Sir Richard on the right side and with basic information about the culture of the country. You huff and sink down in your chair, overwhelmed by data.

“Please read this and try to remember as much as possible. I give you five minutes before I close the board and test your memory.” Miss Spencer says with a thin smile.

You cannot slide lower in her chair sigh deeply. Miss Spencer makes another note on her ring binder, while you read the test and dates and try to remember everything. After a while, that feel much shorter than 5 minutes, she close the board to test you.

“I wasn’t finished!” You complain and Miss Spencer shakes her head, making another note.

“Miss Spencer, that do I get for 3 demerits?” You ask her, while she writes.

“THREE? Oh no, you had three points, princess. By now you have 5. You earned two for your respect-less seating position and one because you just complained.” Your teacher says and smiles.

You have the feeling, that she will not become your friend very soon.
You press your lips together and try to stay calm....
11121222222313112122211311131221122.title: Enter without knocking

choices: "I'm Janet. Can Susan come to play?"
"Maid Sophie. I have a message to the Princess from Janet."
111212222223131121222113111312211221.content:
Unfortunately, remaining calm is not your strong suit.
“This is unfair and you know it!” you angrily exclaim.
She makes another note on her ring binder, then she gets up and reach you, placing on your desk a photograph. It’s a picture of your nemesis, surrounded by three beautiful women.
“This is Lord Richard, the man you are facing against.” she calmly states “Do you think that he will play fair? No, my dear. He will try everything he has in his sleeve to overwhelm you. You must be ready to face him, to surpass him. If you are just a spoiled brat that complains for everything, then you should simply let him getting the throne.”
You are left without words. She really think that even Richard could be a better monarch then her? You must prove her that she is wrong.
“I’m sorry, Miss Spencer.” you say, with a new determination in your eyes “I’ll do my best!”
She makes a slight bowing with her lips, in what you think is a weak smile, before sitting once again.
“I inform you that you have earned a total of 7 demerits. Now, I will proceed with your test.” she says.
You do your best to stay calm and remember all the information you red.
“Let’s start with a simple one.” she begins “What was the name of the first king of Calonia?”
You try to remember it, and answer “King Gregory of House ...” you make a pause, then adding “... House ... Grimm?”
Miss Spencer shakes her head, replying “King Gregory, first king of Calonia, was a member of House Penrose. House Grimm rose two centuries later.”
You bite your bottom lip, irritated that you have already answered wrong to the first question.
She makes you some questions, about Calonia and about Richard and his family. Every answer you give is not completely wrong, but it always has a big imprecision.
At the end of the relatively short number of questions, Miss Spencer is not amused.
“Princess ...” she says “... you are not stupid, or you wouldn’t have remembered so much. But you are clearly inattentive. You had a tendency to daydreaming in class in your old country, hadn’t you?”
You blush, realizing she is right. Still, you are sure that not even Betty Harris (the most smarty-pants girl in your old class) could have remembered everything just after 5 minutes
“You have earned other two demerits for your negligence.” she states, writing in her binder “That makes a total of nine.”
As you suppress the urge to tell her to stick her demerits in a certain place, she continues with the lesson, explaining what led Calonian old leaders to introduce what is now known as “Calonian Tradition”.
As she continues to explain, you feel a need in your bladder.
“Umh, Miss Spencer, I need to be excused.” you say, as you usually did in your old school when the need manifested itself.
You immediately remember that you are in Calonia and that it’s not how this works. The teacher, in fact, writes something down in her binder once again, and then says “And that makes 10. Princess, we are talking about our traditions and you ask to go to the bathroom? What should I think? That you are inattentive of that you are mocking me?”
You deeply blush, as you simply release your bladder, wetting your diaper.
“I’m sorry.” you stammer “I’ve done now.”
She nods “Very well. Now, as I was saying ...”
Follow the rest of the lesson in a wet diaper is difficult for you. You try to focus on the things Miss Spencer is saying, but the wet sensation keeps distracting you.
You cannot help but feel like a kindergarten schoolgirl: you are in class, wearing a pink kindergarten smock and a wet diaper. At least Janet can’t see you right now.
When Miss Spencer finally says that the lesson is over for today, you hear someone knocking at the door.
“Who’s there?” she asks.
A voice replies:
111212222223131121222113111312211221.title: “This is unfair and you know it!”

1112122222231311212221131113122112211.content:
“I’m Janet, Can Susan come to play?” you hear your friend from the other side of the door.
You smile and look at Miss Spencer, waiting for her to let you go.

“Come in my dear.” Miss Spencer says and waits for Janet to come in.
When Janet enters, Miss Spencer is shaking her hand and smiles friendly.
“It is nice to meet you. The Queen suggested offering you some education about Calonia as well. I would be pleased to have you in my class as well. Maybe you can help the princess to stay focused.”

Janet seems surprised, but promise to think about it. You go to her and whisper to her:
“Don’t do that, she is a mean bitch and give demerit-points.”

“I am a what?” Miss Spencer asks. That woman has some very good ears.

“I am sorry Miss Spencer; I only warned Janet that you give demerit point for punishments.” You blush and curse yourself for you big mouth.

“Janet will not receive demerit-points, why should she. She is a guest and if she does not want to stay or distract you, she has to leave.” Miss Spencer explains.

“And I do not have that option?” You ask sheepishly.

“HA! You are funny. You are the princess, it is your job to learn about our history and I have the job to teach you. We will spend years together.” Miss Spencer says and gives you a little piece of paper.
“Bring this to Miss Fletcher, she will conduct the punishment.”
With that, the teacher goes back to her table and starts to work on the preparation of the next lesson.

Janet and you go out into the hallway and you cannot resist unfolding the piece of paper and looking at it.
“11 Demerits, Enema, 1.1qt, warm water” it reads.
“She is writing that I need an enema! I never had one, stupid bitch!” Your first reaction is to throw the paper away, but you are sure that she will talk to Rose later one.
“But she has not said when I need to give it Rose!” You grin and slide the paper into the pocket of your kindergarten smock.

Janet does not think that it is wise to wait, but you ignore her concern and ask her what she found to play with.
“They have a storage room for dresses. Some of them look like they are hundreds of years old, so I did not dare to touch them, but some look quiet new – and the best part is, some are small enough for us!”
At first you smile, until you remember the lock at the collar of your smock.
“I can’t get the dress off and Rose will get suspicious if we break the lock again.”

Janet looks sad, but nods.
“Well, okay, but as soon as you got rid of that lock, we try on dresses!”

You agree on the spot and fortunately Janet has found out more, while you suffered under Miss Spencer. She found a training area and weapons!
The training area is a big square room under the laundry. Is has a surprisingly high ceiling and many training-weapons along the walls.
“Wow! Are they real?” You ask and lift up a sword. By the weight alone, you know that it is real.
“If they consider this a sport?” You ask Janet and she shrugs. “I think so. They have tons of them and armour and training-weapons, too.”

The two of you pick up wooden training weapons and start to fight against each other. At first you only try to hit the sword of the opponent, but they Janet starts to aim for you padded behind and give it a little slap with the flat site of the sword. You try the same with her and after a while the two of you are sweating and out of endurance.
“Stop! I give up!” you pant when Janet hit your behind two times in a row. Janet stops and put the swords back to the wall. Both of you are sweating hard and you can feel the trapped heat in your diaper. “Damn it, I need a shower!” You say.
The two of you chat and laugh on your back to the main corridor, where you find Rose in front of the nursery.
“Hi Rose, are you looking for me?”

Rose shakes her head and sighs.
“Hm, what do you think princess? Miss Spencer was hear over an hour ago and told me that you did well for the first lesson for somebody from another country. Further she asked me if you made a fuss when I gave you the enema she has chosen punishment for your demerits. Since then I am looking for you and was about to call the guards. What didn’t you come back to me after your lesson right away – and where have you toe been? You two look quiet exhausted.

You blush and tell Rose where you have been. She is a bit shocked when she hears that you have been playing around with the weapons.
“There is a sign saying that no children are allowed in the training area! You could have hurt yourself badly!”

“But we are no… oh, for you, we are children.” You realise and even Janet looks guilty.
“I am very sorry Miss Fletcher, we have not been aware that it is forbidden for us – and we only used the wooden swords.”

Rose sighs and gives you and Janet a tight hug.
“At least that. Oh my little girls, you need to be more careful. You can have all kind of toys. Just ask for it and we can give you toy-swords that are safe – and I would dress you in something more suitable if you like to do sports.” She says to you and takes a critical look at the sweat drenched smock.

“Janet, as punishment for playing with the swords you are not allowed to play videogames until tomorrow.” Miss Fletcher says. “I know you are a guest, but you need to be careful as well.”

Then she looks at you.
“You, princess will receive a spanking before you go to bed, but since you will have the maintenance spanking anyway, your spanking will be extra long.”

You nod your head and look at your feet. “Okay, thank you Miss Fletcher.” You say obediently, hoping to get less slaps if you show respect.
“Can I take a shower? Or can I take the enema first and then take the shower, so I do not have to sleep in a messy diaper? And what is it for dinner?” You ask Rose and make the nanny sigh.
“Well princess, the order will be…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211.title: "I'm Janet. Can Susan come to play?"

choices: You have a nightmare about Richard
11121222222313112122211311131221122111.content:
“Well princess, the order will be the following: first you will take a bath, then you will have your dinner. Before bed you’ll get your enema and the long spanking.” Rose explains.
“But in this way I will mess myself during the night.” you argue, but almost whispering.
“That’s the idea, princess.” she states.
Janet puts an hand on your shoulder, saying “Well, I leave you with your nanny. See you tomorrow, sister.”
“She’s not my nanny!” you exclaim.
“What?” intervenes Rose “I’m not your nanny? Princess Susan, I feel offended.”
You deeply blush, immediately saying “I’m sorry. I was joking, nanny Rose.”
Rose laugh out a little, then she holds out her hand toward Janet.
“Your card, please.” she demands.
“Why?” asks Janet.
“I will turn the access to your gaming console off. It’s your punishment, remember?”
A bit reluctantly, Janet gives the VIP card to Rose. The maid then puts the card in a device similar to a portable cash dispenser, before turning it back to your friend.
You and Janet say by to each other, and Janet leaves you with Rose.
The maid lead you inside the nursery, opening the door inside the room, the one that was never opened. She then takes you across it.
As you suspected, is a bathroom. It’s walls are of the purest white you have ever seen. Inside, a colossal bathtub is placed in the middle of the room. There is a lot of wardrobes too, that you think contains bubble baths, towels and everything that is necessary for a bath. However, there is no sign of a shower, not -of course- of a toilet.
“Umh ... where is the shower?” you naively ask.
Rose giggle, answering “Very funny, princess. Now, let’s get you undressed so I can bathe you.”
She opens up the water faucet, and while waiting for the water to fill the bathtub, she begins to undress you. Taking off your smock (after unlocking it), she says in a playful tone “Naughty, naughty. You dirtied the dress. Now nanny Rose have to wash you up.”
You are too ashamed to say anything, even when she touches the front of your diaper, saying “You had an accident. Don’t worry. You will be cleaned in less than an hour.”
When you are finally naked, Rose takes you up and she puts you in the bathtub. She gives you a rubber ducky, and says “Play with this as I proceed to clean you.”
You politely take it, since you don’t want to give her a reason to punish you further.
“I’m sorry, princess.” she suddenly says, while bathing you “Yesterday evening I forgot about your bath. The queen scolded me for that and she was perfectly right. I promise it will not happen again.”
You simply nod, while your hopes of washing yourself without her slowly sink.
She rubs you everywhere -everywhere-, then takes you out of the bathtub and proceeds to dry you off using a towel.
After the procedure is completed, she leads you back to the nursery’s main room. There, she proceeds to dress you up. First, she diaper you, then she puts you in a jammies (that, despite being quit childish, is the most mature think you wore during your time in Calonia).
“Dinner time!” she exclaims, lifting a glass of baby food and a bottle of milk.
She spoons feed you, then gives you the bottle. Deciding to not complain at all (you will be severely punished, so why worsen your situation?) you eat all your baby food and drink all the milk. Rose is clearly satisfied with that.
She smiles, and says “Since you will be punished for other things and in other ways, and since you have eaten all your food like a good girl, I’ll let you have a dessert.”
You are almost scared, thinking that it will be something meant for a baby like usual, but she gives you a cup of chocolate ice cream with a spoon.
“You can feed yourself with this.” she says, without losing her smile.
Quite happy yourself, you proceed to eat the ice cream. It’s tasty and sweet.
“Thank you, Rose!” you tell her, once finished “It was delicious.”
“Thank you princess.” she replies. She then suddenly stops to smile, adding “Now, I’m afraid it’s punishment time.”
You gulp, knowing that the enema won’t be pleasant.
“It’s really necessary?” you ask.
“I’m afraid it is.” she simply reply.
She takes you back to the bathroom, next to a bar holding an enema bag. She undresses you and then inserts the tube liked to the enema bag in your rectum. It’s a totally unpleasant sensation, but it’s not painful. When the bag is finally empty, Rose removes the tube and puts the diaper back on you.
“All done, princess.” she states, and lead you back to the main room once again.
She sits on a chair, patting on her knees.
“Over my lap, princess. Let’s make this over with.”
“Can’t you ... I don’t know, taking something away from me? Like you did with Janet?” you try to ask, fully aware that she will say no.
In fact, Rose shakes her head “Don’t be silly. Janet is a guest. You are now a Calonian child, an you will be punished accordingly to tradition. Over my knees, princess. I will not say it again.”
Reluctantly, you lay yourself over her lap. The maid open up your diaper, taking down the back part but leaving the front part at its place.
She then proceeds to spank you. The spanking is quite long, as she announced before, and you are almost surprised that you haven’t wet yourself during it. Of course, you started sobbing quite soon.
When her hands finally stops, you are exhausted.
Rose tapes the diaper back close, and helps you getting on your feet.
“It’s over, princess.” she kindly says, hugging you “Now you can have your bedtime.”
She puts you in a romper, the same embarrassing one that you wore during your nap after lunch (“Good princesses get hugs” written on the front, “Naughty princesses get spankings” written on the back).
At the end of all, Rose puts you in the crib, and sing for you a sweet lullaby till you are asleep.
That night ...

choices: You wake up and climb out of the crib
111212222223131121222113111312211221112.content:
That night you have a nightmare about Richard.
It all happens in scenes.
At first you find him and yourself on the opposite sites of a big table, with a very sick looking Queen Charlotte in the middle. She speaks in a low voice: “I need to decide who will be the next ruler of this country and I have to say, that you simply did not fit in, Susan… .”
The view changes and you see yourself, dressed in the clothes you have been wearing when you stepped on the airplane to Calonia. “I do not need to fit in, I will be queen and can change the rules like It want them!” You find yourself say in a stubborn way.
The Queen shakes her head and look at Lord Richard that sits at the head of the table, with two beautiful women at his sites. “The only thing I will change is the number of wife’s a King can have, I have so much love to give.” He say in sickly sweat voice and stroke the hands of both woman.
“Then it is decided, Lord Richard will take over from me and become King.” The Queen says.

Everything turn black and when you can see something again you find yourself in a golden high chair in a corner of the throne room. Beside an enormous thick diaper and a pacifier gag you are naked. Hands and feet are tied to the high chair and the diaper is obviously used.
On the throne sits Lord Richard and on each sides he has one wife.
“I think it is time that little Susi crawls around the market place again. Somebody bring me a collar and a leash.”
A maid is coming seconds later and give the requested items to him, the maid is Rose.
“You majesty, should we change the baby before you take her for a walk?” she asks.

Richard slaps her across the face and pushes her to the ground in anger.
“Why should you do that? Everybody have to see that she is nothing but a stinking diaper wearing baby!”

…

“NO!” You jump up in your crib. It is dark and you are alone. Your hands search for your friend, the stuffed rabbit. When you find him, you hug him tightly and cry.
While you sit there in your crib you notice that your diaper is no longer dry, but very wet and messy. This makes you cry even more passionately.

The door of the nursery is opening and Nanny Rose comes in, she must have a kind of baby phone. She switch on a little lamp and comes closer.
“Hush baby, what is wrong?” She asks stroke you back.
With tear filled eyes you come to your knees and hug her tightly. When you break loose from her Rose wipes your tears away and holds a tissue for you to blow your nose.
“I had a nightmare.” You whimper into Rose’s bosom. Suddenly you realize that she is only wearing a thin nighty of white silk. You blush and try not to have more tears fall on it, but she holds you in place and hushes you.
“I had a nightmare about Lord Richard. He cannot become King, he will beat you and turn my life into hell.” You sob.
Rose is hiding a little smile, you look so cute with your stuffed rabbit in your hand and your dropping diaper, but she takes you serious and stroke your hair. “He will not become King if you work hard and I know you will, Princess. You will become Queen and we will be very proud of you.”
You nod your head and feel a little better.
“Do you like another bottle with a bit more sleeping aid?”
You want to say no, but if you are honest, it is a good idea, so you nod your head and wait for Rose to bring it to you.
You lie down in your crib and suck on your bottle, while Rose hums softly and stroke your hair.
She used a bit more sleeping aid, like she said and your eyes quickly become heavy. When you almost drift off you take the bottle out and say: “I am poopy.”
Rose giggles and nods her head. “I know princess and it is very brave that you don’t ask to be changed. – I change you in a few hours, little one.” She says softly.
You nod your head and finish the bottle. She takes it from you, but keep stroking your hair.
“Rose!?” You whisper, almost asleep.
“Yes princess?” The nanny asks.
“Thank you for coming.” You whisper and fall asleep.
Rose keep stroking your hair for a few more minutes before she gets up. “Always Princess, Always.” She says and leaves the room.

In the morning…
111212222223131121222113111312211221112.title: You have a nightmare about Richard

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
In the morning, you feel a firm hand touching your shoulder. The touch is gentle, but determined.
You open your eyes, and once focused you see Queen Charlotte bent over your crib, with a cheerful smile.
“Wake up, Susan.” she says.
You yawn, asking “Can I sleep a couple more minutes?”
“I’m afraid it’s not possible. A princess must follow an healthy schedule. Waking up at the right time is a part of it.” answers the Queen.
She helps you getting out of the crib, and instantly you remember that you are wearing a very wet and messy diaper.
“Can I get changed now?” you ask, looking in Rose direction. She is right next to the changing table.
“Of course, princess.” she replies “But I’m not the one that will do it this morning.”
As she finish to talk, the queen puts a hand on your shoulder, saying “Come on, Susan. I don’t want you to get a rash.”
She leads you to the changing table and lift you on it. Once on the soft surface of the changing table, you ask “Weren’t you too busy to change diapers, ma’am?”
“First of all, stop calling me ma’am. I don’t’ expect that you call me mommy, but you can call me Charlotte.” she replies “And I stated that I would have been often too busy, it’s true, but not always.”
She removes your romper and makes you lay on the changing surface, then ends her speech with “Yesterday I was very busy and I hadn’t almost the opportunity to see my little princess. This morning I want to make up for.”
Having said that, she proceeds in changing your diaper. Except when she putted the diaper on you the first time on the plane, she has never changed you. Maybe two days ago you wouldn’t have noticed it, but now you realize that Rose is much better at changing diapers than the queen is. In fact, queen Charlotte seems a little more insecure and the entire procedure is slower.
After you are changed into a fresh diaper, the queen helps you come down from the changing table.
She then sits on a chair, saying “Now, you can come over my lap.”
You instantly go pale, and you stutter “But … but … but I didn’t do anything. Why do you want to spank me?”
Surprisingly, Rose scolds the queen, saying “Your Majesty, you cannot tell a little one to come over your lap without specifying the position where you want her. You scared her for nothing.”
“I’m sorry.” says Charlotte, blushing “I’m not that expert in this. Susan, I was saying that you can come to sit on my knees.”
Relieved, you reach the queen and sit over her lap. She hugs you a starts to cradle you in her arms.
“Is Rose going to spank you for this, Charlotte?” you ask her, clearly joking.
The two women burst out laughing, and Rose says, joking too “Of course. I spank every naughty royal than resides in the palace.”
The maid then passes to the queen your breakfast, and she proceeds to spoon feed you.
After you have finished the baby food, Rose passes to the queen the bottle of milk. Holding you with her left arm, Charlotte gently puts the teat of the bottle in your mouth with her right hand.
“Suck it all, my little angel.” she says, smiling.
It’s quite humiliating to be suckled with a bottle, but you cannot deny that is quite relaxing.
“I’m really proud of you.” the queen states, during your breakfast “The maids reported to me what you did yesterday in the laundry. I’m impressed, just like them. And your teacher had complimented you, though you learned some demerits. As icing on the cake, you got punished just once, and not six times like the day before. When I look at you, I see the future of the country.”
You blush, and when she removes the bottle you reply “To be honest, Charlotte, I’ve received three punishments, just at the same time.”
“Details.” she says “But now I’m even more proud. Honestly always rewards.”
After a moment of silence, she add “I’m afraid I have to go now.”
You hug her, don’t wanting to let her go.
“Please, stay with me.” you whisper.
“I’d love it, really. But I must go. The country needs me.” With this words, she puts you down and leaves the room.
Once again, you are left alone with your nanny.
“It’s time to get dressed.” she states.
She then dresses you with a less babyish dress than usual.
The dress is in fact a white cardigan, full of red ribbons and bows, and with an heart printed on the chest. It’s frilly on the neck and around your bum, but is accompanied by a pair of red trousers that ends in a very VERY frilly part. For the first time, she doesn’t put the lock on.
“You can go to play with Janet.” says Rose, once you are dressed “When you have the chance, come to see me. I will unlock Janet’s card so she can play with videogames.”
But you don’t move, and tell Rose “I would like to stay here a couple more minutes.”
“As you wish, princess. I’ll clean the bathroom. If you need me, simply call me.”
And she disappears in the bathroom. For the first time, you are left completely alone. Your rebel part is bursting: it’s time to do something naughty.

Since you have arrived in Calonia you never had the chance to “relieve tension” in the way you are used to do. At home – at your old home – you developed the habit of tickling yourself to sleep, what is a nicer way to say, you masturbated until you were too tired to stay awake. With the locked on rompers and onesie this was not an option for you, especially not when you went to bed in a wet or full diaper.
The last attention your private parts got haven been on the changing table, by Rose or Charlotte and you find it deeply humiliating that you started to get aroused when they wipe you down with wet wipes or rub oil between your legs. You decide that it is time to take pressure off the system, not to end on the changing table and grind your private parts against the hands of your caretaker.

You look around the room and find the play area suitable for some naughty fun. A hug teddy bear is sitting in the corner and you sit down between his soft, legs and rest your head against his round belly, while you take a deep breath and wiggle your hand through the waistband of your diaper. The lack of skill from the Queen felt the diaper a bit lose, what makes it easier for you to slide your hand in and touch your private parts.

Rose huffs and puffs and get some wet wipes from the changing table to wipe your fingers clean.
“What do you think? You know some of our rules already. Do you think we allow little girls to have naughty fun, so easily?”


You shrug, placing dump. “Once you said that you would prevent naughty fun, when I have been a bad girl. But I have been a good girl. I do not wear the lock any longer and got praised a lot. I think I deserve some playtime with my little kitten.”

“I am sorry, but that was a misunderstanding. We will ALWAYS prevent unauthorized manipulation of your private parts. You are too young and unexperienced to decide what your little body needs. We decide that for you or use it as a special treat, like ice-cream, you know.”

You are shocked by that stupid logic. “Are you telling me, that I am not allowed to masturbate – but YOU will make me cum from times to times, as a treat? That is sick!”

You cannot deny that boys and girls can be easily controlled when you control their sexual needs and you must admit that the… frequency little ones would masturbate is insane. For that reasons we use it as a treat and in very, very rare cases as a punishment.”

You huff and fold your arms in front of your chest.
“And what does that mean for me? Haven’t I been a very good girl and deserve a special treat? And… oh fucking god – are you telling me, that YOU will masturbate me?”

“Princess! Language!” Rose scolds you and blush at your question.
“Some caretaker use a massage-wand, either on the diaper of direct on the private parts, like on the changing table. Some allow the littles to hump a rocking horse to take care of their needs.”

You look around the room, but find not rocking horse.

Rose blush and you think she nods a little bit, but it is very hard to tell. “Sometimes I did, but we have a rocking horse in the basement as well.” She states and pulls you to the chair, where she sits down and pull you over her lap.
“Anyway. For unauthorized naughty fun and foul language you deserve a spanking and to prevent further manipulations…

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“… I will put mittens on you.”
You can’t believe your hears.
“Are you serious? A spanking and mittens just for doing something absolutely normal?” you yell, while you lie on her lap.
Rose doesn’t answer, but simply lowers your pants and unfastens the diaper, taking down the back part of it.
Her hard hand smacks your bottom, and only after the second slap she speaks “Unauthorized naughty fun and foul language, princess. Since you didn’t know about the first of the two things, I will lenient about it. Mittens will not be followed by a locked onesie. And for your language you can be grateful that I don’t resort to mouth soaping after having warmed up your bottom, since you should know about it.”
You feel a little humiliated, in been given a lesson during a spanking.
After some more slaps, she lets you stand up, puts your clothes back on you and, shaking her right forefinger in your direction, she adds “The next time you’ll have unauthorized naughty fun, your spanking will be with the hairbrush, and not with the hand like this time. And next time you use foul language, you will not avoid the soap. It’s that clear, princess?”
Still sobbing, you nod.
“Princess …” she adds, more sweetly “… we are not bigots. We know that naughty fun … masturbation … it’s a natural thing. You haven’t been punished because we think that it’s bad or sinful, or we wouldn’t use it as a reward. It’s because little ones need supervision, and cannot simply play with their body like adults do.”
In hearing her words, you calm yourself a little.
“So, I can ask you? And you will … well … you know.” you ask.
“As I said, it’s a reward. So you can ask for it if you have been a good girl. Be aware, however, that I can say no, even if you’ve been good.”
After havingsaid that, she takes a pair of mittens from a wardrobe. They are thick, pink and with kittens printed on.
“Hands forward.” commands Rose.
Gulping, you put your hands forward her. The nanny then puts the mittens at your hands.
“Great.” you think “Now I’m completely unable to use my hands.”
They are not locked, but are so thick that you cannot remove one of them without using both hands. And since you can’t use none of them, you are completely unable to do anything. Perhaps with Janet’s help, however …
“Now you can go to find Janet.” Rose adds, interrupting your thoughts “And please, princess, don’t do anything obvious and stupid, like having her removing them for you. I would know it, and you will both be in trouble.”
You blush, realizing that your idea wasn’t so ingenious.
“Miss Fletcher … will everyone know that I had naughty fun in seeing me in mittens?” you ask her, realizing that is not a think you would everuy servant in the palace to know about.
“Someone will probably perceive it, but most servants will simply deduce that you threw something at me and you’ve been punished for that.”
“Ok, someone will understand that I’ve been that type of naughty while other will simply think I’m a brat. Much better.” you think, ironically.
“If you behave during the rest of the day …” concludes Rose, winking at you “… I will not inform the queen about what happened. It can be our … little secret.”
You hug Rose, and then bye her and leave the nursery, looking for Janet.
When you reach her room and knock, she answers with a quite angry voice.
“Who’s there?”
“Janet, it’s me, Susan.”
“Come in!”
You enter her room, uncertain of why she is so angry. It can’t be for the videogames, can it be?
You look at your friend, who is waiting for you with her arms crossed.
“Janet? What’s the matter?” you ask.
“What’s the matter? WHAT’S THE MATTER?” she yells “How could you!?”
Seeing that you don’t really understand what the problem is, she reaches you, grabbing by your shoulders and giving you a firm slap on the bottom.
“That man!” she says, calming a little “Why haven’t you told me about this Richard?”
Your skin goes pale, while you answer “I didn’t want to make you worry.”
“I’m your best friend!” she says “You cannot simply hide to me that a man is trying to getting your throne!”
You are ashamed of yourself, thinking that she will never forgive you for this lack of trust, but she hugs you instead.
“I love you!” she exclaims “I will protect you, always! You are my best friend!”
“Janet, I’m sorry …” you stutter.
“Hush, Susan.” she replies “I’m sorry too, I overreacted. But I heard two maids talking about him, and my blood frozen in my veins. I will not let him hurt you!”
You hug her tightly, and you simply spend a couple minutes like that.
“I think you need to distract yourself a little.” she states, after a while “I have an idea.”
“What’s it?”
She gives you a warm smile, answering …
