1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
„We will make an innocent prank on Miss Spencer.“ Janet smiles from ear to ear.
“It is obvious that she was much too hard on you on your first lesson. I mean, you do not know much about the country and she still treat you like you should know everything y heart – I mean, that is unfair!” Janet says and want to hold your hand, when she notice your mittens.
“Hey, what have you done to earn those?”

You blush bright red and hide the mittens behind your back. “Why do you think I did anything? Maybe Rose put them on me, because she thought they are cute?!” You try to convince her.

Janet raise a brow and giggles. “Hey Princess, it is me, Janet, you cannot trick me. What have you done?”

If it is technically possible, you blush even more, while you stammer. “She caught me… I... shit Janet, do I have to tell you everything? …. She caught me… scratching a certain kind of itch.”

Janet needs a second before she understands, but then she is laughing out hard.
“Oh Susan, you naughty little girl! I can’t believe you let her caught you doing… that. Maybe I should find somebody else for my little prank?!”

You slowly calm down and steer the conversation back to the prank.
“Okay, what is the plan? It cannot be too mean, since – I was told – Miss Spencer was not so bad – for Calonia standards.”

Janet tells you that she found out that the teacher has a bedroom in the palace and since Calonia is so safe, she never locks her door. “Miss Spencer is working like a clockwork. Every morning she is either teaching or taking long walks, therefore her room is free for about 4 hours, until she is back around lunch time. Her underwear is in her bottom-drawer and I still know where the baby-supplies are… .”

You do not get it right away, so Janet helps you out.
“We swap her panties against diapers. So she either go commando or wear a diaper herself. I think that is more than fair after she treated you like a little girl in her class.”

You are afraid to get caught, but the plan sound good and it is not like you hurt her or destroy anything. You simply throw all her underwear into the laundry-box and she will have them back a few days later, no damage and no harm.
“Okay, we do it, lets go!”

You follow Janet through the hallways until you stop at a door with the sign “Miss Spencer”. With those signs you can easily track down anybody in the palace. On your way some maids giggles when they saw you with the mittens and you have the feeling that all of them know why you wear yours. “If they are for throwing stuff or masturbating I would pick for the second myself.” You think by yourself and try to hide the mittens whenever somebody cross your way.

As Janet says is the door unlocked and to your embarrassment did nobody stopped you when you walked around with a big box of diapers in your arms.
“Great, why must I carry the diapers? You wear them as well?” You complain, but Janet shrugs.
“It was my plan and you should be happy that the big box distracted the people from your mittens.” She grins.

In Miss Spencer’s bedroom you find some awards like “Best Teacher of the Year” or “Champion of Ice-Skating”, something you would have never expected. Other than that, the room is not very personnel and you have the feeling that she was another apartment outside of the palace.
Janet’s plan works fine. Yes, she took off your mittens, so you can fold all the diapers in the wardrobe, but before the two of you leave the room, she put them back on. You hope that Rose will not notice that – and it was not… okay, it was to do something forbidden, but at least not the same forbidden thing like before.
With all underwear gone and the drawer full of diapers you and Janet check the room a last time to make sure you have left no evidence of your prank. When you leave the room again…

1. You ask Janet to get you ice-cream with her VIP card
2. The two of you explore the castle further
3. You run straight into somebody.

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
When you leave the room again, you begin to walk across the corridors, without a precise way but only to get away from the room where you did your prank.
You and Janet giggle together as you turn the corner of a corridor. As soon as you turn the corner, however, you violently bump into someone, instantly hearing a yell and the rumor of a fallen laundry basket.
When your sight returns clear, you see a blonde maid, with terrorized puppy eyes.
“I’m sorry, I’m really sorry!” she yells, almost crying “I didn’t see you! Please, don’t whip me!”
Before you can ever realize what is she saying, a man touches her shoulder. Is a man in his later thirties, with black hair and brown eyes. He is dressed in an elegant suit, with a pair of white gloves that particularly stand out.
“Elizabeth, you’re making a scene. The princess is not going to whip you. No one is. Collect the laundry, apology, and continue with your business.” he says, with a flat tone of voice.
The maid does as she has been told and leaves.
“What happened?” you ask, once that you and Janet are left alone with the man “Why she feared that I could whip her?”
“I’m sorry, princess.” he replies, in his flat tone “Elizabeth is new here. She worked for House Grairven since a month ago.”
“Grairven!” exclaims Janet, looking at you “It’s his House, right? The House of that Richard.”
You nod, now fully aware of the fear of the maid, since you know that in House Grairven servants are whipped. You then look at the man with white gloves. It’s the first male servant you’ve seen, and you are curious about him.
“Who are you, exactly?” you ask.
“Princess …” he says, looking at you like he’s examining you “… you will address to an adult saying Mr., Ma’am or Miss, unless the adult hasn’t given you permission to do otherwise, or the adult concerned will feel free to give you a spanking.”
You blush, then say “Excuse me, Mr., can I ask you who you are?”
“My name is Benedict Harper. At your service, princess.” he says.
“You are a male servant.” you state “I’ve only seen maids so far.”
“There are male servants in the palace, although in the minority compared to the maids.” he answers “But I’m not one of them. I’m the Butler.”
“Isn’t butler the name of male maids?” asks Janet, giving voice to your thoughts too.
“My dear, disregarding girls …” he replies “… the Butler it’s not a footman. A footman is the male equivalent of a maid. The First Footman is in charge of all footmen, the Housekeeper is in charge of all maids, and they both answer to the Butler.”
“Wow!” you exclaim “So you are the boss of all palace servants!”
“You can say that, yes.” he answers “However I don’t consider myself a boss, rather an overseer.”
“So you …” you begin to say, with a naughty grin, but he interrupts you immediately.
“If you are about to ask me to remove your mittens because I’m in a higher position than your nanny, you can forget about it.” he states, perfectly seeing through your intentions.
“But you are the Butler.” you exclaim, in a cute way that makes Janet giggle (she is watching the scene, amused) “You should obey me. I’m the princess.”
“My lady, the only person in this palace that can give me a direct order is the queen herself.” he claims, then adding “I also inform you that I’m one of the four servants with the full authorization to spank you if you misbehave, the others are the Housekeeper, the First Footman and the Maid in charge of the nursery.”
You blush EXTREMELY deeply picturing yourself laid over this man knees with your bottom fully exposed. You’d die of embarrassment.
“Mr. Benedict …” intervenes Janet “… can I ask you something?”
He nods, saying “I haven’t much time left to spend with you, but I can answer to one question.”
“Why that maid hadn’t sued Richard? He abused her.” she asks. You think it’s a very smart question.
“Suing him? With what charges? The ways of disciplining the servants are left at the noble’s discretion. It’s perfectly legal to use a whip to do that.” he explains, making you angry.
“What? It’s not illegal? That’s impossible! So every noble can do that?” you shout. The scene that you had in your nightmare, where Richard had beaten Rose, still fills you with anger.
“Technically speaking, yes. But as far as I know, only House Grairven does that. The others nobles tend to punish their servants in more … human ways.”
“I refuse to believe that Charlotte … I mean, the queen … hasn’t done anything to change that!” you exclaim.
“Princess, Calonia is technically an absolute monarchy, but with a lot of similarities to a constitutional monarchy. The queen has a great power, but cannot simply decide everything. The most important reforms must be approved by the Elder Council. If her powers were absolute, she could have simply had lord Richard exiled from the country and your path to the throne would be without obstacles.” explains Harper.
Just as he finishes to talk, you add, lowering your head “And as the Elder Council is made of nobles, and House Grairven is one of the most important noble houses in Calonia, Richard could do everything he wants once on the throne.”
Miss Spencer told you about the Elder Council yesterday.
Harper nods, saying “He would have limitations too, but he would be enough influent to make serious damages to the country.”
You greet Harper, and then leave the corridor with Janet.
Before you can say anything about the situation, Janet says “Try to imagine the face of Miss Spencer today during our afternoon lesson. I’m curious to see if she will really wear a diaper.”
She is trying to distract you, to don’t make you think about your duties. And it’s effective.
“Our lesson?” you ask her, while walking “Today you’re coming too?”
“Of course.” she confirms “I’m interested in the country that my best friend will rule one day. And I’m curious about the result of our little prank.”
“I think we should go back to the nursery now.” you say “Nanny Ro… I mean, maid Rose told me that she wanted to unlock your games console.”
Janet giggles, saying “Nanny Rose, uh?”
“Maid! I said maid Rose!” you exclaim, blushing.
“Of course.” she jokes “Another month and you will begin to call her mommy.”
“Nah, that’s the queen …” you begin to tell her, suddenly realizing what you’re saying and adding “Wait, I didn’t say anything. Forget about it.”
Janet continues to giggle, as you head to your nursery. You even wetted yourself during the morning, and you hope that Rose will change you.
Once at the nursery, you meet Rose. She …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You run straight into somebody

choices: Miss Spencer with a visible padding under her suit.
Miss Spencer and Ben the Butler
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose has discovered the temporary removal of the mittens.
You are not sure how she sees it, maybe there was a marker on the mittens that is now gone or whatever else. Fact is, that you greet Rose, even give her a hug, but as soon as she takes a closer look at your mittens her mood changes.
“Princess, why have you take off your mittens?” She asks straight ahead.
Yu blush and shake your head. “I haven’t taken them off.” You say, what is the truth, since Janet did that.
Still, Rose is not happy with your answer and take your mittens off completely. Then she lift your hands to her face and takes a sniff on your fingers. You blush and Janet behind you laugh out, while you try to pull your hands away.
“ROSE! Are you checking if… if they smell like… my kitten?”
“KITTEN?! HAHAHA…” Janet behind you is holding her tummy, while she laughs on. She has problems to stop and you hope that she is laughing hard enough to wet her diaper. Finally she stops and talks to Rose: “Miss Fletcher, before you continue, can you please unlock the VIP-Card again?”

“That bitch!” You think, while Rose takes Janet’s VIP-Card, unlocks the games and send your best friend out of the nursery. Janet is still smiling and you really wish she hadn’t taken off your mittens…

“Back to you princess, why have you taken off your mittens? It does not look like you haven been THAT naughty again, but please tell me why?” Rose demands.
You bite down on your bottom lip, knowing that you can never tell her about the prank you played on Miss Spencer you consider to tell her a lie or simply stay quiet. You choose the second option.
“I am sorry Miss Fletcher, it is a secret and I cannot tell you.” You say.

A mixture of anger and credit is shown on Rose’ face, but as your nanny she cannot accept you to be disobedient. “Very well, it did not had naughty fun but insist to keep quiet about the real reason. I hope it is worth it, because I have to punish you. Not telling me the truth, even hiding the truth by staying quiet is intolerable. I would gag you for the rest of the day with a pacifier, but since you have a lesson later today I need to do something else… I wash your mouth with soap, before and after lunch.” You want to say that this is unfair, but then you remember the spankings you had and the enema and decide that from all the possible punishments you know, this is the least painful or humiliating.
Your mouth is washed out with soap, what is still very unpleasant, especially since Rose feed you your bottle of formula right afterwards. The taste of the – normally delicious – formula is ruined by the aftertaste of the soap and is takes you much longer to nurse from the baby bottle. As promised your mouth is washes out a second time right afterwards and therefore you drool heavily, when Rose put you to bed for your nap.
“Miss Fletcher, I am very sorry.” You say, before she put a pacifier in your mouth and dim the lights.
“I hope so princess, I am disappointed that you do not trust me.” Your nanny says.
She look down at you for a minute, before she goes to the wardrobe and comes back with new mittens. They are bright pink, with a white cat in the shape of an M and, to your great dismay a little lock.
She put them on your hands and ruffles your hair.
“When I cannot trust you, I need to make sure you keep them on. And this ones leave no imagination about the reason you wear them.” She grins and leaves you alone.

In the twilight of the nursery you look at the mittens and sigh. “So the “M” tells everybody the I was… masturbating.” You think and hug your stuffed rabbit. “Hey Mister Rabbit, do you think I should have told her about the prank? … Me neither, I cannot wait to see Miss Spencer… .”

During your nap you wet your diaper a bit more, but Rose does not seem to mind that, when she checks you after your nap. You do not dare to ask her to be changed and rather waddle into the corridor to meet Janet.
“Hey Susan, sorry for laughing at you, it was just… bizarre.” Janet apologizes.
“I know it is strange, but hey. Did you wet your diaper when you were laughing so hard?”
Now Janet is blushing and nods slightly. “A little bit. I asked a maid to be changed and she really suggested I should wear the diaper for longer and come back when it is worth to change her. Can you believe that?!”
Instead of an answer you show her you new mittens: “Ha, and can you believe this?”
Janet rubs your back while the two of you walk on to the classroom and knock on the door. When you are allowed to come in you find…

1. Miss Spencer with a visible padding under her suit.
2. Miss Spencer and Ben the Butler
3. Miss Spencer with a dress (Commando)
