choices: Mr. Benedict is there instead of Rose
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
When you are allowed to come in, you find Miss Spencer standing next to her heavy desk, with a visible padding under her suit.
“Princess Susan, Janet.” she greets you, with her usual demeanor “Now that you’re here we can begin our lesson. Sit down at you desks.”
Looking at the desk where you sat yesterday, you see that another identical one is standing next to it. You do as you’re told, internally laughing at seeing her padded.
“Now, princess, you will explain to Janet yesterday entire lesson. You have 5 minutes.” she states, while obviously looking at your mittens.
“5 minutes? But the lesson took 1 hour and half!” you protest.
“Yes, and you will summarize it.” she says, writing down something on her ring binger.
“Wonderful.” you think “Demerits already.”
“I’m waiting, princess.” she says.
You look at Janet and begin to summarize yesterday lesson.
When you are finished, Miss Spencer shakes her head. “No, princess. That wasn’t acceptable. You focused on meaningless details and forgot about the important parts. Also, you did not punctuate the words well. It is a very important thing to keep in mind.”
“Let me guess …” you say, with an ironical tone “… I earned demerits for it.”
“I was going to give you three demerits, but since you insist on being so sarcastic, I’ll give you five. Plus the one that you earned complaining before, for a total of six.” she explain.
“Aren’t you going to ask anything to Janet?” you ask her “Or are you going to test only me?”
“Janet can listen to the lesson and is free to ask questions if something is unclear to her, but since she is a guest, she will not be tested.” is her answer.
“Susan …” Janet whisper to you “… I know you are frustrated about your situation, but I will be glad if you stop to try to get me in trouble too.”
You blush, realizing that you are doing what she is saying.
“You should focus on your studies, princess.” the teacher says “And not on … naughty things.”
You blush, knowing what she is talking about. In an unconditional reflex, you try to hide your mittens.
During the lesson, Miss Spencer gives you numerous information, included a lot of thing that will be very useful for the interview. She tests you often, and she is pleased at most of your answer, but you made some mistakes.
“Good but not excellent.” she states, writing in her binger “You’re inattentive.”
“Excellent? How can one be excellent? I couldn’t answer perfectly to all questions! It’s impossible!” you complain.
“Imagine that I’m the reporter that is questioning you.” she says, in a calm tone “If you reply something wrong, even to a single question, the entire interview would change. And what do you think? That you can simply say “I’m sorry, can I try with another one?” ? No, princess. You’ll have only a chance. If you waste it, the entire strategy will crumble.”
Janet nods, adding “I think … she is right, sister. I begin to understand why she was so … strict.”
The word strict was clearly said in place of “mean”.
“You should take example, princess.” she says, looking at Janet “Your friend seems a quicker learner than you.”
You blush, thinking that she has not to remind you that. You’re fully aware that Janet is smarter than you.
In an impetus of pride, you exclaim “Even Betty Harris is smarter than me, but she is an unbearable smarty-pants with no friends!”
You have formulated the sentence as a direct following to your thoughts, so it doesn’t make perfect sense.
“Susan, you have no much friends yourself, remember?” intervenes Janet, shutting you up.
Miss Spencer shakes her head, saying “A smarty-pants, uh? But I bet her grades was better than yours.
“Of course! She was always licking teachers’ asses!” you exclaim, immediately regretting saying that.
“Five demerits for bad language, princess. That makes 13 in total.” says the teacher, writing down on her binger, before adding “You think that you are less smart then other people. It’s right, princess? It’s not true. You are smart. Smarter than most of the students I teach to. You only need to applicate yourself more.”
You are left without words. This is the first time she addressed you kindly.
“The lesson is over for today.” she states, at the end “We only need to discuss about your … little prank.”
Both you and Janet go pale. Have you been discovered so easily?
“The Butler, Mr. Benedict, saw you just around my room. He told me about it. And shortly after I found that my underwear was missing. So, I made the math. As you can see, I was forced to wear what you left in my room.”
“We are … sorry, Miss Spencer.” you stutter.
“You should be.” she says “And I think you both need a punishment for this.”
“What punishment?” Janet asks.
“Janet, since you are a guest, you will not receive a Calonian punishment. I simply expect that you write 100 times on a paper that you should not do pranks. You will write it tonight and you will give it me tomorrow.”
Your friend nod, a little ashamed.
“And for you, princess …” she adds, giving you a piece of paper “… you’ll get15 demerits for your prank. With the13 you gained during the lesson, you have 28 demerits today.”
“Twenty-eight?” you exclaim “Rose will kill me!”
“You should have thought about it before.” Miss Spencer simply states, dismissing you. So you and Janet leave the room.
“That Butler!” you exclaim, once alone with your friend “He snitched on us!”
“I think that you can be grateful that he hasn’t spanked you, Susan.” she replies “He could have done that, remember?”
“Don’t make me think about it.” you say, blushing “I would be too embarrassed to even look him again if he does something like that.”
Janet puts an hand on your shoulder, saying “I wetted myself more during the lesson. What about you?”
“Me too.” you confirm, blushing once again “I think we should go to Rose and get changed. Then I will submit to my punishment.”
“Aren’t you opening Miss Spencer the note this time?” she asks you.
“I’m not eager to know what 28 demerits involve.” you answer, before adding with a smile “And I want to enjoy your first diaper change.”
You laugh together, while going to the nursery once again.
There …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Miss Spencer with a visible padding under her suit

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
In the nursery Rose is waiting for you.
“Welcome back, it is good to see that you come back right away and not after having a workout in the training area.” She smiles and take the note from Miss Spencer from you. She unfold it and sighs deeply. “I don’t even want to know how you managed to earn such a high number.”

“Uhm, Miss Fletcher, would you mind to change my diaper first. I could not use the bathroom during the lesson and it was a bit longer than I thought.” Janet steps in and give you a few minutes before you are told what punishment you will receive. Strangely you do not feel better about it and regret that you haven’t checked the note before. How you boil in your own fear, not knowing what will come.
At least the diaper change of Janet is quit entertaining for you. Rose lifted your friend on the changing table and is about to give her a quick and professional diaper-change, when she suddenly stops. “Oh dear, we better take care of your hair first.” Rose says and when she goes to a low cabinet you can see that Janet has some stubbles “down their”.
“No problem, I can shave it off later! Really!” Janet says, but Rose is very quick and applies a cream from a little jar and says: “No worries my child, with this cream you do not need to worry about public hair for the next 2 to 3 years. The Princess got the same when I changed her the first time.”
“WHAT?” You and Janet yell out simultaneously.
“So it will not grow back for 3 years?” Janet asks and looks quit sad, she had the idea about shaving it into a heart when she is back home – something she has to postpone now.
“Yes, public hair only cause hygienic issues, so we eliminate it from the beginning. Most woman keep using the cream later one as well.”
Janet sighs and lay back, while Rose tapes her in a fresh diaper and helps her off the changing table.
“Off you go, except you like to watch your friend getting punished.”

The way Rose is saying that leaves no doubt that she think, that Janet should better leave. Therefore Janet hugs you and wishes you luck, before she leaves to play some video games.

“Now for you princess. Miss Spencer suggest some public humiliation. Further, she is writing that you would not masturbate if your diaper would be messy – what I agree with.” Rose says and helps you on the changing table.
“You are quiet wet little one. “ She says, when she takes away out diaper and replace it with a new one. It is the same thick one that force you to waddle already, but now she add two booster pads in the middle to make it as thick as a pillow. “This is already part of your punishment, little one. I am sorry, but on the positive side I can say that the worst part will be over when you go to bed.”

You look at the golden clock at the wall and count three hours, two if you are lucky, before you receive dinner and be put in the crib. “I am really sorry for pranking Miss Spencer and I am sorry for not telling you the truth, but Janet was involved and I wanted to protect her.” You say, trying to soften your punishment on the last meters.
Rose nods her head: “It is good that you feel sorry now, but at the same time I am disappointed that you are now blaming Janet. Even when she was involved or it was her idea, you should resist the urge to be naughty, that would have saved both of you.”

Rose wheels in the rack with the enema-kit, but today it looks much fuller that yesterday.
“Today you receive 2qt (2L), that is also the reason why you have the booster pads. The diaper has to last until tomorrow morning.” She explains and pushes the hose up your behind. While the warm water filly our colon Rose applies a mass of anti-rash cream on your private parts and is extra careful NOT to cause you stimulation on your most sensitive bits. She know you want to find release, but you are faaar away from earning it.
After the water is all inside your behind, Rose tapes the diaper close and puts some lockable plastic pants over them. They are clear and pink and the word BRAT is printed on the behind. It is designed for pure humiliation.
“Okay princess, now the final parts and we can begin out walk.” Rose says. She put a tight fitting camisole over you that is only long enough to hide your little breasts, before she adds a baby bib with the words NAUGHTY BABY printed on it. The last item are baby reins that she buckels over your chest.
“Please go on hands and knees, so we can walk around the garden, Princess.”

You are shocked. In the mirror you can see your reflection. The super thick diaper that will be wet and messy within minutes, the little top with the reins. Arms, bells and legs are naked and cannot think about leaving the room like this. “No, I cannot go out like this! No way!” You say and look at Rose.
“Please Miss Fletcher, I know I was a bad girl, but this is too much!”

“Are you arguing with me Princess? I can ask Benedict to give you a spanking in the garden, by the fountain, with all maids watching?!” Rose says.

“WHAT? NO! I mean…. Oh please… .” You already have tears of shame in your eyes when you go down on hands and knees. “Please go quickly, I want to be back as soon as possible.” You beg Rose.


Rose is not the limiting factor on your way through the hallway and into the garden, it is your tummy. In the beginning you crawl quickly, but then you have more and more cramps and helplessly fill your diaper. While you expel the water and… other stuff you cannot move on and Rose has to wait for you. Like a puppy she pat your head and rub your back to comfort you. A few maids walk by and even while none of them is saying a word you notice that they walk slower and stare at you.
After you have filled your diaper you crawl much slower, with the extra weight between the legs. The plastic pants hold the squishy mass against your skin and you whimper with every meter you make. In the garden you try to speed up again, but then Rose stops and hold you back with the baby reins.
“Oh, Elisabeth, nice to see you. I thought you go home right after the lesson to get some new… clothes.” Rose greets Miss Spencer. Your teacher is sitting on a bench with Benedict and enjoys a joyful conversation.
“Oh Rose, Yes you would think that, but I wanted to know what kind of punishment our dear princess receive – and now I can see it with my own eyes. I am very pleased, Rose.”

Benedict walks around you and nods his head. “Yes indeed, I hope she will learn her lesson after this experience.”

Like a dog you pull at the reins and thankfully Rose walks on. You do not say a word and pretend to be invisible, but when you are back in the nursery you sit down on your soaked diaper and cry out.
“I can never face them again!” you howl.
Rose takes the reins and the bib off and hugs you tightly. “Hush Princess, You don’t want to know what punishments Queen Charlotte had to endure, back in that days and now everybody is respecting her.”
You need a while to calm down and Rose is hugging you and comforts you until you nod your head and try to get back on your feet – what is not working.
“I can’t walk with that diaper.” You sob. “Miss Fletcher, can you please change me into a fresh diaper? I promise to be good, but this diaper is just too thick.”

Rose rub your back. In theory she only has to feed you and put you to bed, but the little stroll around the garden was very humiliating for you and very stressful. Well earned, but stressful! She decides to…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Rose is waiting for you

choices: ... you look for Miss Spencer to apology
... you go in the palace library to serch something more about Richard
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose sighs, saying “Princess, I should feed you and put you to bed, without a bath and without a diaper change.”
You lower your head, saying “Yes, I see.”
“Susan ...” Rose whispers, without calling you princess fort the first time “... I don’t like public humiliation, it’s the punishment I would have liked to avoid. But you have been a real brat during the day. Unauthorized naughty fun, foul language, removal of the mittens, a prank that embarrassed an important palace employee, a lot of lies, lots of demerits during your lesson. What should I have done? Simply let it go?”
You begin to cry, aware that she is right. You have been really naughty today.
“My little princess ...” she adds, hugging you tightly “... do you promise to be my polite little angel tomorrow?”
“Yes, Rose. I promise it.” you reply, hiding your face in her bosom.
“Hush, now, little one.” she says, with an affectionate voice “Since you have learned your lesson, I will give you a bath and change your diaper.”
If possible, you hug her even more tightly, feeling ashamed that, during your punishment, you thought that it was similar to what Richard had done in your nightmare. Maybe it was a little similar, yes, but Rose really cares about you, and that’s the main difference. She would never do something like that to just free humiliate you.
With a loving hand, she undress you and gives you a nice bath, before putting on you a fresh diaper. It’s a thick one, but without booster pads.
She then proceeds dress you in a purple romper (that same that you wore during today’s nap) and to feed you, and then puts you in the crib, before turning the lights off and leaving the nursery.
You hug your stuffed friend, Mister Rabbit, and begin to fall asleep.
As you are about to flee in dreams world, however, you hear voices outside the door.
“Your majesty, can I ask what are you doing here?”
That’s Rose.
The queen’s voice replies “Benedict told me about the princess behaviour. Are you okay, Rose?”
You hear Rose replying “Yes. She deserved the punishment and I punished her. That’s all.”
“You changed her before bed, haven’t you?” you hear a third voice, ones that you have never heard before. It’s the stern voice of a woman, maybe on her 60s “You are too soft, Rose.”
“You would have spanked her before the walk, in the garden and before bed, without changing her, wouldn’t have you?” you hear Rose replying.
“Of course.” states the other woman “Maybe I should take care of the princess from now on.”
“You can forget about it, you witch!” this is the first time that you hear Rose raising her voice. She is angry. “I will be dead before I let you raise a finger on my little angel!”
“Enough!” the queen intervenes “I trust Rose’s judgment, Samantha. Maybe you would be too strict for her.”
“I have raised you, my queen. I bet that you still remember my hairbrush.” Samantha replies “And I still hope that you’ll let a true Calonian ascend to the throne instead of that girl.”
“You’re talking about Richard!” Rose exclaims “You traitor! He would ruin our country!”
“Samantha, Rose, you are both dismissed.” the queen says, sternly, before adding “Rose is in charge of the nursery, and with her methods she will rise a beautiful queen. Times change, Samantha.”
If they say something else, you don’t hear it, because you fall asleep.
When morning comes, you are awakened by Rose. She is smiling at you.
“Good morning, my little sunshine.” she says.
“Every morning that I awake seeing you is a good morning, nanny Rose.” you reply. That came quite spontaneous, but you think that could have sound a little obsequious.
She smiles again, and helps you getting out of your crib, saying “Oh, my princess. You are so cute.”
She checks your diaper, but you’re dry. With yesterday enema, you were almost empty when you went to sleep.
As Rose is about to take you out of your romper, the queen enters in the room.
“There is my naughty princess.” she says, smiling a little “I hope that you’ll be on your best behaviour today.”
“I promise!” you exclaim “I’ll do my best! I’ll be an obedient girl and I will focus during today’s lesson! I’ll make you both proud of me!”
As you say that, you think that Calonian tradition is far from being accepted by you, but you’ll try to stay out of trouble for today.
The women looks at each other, and then hug you simultaneously.
“Oh, my little sunshine!” “That’s my girl!” say Rose and Charlotte respectively.
“Urgh! That’s enough! You two are choking me!” you yell, but in a cute voice.
They release you, laughing.
“Well, you’ve been quite naughty.” the queen concludes “But since seems that you’ll be good today, everything it’s okay.”
“Well, at least you have done nothing too shameful.” adds Rose, looking sideways in the queen direction “For example, you haven’t thrown a glass full of wine to the queen during a royal banquet and were putted in mittens in front of all guests.”
The queen’s cheeks become the colour of a freshly spanked bottom, as she exclaims “Rose! That’s private!”
“I’m sorry, your majesty.” the nanny says, giggling a little “I was trying to make the princess feels at ease.”
The queen leaves the room, saying bye to you and throwing a stare at Rose.
After this little show, Rose removes your romper and puts you in the most childish onesie that you have ever seen. It’s like a little kid jammies, blue and in the shape of a unicorn, very large and with a hood that had ears, eyes and a horn.
“Rose!” you exclaim “I’ll die of embarrassment!”
“Oh, princess, don’t say that. It’s so cute.” she says, clearly convinced about what she’s saying.
She completes the procedure putting a lock on. It’s obvious, since you have been really bad yesterday.
After being dressed and having your breakfast, you go to Janet's room. Together ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Change your diaper

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You and Janet go down the hallway together to apology to Miss Spencer. It seems to be a good idea and maybe lowers the number to demerits you will earn today.
It is still early in the morning and very quiet. You hear birds chirp and only see one maid, wiping the floor.
“Good morning Princess Susan, good morning Janet.” The maid greets you as you walk by them. You sigh a sigh of relieve that her behaviour has not changed, since your shameful stroll around the garden, the evening before.
In front of Miss Spencer’s door it is absolutely quiet. You are about to knock, when you and Janet hear laughing behind the door.
“Ben, let me go I need to get changed.” You hear Miss Spencer and footsteps.
“Oh come one, you can in bed for a couple more minutes.” You hear the deep voice of the butler Benedict.” You look at Janet with big eyes.
“They are a couple!” You whisper in excitement.
“Or they just had a good night.” Janet grins and the two of you put your ears back on the door.

“BEN! Stop that, you naughty boy, I need my underwear.” You hear Miss Spencer.
“Why? You look so cute in your diaper.” Benedict is chuckling.
You hear something like a slap and a door is slammed close, probably the bathroom door.
Janet and you are about to knock on the door now, but you hesitate and continue listening. Somebody is walking around the room and then a door is opened and you can hear heels.
“Ha, finally back in real underwear.” Miss Spencer says in a triumphal voice.

“Enjoy it honey, you know I put your ass in a diaper as soon as you go to bed.” Benedict says and Miss Spencer giggles like a schoolgirl. “Ben, you are so naughty!”

“I know, but still it is you that get the bottom spanked.” He laughs out. Her next words are muffled and Janet makes kissing noises beside you. You hold back a smile, nod at her and finally knock on the door.

It takes a few seconds before she answers. “Yes, please.” Miss Spencer says and you and Janet walk into her room.
The windows are open, the bed is made and the butler is nowhere to see. “They are super quick.” You think and smile at Miss Spencer.
“Miss Spencer, we came to apologise for the prank we played on you and that you have been forced to wear a diaper yesterday. We are very sorry and promise that we will never prank you again, so you don’t have to wear a diaper again.” You say in a controlled and super serious voice. Janet beside you begins to turn red and you pray that she can hold back her laughing.

Fortunately Miss Spencer is avoiding looking at you, since she is blushing herself. Her eyes fall on the bathroom door and you can almost feel the butler standing behind it and supressing a laugher as well.
“Thank you princess Susan, thank you Janet that is very mature of you. I will see you in the classroom in an hour.”
You nod your head and the hood fall over your head. This makes Miss Spencer smile. “Princess, the onesie you wear is the cutes ones I have ever seen.”

Quickly you pull the hood back and leave the room, followed by Janet.
“Time for pancakes!” Janet claps her hand and overtakes you. “Enjoy your bottle, princess!”

You smile weakly, but you are not really jealous. Rose is always preparing great tasting formula and mush for you. Okay, you miss to bite on something and have to chew, but other than that you cannot complain. You only hope that Rose will stay your nanny and she is not replaced with that mean women you have heard outside in the hallway. Almost at the door a horrible thought pops up in your mind. “Damn it, Rose shall never become sick or go on leave, or visit friends,… oh no. There are various reasons why she could leave me alone for a few days – or weeks – and I am sure the queen cannot take care of me herself.”

That thought in mind you let Rose feed you your breakfast, before you go to your classroom.
In front of the classroom you first meet Janet and then…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: ... you look for Miss Spencer to apology

choices: Meredith is a smarty-pants, but you do not find her totally unpleasant
Becouse of her shyness, Meredith has problems and gets a lot of demerits
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
... queen Charlotte herself.
“Little princess, Janet!” she exclaim in your direction as you two come closer “Let me introduce someone to you.”
Standing next to the queen, there are two persons. One is a boy, the other is a girl. They are about your age.
The boy is wearing simple red sweatpants, with a visible padding under them. He’s also wearing a white long sleeved shirt, that would have been quite mature, if not for the printed part. On his chest is in fact printed a red heart under a sentence written in blue letters: “Mommy’s baby boy”.
He is quite a nice looking boy, but the first word your mind come up with in seeing him is not “nice looking”, but “cute”.
The girl, instead, is wearing an exact copy of the onesie that you were wearing during your landing in Calonia. Her, however, is not pink, but yellow, and without any lock.
She has a big pair of glasses, with very thick lenses. So thick that you have difficulties in seeing her eyes.
“Let me introduce you to the others children that resides in the palace.” says the queen “William and Meredith Kent. They are the prime minister’s children.”
You greet them, and they greet you back.
“They normally have morning lessons with Miss Spencer. Since she is busy today’s afternoon, you will attend class with them for today.” the queen explains, before say bye and leave.
After you are left alone, the boy named William come closer to you, saying “So you are the princess. You are not ugly as I thought. In fact, you are not ugly at all.”
Should this be considered a compliment? You are not sure about it.
“Well, you are not so bad yourself.” you reply, a little unsecure. You have never met a boy about your age still in diapers, after all.
“Of course.” he replies, quite full of himself “We are the children of the prime minister. We are not babies like you are.”
Before you can say anything, the girl next to him intervenes, with a very shy tone of voice “But William ... I mess myself every night, and nanny Melissa always says that you are the bigger wetter in the country.”
William instantly turns red as a tomato and turns to her, exclaiming “Sis! That’s not a thing you should say to strangers!”
“Shouldn’t I? Why? It’s the truth.” she says, lowering her head “I’m sorry, I’ve messed up again.”
Janet immediately steps in, saying “You should apology to her!”
He simply shakes his head, replying “She the one that have embarrassed me. Why should I be the one to apology?”
Ignoring him, you reach Meredith, saying “It’s okay. Meredith, right? I’m Susan. It’s nice to meet you.”
Without the slightest notice, she hugs you tightly, saying “I’m glad to meet you too. I hope that we’ll become great friends.”
“Hey, back off!” Janet suddenly exclaims, putting an hand on your shoulder and moving her away from you “She’s mine!”
“Umh ... Janet?” you whisper to her “Don’t you think that you are a bit too ... possessive?”
Realizing it, she deeply blush, telling Meredith at once “I’m sorry. I have a tendency to overreact.”
In response, Meredith hug her too, saying “No problem. I want to be your friend too.”
Janet becomes crimson, and you try to do your best for not laughing.
“I’m ... Janet, by the way.” she says, trying to not been rude to Meredith.
Suddenly, you all hear a stern voice “Children! I’m waiting for you. You’ll all get demerits for not entering straight in the classroom.”
Miss Spencer, of course. Not wanting to upset her more, you all enter the classroom.
The office is now much similar to a classroom, having four desks instead of one or two. For the first time, you notice a door hidden in a corner of the room. You are sure that it lead to a warehouse full of desks.
You, Janet and William go straight to the respectively desks, while Meredith reaches miss Spencer.
“I’m sorry, miss Spencer. I wanted to make acquaintance with the princess and I distracted her. You should give her demerits to me, instead.” she says.
You blush, not believing in your hears.
“Absolutely not!” you exclaim “It’s my fault that I got distracted, not yours! And if you want to blame someone for it, you should blame your brother!”
“What? Why?” he asks, whit a loud tone of voice.
“Silence!” intervenes miss Spencer, almost -almost- yelling “I’m the one who decide who’s getting demerits, and for this little show you all will get extra’s. All three of you.”
Of course, Janet is exonerated in the demerits system, since she is a guest.
Meredith sits at her desk, and the lesson begins. During it ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Queen Charlotte

choices: They decide to eat lunch together
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The lesson is very interesting. With her four students Miss Spencer is teacher I wider range and does not focus on your enemy Richard or the history of Calonia only. This way you learn something about the surprisingly strong economy of the country and that the country is famous for their innovators.
The worst part of the lesson is math. That seems to be following you, no matter in what country you live.
William is average smart, but clever enough to raise his hand whenever he is sure to know the right answer. Miss Spencer let him give the answers and leave him alone for the rest of the lesson. Meredith is very shy, especially with Jane and you around and does not raise her hand at all – a strategy that does not work with Miss Spencer.
“Meredith, can you please give the answer to my question.” Miss Spencer calls her up.

Meredith blushes and looks down on her papers. “I… I am not sure, maybe 6?!” She almost whispers.

Miss Spencer knows that Meredith can do better and keep pushing her. “Meredith, please. Give me an answer and mean it. Do not fraise it like a question.”

The girl with the heavy glasses bite down on her bottom lip and starts to fidget on her seat. “But I do not know it for sure, Miss Spencer.” She starts to write down another calculation, but Miss Spencer is pushing more.
“Please Meredith you know the answer. Just tell it straight ahead!”

William, who sits beside his sister leans over and whispers something to her. Meredith seems surprised, but repeats his words. “5, I am sure it is 5!”

Miss Spencer sighs and shakes her head. “No it was 6, from the beginning. You need to concentrate better and trust yourself. William, one demerit for whispering, Meredith five demerits for asking me instead of answering.”

“What? But five points mean… .” Meredith looks around in panic and tries to calm down.

When Miss Spencer turns her back to the group of you William leans over to his sister. “You get a spanking on your hiney.” He says in a singsong.

Meredith hisses at him and slaps his arm – what is seen by Miss Spencer.
“Meredith! 5 demerits for hitting your brother!”

Meredith jumps up and starts to pleas: “No Miss Spencer, you know what Nanny Melissa does when I have 10 demerits! It was his fault alone, he is an idiot!”

Your teacher shakes her head and point her finger at Meredith’s chair. “Sit down young lady, you only make it worse right now. And the longer you talk back to me, the more points you will earn.”

William giggles, while his sister stand beside him, with her arms folded across her chest. “No Miss Spencer, this is unfair!”

“Meredith, one point, two points, three points…. I can continue until the lesson is over… four points.” Miss Spencer keeps counting.

Susan cannot stand this any longer and pokes her in the side. “Sit down Merry, she will continue forever. You cannot bet her!”

Finally Meredith sits down and the lesson continues. She is angry at Miss Spencer and refuse to give any more answers, until Janet and Susan can convince her to at least try it, but by that time she had earned 8 more demerits. When the lesson is over, Miss Spencer ask Susan, William and Meredith to stay a bit longer, while Janet can leave.
“You get your notes for your nannies. Princess Susan, you only earned 9 points today, what is a great improvement. Stop whispering with your neighbors and you can press that number further down. William, you did very well and only earn 4 points. Please be nicer to your sister that will help her and yourself.” She give both their notes, before she turns to Meredith: “My dear, It was obviously not a good day for you. I am not sure if it is because of the princess and her friend, but you have to work on your self-assurance when it comes to giving the right answers. Your little outburst was simply stupid and I am sorry that it took you so long to understand this. In total you have earned 29 demerits. Please give this note to your nanny right after the lesson.”

Meredith is pale when she walks out of the classroom. William seems carefree and walks on, while Janet and Susan try to cheer her up.
“Hey Meredith, it will not be so bad. At least it will be over tonight – hm, isn’t that the rule?!” Susan tries.
Meredith shakes her head and sobs. “No, nanny Melissa will put a lock on me and extend the punishment over days. She is super strict when we misbehave. Oh I was so stupid! You know, she gives enemas after ten points and I hate those, which is why I wanted Miss Spencer to take back some points.”
Susan nods her head and rubs her back.
“I understand that. Will it help if we talk to her?”
Meredith shakes her head. “No, she will punish me according to the 29 points, no matter if you talk to her or not.” She sighs and turns to leave. “I better go now, or I earn a punishment for being late.”

Susan and Janet look after her, feeling very sorry for her. Then…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Becouse of her shyness, Meredith has problems a...

choices: Stay and look at the punishment
Leave and go back to Rose
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You begin to go back to the nursery: you have promised Rose that you would have been on your best behavior today, so it’s better not to keep her waiting.
“I don’t like that William.” says Janet, during the way “I confess that I was going to give him a chance with me, but after he treated his own sister, I think I’ll pass.”
“Yeah. I don’t like him either.” you agree “Have you seen how he looked at you when miss Spencer asked to give her your punishment lines?”
“Yes, I saw it.” she confirms “Like one that thinks that he’s smarter than anyone. Like if I was a naughty baby. Well, I’m wearing an outfit that fits a 14 years-old, not his ridiculous pants and his babyish shirt.”
“Don’t’ remember me of our dresses.” you say, blushing “Have you seen what I’m wearing?”
She smiles at you, replying “He looked ridiculous, but you look very cute, my little unicorn.”
Once at the nursery’s door, you enter, followed by Janet.
“Welcome back, princess.” Rose greets you “And welcome back to you too, Janet.”
You run straight to her, giving her a hug.
“Nanny Rose! It was so unfair!” you cry.
She seems confused, and looks at Janet saying “What’s happened?”
“I think she is talking about William and Meredith.” she replies.
“He was mean, and miss Spencer gave demerits to Merry for it. It’s not fair!” you insist saying.
“I see, you’ve met the prime minister’s children.” she states, beginning to understand “William the bold and Meredith the shy.”
“He’s a bully!” you say “Why doesn’t his nanny punishes him for it?”
“Don’t be too harsh on him, princess.” Rose replies, rubbing your back “William and Meredith always quarrel, and William is quite eager to get her in trouble with mischief. But I assure you that, despite his demeanor, he cares about her. Years ago he risked his life to save her when she fell in a well. As for the punishment question … have you talked to Melissa about it?”
“We haven’t, Meredith told us it would have been pointless.” Janet intervenes.
“You couldn’t have avoided her punishment for her demerits, it’s true. But I suggest you to talk to Melissa about what happened. You know, Meredith cannot prove her words alone, since they are worth as William’s, but if the princess and her best friend testify …” she concludes, with a grin “… William the bold will face some consequences.”
You nod, smiling “You’re right! That’s what we must do!”
You reach Janet, but Rose cough.
“Haven’t you forgot anything, princess?” she says.
“Uhm? No?” you try.
“The note with YOUR demerits, princess.” Rose states, in a very strict voice.
Blushing, you give her the note.
She opens it up, and smiles.
“Nine demerits? And for minor things. That’s my little angel.” she seems happy, but she suddenly stops to smile, adding “Still, since they are more than 5. The maximum you can get to avoid a punishment is 4. So, I have to give you a spanking.”
You blush and calmly nod you head, knowing that is better to make it quick.
To your surprise, however, Janet steps in, saying “Miss Fletcher! Don’t punish her! It was my fault if she was distracted.”
“Janet, I don’t need …” you begin, but she interrupts you.
“Hush, little unicorn, I’m talking to your nanny. Miss Fletcher, for this time, you should punish me instead of her.”
Rose seems shocked, and it takes a while for her to say “Janet, if you take the guilt and accept to be punished in her place, I will not give you a non Calonian punishment, but I will spank you bare. Are you sure about it?”
She seems determined, adding “I made her waste the occasion to get 0 demerits. It’s my fault, and my conscience would keep me awake at night if I let her be punished for this.”
You cannot believe your hears. Is she serious?
“Very well. Since you are so determined, I will punish you instead.” Rose says, sitting at her chair “Come here, Janet.”
You look at the scene, almost alienated. Janet gives you a wink, before reaching Rose.
The maid pushes Janet over her lap, takes down her pants and her diaper comes down as well.
“Have you ever been spanked, Janet?” your nanny asks her.
Janet shakes her head, replying “No, miss. Never.”
“I thought so. I hope this will be a lesson to you.”
And with these words, Rose gives a firm slap over your friend bottom. You see Janet winces as the hand makes contact. It happens again, and again. This is the first time you see someone else getting spanked, and you are not sure you like it. Maybe watching it is more painful (metaphorically speaking) that being over Rose’s lap.
After some other smacks, Rose lets Janet getting up. The maid re-dresses her, and then gives her a hug.
“That was very brave, Janet.” she says “You are a wonderful friend for the princess.”
Janet smiles too, happy that it’s over. You’re almost jealous: you usually start to cry after few slaps, but Janet endured her entire spanking without shedding a tear.
“You can go to your friend’s nursery. Melissa would be eager to listen to you. But after that you will return here to have your lunch. It’s that clear, princess?” says Rose, looking at you.
“Yes, nanny Rose.” you reply.
You and Janet quickly search for the other nursery in the palace. When you find it, you knock at the door.
“Come in.” a voice says. Is the voice of a woman.
You enter. The nursery is very similar to yours, but without golden things.
There are two persons inside. One is Meredith. She is wearing a very skin-tight blue onesie with the sentence “I’m a naughty girl” embroidered at the belly. You notice a lock on it. And her padding is really massive. You know what that means: a thick diaper with booster pads. She is crying and doesn’t even notice you, while sitting on a changing table.
The other is a very tall woman (about 6,5 ft) with long brown hair, dressed exactly like Rose. It’s clearly Melissa, that stands in the center of the room.
“Princess Susan.” she says, seeing you. Her voice is melodious, but her tone is strict. “What do I owe the pleasure to having you in my nursery?”
“We are here to talk about William’s behavior.” you state.
“I’m listening.” she replies.
And you proceed to tell her everything that happened during the lesson.
When you finish, she shakes her head “That boy. He’s always a trouble.”
She then looks at the door that obviously lead to the bathroom, exclaiming “William! Come here this instant!”
The door opens, and William enter, dressed as before.
“Have you done punishing Meredith, nanny Melissa?” he asks, before noticing you and exclaiming “Princess? What are you doing here?”
“She told me about your attitude, little one.” she says, pointing a finger at him “Her words matches with Meredith’s. So, I have confirmation that you’ve been a bully today.”
“No! They’re lying!” he yells, stepping back. Not so tough, uh?
“And I don’t like bullies. Not a single bit. You will be punished, Willy, and Merry will watch it. The princess and her friend can stay too, if they want.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: They go to the nursery

choices: An elder nanny you have never seen.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You are not sure if you like to see another punishment after you watched Janet receive a spanking only a couple of minutes ago. Beside you, you see Janet nodding her head eagerly and so you nod as well.
“NO! They can’t stay! They can’t see me naked! I am a boy!” William shouts and steps back further until he hit the door to the bathroom and stops.

Nanny Melissa follows him and pulls him to the changing table by his ear. “You are a little boy and got your poor sister into trouble in front of the princess and her friend, it is only fair that they can be sure that you receive a proper punishment.”

Meredith hops down from the changing table and hols her bloated belly.
“Nanny Melissa, if it is clear that it was his fault, can I use the potty to expel… the enema?”

First the tall nanny tells William to start undressing, while she kneels down and wipe a last tear from Meredith’s face. “Sorry little one, but you disobeyed your teacher and only for that I would give you an enema. I know you do not like them, but that is exactly why they work as a punishment for you, better than a spanking or a mouth-soaping.”
Merry nods, but looks sad, until her nanny takes off the lock from her onesie.
“But I will change you before bedtime and you do not have to wear the lock, not at all.” Her nanny says and gives her a light kiss on the forehead.

In the meantime William is standing in front of the changing table and covers his private parts with his hands. His face is red and he looks like a little boy that exactly knows what is waiting for him.
“I still think they should leave.” He says as his nanny takes her seat on a wooden chair and pats her lap. “I know that you think that little boy, but I tell you now for the second time that they will stay. Now be quiet.”

Unwillingly Willy lay over her lap and tries to hold back his tears as long as he could. But nanny Melissa is slapping his behind hard with a brush and he quickly melts and starts to cry like a baby. When the short, but hard spanking is over he has issues to stay straight and hold his red behind. By this he forgets about his private parts and Janet and you can see that he is as hairless as all “kids” are. You giggle and Janet is blushing a bit while she stares at his privates. Merry stands beside you and smiles weakly. It is good for her to see that her brother gets what he deserve, but her tummy is causing her trouble and before her brother is lifted on the changing table she starts to fill her waiting diaper, blushing deep red.
“I am sorry.” She whimpers when you and Janet look at her.
“No need for that, I had it yesterday as well.” You say and rub her back. Merry smiles and lean against you, while you see, with upraise that William is strapped down at wrists and ankles.

Meredith sees the question in your faces and whispers to you.
“He has the tendency to fight and kicked in the past. That is years ago, but our nanny still straps him down to make sure he behaves.”

William has his eyes closed and avoids to look at you, while his nanny prepares an enema-kit. It looks funny when she comes back and slides the hose up his behind. You giggle, until you remember that you must have looked the same.
Willy moans, as the water fills his colon and starts to fidget on the table.
“Look! LOOK!” Janet whispers to you and point at his… manhood, it is getting erect and quiet impressive – for what you can say.
Janet is laughing out hard now, until nanny Melissa turn to her and warns her.
“Hush little girl, that is common for little boys. The water is pressing on his prostate, what cause the erection. It is not that he likes it.”

“Please do not look!” William begs and for the first time you feel a little bit sorry for him.

After all water is in, he is put in a diaper, as thick as the one of his sister is wearing and dressed in a black romper with the word “troublemaker” on his chest. You think it looks kind of cool, but it still marks him as a naughty boy. And that after he always tries to look as mature as possible.
A lock is put on him and soapy pacifier is pushed into his mouth.
“You will keep the paci in all day, except when you are feed. Maybe you learn that your big mouth can get you in trouble. The lock stays on you for the rest of the week and that diaper stays on until breakfast, tomorrow!” his nanny says.
William looks angry at Janet and you, but nods his head and begins to suck on the soapy pacifier.

By now Meredith has filled her diaper, but the pain is gone and she thanks Janet and you. “Hey, thank you for coming around. I hope he will not be so mean to me for a while – and I will be less shy around you, since I know you are so nice to me.” She hugs you first and then Janet.

William waddles to the corner, sits down on a thick play-carpet and hugs a teddy bear. He looks kind of cute you have to admit and Janet keeps starring at him the whole time, with flushed cheeks.

“Okay the show is over, I think you better to back now, or I get in trouble with Nanny Rose.” Nanny Melissa says and gives you and Janet pat on your padded behinds.

In the hallways, Janet seems stirred up and wants to talk about Willy’s punishment and his… reaction to the enema. “Did you know that would happen? I had no clue. Gosh it was so cute to see him blush…. .”
She keeps talking until the two of you reach your nursery, where you stop her. “JANET! Do not freak out. He is still a brat and will seek for revenge. If you find his.. thing so fascinating I suggest you look for another boy.”

“Uhm sorry, maybe you are right, I got carried away. And he is in diapers all the time, what is cute, but not helpful if it comes to... you know?!” Janet says, scratching her chin.

Now you are blushing as well. Janet is only a few months older than you and is thinking about sex! “Hello? I am sorry to say that, but either you wait until you are back home or you get used to it. All minor boys wear diapers what means until… 18 or 21?? Get used to it or look for an older one.”

Now Janet looks disgusted. “Sure, as if I would let a twentysomething years old touch me.”

With that the conversation is over and she goes for lunch while you enter the nursery. Inside you find…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Stay and look at the punishment

choices: A sweet dream where you see Rose and Charlotte’s childhood
A nightmare where Samantha is you nanny
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Inside you find an elder nanny you have never seen.
She’s not simply older that Rose, it’s very old. She must be on her 60s. She’s a pale woman, quite small and curved. The first thing that you come up with seeing her is the word “surly”. She hasn’t the elegance that Rose and Melissa posses, she seems more like a standing rock. Ever her dressed is different. She is not dressed as a French maid, like Rose and any other maid you’ve seen in the palace, but she seems more like a Victorian governess. Her severe expression and tiny rounded glasses are the icing on the cake to that impression. Could she be … ?
“Good lunch time, princess.” she says, in a total flat voice that conceal a stern tone.
Hearing her voice, you are sure of it now. She’s Samantha the woman you heard last night. She has told that she raised the queen, and scolded Rose for being “too nice”.
“I’m sorry, but I think I don’t know you, Ma’am. Where is my nanny?” you tell her, trying to keep a cordial tone.
“I’m nanny Samantha.” she replies “I wanted to speak with you, so I told maid Sophie that miss Amelia, the Housekeeper, was looking for Rose. She told Rose about it, and now I’m here and she is not. The oldest trick in the book.”
“Can I ask why you wanted to see me, Ma’am?” you say, in your flattest tone. Janet meanwhile stays quiet, not fully understanding what’s happening.
“You can call me nanny Samantha, princess.” she says, avoiding your question.
You are tempted to answer something like “In your dream, old witch!”, but you realize that maybe is just what she wants, so she would have a reason to punish you. Instead, you say “I’m sorry, Ma’am, but I’m not ready for it, since I don’t know you at all. My only nanny is the maid in charge of this nursery, miss Rose Fletcher.”
You have the impression of a bad look from her. You are quite sure that’s because you saw through her scheme.
“You brat! Are you mocking me?” she exclaims.
Before anything can happen, you feel a warm hand touching you shoulder, and a familiar voice that exclaims in a stern tone: “Mrs. Samantha, unless you have the queen explicit permission to be here, I ask you to leave the princess alone and to leave the nursery that it’s in my care, at once.”
“Maybe I have the permission, Rose.” she replies, looking at your nanny “Haven’t you thought about the possibility that the queen has told me to replace you?”
“I know queen Charlotte too well to think that she has gone mad.” that totally unexpected answer from Rose, said in a very calm tone, make you and Janet giggle.
Samantha’s cheeks turn red, and she is clearly angry. Without saying anything else, the leaves the nursery.
Rose tremble a little, and you see her lean on the changing table. She says something to herself, but you manage to hear it: “Dammit. I almost wetted myself.”
You resist the temptation to laugh at that, and you simply ask her “Are you alright, nanny Rose?”
“Yes, I am.” she replies “Janet, it’s the princess’ lunchtime. Can you leave us, please?”
Janet nods, and after giving you a hug she leaves the nursery.
As she closes the door, Rose run to you and hug you tightly, saying “Has she been mean? I will speak to the queen about it, and …”
She starts to say a lot of words, but they go more confused as she proceeds to talk.
“Umh … Rose? Were you afraid of her?” you ask her.
She nods, replying “I have unpleasant memory about her. She was queen Charlotte’s nanny. She punished us a lot of time. We haven’t spent so much time with her, since my mother was a housewife and took care of us. My mother was very strict, stricter than me, and so was Charlotte’s mother, but they were fair. She wasn’t!”
“Hold on a second, Rose.” you interrupt her “Did you grow up with queen Charlotte?”
She blush a little and, letting you go, she says “Yes. We are childhood best friends.”
“And you work here as a maid? If you are the queen best friend, why aren’t you in an higher position?” you ask.
“Calonians don’t look good at favoritism. A commoner like me working in a high position? It would have been impolitic.” she explains “And yet, once ascended to the throne, Charlotte tried to make me Prime Minister. But I’m not a politician. I would have caused a political incident in three days. She tried everything to keep me in the palace, and we found a position that suited me, something that makes me happy and where I’m capable of.”
“Being a nanny?” you ask.
She rubs your hair, answering “Exactly.”
“So you must know a lot of the queen’s mischiefs?” you say with a grin.
“We were like you and Janet. I know more about it that everyone else. But I will not say anything to you.” she replies, smiling.
“Please, nanny Rose.” you beg her, hugging her.
“I said no, princess. But … maybe something can slip out from my lips time to time.” she concludes, giving you a wink.
You giggle, as she takes your bottle of formula. In order: she then feed you, she undresses you and puts you in a white romper. After that, she puts you in your crib.
“Nanny, I wetted myself during the morning.” you say “Can’t you change me?”
“After your nap, princess.” she replies “When I wake you up, we have a lot of things to do. First, I will change your diaper. Then, you will receive you maintenance spanking, since you have earned the lock. We will then discuss about the dress you will wear during the interview. After we are finished with that, you can go play with Janet.”
You feel tired, so you simply nod and fall asleep.
During your nap, you have a dream …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: An elder nanny you have never seen

choices: I hope it will not be that bad.”
I will never allow something like this.”
Let us talk about something else: DRESSES!
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You are woken up by a hand on your shoulder. With a weak smile you turn over in your wet diaper and look at your nanny.
“No! Not you!” You shriek up and hold Mr Rabbit tightly.

Nanny Samantha grins down on you and reaches for your stuffed friend. “Time to wake up princess, time for your spanking.” She grabs Mr Rabbit and rips him out of your hands.
“What a pathetic toy for a princess. That is not acceptable.” She says and throws him into the trash can.

“NO! Mr RABBIT!” You cry out and climb out of the crib. You want to take him out again, but your new nanny stops you.
“We do not touch something that is in the trash can, are you a tramp or a princess?” She slaps your hands away and pulls you to the changing table by your ear. “Let’s see how wet you are, you big baby!” she slide two fingers into the leg band of your diaper and wiggle them around a bit.
“You are a potty princess, but I think a few hours longer in your wet diaper will do you no harm.”
She strips you out of your romper, takes out some lockable plastic pants and slides them up your legs. “You may think I forgot about your spanking, but I have not. I never forget to spank little brats.”

Still bend over on the changing table she straps down your hands with leather-cuffs, what leaves you stretched and helpless. “Please, nanny Samantha, nanny Rose only spanks me over the knees with her hand.”
“I know, and that is the reason why you are such a brat.”
You feel a slap on your padded behind, but feel not much pain.
“You see, the stick is not working on with thick diapers, but it works wonders on legs.” Nanny Samantha snickers and let the stick slam down on the back of your legs, leaving a dark red line.
You scream out in pain and start to cry immediately. “Ouch! No, please stop, I cannot stand that!”

But the old and evil nanny does not stop. She keeps striking you with the stick until your legs are red and purple and show the first signs of bruises. By then you have almost past out in pain and lost all control over your body. You cry, drool and snot is running down your face and you have peed and messed yourself.
“You are so pathetic. You will never be a good queen.” Nanny Samantha says and opens the cuffs. Yu slide down the changing table and lay on the floor like an infant.

“I give you five minutes to get your ass up, while I prepare your breakfast. I think a mixture of oatmeal, prunes and castor oil will do you good.” The nanny says, grinning from ear to ear.
You are still in serious pain and cannot react to her mean words. When the time is up she drags you to the high chair, where she straps you in and force feed you a great amount of disgusting mush.
“Oh yes, that will help you to fill your wet diaper, my little stinker.” She grins and force another spoon into your mouth.
“Oh please, I cannot eat anymore. It is too much, Nanny Samantha.” You plea, but she force the next spoon into your mouth and grins. “Oh, it will all end in your tummy, either by the spoon or a force feeding kit. That is like an enema, but the hose goes down your throat. I have the obligation to ensure that you get your vitamins.”
You whimper and fidget around in your wet and messy diaper – not looking forward to mess it more in a few minutes… .


“Princess? Princess Susan, time to wake up. Naptime is over.” You feel the soft hand of Nanny Rose on your shoulder. Waking up from the nightmare feels like a cold shower, but you are very happy to be awake and look into the friendly face of your beloved nanny.
“I had a nightmare.” You whimper. You see your friend, Mr. Rabbit and hug him tightly. You have missed him already and now you are happy that he is still with you and not in the trash.
“Poor baby, but you still will get your spanking, I am sorry.” Rose says and helps you out of the crib.

You notice that you have sweated a lot and during your nightmare you had a little messy accident.
Rose notice that, when she takes you over her knees. She rubs your behind a bit and asks you if you prefer a spanking on your legs, since you are messy.
“NO! Not on the legs, that hurts terrible.” You shriek out, remembering the stick.
Rose shrugs and gives you a light spanking over your diaper. It is not painful, only humiliating. The worst part is, that is spread the mess you have made around.
“Puh, now you need a back, little one.” Rose says, when she helps you on your feet.

The bath is so nice that you forget about the nightmare completely. You even dare to ask Rose to allow you some naughty fun, but she denies that. “Not as long as you wear a lock, little one.”
You pout, but understand and while she diapers you nice and fresh you tell her about your nightmare. She is listening carefully and hugs you tightly, when you are diapered and dressed.
“Oh, poor Princess…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: A nightmare where Samantha is you nanny

choices: “Only if Willy can play with you too.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
... believe me, I’ll never allow something like this.” Rose says, rubbing your back.
“Is she really … that bad? Like in my nightmare?” you ask her.
“Not as much, but pretty close.” she replies, suffocating a gulp “I still remember when she paddled us in the throne room in front of an important guest from another country.”
“And …” you begin to say. You have an hesitation, fearing the possible answer, but you have to ask it: “… there isn’t any possibility that she will replace your, right? Not ever temporary like when you have to leave for a while?”
Rose smiles and gives you a caress on the cheek, saying “That will never happen, haven’t I promised you this? She will never replace me, I know the queen too well. She doesn’t like Samantha either, she doesn’t fire her just because Samantha was very loyal to Charlotte’s father. But she would never let you in her care. And I even spoke to queen during your nap to prevent that witch to even be a temporary substitution. If I have to temporary leave the palace or I fall sick, you will be transferred in the third nursery of the palace, the biggest one, along Meredith and William, under the care of nanny Melissa.”
You don’t like the idea to go in her care, since she’s almost a stranger, even less to stay in the same room as William, but you think it’s a far better solution than Samantha.
You hug Rose, saying “Thank you very much, you’re the best nanny ever.”
She keeps stroking your hair for a few more minutes, before saying “Now, princess, no more sad thoughts. It’s time to talk about dresses.”
She lifts you up, and leaves the nursery carrying you in her arms.
“Rose!” you exclaim, blushing “I can walk, you know? And where are we going, anyway?”
Rose takes up your hood (she putted you back in the blue unicorn onesie you wore during the morning), pushes a pacifier in your mouth and replies “Hush, my little unicorn. I know you can walk, but wanted to carry you a little. As for your question, we are going to the royal walk-in closet.”
She continues to walk, with her “little unicorn” in her arms. She stops in front of a big door. You look at the plate on it (every single door in the palace seems to have a plate) and you see the words “Royal walk-in closet.”
The maid opens the door and walks in. You look around, amazed.
“This is not a walk-in closet!” you exclaim, removing your pacifier and looking at the enormous number of clothes present in the biggest room you have seen in the palace so far “It’s an entire house!”
Your nanny puts you down, before giving you a very firm slap on the backside.
“Ouch!” you exclaim, more for the surprise than the pain, since you are heavily padded “What was that for?”
“Really, princess?” she replies, sternly “Did a grown up told you that you could remove your pacifier?”
You blush, realizing that she is right. Instantly, you pull the pacifier back in your mouth, sucking it.
“I’m swrry” you mutter.
Rose smiles, and takes you to a couch. She makes you sit on it and proceeds to unlock your onesie.
“I will put the lock back once we are finished.” she says “Don’t hope that I’ll forget it.”
You nod, aware that her specification was unnecessary. It was made just to remember you that yesterday you’ve been bad and earned the lock. She then finally removes your pacifier.
After this, the maid leaves, disappearing at your eyes even if remaining in the same room. She returns after a while, carrying a lot of cute dresses.
They are very different one from another, but they all remember you the dresses of a fairy tale princess. The are quite childish, but much more mature than the babyish outfits you now usually wear.
Rose is very patient during your dress-time. She helps in both dress and undress you, and writes in a notebook everything that she finds fitting and everything she believes it’s not appropriate for the interview. For example, you liked very much a frilly green dress with a long skirt, but Rose told you that it wasn’t a good idea to completely hide your diaper during something that was meant to show that you fully accepted the tradition.
After testing a lot of dresses, you begin to get bored, and say “Isn’t this enough? I tried a lot of dresses. I’m quite tired of it.”
But she shakes her head, replying “No, princess. I’m sorry, but you have to try all the dresses I took here.”
“But I don’t wanna!” you exclaim, in a quite childish way.
“Princess, you were very well behaved today, so you weren’t punished during the day, you received just the maintenance spanking. I am much more lenient, and fair, than Samantha is, it’s true, but you will not throw a tantrum at me.” she scolds “I really love you, but you will behave or I will punish you. Are you going to be my little angel or do I have to take out my brush?”
You go pale, instantly replying “I’m sorry, nanny Rose! I will behave, I promise!”
She gives you a smile, and the dressing up trial continues.
When you are finally finished, Rose has decided the perfect outfit for the occasion: a very elegant yellow dress, with a long skirt made of tulle.
“Everyone will see my diaper.” you complain “Are you sure it’s the best option.”
“It’s an elegant dress, that fits for a royal. It’s not childish, so you can have a grown up composure, but the skirt made of very transparent tulle will show everyone without doubts that you are wearing a diaper. And it’s yellow, so if you wet yourself during the interview no one will notice it.” she explains.
“It would be a problem if someone notices it?” you ask.
“Not at all, since kids are expected to use their diapers. But you will feel more at ease knowing it.” she replies.
You smile, happy of this solution.
“You can now go to play with Janet.” she concludes, dressing you up again in the unicorn onesie and putting the lock back on “I’m sure she is waiting for you.”
“Do you think we can call Merry too?” you ask her.
Rose nods, and says “You can ask to nanny Melissa. She will tell you if Meredith is free or not.”
You hug and bye her, and look for Janet.
Once together, you go knocking at Meredith’s (and William’s) nursery.
“Who’s there?” asks Melissa, from the other side of the door.
“Princess Susan and Janet.” you reply “Can Meredith come to play?”
Nanny Melissa than says …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: I will never allow something like this.”

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Only if Willy can play with you too.” Nanny Melissa states. “You cannot exclude him because he is a boy.”
You like to answer, that the reason is, that he is a mean asshole, but you keep quiet and hope for the best. “Okay, if we only can play with Merry when we take him too, then we take both.” You say.
Merry is super happy to see you. She is pressed in a normal diaper and pink onesie with a kitten on the chest. It looks very alike to the one you have been wearing a couple of days before. As Nanny Melissa has promised she is no longer wearing a lock and jumps into your arms. “Hi Susan, I mean Princess Susan, nice to meet you.” She says in cute way.
“You can call me Susan, no worries, where is William?”
“Oh, he is still a bit… handicapped.” Merry grins and step to the side, so you can see William while his nanny helps him out of a playpen.
He is wearing a pink romper, which hardly hides his thick diaper. At his collar he wears a lock and he waddles slowly to the three girls with a sour face.
“Cute romper! Janet teases him and makes him blush.
He walks between you, Janet and Merry and set the pace – the slow pace. “Very funny Janet. That is my punishment for looking under Melissa’s skirt. She told me that, if I am so interested in female clothes, I can wear some.” That makes all you girls laugh out and he blushes even more.
“So you are wearing Merry’s romper?! Oh great!” Janet tease him.

William would like to slap her, but holds back. Since yesterday he received three spankings and acts much more submissive – at least until the four of you enter Janet’s private room.
“WOW! You have a game console? Let us play!!” He jumps up and down until he lost his balance and lands on hands and knees.
“Only if you do not break anything!” Janet says and starts the TV. For the next hour the four of you take turns playing, but then William gets bored and starts to get naughty. While you play against Janet he sneaks up to you from behind and grabs your breasts. It is only for a short moment, but distracts you so much that you drive your virtual car against a wall.
“Hey! Stop doing that!” You yell at him. He apologises and let you restart. But only a few minutes later he does the same with Janet, who does not take it lightly. She jumps up and pushes him – what has no effect. “I will tell you nanny what you did!” She threats him – and again he apologises, only to do it with his sister a minute later.
“Survey completed!” He calls out. “First place goes to Janet, then Merry and the princess has the smallest ones, barely anything.”

You would have never thought that the remark of a stupid boy hurt so much, but it does. Embarrassed you lay down on Janet’s bed and pouts. You could cry, but do not want to give him the pleasure to see that. You stay like this until somebody lay down next to you and rub your back. It is…

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look over your shoulder, and with great surprise you see Willy himself.
“I’m sorry.” he says “I stepped the line a little. Nanny Melissa even removed my pacifier to play with you and I acted naughty as usual. But you must understand me. A boy spending his afternoon with beautiful girls. I couldn’t resist. And I think the smaller “they” are, better it is.”
The last sentence is clearly a lie, but you appreciate the gesture.
“So you are not a complete asshole.” you state.
He blushes a little, and lenses is right hand forward.
“Can we still be friend, right?” he asks.
You hesitate, but then shake his hand, replying “Yes, Willy. We can.”
Completely out of nowhere, Meredith hugs you both, exclaiming “Yes! We are all friends!” and then gives you both a kiss on the cheek.
As you blush, Janet can’t hold a laugh.
“We have still a considerable amount of time before dinner.” William states, after Merry left go both of you “What do you think we should do?”
“Well, I have an idea.” Janet steps in.
“What is it, big sis Janet?” Merry asks.
You look at her, saying “Bis sis?”
“She wears big girl clothes and doesn’t use the diaper, right? She’s like the big sister of our group.” replies Meredith.
Janet seems to like that nickname, because she smiles and says “Come around big sister Janet, kids. I’ll expose my idea.”
You sigh and reach her, followed by the others two.
“I have explored the palace a lot these days.” Janet explains “And I noticed that every door has a plate that says what’s behind it. Every door … except one.”
“Uh? What do you mean?” you ask her.
She giggles a little, before answering “I found a door with no plates. Instead, on the door was placed a big red sign, with only the words “entrance strictly forbidden”. I’m now very curious about what’s inside.”
“But Janet …” says Merry “… strictly forbidden doesn’t mean that we can’t go inside?”
William sighs, replying “For being someone so smart, you are often very slow at catching things, Merry.”
“Willy! Behave and be polite with Merry!” intervenes Janet “Or big sis Janet will punish you.”
You giggle, thinking that she has identified herself too much in the bis sister part.
“Now I will go to the bathroom.” concludes Janet “When I’m back you’ll tell me if you agree with my idea.”
Said that, Janet leaves the room. After a while, she’s back.
“All done.” she proclaims, making you blush. You would ask her to unlock the onesie like she did the first day, but you realize it wouldn’t be a clever idea with two witnesses, even if friends.
“Have you used the potty, big sis?” Meredith asks her.
Janet shakes her head, replying “No, Merry, I used the toilet.”
“That big bottomless thing full of water?” Meredith says, touching her glasses “Doesn’t it swallow children?”
Hearing this, you try your best to don’t laugh. Merry is shy and cute, and you don’t want lo laugh in her face. Still, it’s difficult to don’t laugh at a 14 years old girl that believes that the toilet eats children.
“Oh, Merry, bis sister has a lot of things to teach you.” says Janet, touching her shoulder. She then looks at you all, asking “So? Who will come with me?”
“I’ll come!” William immediately says “I never say no to an adventure!”
You instead hesitate. Yesterday evening you gave your word to Rose that you would have behaved during the day.
“I’m not sure. I promised to nanny Rose that I would have been a good girl today.” you say.
“I promise that all the time.” intervenes Willy “And I always do the opposite.”
“And you always end over nanny Melissa’s lap.” adds his sister.
He turns red, and tells to Meredith “Sis, could you please stop to say embarrassing things when I try to act tough?”
“So, little unicorn?” insists Janet, looking at you “Are you coming or not? Are you a brave princess or are you scared of the children-eater toilet too?”
You blush, and your wounded pride makes you exclaim “In your dreams! I’m coming, of course!”
“I’m not sure.” Merry states, stuttering a little “If someone sees us, we’ll get in trouble.”
“That’s the funny part.” Janet says, making a naughty grin “Not being caught. The risk is part of the adventure.”
“It’s easy for you to say.” you intervene “You don’t get our punishments.”
“It’s this what makes you falter? Very well. I take an oath. If we are caught, I solemnly swear that I will request that your own punishment shall administered to me too, whatever it may be.” says Janet, in a very dramatic tone.
You smile and nod, and so do William and Meredith.
“Ok. So we are a team.” concludes Merry.
You all leave the room, following Janet.
She leads you down, at the basement’s door. The incriminated door with the sign stands right at it’s left.
“Look my back, you three.” orders Janet, as she takes the lock pick out of her pocket.
With a rapid movement, she unlocks the door and you all get inside.
You find yourself in a long, narrow and dark corridor. You begin to walk in it, and after a while Meredith says to Janet “Big sis, can you old my hand? I’m scared.”
As Janet takes Merry’s hand, you feel something that you don’t understand. Immediately, that feeling makes you say “Can you hold my hand too, Janet?”
She sighs, saying “What are you? Five?”
But she takes you hand too.
At the end of the corridor, you find yourself in an illuminated room. It seems a storage room. Its full of boxes.
“What are those?” Merry asks, looking at the boxes content.
“They seem … they ARE erotic magazines!” you exclaim.
Both Janet and William throw themselves over the boxes, while you and Meredith wait.
“Susie …” she whispers at you hear “… I heavily wetted myself in the dark tunnel, before.”
“Me too.” you admit, blushing.
“What exactly are those magazines, anyway?” she asks.
You are fully aware of what they are, but you don’t want to affect her innocence, so you shake your head saying “I don’t know.”
As you ask yourself why erotic magazines are so hidden (maybe to hide them to children?) and Janet and William eagerly leaf through the magazines, you hear footsteps coming from the corridor.
“Shit!” you think, looking around for another exit. But you are blocked here.
You turn back, and you see …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Willy

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You see a very young maid, coming out of the dark hallway.
You would barely consider her an adult, with her petite body and long ponytail, hold by a pink scrunchie.
“Excuse me, I think you should not be in here.” She says in a weak voice.
Merry is about to run back into the corridor and out of the forbidden area, but you hold her back. And look at the maid. “I am sorry, but you are wrong. We have permission to be here. I am Princess Susan and these are my friends. Queen Charlotte herself gave us permission to explore every corner of the castle to help me familiarize.”
The maid looks surprise and her hands starts to nervously lay with the hem of her short French maid skirt. By now William and Janet came to you and Meredith and support you.
“Yes, we should be aware of everything, what includes this room. It was a bit confusing, that the door has no sign, but now we understand.” Janet says, grinning.

The maid blushes and accidently lift her skirt with her fiddling hands, presenting a slightly used pull-up. She cannot be out of diapers for that long. William is turning red and supress to point his finger at her and laugh, Janet and you are nut better. Only Merry is so busy to stop her feet from running away that she is missing the little surprise the maid is hiding under her skirt.
“Yes, it would be strange to put a precise sign on the door, wouldn’t it? The maid giggles “I mean, what would it say? Queen Charlotte’s secret porn-collection?”
The four of you stare at her with open mouths, surprised by her words.
“So they ALL belong to the Queen herself?” You ask.
“I am sure not only the queen comes here from times to times, but she asked to receive one sample from each adult magazine that is produced of imported. She must have a… special interest in them.” The maid says, blushing, before she turns to leave.
“I better go now, I need to change… something… in… ah… it does not matter, bye!” She says and walk off, back down the dark corridor.
As soon as you hear the door closing you laugh out and hold you tummy. “Oh my gosh, this all belongs to the Queen, I would have never guessed it!”
“And have you seen her training pants? I bet she is already leaking by now!” Willy calls out and almost loses his balance, with his own super thick diaper.
You think about the poor maid and her special underwear. You have never thought about it, but it cannot be unusual that young adults that just earned the rights to wear panties suffer under accidents after being in diapers for 18 to 21 years. You only hope that you do not lose your potty training until you are finally allowed back into panties.

After the maid is gone, you and your “Crew” dig further through the magazines. After a long time of hesitating, even Merry starts to look at them. It is interesting for you to see her reaction on the different kind of kinks. While Willy seems to drool on every magazine and every naked woman he can find she looks distressed by all the naked flesh and especially the naked men.
You need to hold back when she stops at one magazine and flip every single page of it, announcing: “This is not so bad, there are only girls in it.” While you can hold back her brother is different. He waddles to his sister and take a close look at the magazine: “Really Sis? This is a homosexual magazine for girls. Those are lesbians.”
Merry blushes and put the magazine back with shaking fingers.
“I want to leave. Can we go?”

Willy moans out in frustration and even Janet seems pissed off. “Really Merry, I do not think we can come here every day. We should look around as long as we can.”
Merry sighs and wants to pick the next lesbian magazine, but then she remembers her brother’s words and leaves it. After a while she finds a magazine about Pet Play and flip through the pages, giggling.

You know some of the magazines from your own country, or at least the kind of magazine, like Janet does, but even you look around and snoop into some rare fetish magazines.

At some point you think it is time to leave, before somebody else is searching for you or the young maid comes back after finding out that you lied to her. “Let’s go back. I am sure we cannot trick another maid.”
Your friends agree, even when Willy would love to take a few magazines with him, but he has no place to hide them with his romper and therefore he has to leave them behind. You walk down the corridor and reach the door. Quietly you sneak out and close the door when you notice…

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
… a known woman coming in your direction.
“Children? What are you doing here?” she asks as she sees you. She seems surprised.
“Charlotte?” you wince “What are you doing here?”
“That is what I should ask to you. Why are all of you down here?” she asks.
“We were playing, your majesty.” Janet intervenes “Meredith here wanted to play hide and seek.”
Meredith blushes, and you really hope that she endures the urge to blurt out everything to the queen.
“Hide and seek, uh?” she says, not completely convinced “And tell me … have you entered the door with the sign of denial?”
“We found it opened.” intervenes William too “As we entered, however, we saw the sign and stepped back, closing the door behind us. We thought that it should have been locked, so we were going to look for a maid to tell her about it.”
What an incredible liar. Now even if the queen says that she saw you coming out from there you have an excellent alibi.
“I see.” says Charlotte. She isn’t at ease. “It’s okay, then. But you should go play somewhere else. Now, if you excuse me, I have to read some … books about … interhuman relationship … in the royal secret archives.”
You take a bow and bye her, leaving her alone. Followed by your friends, you leave that palace zone, just after seeing Charlotte enter in the forbidden door.
Once you are in a safer place, known as Janet’s room, you all laugh together.
“The queen was … busy, uh?” you say, giggling a lot.
“So? Wasn’t the juice worth the squeeze?” Janet asks to you.
You instantly nod, without even thinking about it.
“We lied to the queen and she believed us!” Merry intervenes “While you were talking I felt a great fear. I even wetted myself a little, and now I think my diaper is on the verge of leaking.”
You are amazed at how easily she says things that you find extremely embarrassing.
“And what about you, Willy?” Janet says, giggling “You weren’t changed at all after your enema, right?”
William deeply blushes, exclaiming “Janet! That was a low blow! Yes, I’m in a full diaper, but you shouldn’t declaring it to the world.”
