Even William is much different about this matter than you are. Yes, he acts in a more mature way and feels embarrassed at hearing certain things, but he never tries to deny the truth about the usage of his diapers of about his punishments. For a boy so good a lying, it’s almost a contradiction.
“So we have two heavily wet children. And the third one?” Janet looks at you whit a grin.
“I’m fine, thanks.” you lie.
“Haven’t you wetted yourself in the corridor too, Susie? You told me that.” Merry intervenes.
You blush at her affirmation, thinking that she is totally unable to lie. Her brother perfect opposite.
Janet giggle again, but then hugs you, saying “I’m joking, Susan. You’re my best friend, right? I will not make fun of your situation.”
You hug her back, with a smile.
Since it’s dinner time, you say goodbye to Janet, as well to Merry and Willy. In the blink of an eye, you are back at your nursery.
There, Rose asks about your afternoon. You tell her that you had a lot of fun and that you at end befriended not only Meredith, but William too.
“Very good, I’m happy to hear it.” she comments, of course unaware of your adventure in the forbidden room.
She takes you out of your onesie and of your dirty diaper, before giving you a nice bath. After bathing you, she dresses you up in a fresh diaper and then in the white romper, she proceeds to feed you with baby food and milk, and the puts you in the crib.
“Good night, princess. Tomorrow is the last day before the interview. If you behave well like today, I’m sure tomorrow will be a great day too.” she says, kissing your forehead and then leaving the nursery after turning the light off.
You hug Mister Rabbit tightly, saying “What do you think, Mister Rabbit? The day after tomorrow I have the interview. Will I manage to do it? Really? You think so? You are a great friend.”
And you fall asleep.
…
Rose touches you shoulder with strength, shouting “Wake up, Princess! The palace is under attack!”
You instantly jump on your feet, exclaiming “It’s that so? Come on, my friends! We’ll defend the palace!”
Followed by Rose, Mister Rabbit, Janet, Meredith and William, you leave the castle using the main door. Outside, the royal knights are fighting against an horde of ninjas. Lord Richard himself is waiting for you, with a bastard sword in his hands.
“Come, princess!” he shouts at you “Show me if you are a worthy opponent””
Rose gives you a rapier, saying “This belongs to the Royal Dynasty. It’s called Light Bringer.”
Taking the rapier, you attack Richard with all of your strength. He’s a good swordsman, much more expert than you are.
“Surrender, little stinker!” he exclaims “I will be king!”
You are about to collapse, but then you hear Meredith shouting “Don’t surrender, Susie! I’m with you!”
With renewed vigor, you fight again, disarming Richard with a precise cut.
The evil man kneels before you, saying “I’ve lost. You are the next queen.”
“Yes, I am!” you exclaim “And as the next queen, I sentence you to diaper punishment!”
Rose drags him at a bench, puts him over her knees and begins to spank him with a hairbrush. Meanwhile, Melissa reaches them with an extremely thick diaper in a hand and booster pads in the other.
You raise Light Bringer to the sky, as the crowd cheers you up.
“Long live queen Susan!”
…
You feel someone touching your shoulder, and you wake up, illuminated by the morning sun.
“Rose?” you say, once you’ve focused on her “Where are we? And where is Light Bringer?”
“Light … oh, I see, you had a dream.” she says “You’ll tell me later about it. There is someone that wants to speak with you.”
You look beyond her, seeing another woman in the room.
The woman is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Queen Charlotte shows up

choices: Lord Richard is present as well
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The woman is the young maid from the day before.
You gulp hard and pray to god that she does not say anything stupid. She is smiling and does not seem upset.
“Good morning Princess Susan, I apologies for bothering you that early in the morning, but I need your help.”

By now, Rose has helped you out of the crib and is wiggling a finger into the leg band of your diaper find you wet. You ask her to stop nods into the direction of the clock, but pulls her finger out and goes to the changing table and already prepares a fresh diaper for you.

You look at the maid and smile as well as you can: “Uhm, sure, what can I do for you?”

“Yesterday the Queen scold me for messing up the order of her… collection. She said that some magazines where put in the wrong place and some pages are kinked. I would ask you to tell her that it was not me, but you with your friends, while you have been exploring the castle.” She blushes and looks at her feet.
“You see, I have just started as a maid and Mr. Benedict already gave me a final warning for ruining one expensive carpet. If the Queen now tells him, that I spend my time reading kinky magazines, I am in real trouble.”

Behind her you see Rose with wide eyes, shaking her head. She does not say a word, but it is clear to you, that she now knows where you and your friends had FUN the day before. You gulp hard and does not know what to say. Before she pause stretch too long, your nanny steps in.
“For sure the princess will explain everything to the Queen and tell her that it has been her and her friends, not you, the obedient maid that snooped around in the Queen Private collection. Do not be worried Alice, we will take care of everything.” She rubs the maids back and managed to calm her down. Before she push the petite women, that again played with her short skirt and expose her training pants out of the door, she stops her: “Alice, please do not talk to anybody about this. You see it is a BIT unusual that the kids have been allowed to enter that room.”

Alice nods and quickly leaves the room, to change her trainers.

“Princess Susan, you had FUN in the Queens private library? Are you kidding me?” Miss Fletcher scolds you and lift you on the changing table. She roughly push you down and quickly change your diaper. You expect her to give you a spanking, but the pressing time does not allow that. With a fresh diaper on she pulls you up and look at your face, from a distance of a few centimeter: “Princess, after being such a very good and obedient girl you do such a naughty thing. I will talk to Nanny Melissa and make sure Willy and Merry receive a proper punishment. Janet will lose her game console for a few days and you, you will have a talk with the Queen and ask her for a hard, but fair punishment.” Your face lose its color by her words, but she is not jet done with you. “Whatever the Queen think is good, will be increased by me, because I am very disappointed that you lied to me AGAIN. You know that you would receive a sound spanking and go back in your wet diaper IF you would not have such an important day.” She sighs deeply and see that you already have tears in your eyes.

“Oh Baby, it will be okay. I am sorry, it is cruel to know that you will be punished later, but we do not have time now. I still love you and I am sure you will be a great Queen – one day – but you crossed a red line and it will be interesting to see that Queen Charlotte thinks about this.” She ruffles your hair to calm you down a bit.
“We do not want to anger the queen, before she speaks to the press, therefore you will tell her everything after the interview.”

“But isn’t that lying as well? Not telling it to her now?” You sob, sniffing quietly.

“Yes it is, but I take that one on me. She needs to concentrate on the press, like you must now remember your training. You now get a light breakfast and will be dressed up. You know a lot about Richard and with the dress it will be obviously that you embrace the tradition. If you can, if would be great if you could wet your diaper during the interview and do not say a word about it – as if it is a natural thing for you.” Rose suggested and helps you off the changing table.

The conversation about the interview distracts you from the later coming punishment. Rose keeps refreshing your memory while you nurse on the baby bottle and are guided to the dressing room, where four maids wait to help you with your preparation. With a full bladder and all the lessons from Miss Spencer refreshed, you walk to the Queen.
Your dress has a perfect fit, your hair is pulled back into two youthful tails and you have a decent makeup that makes you look even more innocent, but still has a degree of perfection, suitable for a princess.

Queen Charlotte is wearing an elegant dress herself and smiles at you when you enter, guided by Rose. “Good morning Susan, you look great and I am sure you will do very well.” Charlotte says.

You blush, but nod your head. Rose is right, you should not anger the queen right now, with the reporters waiting in the next room. She takes your hand and without further hesitations lead you through the next door.
A speaker announce the Queen and you and before you can count the number of reporters you find yourself on a small throne, next to the queen in a big one. In front of you, like an angry snake, you have a microphone and when you look down you notice how revealing the skirt of your dress is. With all the light in the room you could wear a shirt only without showing off more.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: The young maid you’ve met yesterday

choices: Tell her eveything, included Janet's oath
Tell her everything, but skip Janet's oath
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look around the room, noticing that there are relatively few people. In front of you stands a woman, dressed in a white revealing jacket, very feminine, and a tight black skirt long up to above the kneel. She is surrounded by 9 men, including photographer, men with recorders, cameramen and men with notebooks and pens. You remember what the queen said, that is a full interview for one of the most important newspapers in the country. It obvious the were few, for a single newspaper they are even too much!
“I welcome the envoys from Calonia’s Echo.” the queen says, looking at the woman in the middle of the small crowd “Calonian Royal House it’s always happy to open the door of the Royal Palace for your magazine.”
The woman nods, in a solemn way, answering “We are grateful of this, as always. Beloved Queen Charlotte of Calonia, can we proceed with the princess’ interview?”
The queen nods, and the presswoman turns her eyes on you, saying “Greeting, princess Susan of Calonia. I’m miss Daphne Adams, a reporter from Calonia’s Echo. Can we begin with your interview?”
She is really formal, and for the first time you realize what means to be part of the royal family.
“Of course.” you say “I’m ready to answer to all of your question, ma’am.”
Without waiting a second more, Daphne starts with the first question “Princess, can you please tell us what do you think of our country in general?”
“It’s a very interesting country. I found the perfect mediation between an old and respectable style of life and the strong economy and the high technological development really interesting. I see why it’s a wealthy country.” you reply.
“And about of traditions?” she asks “What do you think of them?”
“About the diapers, right?” you reply “I fully accept your tradition, as you can see.”
“It’s interesting, because after your landing here, another newspaper reported that you said these words: “Oh I hate the diapers and it is insane I have to wear one.”. Should we assume it’s a lie? Or is it all true?” she continues to press you.
Quickly, you consider your options: say it’s a lie would mean sling mud at the newspaper concerned, accordingly making an enemy. It’s not a good idea.
“It wasn’t a lie, I concede this.” you decide to say “But I was very tired and was the first time I wore a diaper since I was little. That wasn’t my real thoughts, but a quick answer of a tired girl in a full diaper. I was so tired I could have said I was a boy named Trevor.”
You can hear the men in the room laugh a little at your answer, but not Daphne. She remains a block of ice.
“It’s a very interesting way to see the facts, princess.” she continues “Because after your arrival you were wearing a lock on your onesie. You stated that it was put on you because you threw a tantrum about the color of your dress, but it’s an interesting coincidence that you arrived with a lock and saying just a few seconds later that you hated diapers. It is not plausible to think that the queen putted the block on you because you tried to fight the tradition, rather than the color of the dress?”
“She’s not a journalist, she’s a goddamned inquisitor!” you think, before answering “I’m aware that it’s legitimate to think that, but I assure that my tantrum was about the color of the onesie. As you can see, I’m not wearing a pink dress today, because I hate it. And just to be clear, I threw a very wild tantrum, that is why the queen spanked me and putted me the lock.”
“She spanked you?” she asks “And how did you reacted to that?”
“I’m used to be spanked, my parents did that all the time.” it’s your answer, which is a big lie, since the queen gave you the first spanking of your life “And so does nanny Rose during my permanence at the palace when I misbehave. I’m sure that it’s a good discipline method, and I immediately understand the errors of my ways when I’m spanked. So, I’m grateful to the queen and to nanny Rose for it.”
The second part of the sentence is a lie too, since you still think you are too old to be spanked.
“Can you tell us about this person you just mentioned, princess? This Rose?” she asks you then.
“Miss Rose Fletcher. She’s my nanny. I really love her, since she is very kind and really cares about me, but she’s also very strict and punishes me every time she thinks I deserve it.” and your entire sentence, this time, it’s completely true.
Just as you answer to that question, you feel an unbearable throe at your bladder. You completely let it go, wetting your diaper in front of everyone.
Everyone in the room notices that, and you can clearly hear a photographer tell to a man with a notebook “How cute, the princess just went number one in her diaper.”
You are aware that what you just did it’s not only normal, but required, but you feel the same full of shame in peeing yourself in front of strangers. Their comment about “number one” doesn’t help you in feeling at ease.
“Princess, you were not born in Calonia.” Daphne states, then adding “What do you say about all those that claim that only a true Calonian should inherit the throne?”
“She’s talking about Richard.” you think “This is my occasion to talk about him.”
“There aren’t true of false Calonians, in my opinion. There are only Calonians that accept the tradition and Calonians that don’t accept it.” you reply “For example, I met lord Richard Grairven. It’s obvious that he’s smart, and undoubtedly he’s an handsome lad. But the tradition, OUR tradition, says that the closest alive relative of the ruler will one day inherit the throne. Lord Grairven lost that opportunity when the queen found me, and if he is a true Calonian as he claims to be, he should accept it as it’s the tradition.”
“You are putting yourself against one of the strongest men in the kingdom, princess.” Daphne states “Tell me, did you just peed your diaper because you are scared of facing him?”
She’s trying everything to make you say something wrong, you can feel it. This interview it’s not relaxing at all, it’s a total stress.
“I went number one in my diaper, miss Adams, because I accept the tradition.” it’s your answer “And that’s the only reason.”
She then proceed in asking you about your political opponent, and you answer to all question using the numerous information that Miss Spencer gave you: you talk about the past of his family, about the violent bloodline of the Grairven, about the fact that Richard’s great great grandfather had to complain about the tradition, and concluding that Richard is known for whipping his servants: it may be legal, but it’s a barbaric thing to do that challenge modern common sense.
“One last question, princess.” concludes Daphne “If you would be placed alongside lord Richard for a picture, who do you think the people will notice more?”
“I know lord Richard it’s handsome, denying it would be stupid. And I also know that compared to him I’m just a diaper-wearer kid.” you simply state, then adding “But think about it: he’s in his early twenties. No one should make the error to forget that he may look handsome now, but a few years ago he was still in diapers too. And almost certainly it’s not so long that he received his last spanking from his nanny.”
Your last answer makes laugh all the men, and even Daphne smiles.
“Thank you for your time, princess.”
With these words, the troupe leaves the palace, and you are left alone with the queen.
“You were great, Susan!” she exclaims, hugging you “I’m so proud of you! That Daphne was really inquisitive with her questions, and was without doubt a very difficult interview, but you managed it!”
As she lets you go, you nod, happy yourself. You then remember something.
“Charlotte, I need to tell you something.” you say, lowering your head.
“What’s it, sweetie?” she asks, looking confused.
You are about to tell her what’s happened (and you will, since lying now would be a terrible idea), when something flash in your mind: Janet’s oath!
“If we are caught, I solemnly swear that I will request that your own punishment shall administered to me too, whatever it may be.”
Should you say this too to the queen, or skip it during your report of the facts? You don’t want her to get in trouble, but it’s true that it was her idea after all.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: The interview is very difficult

choices: Nanny Samantha will take you over, for a while.
I let Mr. Benedict decide who will be in charge of you.
I give Rose a detailed list of punishments.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You are really not sure how to phrase it. Janet is your best friend and without maid Alice your little adventure would never been discovered, but now it is too late. The only thing you can do is take as much of the punishment on yourself and leave Janet out as much as you can. She has already lost her game console, what is tough, for a gamer like her.
“Queen Charlotte, when you found us yesterday in front of the forbidden door… It was using messing around with some of your magazines, not maid Alice.”

The facial expression of the Queen slips. She feels embarrassed and is disappointed at the same time.
“Susan,… How could you do that? Nosy or not, at least after finding out it is MY personnel collection you should have left the room right away, but you kept reading adult stuff and maybe even laughed at your kinky queen?!”

Now you go pale and shake your head: “No, majesty, I would never do that. I know magazines like this from my country, like Janet does. Willy was interested and Merry was embarrassed like a little kitten, nobody laughed at you about your… hobby. I know Rose, Miss Fletcher already talked to Nanny Melissa, but I kindly ask you to punish me the most. I should have stopped everybody, but I was interested to look through the magazines myself.”

The queen search for the next chair and sits down on it.
“Really Susan, which is something I would never see happening. The room is always locked and you still broke in and looked through forbidden stuff. I have to punish you as strict as possible to make sure this never happens again.” An idea crosses her mind and she bites down on her bottom lip.
“Maybe Rose is really too soft on you. Maybe you need a stronger, stricter hand, like I had in my childhood.”

You see where she is aiming for and starts to shake your head.
“No, please not another nanny. Rose it perfect and she is capable to discipline me.”

“I am not sure. You keep breaking the rules over and over again. Yesterday all looked fine and now I find out you did something horrible. Maybe I should hand you over to Nanny Samantha, at least for a couple of days.”

You go down to your knees and literary be her on your knees. “Please do not do that! I had nightmares of her and I heard she is cruel and unfair!!”

The Queen looks down at you. She has bad experiences with Nanny Samantha herself, but if nothing else helps?! Or would it be enough to give Rose a long list of punishments for Susan?
“Susan,….
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Tell her everything, but skip Janet's oath

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
… was maid Alice that found you in the room?”
You nod, unsure of what she is thinking.
“I think we should let decide your punishment to the one that has discovered you. But since she is very young and inexpert, we will ask to the one in charge of her, and in charge of all servants: we will ask Mr. Benedict.”
“The Butler?!” you almost yell “But he’s a male! I don’t want to be punished by him!”
“I didn’t say that he will punish you. He’s considered extremely strict but fair by all the servants. He will come up with the best suggestion for your punishment. And if he thinks that he should punish you himself, you will simply accept it, princess. You’ve been very naughty, and can’t expect that I let you decide your own punishment.”
You nod, aware that she is right.
Charlotte takes your hand and lead you through the palace’s corridors.
She stops in front of the laundry door, just to open it and enter.
Inside, maids and footmen are busy doing their chores. Mr. Benedict Harper is standing in the middle of the room, giving instructions left and right.
“Ben, I need to speak with you. Can you spare a moment?” she says.
The Butler nods, and after having given a last instruction to the servants, he follows the queen and you outside of the laundry.
Charlotte tells him everything, and he listens with a very professional expression.
“So, you decided to let me decide the princess punishment.” he states, once the queen has finished to talk.
The queen simply nods, as he looks at you with analyzing eyes.
“In my opinion, you shouldn’t let her in the care of Samantha.” he says, and you breathe a sigh of relief “That woman is unfair, and everyone in the palace knows that.”
The queen seems relieved herself. She didn’t like that idea either and seems happy with the Butler’s judgement.
“Miss Fletcher it’s ok for her. The good answers you said she gave during the interview confirms it.” you begin to smile, but he then adds “It’s however true that Miss Fletcher, although strict, is quite soft. Maybe a short period of time, two or three days would be enough, under the care of another nanny would be a good idea.”
“What are you suggesting, then?” the queen asks him, not sure of what he means.
“I suggest to transfer her for a three days under the care of nanny Melissa alongside the Prime Minister’s children. She is quite stricter than nanny Rose is, and will be quite humiliating for her to be punished under the eyes of her friends, especially under the eyes of a boy.” he explains.
“In the same nursery as William?!” you exclaim, blushing “Never!”
“If you prefer, princess, I can give you a bare bottom spanking right here in the laundry and ask maid Alice to change your diaper in the middle of the garden. I’m sure that will work too.” he states, making you instantly hush. You think that this is at least better than be given in the care of Samantha.
“Thank you, Ben.” the queen says to him “Your advices are always smart.”
“I do what I can, my queen. If you need me again, you know how to find me.” and with these words, he leaves.
Charlotte takes your hand once more, and leads you straight to Melissa’s nursery.
She knocks the door, and you hear the voice of Merry’s nanny answering “Who’s there?”
“Queen Charlotte.” the queen simply says “Can I come in?”
“Of course, your majesty.” the tall nanny replies.
The queen opens the door, and lead you in.
Inside, Meredith and William are both in the playpen. They are crying and hugging each other. Merry is wearing a pink onesie, with the words “Unruly baby” printed on the back, while Willy is wearing a red and childish drop-seat pajama, and the drop-seat itself is closed with big buttons and with the words “Bad boy” on it. They are both wearing a lock. It’s obvious that Rose already informed Melissa about what happened and she has already punished the two for it.
“Your majesty, princess.” she greets you “What I can do for you?”
“You will take care of the princess for three days, starting now.” Charlotte explains “She’s under punishment for what she have done alongside her friends. She hasn’t been punished yet, and I demand that she should be treated like the leader of the group.”
Melissa takes a bow, while Merry and Willy look at the scene with wide open eyes, and says “It will be my pleasure, your majesty.”
The queen leaves the room, and as the door is closed, nanny Melissa takes you by your ear.
“Now, naughty princess, we will have a little discussion about your behavior.” she says, and drags you near a chair. She sits on it and pats her lap.
“Over my knees, princess.” she orders to you, while taking up an old wooden hairbrush from the near bedside table.
“But nanny Melissa, Willy is watching.” you complain, and Meredith intervenes too “Please, nanny Melissa. We can wait in the bathroom.”
“Hush!” the nanny exclaims “Another word from any of you and I will take the bar of soap. I gave you an order, princess. Lay yourself over my lap!”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: I'll let Mr. Benedict decide

choices: Have fun with Merry and Willy.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look over to Willy and Merry in their thick diapers and onesie. They just have stopped crying and you do not know for how long they have been sobbing before you entered the room. Afraid to be punished like you have never been punished before you step back and look over your shoulder to the door. “No,… you cannot punish me. Rose is my nanny, only she can do that.”

Nanny Melissa sighs and gets up from her chair. “Princess Susan, Mr. Harper is the head of all nannies and had made a decision. Liking it or not, Miss Fletcher will not question him and neither will I. Maybe I am not such a softie and forgiving, like Rose is, but I will be fair and a much better choice than Nanny Samantha. Now come to me or I need to add more to your list.”

You still step further back until you hit the door.
“Please not, I was such a good girl all yesterday and some magazines are nothing that is new to me. There is no reason to punish me.”

“Princess, The Queen herself told me to treat you like the head of this little adventure and like this you will receive the same treatment as Willy and Merry PLUS something on top.” She says and reach out with her hand.

You sink down to your knees and begin to sob. “But do not throw away Mr. Rabbit.”

Nanny Melissa comes closer and picks you up. “Hush, I will not take away your favorite stuffy, I will get him as soon as you are in your crib to make sure he watches you during the night.”

You are very happy to hear that and even surprised that she knows your stuffed rabbit. She and Rose must talk a lot. With Willy and Merry watching, she strips you down completely and takes you over her knees. She is using a spanking paddle that looks scary, but does not hurt much more than a hand. It is only louder, what makes it more humiliating. In the end, your behind is pink, but does show no sign of bruises. You are crying like a baby in the end, but you have expected that. From her lap, Melissa carries you to the changing table and straps you down, before she get the enema-kit and slide a quit wide hose up your behind. It has two little balloons. One for the outside and one for the inside, which are pumped up. It feels quiet strange, but does not hurt.
“This will prevent the hose from coming out, I want you to hold the water in for a long time to make sure all your naughtiness is washed out.”
The water begins to fill your colon and you like to argue, that your naughtiness is in your mind and not in your behind, but you do not want to risk a mouth soaping.
It takes quite a while until all the water is in and Melissa let you wait even longer before she put you in a thick diaper with three booster pads and pink romper with a sad looking sun on the chest. For sure you get the lock as well and a pacifier is strapped into your mouth that has a hose attached.
“This is a feeding gag. I want to make sure you drink enough and use your diaper like a good little girl.” Melissa explains and put you into an adult size version of a baby bouncer.
“In a few minutes you will fill your diaper and a while later you will for sure wet yourself. The bouncer will make sure you feel that and keep the diaper pressed against your crotch.” Melissa explains and gives you an initial push down.

You bounce up and down and look over to Willy and Merry. The pacifier in your mouth prevents you from saying anything, but the sibling see you bouncing and whisper to you as soon as Melissa left the room.
“Sorry for the bouncer. You will not be able to find a comfortable position in it.” Willy says. He seem to know the bouncer quiet well.
“But do not worry, as soon as your diaper is full, she will put you in the crib and you can relax. Is Janet now getting this treatment as well?”
You shake your head and he looks relieved.

An hour later your bowels are empty and you diaper has turned into a squishy sponge between your legs. The formula in the force feeder was not tasting as good as the formulas Rose had feed you so far, but maybe that was part of the punishment. You have been happy when the bag was empty and you could relax your yaw.

Finally Melissa comes back and helps you out of the bouncer.
“I see you used your diaper good, now you can go to bed. I am sorry, but the punishment will continue tomorrow, you have just been too naughty. But for today you are done.”

She had wheeled in a bid crib and to your surprise you find yourself in it, together with Merry and Willy. “And I have your little friend as well.” Melissa says and give you Mr. Rabbit. “He will make sure you do nothing naughty during the night.” You hug him tightly and smile behind your pacifier.
“Good night babies and do not do anything naughty, I have you on the baby monitor.” Melissa warns and leaves the room.

You lay next to Merry, while Willy lies on the other side of the crib. All three of you have thick and full diapers on and you all hug your favorite stuffies. Merry hugs a doll, while Willy hugs a big teddy bear.

You have never shared a crib and wonder if this could be a funny night?
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Complain more.

choices: "You will stay here with me. You’re still grounded.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
After spending your morning at the interview and your entire afternoon in this nursery, you are eager to do something funny. You hadn’t had fun for all day, after all.
“Merry, Willy …” you say “… maybe we can play a little?”
“I’d really like to.” William replies “We spent the entire day grounded.”
“Me too, it seems.” you say “But at least I skipped Miss Spencer class for today.”
“We shouldn’t!” Meredith exclaims, keeping her voice low “Nanny Melissa has us on the baby monitor.”
“She said to not do anything naughty. I want only get a little fun.” You state.
“What do you think we should do?” William asks.
“We can make our friends befriend each other’s.” you propose.
Willy and Merry both nods, giggling a little.
Merry takes out her dolly, saying “She is Betty. She is very brave and always protect me.”
“He’s Teddy!” exclaims William “It’s a very kind bear and always comforts me when Nanny Melissa punishes me.”
You take out Mister Rabbit too, saying “He’s Mister Rabbit. He is a true gentleman, and always believes in me.”
“What do you think of your owner, Teddy?” you say, moving Mister Rabbit like he is the one who talked.
“I like Willy.” William replies, like if Teddy is speaking “He’s very mature and tough, but sometimes he needs me to calm himself down, especially when Nanny Melissa uses the hairbrush.”
“And you, Mister Rabbit?” intervenes Meredith, moving Betty “You surely know a lot about the princess. Can you tell us how many diaper changes she gets in a day?”
You blush, but decide to keep with the game, and so you make Mister Rabbit reply “Betty, dear, I’m sure you are a gentlewoman, so you shouldn’t ask things that are so private. But I assure you that she needs a lot.” you stop to move him, and add “Mister Rabbit! That’s private!”
Merry giggles, and then makes the dolly says “Oh, you are very funny, Mister Rabbit. And can you tell us if there is someone in the palace that the princess dislikes?”
“There is one, of course.” you make him say “She can’t stand Samantha, the unfair nanny.”
“Mister Rabbit, do you know Janet too?” William makes Teddy say “There’s anything you can tell to Willy about her?”
“She is a very smart girl.” you make your stuffy reply “And she’s my owner best friend. Please, tell William that if he tries anything funny with her, the princess will have him spanked.”
William blushes, as makes Teddy reply “And who will spank him, Mister Rabbit? Your owner?”
“No, she will try everything to get him in trouble with nanny Melissa. And I’m sure your owner knows well her laps.” you make him say.
Merry intervenes, adding “But I’m sure everyone will get along in the end.”
She made the doll say that, of course.
As you are about to reply, the door of the nursery opens, and Nanny Melissa enters, wearing a nighty.
“Am I wrong, or I said you three to sleep?” she says “Playtime is during the day, not during the night. Night is made to sleep.”
“But we couldn’t have fun today!” you complain.
“That’s because today you were grounded.” she replies, sweetly “Now, please, hug your toys and sleep. Or must I sing you the red lullaby?”
Both Merry and Willy immediately say “No, no, nanny. We’ll sleep!”
Curious about it, you ask “What is the red lullaby, nanny Melissa?”
“It’s a special lullaby. It is made of the sound of bottoms that turn red. It works wonders to kids that don’t want to sleep.” she explains “Do you want to hear it, princess Susan?”
Realizing that is a colorful way to threat a spanking, you shake your head and say “Not necessary, thank you. I’ll sleep.”
Melissa smiles, and leaves the room again. You say goodnight to the siblings, and fall asleep.
In the morning, you feel someone waking you up. As you open your eyes, you realize two things: first, nanny Melissa is touching your shoulder to wake you up; second, you are hugging Meredith, who’s still asleep. Blushing, you immediately let her go, saying to the nanny “Please, Nanny Melissa, don’t say this to her.”
“Why shouldn’t I? You were so cute.” she says, removing you from the crib “But if it’s so important to you, I will not say a word about it.”
You smile, as she wakes up both William and Meredith.
Once all of you are awake, she reaches the changing table and says “Now, it’s diaper changing time. Princess, you can come first.”
You blush, and complain to her saying “You’ll change my diaper in front of them?”
“Princess, when I say something to you, you will obey me without complaining, if you don’t want to get a mouth soaping.” she says, sternly “This is your only warning for these three days. Come here this instant!”
Defeated, you lay on the changing table. She undresses you, removes your dirty diaper and cleans you up. Before putting a new diaper on you, however, she lifts your legs up, in what is commonly referred as “diaper position”, and gives you five fast and very hard spanks with her hand. They are strong, and the surprise emphasizes them more.
“Ouch!” you exclaim “Why did you spanked me?”
“It was only a maintenance spanking, princess.” she explains, continuing the diapering process “This is how I give them. You will receive three of them, today. This was the first, the second will be administer after today’s nap and the third before bedtime. This is how Nanny Melissa treats naughty children that misbehaved and earned the lock.”
Remembering that Rose gave your maintenance spankings only after your nap and over your diaper, you realize why Melissa is considered stricter than her.
Once finished, she repeats the entire process (spanking included) with both Meredith and William.
William looks embarrassed, just like you. Meredith, however, seems at ease with you looking at her.
Once all of you are diapered, Melissa dresses you up. Meredith is putted in a yellow onesie with the words “My Nanny spanked me” printed on the chest, just over the printed photo of a pair of red buttocks. William is putted in a light blue one, with a heart with a sad face printed on it. And you are putted in a pink one, with the printed words “Leader of a crew of rascals”. She has putted locks on all of you.
The outfits mark you as naughty children, without even the necessity to see the locks. Rose wouldn’t have done this.
As you enjoy your breakfast, Nanny Melissa explains “You two will now go to your morning lesson with Miss Spencer. You, princess, will instead attend your class as usual in the afternoon.”
“What will I do till then?” you ask.
She replies …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Have fun with Merry and Willy

choices: You find her in her room.
You find her in Nanny Melissa’s nursery
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
„You can spend time with Janet.“ Nanny Melissa says to your surprise. You could not be happier, after spending all afternoon, strapped in the baby bouncer, the day before you look forward to have some fun with your best friend.
Smiling from ear to ear you waddle into the hallway and almost knock on Janet’s door, when you remember her oath. “On no, what will she say if she sees me like this?” You ask yourself and hesitate. One maid is walking by and giggle about the sentence on your onesie. When you see a second one coming with Mr. Benedict Walker, you knock quickly and step in.
Janet is sitting on her bed, reading a book. Her short skirt shows of a regular diaper, that looks so tiny compared to yours.
“HEY! Susan, what is going one? They took away my game console and forbid me to see Merry, Willy or you. What the hell happened?”
You sigh deeply and give her the full story. At first she is very angry that you haven’t told the queen or the nannies about your oath, but the more you tell her, the quieter she gets.
“Oh man, I am not sure if I should be grateful or angry. I mean, I told you I take the same as you do and tell the Queen it was my idea.”
“Yes you did, but you are not… you are a guest and should not fall under the same rules as we do.” You explain, trying to be as polite as possible.
“Because I am not one of you guys? Because I am just a visitor?? Damn it Susi, we are best friends and you tell me I am not part of your inner circle???” Janet gets angry and throw her book across the room.
“No, you are my bestie and I l… like you a lot, I don’t want to see you getting spanked or… for god sake, Janet, you don’t know what you are asking for!” You defend yourself, but Jane has a different point of view. She pushes you out of the way and storm out into the hallway. With your thick diaper, you have issues to follow her. She is turning to the right and goes even faster, while she aims for the official office of the Queen.
“Janet stop! You can’t run in there and interrupt her, maybe she has important business going on!” But Janet is unstoppable. She knocks twice and before you can reach her, she enters the office and close the door behind her. You almost stumbles into it, when you finally reach it.
Out of breath you knock on the door and wait for a reply.
….
Nothing!
You knock again and this time you hear Queen Charlotte. “Just a minute please.”
…
…
The minutes must be a very long one. At least it feels like you spend fifteen minutes outside of the office and step from one foot to the other.
Finally the door opens and Janet leaves the office, smiling proudly and holding a note in her hand.
“I will be punished by Nanny Melissa, just like you and the others.”

“No, you can’t! I already took the blame!” You insist and enter the Queens office.
“Your majesty, you did a mistake!” You blur out. “Janet is my guest and she cannot be treated like a common Calonian girl.”
The Queen looks amused, and put aside her pen.
“Princesses Susan, what a surprise to see you here, after I haven’t allowed you to enter and neither allowed you to speak.”
You gulp hard and bend out head. “I am very sorry my Queen, but Janet is my best friend and I cannot see her suffer for my mistakes.”
“Well, but she explained to me that it was her idea and now the INSIST on being punished like you and your little friends. I have to say this is a rare case, but it somebody begs me to be punished, I like to grant that wish.” The Queen explains and writes down something on a note, that she gives to you.
“You see, for you it is easy, since you are a citizen of this country. For Janet we made exceptions, but no that she begs to be treated equal, she will at least be punished like one of you.” She giggles. “She only ask to keep her videogames that was her only condition.”

You see that the decisions are made and will not be reversed. A short look at the paper further tells you, that you will have your mouth soaped very soon. Fearing further NOTES from the Queen you politely leave the office.

Outside you look around for Janet…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: "You can spend time with Janet"

choices: ... is a 14 years old fitting outfit, without locks.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You begin to walk through the corridors, thinking about the note the queen gave you: an instruction for Nanny Melissa to give you a mouth soaping. You are not eager to that, and you are even much less eager to see Janet getting punished. What will she receive? A spanking, an enema and a thicker diaper (maybe with booster pads) for sure. But the shameful onesie and the lock? Will she receive that?
You are completely absorbed in your thoughts, and don’t notice a person coming from the other side of the corridor: you bump into the other person. The impact that follows make you lose your balance and fall on your butt, covered by the diaper. The knock made you even release your bladder, so you wet yourself.
“I’m sorry, I didn’t see you.” you apology, trying to getting up.
“Well, well. If it isn’t the little stinky princess …”
You freeze, recognizing the voice. You look up, and with your dismay you see lord Richard himself.
“You!” you angrily exclaim “Why are you still in the palace?”
He doesn’t even reply to your question, he simply take you by your hear forcing you to getting up. He looks at you with is icy and sharp eyes, and with a voice much similar to a roar than a human voice, he says “This morning, in today’s publication of Calonia’s Echo, I read the interview you granted yesterday to them. Stupid girl, how you dare mocking me in front of the press?”
You are about to yell, but he grabs you by your cheeks with his right hand, covering your mouth.
“Let me tell you a secret, naughty wet pants.” he whispers “Grairven family doesn’t give a fuck about the tradition. I was potty trained when I was 3 years old.”
He begins to drag you along the empty corridor, adding “Now I will teach you a lesson that you’ll never forget about respecting the nobles of this country. We will find a more secluded area and I will have a long talk with you. Sorry, I correct myself: I will have a long talk with your buttock. I promise that you will not be able to sit down for weeks after I have finished with you.”
Tears begin to run from your eyes: you feel so impotent in front of him. Is not like in your dreams.
Just as he’s almost dragged you away from the corridor, you hear a strong voice from behind your back, that says in a very firm tone: “Release the princess this instant, or you will answer to the queen about it.”
You immediately recognize the deep voice of Mr. Benedict, the Butler. You’ve never been so grateful to meet him.
“You are one of the palace’s servants.” Richard says, looking above your head “I am a noble, you idiot. Now scram! I have a private affair with the princess.”
“Scram? Or what?” Benedict replies “You’ll whip me? I am the Butler of the Royal Palace, not a servant of your manor. Raise a finger on me and be sure that I will sue you, and before that I will defend myself.”
“Defend yourself?” Richard laughs “I am the best fencer in the country. A servant cannot beat me.”
“I am aware that I can’t compete with you.” the Butler simply replies “But if we fight, be sure that everyone in the palace will run here to help me. I’m the Butler, and in the Palace my words are credited as the queen’s herself. Do you really want to show to the entire country your true face, my lord?” My lord was said in a defiant tone.
Richard roar, and lets you go. He turns around and leaves, telling to you “We will meet again, potty pants.”
Just as he has left, your turn to the Butler.
“Are you alright, princess?” he asks.
Without answering, you run to him and hug him tightly, crying and saying repeatedly “Thank you, thank you, thank you …”
He seems insecure, it’s obvious that he’s not used to be hugged.
“Hush, princess. It’s all okay now.” he says, with his usual deep voice but with a kinder tone “I can bring you back to your nursery, if you want.”
You nod, stopping your cry but still sobbing a little, as the Butler lift you in his arms and begins to carry you to Melissa’s nursery.
As you enter in the nursery, you see Melissa standing in the middle of the room, and Janet in the baby bouncer, with a pacifier in her mouth.
“Mr. Benedict? Princess?” the nanny says, quite astonished “What happened?”
The Butler explains to her what happened, and then leaves you in her arms.
“Oh, little princess.” she says, hugging you as Benedict leaves “Do you want me to call here nanny Rose? I’m sure she can comfort you better than me.”
You nod, and the tall nanny leave the nursery. You are left alone with Janet.
You look at her. She is in the bouncer and with a visible heavy padding. She is obviously wearing booster pads, that mean she got an enema too.
Her outfit …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You run into somebody

choices: Willy and Merry lie beside you.
Willy and Merry enter the room.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Janet is dressed in a rink romper that leaves her legs and arms bare. On her chest she has the words. “I ASKED FOR IT” and you wonder if Nanny Melissa has made the romper just for Janet – or if she has so many on stock, that she only needed to search for it.
“Oh Janet look at you. I am sure that you regret it now?!” You talk to your friend.
With the strapped in pacifier Janet cannot say anything that would be easy to understand. At first she shakes her head and tries to look proud, but then a cramp hits her tummy and she wince like a little puppy. Her pacifier makes soft smacking noises, when she starts to suck on it to distract herself from the inevitable. Her hands tighten around the straps of the baby bouncer and she closes her eyes, while your hands sneaks to her padded behind.
Even through the diaper, booster pad and romper, you can feel her fill her diaper while she expel the enema. She wince even more when she opens her eyes and see you, standing behind her.
“It is okay Janet, you are so brave.” You try to calm her down, walk around her and hug her.
Hanging in the baby bouncer she is a bit smaller than you and you feel warmth spreading out in your chest, while you hug her and rub her back. It feels good to be the one that cares for others, especially for your best friend.

“Oh Princess, I see I am not longer needed.” Nanny Rose calls from the door. You let Janet go and run to your nanny. “Oh you are needed! Lord Richard caught me and dared to beat me up!” You feel fresh tears again while you hang on your nanny and tell her what happened. Telling it to Rose feels good, but there is a burning question that you must ask. You let go off Rose and step back: “Why is he in the palace, he should be banned forever!”

Rose sighs and nod her head. “In theory you are right, but we have no proof about what had happened beside Mr. Walker’s and your word. That might be enough for US, but not for the public. And he will for sure involve the press if we banish him from the palace. I am sorry to say that, but if he does not attack you in public, we cannot do much besides watching you all the time.”

“Oh great, now I have no more freedom at all.” You think, but stay quiet and nod your head.
While you think about the unfair situation Nanny Melissa helps Janet out of the bouncer and put her in a high chair. Your stomach growls and you notice that it is already time for lunch. Obedient you let Rose lift you in a second high chair and allow her to hold your bottle of formula, while Nanny Melissa holds the one for Janet.

“Do I have to take a nap? I am not tired”, you complain and feel a little cramp. “And I need to use the bathroom for number two.” You need to try it with Rose, but you have expected her answer, especially in front of Melissa.
“Sorry little one, you will use your diaper, like ALWAYS.” She says, the last word more to Melissa than to you.
Melissa grins and lift Janet into the wide crib of Willy and Merry. A second later you lie beside her and look for Mr Rabbit. When you found him, you hug him and blush, when you see Janet’s facial expression.
“Uhm… do you think it is childish to have a stuffed, best friend?” You ask her.

Janet has to think about this, but finally shakes her head.

“Janet, should I look for your stuffie?” Rose offers. Janet’s face slips and she looks down, while she shakes her head slowly.

“Rose and Melissa know immediately what is going on and react on the spot. In a second they offer Janet different kind of stuffed animals and a doll. Hesitating and blushing, she takes a fluffy sheep from Melissa and look at her with big, grateful eyes.
“It is okay baby. No need to be ashamed.” Melissa comforts her.
She even give her a kiss on the forehead, while Rose kisses you.
Hugging your stuffed animals the two of you fall asleep. Even you sleep in, before your stomach can keep you awake and when you wake up…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: ... is a locked "naughty child" outfit.

choices: Miss Spencer is waiting for you, with her binder.
A substitute teacher is there, and wields a school paddle.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You wake up, feeling a messy sensation around your butt. You make a disgusted face, then realize another warm sensation. You look around, and you see Meredith lying next to you, while William is lying next to Janet. The crib feels quite small, now, and all of you are crammed in it. You blush when you understand what the warm sensation is: Merry is not hugging her dolly, but you.
Exactly in that moment, a hand touch your shoulder.
“Princess, I saw you open your eyes. Wake up, please.”
Is the voice of Rose. You smile, as you turn your head to her.
“Good morning, nanny.” you say, then adding “Are you here to take me back to our nursery?”
“First of all, princess, it’s not morning, but afternoon. This was your nap, remember?” she replies “And no, you’ll stay in nanny Melissa’s nursery today and tomorrow, and only then you will return to mine.”
Melissa is here too, and immediately adds “I read the queen’s note that was in your pocket, princess. Why haven’t you tell me about it?”
You go pale, replying “I forgot, nanny Melissa! Please, trust me! Richard made me forgot about it!”
Rose takes you out of the crib, after casting aside Merry’s arms, and as she proceeds to awake the others three, nanny Melissa says to you “I believe you, princess. Lord Richard has the tendency to make everyone so angry that your forgetfulness is understandable. Despite that, you’ll get your mouth soaping.”
“Mouth soaping?” says Janet, still yawning “What has she done?”
“It seems that the princess forgot her manners while talking to queen Charlotte, this morning.” Melissa explains “And her majesty herself requested a mouth soaping for this.”
“Aemh … can I have my diaper changed, first?” you ask, but the tall nanny shakes her head.
“First, the mouth soaping, then the diaper change and last but not least the spanking.” she explains.
“Spanking?” Rose intervenes “You mean maintenance spanking, right?”
“No, Rose, I mean a punishment spanking.” Melissa states “The mouth soaping is the punishment requested by the queen, and the spanking will be for shaming her caretaker, that’s me, with her behavior.”
“But it’s really necessary? I mean …” Rose begins, but Melissa interrupts her.
“Rose, I respect you, really. But I don’t accept that another nanny tells me how to run my nursery.”
Rose blush a little and nod, as Melissa takes you next to the sink.
You stayed silence, aware that you could only worsen your situation.
Melissa wash your mouth with soap, then removes your dirty diaper, and as she stated she concludes the entire procedure giving you a spanking with the noisy but not much painful spanking paddle, before putting you in a fresh one.
You cry and run to Rose, who hugs you.
“Melissa is right.” she whispers “You earned that, but it’s now over.”
You stay in her arms, while nanny Samantha changes all three of your friends and gives a maintenance spanking to both Willy and Janet. When it’s Merry’s turn, she receive a punishment spanking too.
“Eight demerits are not that much, but still too much.” Melissa scolds, during the spanking. You realize is a spanking for her morning lesson with Miss Spencer.
When the procedure is over, she puts all of you back in your locked punishment onesie, the same of the morning.
“You are all free to go.” concludes Melissa “Merry, Willy, you will both return here for your dinner. Princess, I expect to see you here after your lesson. Janet, you are completely free. You can come here after dinner to sleep with your friend or you can go back to your room. Be aware that I will remove the lock only tomorrow in both cases.”
As Merry and Willy leave the room, however, a woman enters in the nursery.
“I’m sorry to interrupt.” she says.
“No interruption at all, Lady Kent.” Melissa replies with a bow. Rose bows too.
It’s the prime minister. You haven’t seen her since the mess with the chocolate.
“Princess, the queen and I have been informed of what happened with lord Richard.” she says “So we’d like to give you a escort for your movements.”
“An escort?” you exclaim, blushing “I don’t need it, really!”
“It’s not your decision, little one.” lady Kent replies, with a kind voice “I’m sure that you will be grateful for it in very little time.”
She then turns to the door, saying “You can come in.”
At her command, a woman enters in the nursery. She has short blonde hair and is quite tall, even if not as much as Melissa, and wears a thin silver armor that to you seems quite anachronistic. At the left side of her belt, she carries a rapier, similar to the one in your dream, while in the right side she carries a scary looking black handgun.
Without waiting a second, she completely kneels before you, and says with a determined voice “Princess Susan, my name is Eden Langdon, of Calonians Royal Knights. I vow to you to serve you and protect you from your enemies, and to give my life for you without regrets if it will be necessary.”
As you look at her, not knowing what to say, the prime minister intervenes “We thought that a woman would have been less problematic for you. But I assure that we would have chosen her even if it wasn’t a problem. Eden is the best gunner and one the bests fencer in the country.”
Eden is still kneeled, and you decide to say “You … can get up, ma’am.”
The lady knight gets up, but replies “No need to call me that. I’m at your service, my lady.”
In hearing her calling you “my lady”, you blush. Rose notices that and can’t avoid to giggle.
After having greeted the nannies and lady Kent, you leave the nursery to go to your lesson, followed by Janet and the knightess.
“Great, now I have a guardian angel, too.” you sigh, during the path, telling to Janet “She will tell everyone if I do something naughty, if she doesn’t spank me herself.”
To your surprise, Eden intervenes saying “No, princess. Your discipline is not my concern, only your safety is. If you do something naughty, I would not punish you, nor I will report it to anyone.”
“So you can’t punish her?” Janet asks (nanny Melissa removed her pacifier before letting her go).
“I can.” she replies “And I will in a specific occasion: if she endangers herself.”
“If I endanger myself?” you ask, skeptical.
“Yes, my lady. If you endanger yourself you would lacking respect toward my duty to protect you, so I will punish you on the spot.” she explains “That means that if you put yourself in danger, I will spank you wherever we are, in your nursery or in the middle of the palace.”
Picturing you on this strong woman knees, you blush, thinking that would be much worse than be spanked by Rose or Melissa, especially if in front an audience.
Finally, you reach Miss Spencer office. Inside …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Willy and Merry lie beside you

choices: She ask somebody for an advice.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You almost stumble over your feet when you see the tall man, dressed in a black suit, holding a paddle. “Uhm Hello? I thought we have a lesson with Miss Spencer?” You almost whisper. Janet beside you has a similar facial expression and gulps hard. “Hi.” She says. Both of you are already happy to have Eden behind you, no matter who that man is, he will not be able to hurt you… .

“Good afternoon Princess Susan, good afternoon Janet, girlfriend of Princess Susan.” The man greets you with a little nod of his head. He use the paddle to point at the tables and ask you to sit down.
“We already waste enough time. Can you tell me why you are two minutes too late?!”

You look at the clock on the wall and see the pointer jumping to 13:02.
“Sir, we are only a minute late, because… I do not know why. You see I have a guard now and it took a bit longer to organize ourselves. And, by the way Janet is my friend, not my girlfriend.”

The man makes an angry face and let the paddle crash on the table.
“DO NOT TALK UNSELL I TELL YOU SO!” He booms and flip the white-board open. In HUGE letters you see a name: MARCUS GRAIRVEN.
“This is my name, but you will only call me Sir, simple enough for you to remember. I do not tolerate smart mouthing or any other kind of misbehavior. Further I like to make sure that naughtiness is cured on the spot and not ONLY later. For that I have the paddle, for example. I will use it when you misbehave to make sure you do not forget why you get punished.”

You look at Janet, who looks totally in shock.
“Uhm, Sir! Does that mean that we earn no demerits?” You ask, just to be sure you understand him correct.

“Princess, I have not said anything like this. You need to listen more careful, please get up and bend over your desk.” Mr Grairven says. The name rings a bell and suddenly you understand.
“Are you the brother of Lord Richard?” You ask, while you bend over your desk.
You prepare for a slap, but when the paddle hits you, it still hurt a lot. It is obviously not the same kind of paddle that Melissa use. This one is quiet, but hurts a lot. He gives you 5 slaps with it and your behind burns under your diaper. Wetness spread around your crotch and you notice, that you are wetting yourself.
“Five slaps for coming late, smart mouthing and talking without permission, three times.” He counts out and let you back to your seat.
“Miss Janet, now I is your turn.” He point his finger at Janet. “JANET!” He shouts after Janet did not move at the first call. Janet jumps up and lay flat across her table. She receive two slaps. One for coming late and one for needing two calls to react.
Janet is harder than you, but even she has a tear running down her face when she is allowed to sit down again.

After that horrible start it is getting a bit better. He is teaching history and repeats some stuff you have learned from Miss Spencer already. That helps you a lot and he has no reason so spank you further. After a little break he continues with math and asks you to calculate complex functions without using a calculator of making notes.
While Janet has no big issues with this, you have major issues. You find yourself using your hands to remember numbers and to write down tiny number on your paper.
“I see you have issues princess. I wonder how you passed an interview and even manage to talk bad about my cousin when you have problems to count to three without using your hands.”

“I knew it!” You call out in your mind, but stays quiet.
To distract him from your lack of math-skills you raise your hands and wait patiently from him to call you.
“Sir, could you tell us where Miss Spencer is and when she is back?”

Mr. Grairven sit down on the edge of his big table and smiles.
“Princess, I am pleased to hear that you are concerned, since you are the reason she is on sick leave. Miss Spencer has a bladder-infection and is in too much pain to teach. I am not an expert with the female illnesses, but it I was asked to teach you for a couple of days.”

One the one hand you feel sorry for her, but on the other hand you know that you are only the reason she wore a diaper once. While the other times was have been triggered by her and Mr. Benedict’s “activities”. But this is something you will not tell the mean substitute teacher.
Your plan to distract him has still worked and he end the lesson without spanking you more…at least that is what you think.
“Princess, Janet, I thank you for your attention, now you only need to receive your regular spanking and you may go.”

“Regular spanking Sir? But why?” You blur out.

“You wear onesie with locks, so you are naughty little girls. And naughty little girls get maintenance spankings by the end of my lessons. You now receive one extra-slap for talking without permission.” He grins and grab his paddle. You do not know how long he will spank you and this time he is not counting either. He just keep slapping your behind with the paddle until you cry and sob. “EDEN!” You call out in pain. “Protect me!”.

The knightess, that have been standing by the door like a statue walks up to Mr Grairven and stops his hand. “Sir, you are crossing a line. Control yourself or I will make you pay.”
All color vanish from his face, but he is a Grairven and does not miss a chance to be cruel. “Just two more, then it is over.” He says in a thin voice.

To your dismay, Eden let him go. She looks at you and apologizes. “I am very sorry princess, as long as it is a normal punishment I cannot stop him, it is part of his job.”

You nod and bite down on your bottom lip, while he slaps you two last times.
When you get up from the table you waddle to Eden and hug her. The warrior looks a bit surprised, but lay her hands on your shoulders and let you cry at her armored chest.

Janet is not spared either, but he is less harsh with her and counts down from ten while he spanks her. It is still hard for you to see your brave friend starts to cry. When she is done, she comes to you and take your hand. “What a bastard.” She whispers and pushes the door open.

“Excuse me, but you forgot your notes.” He calls from his desk with a sickly sweat voice. You and Janet walk to him to take your notes. On your way out you open yours and gasp in shock. “20 demerits? After he already spanked me?” Janet has 12 points and does not feel better. To avoid further trouble the tree of you walk to the nursery and hand the notes over to Melissa.
“The substitute teacher is the cousin of Lord Richard. He is cruel and spanked us AND he gave us demerits. This is unfair!”

Melissa checks your red and pink behinds for serious damage, before she decide about the notes… .
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: A substitute teacher is there, and wields a sch...

choices: No, it isn't. Go to the siblings.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Janet …” Melissa says, looking at your friend “… why did you let him paddle you?”
She blushes, replying “I’m under the system now, am I not?”
The tall nanny shakes her head, saying “No, Janet, you are still a guest. You will receive a Calonian punishment only if you accept it. You accepted the naughty treatment for what happened in the forbidden room, that’s why you are dressed like this and you are currently disciplined by me. If you were simply treated like a Calonian child from now on, you wouldn’t be allowed to return in your room if you want, and your VIP-Card would have been confiscated.”
Janet lowers her head, saying “So next time I can say to him that he cannot paddle me.”
“Yes, you can.” Melissa confirms, then look at Eden, saying to her “Miss Langdon, if tomorrow he tries to paddle Janet against her will, can you stop him?”
The knightess look at her, replying “Only if the princess says so, miss.”
You look at her too, adding “Yes, Eden, please.”
Eden simply nods, confirming your order.
“He paddled me too.” you then say, turning your head to nanny Melissa once more “Can he really do that?”
To your dismay, Melissa nods, replying “Yes, princess. A teacher can discipline pupils as he see fit. That means that he is free to give you both paddling and demerits.”
You lower your head to, adding in an angry tone “But he’s a Grairven! The cousin of Richard! Why the queen has let him be the supply teacher? It’s unfair!”
“Unfair …” nanny Melissa says, with a sigh “… you say that a lot, princess. Think about it: does it seem fair to you that a qualified teacher is denied a job only for his surname? He was strict, maybe too much strict because he probably had hold a grudge for the interview, but he taught you correctly, hasn’t he? Now, princess, please tell me: do you want to become a wise ruler, or a tyrant that eliminate anyone she doesn’t like?”
You blush, looking at her. With anger, you realize she is right.
“So, my demerits …” you whisper, almost beginning to cry.
Melissa smiles, then takes both notes and, with a decided movement, she rips in two both of them, before throwing them into the trash can.
“As I said, he is free to give you demerits, but I don’t feel obliged to listen to a Grairven.” she says, giving you a wink.
She then takes a blank piece of paper and write something on it. When she is finished, she says “You will give Mr. Grairven this paper, tomorrow. It’s a paper with my signature that specify the maximum number of paddling he can gives you. As your nanny (even if temporary), I’m fully in charge of your discipline. If he crosses the line, your escort will be allowed to stop him.”
She puts the paper down, and you immediately hug her, saying “Thank you, nanny Melissa.”
The nanny hugs you back, saying “As far as I know, Merry and Willy are in the garden. You can have fun with them for the rest of your afternoon, before returning here for your dinner.”
“I can have a regular dinner?” Janet asks.
Melissa nods, replying “It’s your choice, Janet. You can have a regular dinner than return in your room, have a regular dinner then come here to sleep with your friends, come here to have a dinner like them then return to your room, or come here to have a dinner like them and sleep with them too. The choice is yours. As I said, however, I will only remove your lock tomorrow, and your little friend, the fluffy sheep, will stay in the nursery.”
“So I can hug Miss Snowflake only in the nursery?” Janet asks, making you giggle.
“Miss Snowflake?” you say, incapable to stop giggling “It’s that her name?”
“Do you have a problem with that?” she replies, looking at you with a fake resentful tone “It’s more original than Mister Rabbit.”
You blush, saying “Hey! Don’t offend him! He’s very sensitive!”
Melissa giggles herself, then says “You’d better go, now.”
You both greet the nanny and leave then nursery, trying to reach the garden.
“Eden, can I ask you something?” you ask to your escort during the path.
The knightess nods, replying “Of course, my lady.”
“Will you follow me everywhere, without taking breaks? It’s not a too heavy task?” you ask her.
“Please, do not insult me, my lady.” she replies “It’s my duty to follow and protect you. I do not consider it a heavy task at all. It’s however true that I need breaks too. I need to drink, eat and go to the bathroom. I’m a human and not a robot, after all. I’ll leave you in the care of your nanny at dinnertime and I will return at your side after your breakfast, when you are ready to leave the nursery. The same I will do for lunch: I will leave you in the nursery for lunchtime and return after your nap.”
You breathe a sigh of relief, now knowing that she will not watch you during your diaper changes. It would have been quite shameful.
You reach the garden, trying not to think to your wet diaper. You could have asked to nanny Melissa for a change, but you knew it would have been pointless, so you decided to don’t ask at all.
In the garden, you instantly sees two different couples of people. One couple is Merry and Willy, that are playing rock-paper-scissor or something similar. On the other side of the garden, instead, you see a quite old woman, that you immediately identify as Amelia the Housekeep, even if you haven’t seen her before, that is talking to Alice, the young maid in training pants. The sensation is that the Housekeeper is scolding the maid for something.
You should really go to the siblings, and you will, but before that wouldn’t be interesting to eavesdrop at the conversation between the two women, even if aware that the Housekeep has the authorization to punish you? But it’s the juice really worth the squeeze?
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: She ignore the notes

choices: Bath and Change all of you together
Bath and Change one after the other
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You feel that you MUST know what the Housekeep is saying and stroll in their direction, pretending to look at the flowers at the edges of the garden, while you send Janet to the siblings. You walk slow and stop at some flowers to be able to hear as much as possible. When you are in reach, you hear Alice whimper: “I am very sorry Ma’am, but I got distracted by something. Still, I had planned to finish the bedroom in a few minutes.”

“Distracted? What can distract you while you make the Queens bed? Nobody called you, it is not jet time for dinner! What has distracted you?” Amelia asks, with her fists pressed against her hip.

Alice blushes and is looking very uncomfortable. “I… I am very sorry Ma’am.”

“We had that, but what was distracting you… oh no,… let me guess, it is still distracting you, isn’t it? That is the reason why you press your knees together and step on your toes all the time. You look like my grand-daughter when she need to pee. Jesus, then go to the bathroom if you need to pee, but finish your job!” Amelia scolds Alice.

“I… no, I do not need to pee. I need to go to the supply room.” Alice admits, blushing even more.

The housekeep sighs and lift the young maid’s skirt, revealing some soaked training pants.
“Alice, again? How often did you changed yourself during the day? Three times? Have you ever made it to the bathroom in time? Did you left the queens bed unfinished, because you were almost leaking?”

Susan feels sorry for the young maid, but cannot hold back a smile. Slowly she takes a few steps to look at the next flowers, while the maid nods her head.
“I made it trice, but yes, this is the third little accident I have. I planned to get changed quickly, but then there was another maid in the supply room and I was too embarrassed to grab fresh trainers. I am so sorry Ma’am.” A fresh tear run down her face and she quickly wipe it away.

“Hush little one, it is okay. It is hard for some young adults to adapt to the new situation. Still, you cannot provide bad results and risk to ruin the palace carpets. You will wear REAL protection until further notice and let yourself get changed by… “. The old woman looks around the garden and sees Willy and Merry. “Yes, why not. To make sure you are properly protected you will have Nanny Melissa change you, when needed.”

“WHAT!?, BUT?! I am an adult.” Alice shrieks out, but stops when her boss poke her soaked padding against her crotch.
“Not jet Alice. Follow my order or you have to quiet.”

That was enough for Susan and she is too far away to hear more, but she sees when Alice walks away a few seconds later. When she reach Janet, William and Meredith, she tell them everything and all of them giggle.
“Do you think I can watch her getting changed?” Willy grins and is about to waddle off, but his sister hold him back. “Do not dare Willy if she tells Amelia that you spied on her all the maids will supervise you and report every mischief to Melissa.”

You look at Eden. To your luck, she did not follow you like a dog, but took a position in the middle of the garden, overlooking everything and always ready to reach you within seconds. She is a perfect bodyguard and you are happy that she did not judge you for the little games you play – at least she is not saying anything about it.

You and your three friends play catch me and hide and seek, but you play the second game only for two rounds, since Eden is always watching in your direction and expose your hideouts.
Finally it is time for dinner and Janet split off the group. She promise to come back later, but likes REAL food better than mush and formula.
Back in the nursery Eden officially hand you over to Melissa and wish you a good night.
One by one, Melissa feed you in the high chair, before she allows you to hold your own bottles. At that moment Janet is coming back and giggle at the picture of her three friends nursing from baby bottles.
You think that Melissa will put you all to sleep now, but then she checks all your diapers and shakes her head. “Three wet ones and two messy as well, PLUS you all stink of sweat and dirt. I think you all need to be bathed before you can go to bed.”
Janet is giggling, as long as Melissa checks her as well: “Four wet ones and four stinking kids. You all need to bath!”

When she mention the coming diaper change you wonder if Alice has been lying on the same changing table a few hours before – and if she will come around to get changed later.

Melissa still think about the challenge to change and wash four babies. She decides to…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Yes, it is. Eavesdrop.

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“It may be a problem.” Melissa says “If I bath you one by one, we will all go to sleep tomorrow.”
“You can let me go to Rose’s nursery, so I will not be a problem anymore.” you try to say.
Melissa looks at you, replying “Princess, I didn’t know you liked getting soap in your mouth. It’s this the reason you always says inappropriate things? It’s because you like it?”
Understanding the veiled threat, you decide to shut up.
“Nanny Melissa, you aren’t …” Willy begins to say, but the nanny interrupts him.
“I’m afraid it’s the only solution.” she explains “All four of you will enter in the bathtub together, so I can wash all of you contemporary and diaper you more quickly.”
You, Janet and William all blush. They have already seen you naked, but only for few seconds (a spanking and a change), not for the duration of an entire bathe. Merry, as always, seems not having problem with it. She has the modesty of a real kid.
“I’m not sure of it.” Janet says, but Melissa shakes her head.
“You chose to come here after the dinner, so you have no words in the matter, little one. You are under my care for tonight.” the nanny says.
She starts taking you at the changing table: she undress you and removes you dirty diaper, cleaning you up and putting you down while you are still completely naked. She repeats the procedure in the same manner first with Meredith, then with Janet and last with William.
“Come, babies. You all need a nice bath.” Melissa says, smiling and leading you all in the bathroom.
You wait as she fills the tub with warm water, and try not to look at your friends.
“It’s ready.” nanny Melissa says “You can enter, now.”
Without waiting a second, Janet takes a rush and enters in the enormous bathtub (like the one in your nursery, seems more like a small pool) with a dive.
“It’s so nice!” she exclaims.
As she has done that, however, the nanny takes her by her shoulder and gives to her wet bottom three hard spanks.
“No diving in the bathtub.” she scolds “It’s big, but it’s not a pool.”
You don’t like seeing Janet getting spanked, but decide not to say a word and enter in the water yourself, walking slow. Merry immediately follows you, and the so does Willy.
When all of you are in the bathtub, Melissa takes a chest and overturns its contents in the water: they are all rubber bath toys, like rubber ducks and other animals.
“You can play with them, while I wash you up.” she says, taking a sponge and beginning to rub William’s back.
You and Janet both blush, as Willy and Merry takes the rubber animals in their hand.
William is trying to concentrate himself over a dramatic battle between a rubber crocodile and a rubber shark. He’s clearly trying to concentrate on it to remove his focus from Janet naked body, and despite that you see that a few times he looks at her sideways.
Merry is instead staging a funny conversation between a rubber tortoise and a rubber dolphin. She seems at ease, and lets Melissa wash her everywhere without a fuss. You think that she is very cute, but you immediately remove that thought.
After a while, nanny Melissa exclaims “All done. My babies are all clean and fresh now.”
She let you all getting outside of the water, and then proceeds to dry you off all with a towel.
Once you are all dry, she lead you all back in the nursery main room and puts you on the changing table.
She then proceeds to gives you your maintenance spanking, followed by the actual diapering. Once she has finished, she does the same with all of your friends, including Janet.
“If I had chose to return in my room, I would have avoided the maintenance spanking?” Janet asks, after the slaps and while the nanny is diapering her.
“No, little one.” Melissa explains “You would have received your maintenance spanking tomorrow morning. Since this was the last punishment day, and you all behaved very well today, tomorrow you all will wear normal clothes without locks and you’ll not receive maintenance spankings. You would have, if you hadn’t receive yours tonight.”
As the she had finished diaper Janet, she dresses you in cute rompers. They are all 4 completely identical: yellow and with a sentence printed on the chest.
In seeing the sentences, you understand they are new, because all of them has the personalized sentence “My name is () and I’ve been naughty”.
They have all of your names, so yours is “My name is Susan and I’ve been naughty.” while your friends have the respective names.
Only in a second moment you see that all of you have a printed sentence on the butt too: “Well spanked one.”
As she finishes to put your romper on, she whispers to you “Tomorrow you’ll be still under my care. When you’ll go to bed tomorrow night, the following morning Rose will take you back to her nursery.”
Melissa puts all of you in the crib, whispering “Good night, my little angels.” and giving all your stuffed friends to all of you: Mister Rabbit the stuffed rabbit to you, Teddy the stuffed bear to Willy, Betty the doll to Merry and Miss Snowflake the stuffed sheep to Janet.
