You friends fall asleep, as Melissa turns the light off and leaves. You are about to fall asleep yourself, when you hear Melissa’s voice.
“Alice? Are you here again?” she says
“Umh … nanny Melissa … I need …”
“I know what you need, little one.” Melissa replies “A diaper change and a motivational help. I only ask you to be quiet, because the children are sleeping.”
The door slowly opens, and the light turns on again. You pretend to sleep, and just be content to listen. You have to focus, because they are almost whispering.
“Your diaper isn’t wet, Alice, it’s soaked.” the nanny says “Are you sure you are 19? Not even the princess pees so much.”
You blush, and continue to listen as the maid replies “I am, I am! Please, nanny, quick.”
“Hush, Alice. Be quiet.” Melissa scolds. You know she is changing her.
After few moments, you hear five swats, and you instantly know what happened.
“Ouch! What was that for?” Alice exclaims.
“Keep your voice low or I’ll begin again.” Melissa scolds her “This was motivational help. If you have problem behaving like an adult, maybe if next time I punish you like a kid you’ll do better, right?”
“No, no! I will behave, I promise!” Alice says.
“I really hope so.” Melissa says, finishing to diaper her “You are not a kid anymore, so don’t aspect any leniency from me.”
After that, you really fall asleep.
In the morning, Melissa wakes you up.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Bath and Change all of you together

choices: Willy tease Alice and touch her diaper.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
In the morning you are surprised to see not only Nanny Melissa, but Maid Alice as well. She stands beside the taller woman and blushes, while she looks at her feet.
“Good morning princess, I hope you and your friends does not mind. We have an assistant today. Maid Alice is… transferred away from the house-maids for a while.”
Melissa does not go into further details. She does not tell to you kids, that Alice waited so long to get changed the evening before that she had leaked in the royal chamber and left a spot in the queen’s carpet – like the Housekeep Amelia had feared and warned her about.
You are still too tired to worry about all this or to complain. You are busy to wiggle out from Merry, which had again snuggled up to your side and drools on your arm.

Now Alice helps you out of the crib and carries you to the changing table, with some effort.
“Are you sure you can handle her?” Melissa asks the maid that struggles a bit with you.
You have to say, as embarrassing as it is, that Melissa and Rose can carry you like a little baby, it feels better being carried by a girl that has issue to keep the balance, while she tries to lift you on the changing table.
“I am… fine.” Alice gasps and let you fall on the padded changing table.
“Ouch.” You rub your behind and denies it, as Melissa push Alice away and double checks that you are fine. “I guess you are not strong enough for that. Why don’t you prepare the breakfast for them. I left you some instructions beside the fridge.”
Alice looks sad, but obeys and leaves the room. You feel sorry for her when Melissa provides you the last morning maintenance spanking and put you in a fresh diaper. The sound of the spanking wakes your friends up and Janet pushes Willy off her. Like his sister he had snuggled up to the person beside him. You are sure he likes Janet and that it was not a coincident that his had was lying on her chest, when they were still sleeping.
Your friends are treated like you, except Janet. She does not receive a spanking and is asked if she likes to stay in diapers or go back to trainers.
“Oh, I think I go back to trainers. As much as I hate it, I will have to leave in a few weeks and don’t want to forget how to use the toilet.” She is praised by Melissa for her mature decision and just jump off the changing table, when Maid Alice comes back, carrying a tray with four bottles and four bowls of mush. To see Janet in trainers irritates her so much, that she stumbles and almost let the tray fall down. In the last second she manage to balance it out and put it down on the tray of a high chair. She sighs deeply, but then blushes and grab her padded crotch.
Nanny Melissa is just putting a training bra on Janet and give her a sexy dark blue dress that shows off her long legs, but she still notice the young maids behavior.
“I saw that Alice. It is so easy for you to lose control?” Melissa says, while she close the zipper on Janet’s dress.
Alice blushes and presses her knees together. “What? No, I am fine.” She lies. “Uhm, why is the girl in trainers and not in diapers, is that allowed?”

Melissa sighs and walks to the young maid, that steps back and almost push the tray with the bottles off the high chair. “STOP where you are.” Melissa warns her and grab her padded crotch. “Just as I thought. Do you have been checked for a medical issue or is it only the lack of willingness?”

Alice blushes and pulls the nannies hand away. “I… I just needs a bit more training and… I am easy to distract. Please do not fire me. Mrs Amelia says this is my last chance – and I really don’t want to go back to mommy… I mean, my mother’s house. She always had me in locked plastic pants and forbid me to potty train before I turned 18. Please Nanny Melissa, please keep me!” She is already crying and plays with the hem of her skirt again, showing off her wet diaper.

Melissa might be strict, but she is fair and feels sorry for Alice. Usually parents encourage their kids to gain control over their bowel and bladder in little steps, starting when they turn 16 or 17. To expect that a young adult stays dry and clean, when he or she was forced to use the diaper until the day before is simple unrealistic and not fair. “Do not worry. I get you back into panties in no time. Or in panties for the first time, whatever is true, but do not lie to me or I punish you like a naughty little girl, understood?”

Alice nods and wipe away her tears.
Melissa turns to you kids and announce.
“Okay everybody, this is important. Nobody is losing a word about this. Alice is a good girl and will be a good maid, when she gets the chance. If we all help her, she will do fine and we have a new friend. Does that sounds good?”

William, Meredith, Janet and you agree to support the young maid, and not only because you all feel a bit guilty that you have tricked her.

Now it is time for breakfast and…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Maid Alice is there, too.

choices: to go the see the tournament.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Looking at the tray, Melissa notices something: it has four bottles and four bowls of mush.
“Alice!” she exclaims “Hadn’t I wrote three bottles and three bowls?”
“Umh ... yes.” she replies “But I thought that you meant four, since there are four kids.”
“Alice, if I wrote three, I meant three.” Melissa explains “Janet can have a regular adult breakfast.”
“But she is a child!” Alice exclaims “It’s unfair! Why is she in training pants, and dressed like this?”
You resist the urge to giggle, when Melissa sternly says “Another word and I’ll take the soap, Alice.”
The maid goes pale, and replies, stammering “Sorry, sorry. Please, don’t do that.”
“Good. Now, to answer your questions, Janet is not a Calonian, she’s a guest with a VIP-Card. That’s why she is treated quite different from the other kids. God, Alice, I think you are the only maid in the entire Palace that didn’t know about her.”
The maid blushes, and taking a bow says “I’m sorry, Janet. I didn’t know.”
“It’s okay, Alice. It’s not a problem.” Janet replies “And I think it’s a ... pity ... to waste food. So I think I’ll have breakfast here.”
You try not to laugh as you noticed that your friend went redder and redder with any word she said.
As she finishes to talk, Meredith jumps at her and hugs her from behind, saying “You’re so mature, big sis!”
In doing so, however, her big glasses fall from her face to the ground, and for the first time you see clearly her eyes (she removed them sometime, but you had never the occasion to look at her closely): they are dark blue, the deepest blue you have ever seen, like two sapphires.
Immediately, Merry puts a hand over her eyes, saying “I’m sorry. Please, don’t look at me.”
“Merry, still with this problem?” Melissa says with a kind voice, looking at her “You have beautiful eyes, stop covering them.”
“They are not!” she exclaims, beginning even to sob “They are too dark! Susan and Janet will see them! I don’t want that!”
You put a hand on her shoulder, saying “Merry, you don’t need to be ashamed for that. They are part of you, like it or not. I can assure you they are good looking, they aren’t too dark.”
Janet touches her shoulder too, adding “I really like dark blue. Have you seen my dress?”
She begins to calm down, and Willy decides to intervene too, saying “Sis, please, stop sobbing. We all like you.”
As he says that, you think that William is a very strange boy: mischievous and arrogant, but also kind and caring. It’s a strange combination that you haven’t seen in any other boy before.
Finally, Merry calms down, and you pick up her glasses, holding her out to her.
“Here. Your glasses.” you say.
Meredith removes her hand, and look in your eyes with hers.
“Thank you.” she says, taking her glasses and putting them back on.
Once the situation is solved, Melissa puts all of you in four different high-chair. One after another, she proceeds to feed you all. Once she has spoon fed you, she gives you all your bottles, letting you suck at it.
You can’t hold back a giggle in seeing Janet be spoon fed and then seeing her sucking at a baby bottle. You have already seen it once, but this time it’s not a punishment, so it feels way more cute.
“Now, it’s dressing time.” Nanny Melissa says, taking you out of your high-chairs once you have finished.
“Alice, there are three dresses in the wardrobe. Can you please take them?” she says, pointing at a great wardrobe with her finger.
Alice nods, and does as has been told to her, while Melissa removes the rompers she had put you three back in four your breakfast.
You gulp when you see Alice coming back with a little stack of clothes with three lock on top of it.
“Nanny Melissa!” you exclaim “I thought you said we wouldn’t have putted us in lock today! Were you lying?”
Without a notice, Melissa takes your shoulder and makes you turn your back to her, before giving you two smack on the top part of the legs.
You let go a exclamation of pain (they weren’t much strong, in reality), as she scolds you “Never accuse a nanny to lie, princess! That’s very rude!”
While you are rubbing your legs, she explains “I told that you wouldn’t have lock because the punishment for the bravado in the forbidden room it’s now finished. But you received a note from the queen herself, princess, and Willy is in his last day of punishment for bullying his sister in class.”
“And the third lock?” Merry says, gulping “I’ve been good, I promise.”
“That was just precaution.” she says “It was ready if needed. But it is not. You’ll be not be put in punishment clothes today, Merry.”
Melissa then proceeds to remove once again your rompers and dress you up. Willy is put in the black romper he wore during the first phase of his punishment (maybe to symbolic close a cycle), the one with the word “Troublemaker”. You are instead put in a black onesie with the Play Station logo, the PSN trophy symbol and under it the printed sentence “Trophy unlocked: Getting a spanking from nanny”. It’s quite original, you have to admit it. Janet burst in laugh in seeing that. You are then both put in locks. Meredith, on the other hand, get dressed in a white onesie without lock and with the printed sentence in black letters: “The fairest of them all”.
Once finished, Melissa says “Ok. You are all free to go, now.”
Hearing that, you realise something and says “Wait a minute! I landed here on Monday morning, and I spent here 5 complete days plus the landing day. So today is Sunday!”
“Yes, princess. None of you have lessons, today.” the nanny confirms.
“But you said to give the supply teacher the note today.” you reply.
For the first time, you see Melissa blush, as she replies “I lost time cognition and I made a mistake. No one is perfect.”
Merry then hugs you, saying “I’m happy! We will spend the entire day together!” she blushes and calms down, then adding “If ... if you want me, of course.”
“Of course we want you, Merry.” Janet says “Willy is free to join, too.”
William nods, and Meredith smiles.
You walk toward the door, smiling, but the nanny stops you.
“You’ll await the arrival of miss Langdon, princess. She’ll be here any moment now.”
You nod, and while waiting for Eden, you ask Melissa “It’s anything interesting we can do?”
“You can go to the tournament between the Royal Knights. They’ll open the training area in the morning. Or you can play like usual. Be aware that if you want to go to the tournament, you must be on your best behaviour and stay in the spectator area.”
You nod, and you leave the nursery as Eden comes to pick you up.
Once outside, Merry and Willy tell to you that Miss Spencer has been taken to the hospital after their lesson, so they haven’t met Marcus Grairven yet.
You try to reassure Merry, who is scared of him, saying that it will be only for tomorrow.
With Eden behind you and your three friends, you decide:
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Janet agrees to be fed

choices: Make it to the door in the garden.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look up at Eden and wonder if she would like to see the tournament. It would wonder you if not and it would be interesting for you as well. For sure there are plenty of people, maybe even some new friends to meet.
“Hey guys, let us go to the training area and watch the tournament.” You suggest.
William, Meredith and Janet agrees with you – and even Eden smiles.

In the training area three rows of benches have been places around the square in the middle. It is not like a boxing ring. Only white lines separate the fighting area from the spectators.
“Uhm is this save?” You ask Eden, when you notice that there is only one meter between you and the line. The fighters would be right in front of you, swinging weapons and beating each other.

“Normally it is perfectly save. No viewer ever has been wounded seriously, but if you want to be sure we can go to the second row and block the first, so you still can see something.” Eden suggested. At first you liked the idea, but very quickly the room fills and you notice that you will force visitors to leave if you insist on blocking a full bench, just for your comfort.
“I think I am fine.” You say and hold Janet’s and Merry’s hands. They sit at your sites, while Willy sit next to Janet and holds her hand as well. Eden stands behind you and hushes people away that come to close for her liking. Everybody respects her and follows her orders.
Very soon the first match starts. It is grappling without weapons, what surprises you, but Eden explains, that a knight needs to be able to fight with or without weapons.
The first fight is over when the man in blue shorts had the one with the red ones in a dead-lock and that knights gives up. They do not hit each other in the face and do not make each other bleed, what you like very much. Still is interesting to see, especially since they do not separate light from heavy knights and not even male from female. You cheer when a very agile knightess in shorts and sports bra win against a much taller and heavier knight.
“WOW! She is good!” You call out and ask Eden if she knows the knightess. “Yes, we often train together.” She says.
“Do you win against her?” You dig further, since the tournament has a little break and the setup is changed. “More often than I lose.” Eden says and you nod in respect. She must be very good.

The next part is more of what you have expected. The knights are heavy armored and wear swords and shields. On the Shields, on the top of the helmet and on the breast-plate they have stuff like modeling clay. In the matches, they try to hit those with their swords. The knight that damages all three areas, wins.
Those matches look like from a historical movie. Swords bang against each other and the knights even kick and slap each other. It is only due to the armors, that they get not wounded.
“This is only for the best. An amateur would accidently hit an unprotected area and could even kill his opponent.” Eden explains.
She is more and more absorbent by the matches and pays less attention to you and your friends.
“Hey, this is great, but I want to test something.” You whisper to Janet.
“Okay, wat is the plan?” She asks, grinning.
“You go to the bathroom and I follow you after a minute.” You grin.
“And Eden?” Janet is not sure if she likes the idea. It is her first day in normal clothes.
“We can come back and bring her ice cream. They sell it by the entrance and you will get it for free, with your VIP-Card. I only want to quickly check what is behind the door at the end of the garden. I never checked that door. Have you?” Janet shakes her head and finally nods her head. “Okay we do it.”
She turns to Eden and snaps her fingers to get her attention. “Miss Langdon, I quickly go to the bathroom and get us some ice-cream, okay?” Eden nods and Janet disappears in the mass of people.

After a minute you turn to Eden as well.
“Sorry Eden, can I help Janet. She will have issues to carry all the ice. It is just over there, you can even see it from here.” You point at the ice-cream stand that is… partial visible behind all the people.
“You can enjoy the fights of your colleagues, I am back in a minute.”
The moment is perfect. The knightess from before just enters the area and greets her opponent.
“But you need to be back immediately.” She says.
You wink at Merry and Willy and follow Janet.

“I thought she would follow us.” You say to Janet, who stands beside the ice cream stand.
“Well, she is still watching you. You need to run from here and hope that we make it to that door before she finds us. Are you sure it is a good idea?”
You shrug. “What can happen? We are in the palace. Lord Richard is not in the town, according to Alice and I have made no further enemies so far. There is no sign at the door that it is forbidden to enter. I think we do no harm. And when we are back we still buy her ice cream.”
Janet agrees, after thinking about is. Then she counts down from three and the two of you run up the stairs and into the long hallway.

The two of you…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: to go the see the tournament.

choices: You look at the final part of the tournament
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The two of you run with all of your speed, reach the garden and then through the garden, making it at the door. You look behind you, too make sure no one is looking at you. Saw that, you open the door and go through it, followed by Janet.
You and Janet find yourself in a new area. You look head, and you see a big grass field, that seems a football field or something like that. It’s like the garden an open area, delimitated by high walls. Next to the field, you see a small building. It’s very small, and the palace it’s so big that you are not so surprised that it contains even a smallest building inside it.
“Oh, a sport facility!” exclaims Janet “It’s interesting. The small building must be the locker room.”
“So there is an outside facility for more common sports, not only the training room.” you say, reflecting aloud.
“Do you want to see it more closely?” Janet asks, getting a little nervous “Because I think we should go back to your escort. She will be mad, I’m sure of it.”
“She said she doesn’t care if I’m naughty, as far I don’t endanger myself.” you reply “And I’m not doing anything dangerous.”
Janet seems convinced: she nods and begins to walk toward the small building.
You walk alongside her, looking at the sport facility: it’s huge, and you wonder who really use it.
Together, you and your bestie reach the door or the locker room. You open it and enter.
Inside, you see that’s it’s not a locker room, but a small sports hall, with locker rooms and a basketball court.
“So they play football and basket in this country, apart that medieval games.” you comment, thinking about the knights tournament.
You are looking around, in curiosity. You smile seeing Janet looking at the male locker room’s door.
“Janet!” you call her, after a while “I think it’s enough. We should go back to the training area. Eden sure is looking for me.”
Janet nods, and you exit the building together. You walk through the football field and finally reach the door you wanted to see behind, returning in the garden.
You are still giggling with Janet, when you see a woman in shining armour coming in your direction. Is obviously Eden, and she seems upset.
Trying to seem carefree as usual, you greet her saying “Hi, Eden. Were you looking for me?”
When she has reached you, she simply says “My lady, do you care to explain to me why you stealthily moved away from my field of vision?”
“Umh … to have some fun?” you reply “But it’s nothing, really. You could have waited for me in the training area.”
Her eyes seem to flame for a moment, then she grabs you by both your shoulder and begins to shake you (without using much strength), scolding you.
“It’s nothing? NOTHING? Princess! Do you realize that you slipped away from me without telling me anything?!” she says, in a very strict and strong voice, but without yelling.
“Eden, I’m sorry that you’re mad at me, but I haven’t done anything dangerous, really.” you say, trying to calm her down.
“You were wondering around the Palace without an escort!” she says, finishing to shake you “In my opinion, that is very dangerous!”
“Please, Eden, don’t make a scene. Nothing happened.” you say.
“But it could have happened!” she sternly replies “If you wanted to wander around, why haven’t you simply told me so? Haven’t I said that I don’t care if you do something naughty, since your education is not my concern? You did not trust me on the matter?”
“No, it’s not that I don’t trust you, really. It’s only that I … acted without thinking.” you confess. Your naughty part had simply overwhelmed you. During the entire scene, Janet is silently watching at her own feet.
“So you have put yourself in danger because you didn’t think about it? That’s it!” Eden exclaims, and takes you in her arm.
She lifts you with her left arm, holding you perpendicular to the ground grabbing you by your side, under her arm, that is pressed over your belly. She’s literally carrying you like a surfboard. You thought that Rose and Melissa could carry you even too easily for your age, but in Eden arm you feel light like a real toddler.
You are so surprised that you aren’t able to say anything and to even think where she is taking you. She then stops, puts you down and, still holding you by an arm, she sits down in a bench in the middle of the garden.
“I’m sorry, my lady, but now I will take you over my knees.” she says.
You blush, and begin to yell at her “It’s not fair! No! I didn’t do anything dangerous! Please, not in the middle of the garden! The maids are watching!”
She simply ignores your protests and drag you over her knees. She then uses a key to unlock you lock (you’ve seen Melissa giving something to her this morning, you now know what it was), removes your onesie and takes down the back part of your diaper.
“No! Not bare!” you cry, in vain.
“My lady …” she says “… I’m sorry, but I said you that there was only one thing that would have made me spank you, and you did it. And I also said that I always punish little girls on the spot.”
“Umh … miss Langdon I think …” Janet tries to intervene, but the knightess interrupts her immediately.
“I suggest you to be quiet, miss Janet, or you will be next.”
Janet blushes and quieted herself. You feel a little betrayed, but you instantly forgive her when you receive the first slap, that is followed right by another.
You cry out in pain: she is using only her hand, but every slap sting more than Rose’s carpet beater, and you are quite sure she is not using all of her strength.
The spanking itself it’s quite painful, but nothing is worse than the passing maids’ comments: “What a naughty princess.” “I hope she will learn this time.” “Wow, the lady knight really knows how to spank.” “It’s turning red quite fast, isn’t it?” “I bet that the princess friend is next.”
You sob, and continue to say “I’m sorry, Eden. Really, really sorry!”
After some other slaps, she stops. She puts the back part of your (now wet) diaper back on you, the puts you back in the onesie and puts back the lock too.
As you are free to stand up, you immediately hug her, saying again “I’m sorry, Eden! I’m sorry!”
She seems surprised, and takes a while for her to hug you back and whisper “Hush, princess. It’s over, now. I promise that I will not report this to your nanny, ok?”
When you have finally calm down yourself, you ask “Can we go back to the tournament?”
“Of course.” Eden replies “The final part should not be started yet.”
You take Janet hand, and you go back to the training area followed by Eden.
Once there, you sit down next to Meredith and you hug her tightly.
She seems surprised at first, but then ugh you back without questions.
Then …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Make it to the door in the garden

choices: Melissa and Alice wakes them all up.
Alice change some, but let them sleep.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
To sleep together with all your friends was nice, but you needed longer to fall asleep. On top of it you woke up earlier in the morning than you are used to. The little race was exhausting in your diaper and the spanking drained the rest of your energy.
Merry is so warm and smell good. It is a mixture of her usual scent, baby powder and baby oil.
“Mind if I close my eyes for a second?” You ask her, already half asleep.
Meredith is shaking her head slightly and speaks to Eden. You do not listen to her words, but suddenly find something soft and rubbery in your mouth. You does not think about it, but suckle on it and fall asleep.

“Huray!!!” The spectators cheer and you wake up again. You have missed the rest of the tournament and just open your eyes to see the winners get the prices.
“Hmm sowwy.” You try to apologies, but notice that you have a pacifier in your mouth, still.
Merry lakes her hand off your head and you blush when you realize that your head has been resting on her legs.
“No need to be sorry. You look very beautiful when you are sleeping.” Merry says and blushes. “I mean, not only than... but… .” She turn her head away when she notice that she is making it worse and worse.
You get up from her lap and make a face when you notice that your diaper is even wetter than before. You must have wetted yourself in your sleep. Two strong hands lift reach under your armpits and lift you up into a sitting position.
“Hnooo!” You complain and finally decide to take the pacifier out of your mouth. Ashamed you see that it has been attached to your onesie with a string.
“Eden, stop, I can walk myself.” You stop Eden from lifting you up.
Janet and William still hold hands when they get up from the bench. You feel a little betrayed, but smile, when Merry slide her hand into yours and pulls you up from the bench.
“It is too late for ice cream?” You ask Eden and she nods hear head.
“I am sorry princess, but Nanny Melissa will scold me if I allow that. You will have lunch when you are back in the nursery.”

You yawn and sigh. Lunch means that you will have to take a nap – and you just got up from one. “Damn it!” you curse and walk down the hallway, still holding Merrie’s hand.

In the nursery Eden give you a little slap on your behind, but says nothing to Melissa or Alice, which wait for you. “I see you later princess.” She winks and leaves, back down the corridor to celebrate with her colleges.

“Welcome back my little ones, you had a good time?” Melissa greets you and helps you into your high chairs. Alice has prepared the food again and again prepared everything for four babies. Janet sighs, but accept to be feed again. You cannot get rid of the feeling that Alice is jealous at her for being in trainers and that is was not a coincident that she “forgot” to make three portions only.

That is not the only thing you notice.
As soon as you have drunk your special formula and the extra bottle of milk, you start to feel very tired. “Alice, have you used more of the sleeping aid?” You ask the maid, when she lift you into the crib.
“Only a table spoon, like the receipt says.” She promise.
“TABLE SPOON? Oh Alice, the babies will sleep for the rest of the day. TS is tea spoon.” Melissa scolds the maid and quickly place Willy and Merry in the crib before they fall asleep in the high chairs.
Janet is on her way to the door, when she yaws and rub her eyes.
“Janet, I think you better stay in here, so we can make sure you do fine.” Melissa stops her.

Janet yaws again and sighs. “But I am allowed again… and what about Miss Snowflake?”
Melissa lifts her up and carries her to the crib. As careful and quickly as possible she dress Janet in a simple Romper with a sleeping cloud on the chest and lay her down in bed, next to Willy, who is already sleeping, while he suck on his thumb.
Melissa replace his thumb with a pacifier and quickly walk out of the room to get Miss Snowflake for Janet.

Maid Alice stands beside the crib and grins. It took her a while, but the finally notice that she got scold by the Queen because this little brats tricked her. She did not give that much sleeping aid by accident, neither did she add the laxatives by accident.
“Messy dreams.” She whispers and look down at her own diaper. One wetness indicator is a little bit blue, but that is better than the day before. She waits until Melissa is back with the stuffed sheep for Janet and leaves the room.

After a few hours…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You fall asleep hugging Merry

choices: Receives a lot of spanks during the changing procedure
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You slowly open your eyes, feeling a wet and messy sensation in your diaper. You wetted yourself even more, so much that you are in the verge of leaking, and you have heavily messed yourself. You feel disgusted, and the intense smell gives you the sensation of nausea. It takes you a little to realize why the smell of pee and poop it’s so intense: all three of your friends have the diapers in the same condition as yours. Willy and Merry, at least, because Janet pull-up is much worse, because you are quite sure it leaked. They are all still sleeping, and you think that maybe it’s because you took a nap before too that you are already awake.
Just as you are still making your consideration, you hear a powerful slap, followed by a voice “Ouch! I’m sorry, Nanny Melissa!”
You turn you head toward the direction of the sound, and you see Alice laid over Melissa’s lap, with a bare bottom on display, while the tall nanny is spanking her with a wooden spoon.
“You’d better be! You added laxative in the children’s meal! That is only for when they are blocked up, not for normal circumstances! You were so jealous of Janet’s pull-up that you did that? Did you really thought that I wouldn’t have noticed that an ingredient in the storage of MY nursery was disappeared?” she scolds, as she spanks.
The spoon leaves big red marks on Alice bottom, and you think (you rather hope it, to say the truth) that is a punishment not meant for children, but only for cases like this.
“Please, nanny! I’m sorry!” Alice cries out.
But Melissa doesn’t stop and continues to paddle her with the wooden implement.
“You should be grateful that I don’t report what happened to the Queen herself. She would fire you instantly. And be sure that the princess and her friends will know what you did when they wake up. You will submit to every punishment they think you deserve. And after that you’d better hope that the princess doesn’t suggest firing you, in the end.” Melissa continues to scold.
“No, please! You cannot let four children punish me!” Alice yells “Stop, please! You are hurting me! How can you criticize lord Richard for whipping his servant when you do the same?”
Melissa gives her three more slaps, before letting her get up, then replies “You realize that you did a thing possibly dangerous for the throne heir? And that you received a spanking for it - a very severe spanking, it’s true, but a spanking. And I had let you decide if take it or leave the Palace. Do you think that lord Richard lets any choice? He simply whips his servants, with a true leather whip, on the back, at the slightest error they make. So, please, you can leave if you think the punishment it’s too much, but don’t compare us to that sadist.”
Still sobbing, Alice hugs Melissa, then immediately hugs her back and cuddles her a little.
“Sorry, nanny … I … I …” the maid sobs.
“Hush, hush, Alice. The important thing it’s that you learned from your errors.” Melissa says, kindly “You will now wake up the children, will apology to them and ask them for a punishment.”
As the nanny lets her go, you close your eyes, pretending to be still asleep.
Alice waddle toward you and wakes you all up. You pretend to awake only in that moment, but you are still quite sleepy, so pretending it is not difficult. Meredith and William both wakes up, yawning, and they blush noticing the critical condition of their diaper.
“Oh, I wetted myself more than usual.” it’s simply Merry’s comment, while Willy says “I don’t usually mess myself when I sleep. That’s strange.”
When Janet wakes up, she feels much wetter then all of you, and yellow stain was formed between her legs, on her romper.
“What!?” she exclaims “I wetted myself and even … messed myself?”
She begins to cry, saying “What’s happened? I’ve never done this before! I’m so ashamed.”
Melissa puts a hand on her shoulder, saying “Don’t worry, Janet. It’s not your fault. You will not be put in diapers for this, I promise. Now, Alice has something to tell you.”
You all look at the young maid, even if you already now what it is. She blushes, and seeing that she doesn’t say anything, Melissa gives her a slap on the bottom, saying sternly “Alice! Speak up!”
“Ouch! Kids, I’m sorry. I was jealous of Janet’s trainers and I wanted to get a payback for tricking me in the forbidden room, so I deliberately prepared four meals, put too much sleeping aid and added laxative. I’m sorry, and I will accept any punishment that you think it’s fitting.”
The four of you look at each other, while Melissa takes you all out of the crib.
You have an idea and, seeing your friends’ expressions, you immediately know they are thinking the same, so you say “Oh, we will forgive her. But she has to change our diapers herself and wear a punishment onesie for the rest of the day. It's still quite a while at dinner time, so she has a lot of occasions to make anyone in the Palace see it.”
“What? Change you? But …” she doesn’t finish her sentence because a slap on the bottom gave by Melissa stops her, making her say instead “… I mean … of course, princess.”
“Just to be clear …” Willy adds “… I resisted the temptation to make fun of your diaper, to be nice to you. If this is the payment, I will never be gentle with you again.”
“Come on, Willy.” Melissa replies “After the punishment, all is forgiven. That is how it works. It’s rude to hold a grudge.” she then looks at Alice, saying “And you’d better be very delicate and accurate in the changing procedure, or at any mistake you bum will suffer.”
While saying this, she takes up the wooden spoon again, concluding “A mistake, an immediate spank. It’s that clear?”
Alice nods, and …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Only you wakes up

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Janet with her leaking trainers is the first to get changed. She whimpers and sobs, when she walks to the changing table, with her legs as wide as possible.
“Can I take a bath when that filthy thing is off?” She begs.
Melissa nods and rub her head. Alice takes her under the arms and lift on her the changing table. It gives a squishy, wet noise, when Alice drops Janet on the changing pad and Janet whimpers.
Immediately Melissa slaps Alice’ behind with the spoon. “Be more careful. She is already leaking and in discomfort. When you make her fall on her behind she suffers more.”

Alice rubs her behind and takes Janet’s romper off. It goes directly in the hamper to be washed. Janet’s training pants look awful. They are discolored and swollen. You would like to hold Janet’s hand, but William is faster. He is already at her side and hold her hand. “It is okay, I look like this all the time.” He smiles down at Janet.
For a second you wonder if he only is at her side to stare at her naked breasts of even further down, but he is really nice and keep his eyes on Janet’s eyes and talks to her, while Alice does her best to clean up the teen girl’s crotch.
She needs a while and receive another slap from Melissa. “Please hurry, you have three other babies that need to get out of their diapers.” She reminds the maid.

When Janet is done, she is allowed to go to the bathroom and wash herself.
“What about us?” You ask, wanting to take a bath as well, but Melissa shakes her head.
“We better wait a bit. I make an exception on Janet, but to be honest I fear that you might mess yourself more during the day. The laxatives could still be in your system. Janet can run to the bathroom when she feels a bit of pressure, while you three will be stuck in your diapers. I wash you before it goes to bed again, I promise.”

You sulk a bit, but agrees.
William is the next in the row and Alice giggles when his manhood becomes erect, when she cleans him up with wet wipes. Melissa spanks her again and tells her, that this is a perfectly normal reaction and a nanny would not laugh about it.
William grins from ear to ear, while Alice cleans him up. The lack of skills makes the cleanup much longer and he obviously enjoys the attention Alice has to grand his… private parts.
“Can you please clean up my little Willy? I am sure he is still a bit dirty.” He grins.
Alice nods her head, but is stopped by Melissa and another slap on her behind.
“Don’t let him trick you. He is perfectly clean and will make a mess on his belly if you continue, if you know what I mean. Put him in a fresh diaper and send him to the play corner. All the naked girls drive him crazy I see.”
William is a bit frustrated, but let Alice put him in a fresh diaper, before Melissa dress him in a normal onesie. It is not a punishment onesie anymore and has a smiling prince on the chest.

Meredith is the next and Alice is getting better. She has practiced with Janet and is getting much faster. When is it your turn, she is very fast and good with the wipes. Still, she use more than Melissa or Rose and you get quite excited. You are happy that it is not as obviously as with William, but Melissa stops Alice, before she can give you something you have not earned jet.
“Please stop Alice, our princess face is all flushed and her… crotch is getting puffy. I think it is enough.”

You sigh deeply and Melissa give you an angry look. “Princess, you do not want to be punished today, do you?”
Quickly you shake your head and let Alice diaper you.
Janet is back and wears a short summer dress, which barely hides her trainers. This is her little revenge on Alice that is now stripped down to her diaper and bra.
“Okay little ones, choose an onesie for Alice.” Melissa says.

You all stand around a selection of onesie in Alice’s size. One is a quite simple, one is almost sexy, with a lace-cut on the chest and on the back. The put in the back goes down to the waistline, which would make the diaper visible. Last put no least you have an only fashioned red one with a flap at the bottom. It has the words “Naughty big Girl” on the chest, but the BIG is crossed out.

Finally you and your friends select the…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Receives a lot of spanks during the changing pr...

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You grin, pointing at the red onesie with the flap at the bottom.
“The butt-flap onesie.” you state, while your friends all giggle.
Alice become red as a tomato, and tries to say “Can’t I have the normal one, please?”
The four of you simultaneously shake your heads, and Janet replies “It’s your punishment, remember?”
Alice look at Melissa, hoping for some help, but the tall nanny simply nods.
Sighing, the young maid pick up the onesie and puts it on. Melissa closes the zip, and makes her take a turnaround to show to you the finished job. On the chest there is the words you saw before: “Naughty big Girl” with the word “big” crossed out. Only now, however, you notice that there is a sentence on the flap too: “Warning: Loading in progress”. You giggle, knowing that everyone in the palace will understand what the maid have under the onesie, even if it not seen.
“Now, Alice, you can go to Mrs. Amelia to say how happy you are in helping me in the nursery. An be sure to don’t run in the hallways.” Melissa says, gently pushing her outside the nursery.
The young blushing maid leaves the room, passing by a woman in a silver armour.
“What’s happened?” Eden asks, looking at Alice backside as she moves away.
“We only had a little talk about her behaviour.” Melissa replies “You can pick up the princess.”
“Nanny, why I am the only one still in punishment clothes?” you ask her before leaving. In fact, Willy is now dressed normally, while you have been put back in punishment clothes (a quite simple blue onesie, with the words “Potty mouth” printed on the chest, over a printed wet bar of soap, and a lock).
“Just this afternoon, then you’ll go back in normal clothes too.” she replies “You sassed the queen, princess. It’s a very naughty thing, don’t you agree?”
You nod your head, while thinking that is quite unfair. You simply spoke without permission, you haven’t told her to fuck herself.
“Can we go play?” Merry asks. As Melissa nods, she smiles.
“I expect you three to come here for your dinner.” Melissa says “Janet is welcomed to, of course.”
“Tomorrow morning I can go back to Rose’s nursery?” you ask. Once again, Melissa nods.
Happy, you greet her and leave the nursery, followed by your friends.
Before leaving, however, you have noticed that the nanny gave to Eden a key (for your lock, certainly) and a pacifier.
“What should we do?” you ask, after walking for a while.
“I suggest to continue the exploration.” Janet suggests “The palace it’s enormous, and there are still areas that we haven’t explored yet.”
“I thought that you would suggest to play videogames.” you say, quite surprised “You are a gamer, aren’t you?”
Janet nods, replying “I play all the time when your are busy, Susan the very important princess. While you are all free, I prefer spending time with you in a more … interesting way.”
All of you agree, and decide to explore the Palace more.
“Near the basement there is a room where servants never go to.” William adds, while walking “We can see what’s behind it. As far as I now, it’s not a forbidden area.”
You agree, suddenly intrigued. The four of you the walk toward the basement zone, to reach the door.
Obviously, Eden follows you, but doesn’t say a word.
During the path, you notice that some servants (mostly young footmen) look at Janet. You can see why: your tall and gracious friend is dressed in quite revealing outfit, that (the icing on the cake) makes everyone understand that she is not wearing a diaper.
You feel so jealous right now: your bestie is in the spotlight, while you, the princess, are behind her with a punishment onesie on and hoping to don’t mess yourself too soon.
You are still absorbed in your thought, when Merry takes your hand.
“Can I … hold it?” she asks, blushing.
You blush too, but nod.
You finally reach the door in the basement area. You are still thinking about opening it, that you hear a loud boom from the other side, like if someone just exploded.
“You are an idiot!” you hear someone shouting, with a male voice “How much potassium did you add?”
“The quantity I thought was right, dumbass!” a female voice replies “If your calligraphy was legible, I would have added the quantity you had written.”
Even more intrigued, you open the door and go in, followed by the others.
You find yourself in a strange place, similar to a laboratory. It’s strange, because it has a lot of modern technology in it (like a modern biology lab) but with ancient furniture and decorations.
Inside, there are two persons near a table with broken glasses on it. They are so caught up in arguing with each other that they don’t even notice you. They are both in their later twenties, and both of them have the hair of the strangest colour you have ever seen: bright silver.
“You were obviously spanked too little in the past years!” the male yells “Or you would have developed more discipline!”
“Oh, what about you, then?” she replies “Mommy always spanked you a lot, but you are still a complete loggerhead. Maybe you should go back in diapers and let the grown up work.”
“It’s you that wetted the bed since you were 22 and needed night-time protection! Slacker!” he shouts.
Suddenly, Eden coughs aloud, catching their attention.
“What’s now? The Palace’s magician need to concentrate!” the female yell in your direction, but suddenly freeze.
“The princess?” she says, blushing “We are sorry, really.”
“Yes, we are.” the male adds “But if you want to punish someone, I suggest to punish her.”
“Shut up, idiot!” the female yells back “Behave in front of the princess!”
Eden sighs, then says “Those are the Palace’s Magicians. Amos and Nena Campbell, brother and sister. It’s an ancient title, today they are more like inventors, since they use science and not a so called magic. Their father was their predecessor.”
Without the slightest notice, Nena takes you by your arm and drag you inside, saying “Come, princess! I want to show you MY latest invention.”
“OUR latest invention.” Amos corrects her.
Before your eyes, a strange machine appears.
Nena smiles, and says “This, princess, is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Butt-flap onesie

choices: “Show it to us, I can use a snack.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“This is the first full automatic diaper changing machine.” Nena smiles.
The machine looks a bit scary and your first reaction is, that nobody would put a small baby on it, but then you remember where you are. In Calonia where teens and young adults wear diapers as well. For those it might be okay to use a machine, but still…
“All those arms? They look scary!” You say and step back.
The machine looks like a very big changing table with four robotic arms, two on each side. The arms end in hands, while one arm has an additional scanner. Those arms can reach all the items that lay around the comfortable looking changing pad, the diapers, the oil, the powder, the wet wipes, but also a spanking paddle and medical equipment.
“Is all that stuff really needed for changing a diaper?” You ask Nena.

Amos steps in and pushes his sister away.
“Princess, to have a machine like this should be a great help for the parents and how would it help if the machine does not know if the baby is fine and can react to it?! With this machine, you can press on start and a few minutes later your baby is a clean diaper and you even receive a health report from it. It is a great invention.”

Nena stick a finger in her mouth, before she pushes it in Amos’s ear, with a wet smack. He jumps away and she continues the presentation.
“The paddle was his idea of course. He wanted me to try it and had manipulated the A.I. to give me a maintenance spanking. That bastard!”

Eden raise a brow and gives her and angry look.

“Uhm, sorry for that.” Nena apologizes. “Well, why don’t we have a little demonstration? There is a wet or dirty little baby round?”

“Now we could use Alice.” William whispers to his sister and grins while Meredith blushes and slowly lift her hand. “I… I could use a change.” She whispers and looks at her feet.

All of you look at her and she blushes even more and shrugs. “I guess it is still the medicine. I had a little messy accident.”

“Are you sure Merry? We can get you changed by Melissa when we are back.” You try to stop her, but she shakes her head and walks to Nena. “No, I am sure I want to try it. Melissa will not change me before bedtime and I really like to get cleaned up.”

You all shrug, while Nena and Amos look very happy. They help Merry on the changing table and fix her in place with a chest-strap and wrist-cuffs.
“During the test-phase we still need them. We want to make sure the baby does not jump up and get hurt by the robotic arms. After some fine tuning, the straps should become obsolete.” Amos explains.

Smiling from ear to ear, he presses the start-button and steps back.

“HELLO BABY, TIME TO CLEAN YOU UP.” The machine says and the arms start to move. One arm positions above Merry and a red light scans her.
“UNDRESSING REQUIRED, NO ROMPER DETECTED.” And the machine stops.

“Well, that was not impressive.” You grin and Nena and Amos quickly go to Merry and strip her down to her diaper.
“Sorry for that, with a romper and the crotch-snaps it works perfectly.” Nena explains.

They reactivate the machine and after scanning the almost naked Merry again, the machine continues. It cut open the diaper at the tapes and begins to wipe Merry’s crotch down with a wide wipe. By doing that it pulls away the diaper and holds her legs in the air. Now three arms work at the same time one is holding her legs up, one is cleaning and one is scanning her behind for remaining dirt. You would think that the machine now tapes the diaper close, but now comes the medical check. One hand positions in front of Merry’s anus and a thermometer slides out a fingers tip.

“No! Stop that, please.” Meredith complains.
“YOU WILL BE FINE, LITTLE ONE.” The machine says and one arm pushes a pacifier in Merry’s mouth. A second later the thermometer is extracted and the full finger of the hand push into her behind, but only for a few seconds.
“NORMAL TEMPERATURE, NO OCCLUSION DETECTED” The machine says.
One of the arms grab the spanking paddle, but then stops, before you could say anything. “NO PUNISHMENT FILE FOUND, CONTINUE WITHOUT SPANKING?”

“Yes! Yes!” Nena and Amos call out together and look very relieved, when the machine drops the paddle again.

Finally it lubes and powders Merry’s crotch and tapes the diaper shut.
Then all arms pull back and the straps open.

Merry looks a bit stressed and sucks on her pacifier, but she is happy to be in a clean diaper again.
While you, Janet and Willy help her into her onesie, she takes the pacifier out and says: “beside the medical check it was fine, but it was scary when the… think pushed into my behind.” She blushes and put the pacifier back into her mouth.

“Yes, but after the first time, the kids know what is coming and will be fine.” Amos says and looks very proud. “And I am happy that I could stop the spanking.” He grins and wipes away imagined sweat from his forehead.

“What was that OCCLUSION thing?” Willy asks.

“Oh, it would give a full automatic enema if the baby is blocked up. It will even remind the parents to change the baby again, after an hour.” Nena says.

“Okay.” You clap your hands. “That was interesting. Anything else you like to present or should we walk on, guys?”

Amos looks at Nena. “We can show the high chair, what do you think?”
“I am not sure if it is ready, it still has issues with the software.” Nena says and tries to smile.

You shrug and say…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: … a diaper changing machine!”

choices: “We can pay your mom a visit.”
“We can show you how a toilet works.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Show it to us, I can use a snack.”
Janet shakes her head, saying “I don’t think it’s a good idea, Susie.”
“Why? The diaper changing machine worked perfectly.” you state.
“But this one seems to be not completely ready yet.” Willy adds “I’m not sure of it.”
You are very curious about the wonders in the lab, so you decide to ask for an alternative, and if it will not satisfy you then you’ll go back to the high-chair idea.
“Is there anything else you can show us?” you ask to them.
Amos nods, saying “There is my greatest invention! The fully automatic spanking machine! It’s complete with numerous implements and ...”
“The princess is clearly not interested in a machine that has the only purpose to spank it’s user, dumbass.” Nena interrupts him “I suggest to show her the automatic bathtub, instead.”
“That monstrosity it’s still under development, stinky head.” he replies “It could severely endanger it’s user for how it is now. But you are so slow in understanding that I would have been surprised if it worked.”
“Enough!” Eden exclaims “You are in front of princess Susan of Calonia! Please, behave!”
They seem to calm down a little and nod in your direction.
“You created a machine for diaper change, one for bath time, one for feeding time and even one for spankings?” you ask, amazed “It’s impressive.”
“Thank you, princess.” Nena says, smiling “And we have in the pipeline even an automated crib. Very soon, everyone too busy to take care of their children but with not enough money to hire a nanny will no longer be obliged to do somersaults.”
“Now, about the high-chair. Do you want to test it?” Amos says, overlooking his sister's voice with his.
You nod, and he tries to take your arm, but Nena pushes him away and she takes you instead.
“Follow me!” she exclaims, taking you next to a strange looking high-chair. It’s a simple high-chair, but with multiple arms like the changing table before. A lot of compartments are placed round it, full of baby foods, bottle with milk and other things. A small platform come out from the chair’s base. And, last but not least, a big wooden hairbrush lie inside one of the compartment.
“Put yourself over the base and you will enjoy a snack.” Nena says, smiling brightly.
“What with that hairbrush?” you ask.
“Oh, it’s my idea, of course.” Amos intervenes “It’s for naughty children that don’t want to eat. I think a good spanking is always the best solution for naughtiness.”
“You should spank yourself and shout up!” his sister yell at him, before saying to you “Are you ready, princess?”
You take a step forward, going up on the platform.
A scanner originate from the high-chair, and a loud voice states “HELLO BABY. TIME TO HAVE A SNACK.”
Two robotic arms lift you taking you under your armpits and takes you up, before gently let you in the high-chair.
“SELECT ONE: BREAKFAST, MORNING SNACK, LUNCH, AFTERNOON SNACK OR DINNER?” the machine asks.
“Afternoon snack.” you says, but the machine puts a pacifier in your mouth.
“HUSH, BABY. A GROWN UP SHOULD REPLY.”
“Afternoon snack, please.” Nena says.
The machine seems to understand, because it takes out a bowl and a spoon, then fills the bows with ice cream.
“FEEDING TIME!”
One robotic arm removes the pacifier, while another begins to take the ice cream to your mouth. You savour the nice ice cream, and you think that the machine it’s delicate enough, even if it doesn’t transmit the sweetness like a real nanny does.
Once the cup is empty, the high-chair simply release you. As you are about to get down, however, the arms takes you up once again.
“LOCK DETECTED. INITIATE PUNISHMENT.”
“What?” you scream “Tell it to let me go!”
“Stop! Stop now!” Amos yells, beginning to fumble with the control panel.
“You idiot!” Nena yells at him “You used the some punishment encoding you used for the changing table! The high-chair shouldn’t give a fuck about the lock!”
While the two tries to stop the machine, an arm begins to thrash your padded behind with the hairbrush.
“Take me down!” you shout, still receiving the slaps.
“There! This should go!” Amos exclaims, pushing a button.
As he does it, the machine stops and let you go, saying “BEHAVE FROM NOW ON!”
You run to Eden and hug her, while Nena says “I’m mortified, princess. I work with a spanko.”
“I’m a disciplinarian, not a spanko!” he says, offended.
“That’s enough!” Eden intervenes “You are the Palace’s Magicians, you can’t behave like a couple of brats!”
They stop, and Amos says “I’m sorry, too, princess. We will be sure to recalibrate it.”
“Yes, you’ve been a good test subject.” Nena adds “Now back to work!”
Like if you never entered, they resume to work (and to argue).
They are for sure the strangest Palace’s inhabitants you’ve met so far.
You leave the room, and your friends ask you if you are ok.
“Yes, I was padded.” you say, patting your own diaper “It was just a little humiliating. I even filled my diaper during it. Stupid laxatives.”
Just as you said that, Janet winks at you and runs away. After a while, she’s back.
“Sorry.” she says “I needed the bathroom.”
“So, what can we do? We still have some time before dinner.” Willy asks.
You look around, then look at the Prime Minister's children (focusing on Meredith) and say:
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “Show it to us, I can use a snack.”

choices: Split up and take a bath with Merry
Play some games, all four of you.
Ask all to get changed and go to bed.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“We can pay your mom a visit.” You suggest and Meredith nods her head. She is happy that she got rid of the lock and is proud to show that to her mom.
The prime minister is very busy and does not always have the time to see her kids every day. She really tries it, but sometimes it is so late, that she only see them when they already sleeping peacefully in their nursery.

The four of your, five if you count in Eden, walk to her office and knock on the door.
“Yes, please.” You hear her voice from the inside.

You open the door and Merry and Willy run in, yelling and cheering. “HI MOM! HUHU!” They run up to her and jump into her arms. The prime minister is a bit surprised, but quickly smiles and hugs her children tightly.
“Hello my babies, do you have a good time?”

William looks at his mom and at all the files on the desk.
“Mom, it is Sunday, you should take the day off and play with us.”

His mother looks sad, but shakes her head.
“Oh, I am so sorry baby, but I have to work a bit longer. I try to come around later and spend some minutes with you, okay?”

Meredith looks very sad and suckles on the pacifier she still has in her mouth.
“Miniths?” She asks, blushes and takes the paci out.

“I am sorry baby, I try to work faster to have more time for you, okay?” The prime minister says and ruffles Merry’s hair.
She looks a bit sad, but then she looks at you and is all business again.
“Princess, it is good to see you. Your person is still in the focus of the press. It would be wise to have a few trips to the city, so the citizen and the press gets used to you. I receive dozens of requests for more interviews and photo-stories about your life in Calonia.”

You feel bad, that such an important person has so much work because of you. You look at your feel and nod your head. “Uhm, shopping sounds nice.” You whisper, trying to get the best of it.

William’s and Meredith’s mother laughs out and shakes her head: “I have said nothing about shopping. And maybe you should get rid of the lock before you be seen in public the next time.”

You blush and grab the little lock. You are currently the only one with the lock. Janet is back in trainers and a sexy summer dress and William and Meredith are in her normal clothes. Only you are still marked as a naughty child. You step from one toe to the other and feel the mess in your diaper shift. “And I am the only messy baby in here.” You think by yourself.
“I will talk about it with Melissa and Rose, I have been very good… with little exceptions.” You say and turn to leave. As nice as it was to see her, the conversation with the prime minister ruined your lazy Sunday. You like to relax and do not think about your duties as a princess.

William and Meredith say goodbye to her mom and the five of you walk down the corridor again.
William gives your behind a little slap and gives you and angry look,: “you need to work on the issues with the press. Mom is working so hard and has no time to see us, this is unfair!”

You have whimpered when he spread the mess in your diaper further, but his words are much worse than that, because they are true. “Okay, I will work on it. I do not mind to walk around the city, I was planning to ask for it anyway – as long as Eden is with me, I am safe.” You look at your bodyguard and she gives you a polite nod.

You look sad and think about your situation, when Merry pushes her wet pacifier in your mouth. “Here, it will help you relax.” She smiles.
You blush when you accept it and suck on if. Merry hugs you tightly and rubs your back. “Willy is angry for the moment, but I still like you. I know you try to be good.”
Hugging her back you feel a bit better and inhale her scent. She is such a sweet girl, in every aspect.

Further down the hallway you have to decide what to do now.
William would like to play some games with Janet, but you like to get bathed and changed as soon as possible. Merry is still holding your hand and wants to follow you, for whatever you decide.

You decide to…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “We can pay your mom a visit.”

choices: You patiently wait for Melissa to clean you up
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You blubber something, but then realize that you’re still sucking the pacifier, so you remove it.
“I’d really like to take a bath, now.” you say, blushing.
“You’re so boring.” William sighs “We will take a bath before bedtime, you know?”
“But it would be a quick bath.” Meredith intervenes “If we go now, we can enjoy a longer one.”
“I don’t care!” Willy replies “I want to play, now.”
“Now, now, children. Don’t argue with each other.” Janet says “Big sis Janet has the solution. We can simply split up. Susan can take a bath and I go to my room to play with videogames. You two can go with whoever you prefer.”
You really don’t like the idea to let Willy alone with Janet, but you really want to take a bath and you don’t want to force him to follow you.
“Ok. I agree.” you simply say.
Suddenly, William gives you hug, saying “Thank you, Susan. You’re very sympathetic.”
“Oh, no problem at all, Willy.” you reply and hug him back, before adding, whispering in is ear “But if you try anything funny with her, I’ll make sure you’ll sleep on your tummy for a lot of nights with a red bottom on display.”
“Hey, what kind of man do you think I am?” he whispers back.
You then split up: Janet goes to her room with Willy, while you go back to Melissa’s nursery still holding Merry’s hand, and of course followed by Eden.
You reach the nursery and enter. Eden wishes you good night, before leaving the nursery and letting you with Melissa.
“Princess Susan, Meredith.” she greets you “I wasn’t expecting to see you before the next hour. What’s happened?”
“We’d really like to take a bath, and not a quick one.” you explain “My diaper is so full that I if wasn’t for the onesie it would have fell on the ground.”
“Sure, princess. I will bathe you.” Melissa states, before turning toward the bathroom door and say aloud “Alice! Once you finished using the potty, please fill the bathtub.”
“Are you trying to potty train Alice, nanny Melissa?” Merry asks.
Melissa nods, replying “Yes, I’m trying, and she is making progress.”
While Alice fills the bathtub, the tall nanny proceeds to lift you on the changing table, removing your locked onesie and your dirty and wet diaper.
“I’m surprised it didn’t leaked.” Melissa says “Maybe tonight would be wise to put you in a diaper with booster pads.”
“No, not the booster pads, please!” you exclaim “It’s like having a pillow between my legs! I can barely move with them on!”
“Haven’t I said that you don’t have to talk back to me?” Melissa says, once you’re cleaned up “It’s not for you to decide, princess. Tonight all three of you will have booster pads in you diapers.”
She gives you a maintenance spanking, then takes you down from the changing table, still naked.
“Come here too, Merry.” the nanny then says, looking at your friend.
Merry reaches her, and Melissa begins to undress her, removing her diaper too and leaving her naked.
You think that she has a good body, but then shake your head to drive away that thought.
“You are clean.” Melissa states “It’s quite strange. Haven’t you went number 1 nor number 2 during the entire afternoon, little one?”
Meredith hesitates, so the nanny adds “Be honest, my little angel. If you lie I will know, and you’ll have your mouth washed with soap.”
Meredith nods, replying in a shy tone “I went both of them in the early afternoon, but I tried the diaper changing machine created by the Palace’s Magicians.”
As she says that, the nanny gives her a quite hard slap on the naked behind, scolding her “You know you need to ask me for things like this. I’m really disappointed, Merry.”
Don’t wanting to see her getting in trouble, you intervene “They insisted, nanny. And we were curious. I tried the high-chair and had a snack.”
She looks at you with a stare that makes you go pale, then says “Princess, no one has ever told you that you should stay silent while an adult scolds one of your friends? If you want to intervene, you have to raise your hand and wait to be asked. You’ll have a mouth soaping after dinner for this. And you, Merry, will have an enema before bed.”
“No, nanny Melissa, please!” Merry cries out, with tears running on her checks and hugging the nanny “I’m sorry and I promise I’ll be good! Don’t punish us!”
Melissa gently pats Merry’s head, replying “Action and reaction, little one. Every action has a consequence, and a misbehaviour is followed by a punishment. But since it’s quite a minor thing and you seem to be already repented, I’ll not put any lock on you.”
She then looks at you, adding “I will not put a lock on you either, princess. But I want you to apologise and promise me that you’ll be an obedient child tomorrow.”
Blushing, you nod and say “I’m sorry, nanny Melissa. I promise to be good.”
“Very well. Let’s go to enjoy a bath, then.” the nanny says “You will then have your dinner and your punishments, before going to bed.”
Happy about the bath, at least, you enter in the bathroom followed by both Merry and Melissa. Inside, you see Alice, completely naked.
“I went potty on time, nanny!” she exclaims, quite happy about it “Are you proud of me?”
You notice that her punishment clothes are in the room too. So nanny Melissa removed them to let her use the potty. You’re quite jealous of it.
“Of course I am.” Melissa replies “Now be a good girl and tell me all the Five Potty Rules.”
Alice blushes, saying “Here? But the princess ...”
“Now, Alice!” Melissa intimates her.
Gulping, Alice begins to count on her finger, saying “Rule number 1: When you feel the urge, tell a grown-up that you need to go. Rule number 2: Wait that the grown-up gives you permission to go to the potty. Rule number 3: Remove your diaper before using the potty. Rule number 4: Clean up your intimate parts with care using wipes when you’ve done. Rule number 5: Tell a grown-up that you’ve finished using it.”
Melissa smiles, saying “What a good girl. You only needed a loving but firm hand, after all.”
With this, she let you enter the bathtub.
During the bath ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Split up and take a bath with Merry

choices: We need to prepare and train you first.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You climb into the tub and watch merry follow you. Melissa is helping you in, but when she is about to grab the sponge you hear a breaking noise from the nursery and she runs out.
“Alice, what have you done? Oh don’t tell me… .” You and Meredith hear her from the room next door.

“I am sorry, I tried to get the diaper back on and grabbed it to keep the balance.” Alice says.

“You tried to get the OLD diaper back on?” Melissa asks with her voice full disbelieve.

“It was still clean, I thought… I am sorry,… no please do not spank me again.” You hear Alice, before you can hear that she indeed receive a sound spanking by Melissa.

Being alone in the bathtub you and Merry start to make bubbles and play with the toys, but when it takes longer and longer you grab the big sponge and approach Meredith. “I think the Nanny is busy, mind if I start to wash you?”

Meredith blushes a bit and grabs a sponge herself: “but only if I can wash you as well, I guess you need it more than me.” She winks at you, but you still blush and feel a bit ashamed. Seeing this, she comes close to you and hugs you tightly. “I am sorry Princess, I did not mean to embarrass you.”

With your naked and wet bodies pressed together you feel heat rising up from our inside and you quickly break away and splash water at her. Then you begin to rub her back with the sponge and continue with her arms.
When she turns around you blush again, when you let your sponge run over her perking breasts and further down. Meredith looks as innocent as always, but even she hat flushed cheeks now and spread her knees to allow you an easy access to her crotch.
“Can… can I?” You ask, hesitating, but she nods and you continue. You move the sponge up and down and feel her pressing her hips against your moving hand.
“Merry are you sure we should?” You ask, but she hushes you and grab your hand, moving it by herself. Seconds late she let out a tiny, cute moan and shivers all over.

With wide eyes you look at her and feel soooo jealous. The cute little Merry just had a climax. Something you are waiting for, for over a week.
When she opens her eyes she comes to you and give you an quick kiss on the mouth. “now it is your turn, princess.”

You nod eagerly and let her start to clean you up, but right in the moment she wants to start washing your front side Melissa comes in, looking a bit stressed.
“I am sorry you had to wait so long. Ah Merry, you are such a good girl, starting to clean our dirty little girl.” She takes the sponge from Merry and continues to clean to clean you up, quickly and professional. In the end, you are clean, but unsatisfied.

After you are done, Melissa looks at the clock and takes Meredith out of the bathtub and dries her up. She carries her over to the changing table to diaper her and dress her for dinner. Seeing your chance you move your hand between your legs and play with yourself. The bubbles are almost gone, but still provide some level of sight protection.
“One more minute, one more minute,… “ you think by yourself, when you hear Melissa’s voice.
“Princess, stop what you are doing or Melissa is not the only one that receive an enema tonight.”

Blushing deep red you let Melissa take you out of the tub, diaper and dress you in a romper. “You need to learn some patience, little on. If you be a good girl for a little bit longer you are granted a special treat.” Melissa says and put mittens on your hands.
You moan out and a few days earlier you would have complained about them, but you know better now and stay silent.
Like Merry, you are put in a high chair.

“I am sorry for this, but your dear maid had tipped over a big vase and the floor needs to be vacuumed before I can allow you to walk around again.” Melissa explains and only a few seconds later Alice is coming in with a vacuum cleaner. She is in her dropseat onesie again and even has a lock on it. She looks very unhappy, but makes sure everything is clean and free from shards.

When she walks out, Janet and William come in. They are holding hands and you feel a bit jealous. They seem to like each other better and better – even with Willy being a jerk from times to times. Janet tells you that she comes back after she had dinner and leaves again, while Willy is quickly bathed and put in a fresh diaper.
Finally you remember that you wanted to talk to Melissa. Obedient you raise your hand and wait for her to let you talk: “Princess, you do not need to raise your hand ALL the time, before I was scolding Meredith and you interrupted me. That was a different story.”

You nod your head and speak: You Prime Minister told me that I should visit the town to calm down the pressing questions of the press. Do you think we can do that tomorrow?”

Melissa is a bit overwhelmed by the sudden request.
“Oh… that comes sudden… I think…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You play with Merry

choices: ... Melissa and Alice wake you up.
... Rose and Charlotte wake you up.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“I think… it would be better ask the Queen about it.” Melissa concludes.
“Why? It’s a so difficult matter?” you ask.
Melissa nods, replying “Not so much, but I cannot decide something like that on my own. It’s true that you have a personal bodyguard, but when you can leave the Palace is a matter that should be let in Queen’s hand, as your safety is involved. Furthermore, I will no longer be your nanny tomorrow, because you’ll go back to nanny Rose.”
In hearing your TRUE nanny name, You smile, then say “My safety? Isn’t Calonia a peaceful nation.”
“It is, but you are the heir of the throne. You must understand it.” she replies.
You nod, accepting that you’ll have to wait for the Queen.
As Melissa takes out three glasses full of baby food and three baby bottles full of milk, the door of the nursery suddenly opens up, and two women come inside.
“How are my babies doing?” the first woman says.
Immediately, both the sibling exclaims simultaneously “Mom! Mom! You came!”
The Prime Minister reaches her children, hugging them while they’re still in the high-chairs.
The other woman reaches you instead, smiling.
“Hi, princess.” she says.
You smile back, replying “Charlotte! I was hoping to see you!”
“Princess, don’t be rude!” Melissa intervenes “That it’s not the way to address the Queen.”
“It’s okay, Melissa. I gave her permission to call me that, and I encouraged her to do so.” the Queen replies. Melissa then takes a bow, apologizing.
The queen then gives you a pat on your head, saying “What’s wrong, my little princess? Why were you waiting for me?”
“I wanted to go visit the town tomorrow, but nanny Melissa told me that I should ask you about it.”
Charlotte seems to think about it, then says “Only if you solemnly swear that you’ll be on your best behaviour. I don’t want to see on a next day newspaper the picture of the princess spanked in the middle of the capital.”
“You’re not coming with me?” you ask her.
The queen shakes her head, replying “I’m very busy, Susan. I’ll have one of my handmaid accompany you.”
“Handmaid?” you ask her “You mean, maids that follow you?”
“Oh, the handmaids are my personal assistants.” She explains “One of them will accompany you tomorrow, if you still want to go.”
You nod, and she concludes “I will ask Laura. She is very strict and I will grant her fully permission to punish you. It’s that clear, princess?”
“Don’t worry, I’m always on my best behaviour!” you exclaim, stretching you hand toward her. You immediately blush as you remember you are in mittens.
“Oh, I can see that.” the queen states, ironically “What have you done to earn those?”
“I ... I threw a rubber duck at nanny Melissa in the bathtub.” you lie.
“Liar, liar, pants on fire.” Melissa immediately intervenes “Liar, liar, soap in mouth. Liar, liar, sleeps on tummy.”
“Really, princess?” the queen says “You tried to lie with your nanny in the room? That’s quite naive, don’t you think?”
You blush, thinking that Rose would have simply let the queen believe it and maybe punish you for it after her leaving.
“I’m sorry. Nanny Melissa caught me mas... I mean, having naughty fun.” you say.
You think she’d go mad, but the queen pats your head instead, saying sweetly “What a naughty girl. It’s obvious that those mittens fit you very well.”
You blush once again, while the queen hugs you and then leaves, followed by lady Kent (she has cuddled her children all the time during your dialogue with the queen).
“Nanny, couldn’t you support me?” you say to Melissa once the door is closed.
“I don’t like liars, princess.” she replies “If you weren’t already in for a mouth soaping, you’d be for this.”
She then proceed to feed you. Once finished, she gives your punishment to both of you girls: she wash your mouth with soap and gives an enema to Merry. During the enema procedure, both you and Willy have been confined in the bathroom.
You have difficult in understanding Calonian society: it’s okay to bathe together, but not to watch another having an enema if not in certain cases.
Once finished, you are all allowed to stay together, and Melissa removes your rompers, adds booster pads to your diapers, and then puts the rompers back on you.
You have problem moving your legs, and you can’t resist the urge to complain about it: “Nanny, I feel too bulky. Can’t I sleep without this things on?”
“I thought to have said to you that you should not question adults decisions, princess.” is her simple reply “It’s for your own good, trust me. You are not being punished.”
While the nanny begins to lift you to put you in the crib, Janet enters in the nursery, greetings all of you.
“I’m ready for a nice sleep.” she says, then looks at you three and says “If the crib has enough space for me, with all that padding.”
“Don’t make fun of them, please.” the nanny says.
Janet apologies, then reaches you and the four of you are putted in the crib by the nanny. Melissa gives you all your favourite plushes, gives you all a goodnight kiss and turn the lights off, before leaving the nursery followed by Alice.
“Are you in mittens for what I think?” Janet asks.
Blushing, you nod and she laughs “Oh, Susan, you must learn to don’t get caught so easily.”
You’d want to tell her about your moment with Merry, but you’re so tired that you fall asleep.
During the night, you have the weirdest dream.
You are in a big bedroom, and Merry is there too. But as you begin to undress, nanny Samantha enters the room, takes you out in the town streets by your hear and spank you in front of a photographer, scolding you aloud for having sex (that’s a lie, since you didn’t even had the occasion to do anything) and calling you a “filthy girl”. Queen Charlotte, nanny Rose and nanny Melissa look at you with disappointed eyes, and let the evil nanny spank you so many times that you lose the count. William takes away Merry, promising that the “evil Princess” will not corrupt her further, while lady Kent encourage Samantha to hit you even harder. The worst part is when you see Janet hugging Richard, saying “I always wished a true man. I’m glad you’ll be king.”. Lord Grairven is looking at you, with a evil smile and with a shoe pressed over Eden’s unconscious body.
Enough!
You wake up, wet with sweat, shivering. You begin to cry, waking Merry up (she was hugging you).
“Susie? What’s wrong?” she asks.
“I had a nightmare.” you reply, noticing that you heavily wetted yourself.
“Do you want to tell me about it?” Merry asks.
You nod, and say “I dreamed that our moment ruined my relation with all the one I care about here in Calonia. And Richard became king!” you exclaim.
She hugs you tightly, but before she can say anything the door opens, and Melissa enters.
“What’s wrong, princess?” she asks.
You explain everything to her too (omitting the details concerning Meredith directly) then you ask her “I am filthy, nanny?”
You are thinking about your feeling toward Merry, but you think she’ll think you’re talking about the naughty fun.
