Melissa pats you head, replying “Princess, no. Never think that of yourself, never. Sexuality is a completely normal thing, it’s only that you’re a bit too young for it. When you’ll grow up, then you’ll have all the sexual experience that you wish. Never allow anyone to call you filthy for it, it doesn’t matter what kind of sexual preference do you have.”
For a moment you think that she knows everything, but you realize that she is talking in general, and you feel relieved by her words.
With a smile, the nanny continues “I mean, you shouldn’t know about it, but you visited the Queen’s private collection. We all love Queen Charlotte, even with her ... kinky side. Because it’s part of her.”
You smile, lying in the crib again.
“Thank you, nanny Melissa.” you say, falling asleep again. The last thing that you feel before flying in dream land once again is a pacifier putted in your mouth.
The next morning ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: We better ask the Queen.”

choices: In her 30th and looking super strict.
In her early 40th and dresses bizarre.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
When you wake up you see Melissa and Alice standing beside the crib.
“Time to get up Princess.” Melissa says and makes a gesture towards Alice. The young maid helps you out and carries you to the changing table. You have wet your diaper during the night and Melissa starts to clean you up, while Alice wakes your friends up.
William is almost laying on top of Janet and you shake your head – only to remember that you had Merry halfway on top of you as well, when you woke up during the night.
“I clean you up and then you are picked up by Rose. She is eager to get you back, to spoil and sugarcoat your day.” She says, half serious, half joking.
The diaper she put on you has no boosters and the onesie you receive is yellow with the face of a duck on your chest. While you look down you notice your little nipples under the thick fabric and throw a jealous look at Janet. Your friends just stretched and you can see her bra under her romper. She looks much more mature with her thin trainers, that are even dry and her bra.
“Nanny Melissa, can’t I have a bra as well? I think it would look much better.” You say.

To your dismay, Melissa laughs out and shakes her head.
“Oh Princess, you should be happy that you do not have to wear one. They are uncomfortable and only get in the way.” Then she ran her hand over your chest and chuckles. “No, I am very sorry Princess, but if you ask me, you will not wear a bra for the next years.”
She point her finger at Meredith and continues: “Not even Merry is wearing one and she is more under onesie that you.”

You feel like crying and sulk, while your friends get changed. Janet leaves the nursery and comes back in a black dress that goes down to her knees. She looks stunning and two years older than she is.
“I thought I dress up a bit when we go outside.” She grins and comes to you.
“Hey, have you noticed Alice… underwear?”

Having been distracted by your own… issues you have not noticed it, but the young maid is in a hanging diaper and when she walks by you, you notice that her diaper is loaded. You giggle and poke her behind with your – still mitted – hand.
“Oh, Princess, please do not do that!” She yells at you, but overcomes the instinct to slap you.

Melissa just put William in a fresh diaper and helps him off the changing table, when she explains:
“Alice just had a big accident. I told her she had to wait until breakfast to use the potty for number two, but obviously that challenge was too much for her.”

You feel sorry for the maid, but still have to grin when she walks fast you, waddling a bit.
“Melissa, can’t you take the mittens off? I don’t want to get in trouble with Rose, right from the start.”

“Sorry princess, but I want to let her decide when she takes them off.” Melissa explains.

You expect to be feed now, but then the door opens and Rose comes in. You smile and run into her arms. “NANNY ROSE! Finally I am back in your loving care!”

Melissa looks a bit upset, so you quickly soften your statement:
“I mean… Nanny Melissa is great, but you are MY nanny and I missed you. Can you take Mr Rabbit? I… .” You look at your hands and blush.

Rose shakes her head, when she sees your mittens. “Again, Princess? Should we need to keep you in mittens until the summer is over, so you learn your lesson?”

“NO!!!!!” You shout out, but quiet down quickly. “Please not. Everybody is looking at me so strange when I wear them and… and… today I have to go to class and I need my hands to write.”

“I thought you wanted a trip throw the city? Handmaid Laura is already waiting for you in our nursery. She wants to make sure you look perfect for the citizen.” Rose says, picks up your stuffed Rabbit and takes you by your hand.
Eden is not picking you up today, since she will be with you later – all the time. On the way to your own nursery, Rose is looking after you.
You feel sorry, that you hadn’t had the chance to play your day with your friends, but you hope to see them again, very soon.
When you and Rose enter your nursery Handmaid Laura is waiting for you. She is…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: ... Rose and Charlotte wake you up.

choices: ... an old looking carriage with horses.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Laura is a woman in her thirties, with brown hair and big eyes. She is wearing a long red dress with short sleeves that almost reaches her feet, over it she carries a white crossbody satchel, and over the head she wears a white bonnet that cover almost entirely her hair.
“Hi, princess!” she says, with a bright smile in a very cordial and sweet tone “I’m Handmaid Laura, and I will accompany you during your visit along the town. The queen said you were a pretty girl, but I now see she wasn’t exaggerating.”
You blush at her compliment and greet her, then whisper in Rose ear “Wasn’t she supposed to be very strict? She’s so nice.”
You hugged her to have an excuse to be next to Rose ear and don’t make Laura notice the whisper.
“She is strict, princess, but she has not a strict attitude.” Rose explains, whispering too “Laura is very kind, patient and tolerant, but if you misbehave she’ll not hesitate to punish you. She’s even stricter than Melissa on that matter.”
“Oh, you’re so cute.” Laura comments, as you let Rose go “Don’t worry, princess. After your trip, you’ll be back in her arms. Until then, I’ll take care of you. Do you want an hug from me too? I like hugs.”
Saying so, she kneels at your height and stretches her arms in your direction, waiting for you.
You are a bit hesitant, at first, but then you reach and give her a hug, and she immediately hugs you back, cuddling you a little. You like her embrace, it’s very warm and kind.
“How I am supposed to call you, ma’am?” you ask her, once free from her hug.
“Oh, Mrs. Laura it’s okay, princess.” she replies with a smile “You’re so polite. I’m sure you’ll be on your best behaviour.”
“Would you punish me if I’d misbehave?” you ask.
Rose intervenes, saying “Laura, I think you should show the princess the content of your satchel.”
Without losing her kind smile, Laura nods and open her satchel, taking out from it a big black wooden brush.
“This is the Naughty Hairbrush.” she explains, showing it to you “It’s an hairbrush made of a very hard wood, not easy to find, and please look at the sentence engraved on it.”
The sentence is simply a “Naughty child”, engraved in the brush but mirrored.
“If I spank you with this, the sentence will be impressed on you behind, and in the right direction, not mirrored. You’ll remember you lesson for almost a week.” she finishes to explain, putting the brush away.
You went paler and paler at any word the pronounced, and now you’re almost shivering.
“Are ... you really ready to spank me with THAT? I would never be able to sit again.” you stutter.
Both Rose and Laura giggle, while Laura takes out another hairbrush, much smaller and much more normal.
“I was joking, princess.” she says “I never used it and I hope I never will. No, I normally use this. It’s a common wooden hairbrush made of a thin wood, that stings just a little more than the hand. Be aware, however, that I will not hesitate to use this one, if you misbehave.”
“Umh ... can you be clearer?” you say “What will be considered misbehaviour during the trip?”
“Nothing particular.” she replies “Sassing someone, running away from me or your escort, being rude, lying. The usual things. Every punishment will be administer on the spot, it doesn’t matter who we have around. Oh, and you can have some shopping too: always be polite with vendors. And never, never shoplift. Calonian Royal House enjoys heavy discounts in all shops, but has to pay too. Shoplifting will be the only thing that will make me use the Naughty Hairbrush instead of the normal one. It’s that clear, little one?”
You nod, without problem. Shoplifting is a thing you would have never done anyway.
“And can Janet come too?” you ask.
This time is Rose that answers “Of course, princess. Merry and Willy cannot accompany you because they have their lesson this morning, but Janet is free to come.”
In hearing that Merry has her lesson, you get a little angry, afraid that that bastard, Mr. Grairven, would paddle her.
“How is miss Spencer?” you suddenly ask to Rose “She will come back tomorrow, right?”
Rose nods, and answers “She is ok, now. She’ll be back tomorrow morning. This afternoon I’m afraid you’ll have your lesson with the supply teacher.”
You nod, feeling reassured by Melissa’s note concerning the maximum number of stroke you can receive from the paddle in the day and happy that that bastard will not hurt Janet with his damn paddle, unless he would not want to be hurt himself by Eden’s hand.
“Well, no sad thoughts now!” you suddenly exclaim “I’m ready to enjoy my morning in the town!”
“Some last things, princess.” Laura says “You can go shopping, but you’ll have to greet the citizens first. Before going back to the palace, nearing at the end of the morning, you’ll have a quick meeting with the mayor of the capital. And last but not least, during the trip would be a good idea to stay as clean as possible, so if you have a big accident of number 1 or a accident, even small, of number 2, tell me immediately: I will take you to one of the numerous public changing stations and change you.”
You blush, realizing what the satchel really is: a strange type of diaper bag!
“Are you going to change me?” you say, quite shocked “In public?”
“That’s nothing shameful about that.” she replies “Every child you age need diaper changes. It’s completely normal to be taken in a changing room.”
“Changing room?” you breath in relief “For a moment I thought that you would change me under everyone’s eyes.”
“That’s not common and I don’t usually do it.” Laura explains “But some parents do, so if you see a child around your age being changed in the middle of a store, don’t be rude. Oh, since we are on the topic: don’t laugh if you see someone receiving a spanking in front of everyone or a mouth soaping in a public restroom. Those ARE common things.”
You think that Calonian is very strict, but since it’s a so peaceful country, you don’t feel to criticize that.
“And about the dress?” you ask “Will I visit the city with this onesie?”
“It’s perfect.” she simply replies “We just need to adjust your hair.”
She takes the brush out again, but this time she uses it in her meant purpose. Once she has finished, you have two long pigtails that make you look even younger.
“We are ready to go.” Laura concludes.
You greet Rose and reach the Palace main gate with Handmaid Laura. Janet is already there, with two knights. One is Eden, while the other is one of the man in black that was accompanying the queen when you first met her back in America. He makes a complete different effect dressed in a shining silver armour than in a black suit.
He’s not coming with you, he is simply guarding the gate.
Laura leads you outside, to your transport method. It is ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: In her 30th and very friendly

choices: You ask the women to stop.
Janet is back and shows her dress.
You wet your diaper more, soaking it.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
In front of the Palace you see a big white limousine with the royal crest on the doors. You grin when she the licence-plate “Queen II”.
“Oh cool, is that Queen Charlotte car?” You ask Laura and she nods her head. “Yes Princess, it is one of her cars. We will have to pay for parking or receive a speeding-ticket.”
You grin from ear to ear, until Lauren opens the rear door and shows you a big children’s seat, with 5-point harness.
“Really?” You ask her look for another place to sit. The car is stretched and has four seats in the back. Two seats facing two additional seats, that point to the rear of the car. “Can’t I sit on a regular seat, please?”
Laura shakes her head and pushes you on the special seat, before she straps you down. “I am sorry, but that is not possible. Janet is a guest and does not need to sit in a kids car seat and the other two seats are for Eden and me.”

You pout, especially when Eden decides to sit in the front, next to the driver.
“Eden is sitting in the front; I can use the other seat!” You point at it, but Mrs. Laura insists that you stay where you are. “If you continue like this, we stay in the palace, princess.” She warns you and you shut up.

The car starts to move and slide out of a heavy gate. Behind it you see rows of nice single houses, before the buildings begin to get more complex and higher.
“Damn it, I would have never guessed that we are so close to the city!” You shout out and pull at your straps. Janet is impressed as well.

“But haven’t you seen all this on your way in, princess?” Laura asks.

You do not like to think about it, but then you answer: “Not really, I was tired and fall asleep when the car took off from the airport.” Suddenly something pops up in your mind. “I have no money!!!” How can I go shopping when I have not a single EURO??”

Janet giggles and raises her VIP-Card. “My Card is also a credit card and I can spend 150€. I hope that is enough for a dress and ice cream.”
You are soooo jealous at her for that card and look at Laura. “Can I have one as well, please?”
Laura shakes her head, but digs into her satchel and takes out a little stuffed animal, no – it is a small purse that looks like a lion. When you open it you find a couple of banknotes for 50€.
“Why does she get more than me?” You sulk and hug the little lion-purse.

“Princess, you have everything and when you really want something I can buy it for you. That money is for the case that you like to have a snack or something small. You do not need to buy a new dress.” Laura explains.

“Because I am not allowed to wear them anyway.” You cross your arms in front of your chest and look out of the window, ignoring Laura for the rest of the ride.
When the car stops Eden steps out and opens the door. Everybody steps out and finally Laura helps you out of the car seat. The harness has a magnetic lock that you cannot open by yourself. You hate the seat!

“Oh, it is the Princess.”
“Good morning Princess.”
“Beautiful Onesie, Princess.”
“Nice to see you Princess Susan.”
“… “

You hear so many joyful voices that it is impossible for you to answer to all of them, so you call out: “Good morning my dear citizens of Calonia!”

Your group starts to move, while Janet is running around and look at all the stands and windows along the street, while you have Laura and Eden at each of your sides. You are a bit afraid of all the people, since all of them look in your direction when you pass by. You grab Laura’s hand and bit down on your bottom lip while you feel your crotch grow warm and wet.
“Are you okay, Princess?” Laura asks and looks down on you. “You look very nervous.”

You nod your head and walk on. “Everybody is looking at me… that is a bit spooky.” You whisper to her and make her giggle. She digs into her bag and pulls out a pacifier for you.
You shake your head, but she pushes him into your mouth. “Hush little one, it will help you to relax.”

You blush deep red when you start to suck on the pacifier.
“At least nobody expect me to talk to him now.” You think and find the dummy indeed relaxing you.

Suddenly Janet jumps to your side and make even Eden flinch and grab the handle of her weapon.
“YOU HAVE TO SEE THIS!!!” Janet shouts at you and pulls you to a shop, full of elegant and wonderful dresses. She points her finger at a long white dress with almost organic locking pattern in black. The pattern looks like the roots of a tree and are handmade.
“Wow that is beautiful!” You agree – even when the pacifier makes your words a bit unclear.

Janet pulls you with her and you find yourself in the shop.
“Hewo.” You greet the shop assistants and continue to suck on your pacifier. Janet takes the dress in her size and goes to a dressing room, while you look around the room.
Beside “normal” dresses you see some dresses that are close to the one you have been wearing for your interview, with solid fabric on the upper part and transparent skirts or at least with cut-outs to show off the diapers. You notice that you are standing in the kids-section, while Janet is on the mature side.
You sigh and wait for Janet to come out of the changing room when you see a boy of your agree get pulled in by his ear. The elder woman, probably his mother is scolding him and comes closer.
“What have I told you about being whiny?”

“But mommy, I hate shopping, it is so boring and you simply can’t decide for the right pair of shoes. Why don’t you go shipping with your friends?” the young man, that is estimated as old as you, if not older receive a hard slap on his padded behind. He is wearing a white and blue sailor uniform even one of the typical sailor heads. He looks handsome, beside his red ear, that his mother keeps in her fingers.
“You ungrateful brat, I buy you the best and nicest clothes and when I want you to accompany with me, you are bored. Maybe you forgot your place?!” she says and pulls him to a chair, where she takes him over his knees and starts to pull down his diaper. Right next to you and with other people around, she starts to spank him with her bare hand.
Nobody seems to be concerned by this and find it unusual. Laura comes to you to block your view. “Princess, you are starring, that is rude.”

You still hear the slaps and him starting to cry and plea his mother to stop. “Isn’t she too harsh?” You ask Laura, but she shakes her head. “I don’t think so. He was not a good boy and now he receives his punishment, which is okay.”

You look beside her and see his red behind, while his mother keeps spanking him.
“But she has to stop at one point.” You stomp your feet and bit down on you bottom lip.

Seconds later…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: ... the Royal limousine.

choices: An ice cream stand in the park
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You’d really like to tell the women to stop it, but you’re sure it will only have the effect to get you in trouble too, without changing anything for him, so you decide to let it run.
During the scene, however, you wetted your diaper much more, soaking it.
“Umh ... Mrs. Laura?” you says, whispering at her “I need a change.”
She doesn’t understand the full sentence, so she removes you pacifier and you repeat it.
“Sure. Let’s ask the employee at the cash desk where the restroom is.” she replies, taking your hand and leading you to the cashier.
The cashier is a small but good looking woman, and once next to her Laura says “Excuse me, miss. The princess needs to ask you something.”
“Couldn’t she simply ask about the restroom? Why must I ask this?” you think, blushing.
“Oh, you can ask me anything, princess.” she replies, looking at you.
“I need the restroom. Where is it?” you ask.
“Restroom? But at your age you’re still wearing it.” she states.
You understand that she wants you to say it out loud, so you decide to end this charade and say “I need my diaper changed. Can you please tell me where the restroom is, so Mrs. Laura can change me?”
“Off course, cutie pie.” the woman smiles “There is a big sign over there. Follow it and you will find the restroom.”
You greet her, and let Laura lead you to the restroom (always followed by Eden).
“Oh, it’s occupied.” Laura says, once reached the door “Let’s wait for a while.”
After a couple minutes, the door open, and a man takes two girls out of the restroom, holding both of them by one hand with both of his. The girls are almost identical, and you think that they are twins. You think they are 10 or 11 years old. One of them is dressed in a pink onesie with a lock, while the other in a uniform that likes like a Japanese sailor fuku. The one in onesie is thanking her daddy for changing her, while the other is crying.
“It’s not fair, daddy!” you hear her cry “She is the brat, not me!”
“Because she is in locked onesie?” the man replies, moving away from you “Martha was very well behaved today, while you threw a wild tantrum. That’s not acceptable, Marie. You needed that spanking and you know it.”
While they almost disappear from your field of view, you think that maybe the nannies in the Palace aren’t so strict, after all.
“Princess, what are you waiting for?”
Laura’s voice brings you back to reality, and you enter with her in the restroom, while Eden waits outside.
The handmaid puts you over a changing table, and begins to undress you.
“No one will enter, right?” you ask, blushing.
“I locked the door, and Eden stands in front of it. No one will see you getting changed, princess.” Laura replies.
A little more quiet, you let her remove your wet diaper. She then proceeds to clean you up. She is good at this, almost at Rose’s level. Once finished, she puts a fresh diaper on you and puts the onesie back on you, before letting you going down from the changing table.
“Thank you, Mrs. Laura.” you say, blushing.
“No problem, princess. It’s my job, after all.” she states.
She unlocks the door and open it. You get out from the restroom, only to see a man in his late twenties enter in it dragging a girl about 16 or 17 years old, that is wearing a white shirt and a skirt of tulle that doesn’t hide her diaper.
“I had enough of you attitude!” he exclaims “You’re in for a mouth soaping!”
“No, big bro, please. I’m sorry.” she pleas, while he close the door behind her.
“It’s that common?” you ask to Laura.
She nods her head, replying “He’s a young adult and her older brother. It’s normal that he is disciplining her.”
You begin to move away from the restroom door. While you’re still thinking about the punished girl, the woman from before drags the boy about your age in sailor uniform in front of you, saying sternly “Apology to this girl for making a scene in front of her, Taylor.”
The boy, still sobbing, look at you and says “I’m sorry, I didn’t want to bother you.”
You try to resist the urge to say it, but if before you succeeded in it, now you can’t anymore.
You simply reply “No need to.” to him, then you look at his mother and say “I think you’ve been too hard on him. Is normal for a boy to get bored during shopping.”
“Oh, we have a little girl that thinks she has a degree in education.” the woman states, before looking at Laura and says “You should keep an eye to your daughter, Mrs.”
Is this woman dumb? Doesn’t she know you’re the princess? And, for God’s sake, didn’t she saw Eden?
“She is not my daughter.” Laura replies, clearly annoyed by the woman’s comment “I’m just an handmaid. She is princess Susan, and her official caretaker is Queen Susan herself.”
The woman goes pale, and you resist the temptation to laugh at her face, while she says “I’m sorry, I didn’t know. I never saw a picture of you, princess.”
You accept her apology, and she and her son leave. Just as they’re out, however, Laura gives you a smack on the bottom, saying “Princess, criticize a parent for her educational method is rude.”
“But she did that too!” you reply.
“That’s the reason why I didn’t had you giving an apology, princess.” the handmaid says “And you will not be punished for this, but please be more careful with your words.”
You decide to wait for Janet, so you reach the dressing rooms and waits for her. After a couple minutes, she comes out.
She is wearing the outfit she has saw before, and she looks like a goddess of old. With her stunning beauty, her longs legs and long hair and that dress that perfectly fits over her model-like body, she immediately remember you of Sif, Thor’s wife in the Norse myth.
“I tried other similar dresses.” she says, explaining why she took so long “But this is the one I prefer. How do you think I look in this?”
Blushing, you reply “You look fantastic, Janet.”
Laura nods too, saying “I think that’s not age appropriate, but since you’re a guest you can buy it if you like it. I must admit, however, that looks good on you.”
Janet smiles, saying “It’s quite expensive, though. I think this will empty my credit card.”
“Don’t worry.” Laura says “Calonian Royal Hose will buy it for you. Consider it a present for your time in Calonia, Janet. The money on your VIP-card are yours now, it’s not a loan.”
Janet smiles brightly: she is really happy about it.
“I was afraid I had to return them in same way. I’m glad to hear that.” She says.
“Can we have a snack, after this?” you ask.
Laura nods, while Janet goes back in the dressing room and come back with her old dress and the new one in hand. She pays the dress at the cash desk, and you leave the store.
It’s snack time, so Laura takes you to ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You wet your diaper more, soaking it

choices: Eden stops the bicycle before it can hurt you.
You are hit hard and hurt yourself.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Laura takes you to a nearby ice cream stand. You look at the huge variety of different ice and wonder why it is separated in ice for adults and kids. Your fist instinct is to ask Laura, but then you shrug it off and decide to order some mature ice.
“I want that and that and that.” You point your finger at the different kinds of ice and look at the lady behind the counter, but she ignores you and look at Laura.

Since Laura is not saying anything you repeat your order and add: “hey Lady, are you deaf, I am talking to you and I have money to pay for it!” You lift your tiger-purse and shake it. Now you receive a hard smack on your behind and Laura pulls you back.
“Haven’t I told you to be absolute polite to the citizens? Is that the way you talk to adults? If you do not stop this I spank you right here in front of her.”

While you are pulled to the side Janet steps in front of the counter and greets the ice-cream vendor.
“Good morning Ma’am, I am a tourist and I would love to try some of your ice creations.”

The vendor is surprised, but greets Janet.
“It is a pleasure to have you here, and it is good to see that you have very good manners. Some of our local kids have none of those, not even the princess. It seems like some of the stories about her are correct. It looks like she is a naughty girl that requires a strict hand.”

Hearing that you blush deep red. You had thought the woman does not recognize you, but she simply lay the same standards on you that she use on other kids. Janet on the other hand is treated like an adult and receive her order, that she pays with her VIP Card. After a good discount she pays 3€ for her 4 big scoops.
“Now we try again, Princess.” Laura pushes you forward.
Sighing deeply – and receiving another smack for it – you go to the section for kids and talk to Laura. “Please Mrs. Laura, can I have those three kinds of ice-cream?” You point at chocolate, vanilla and strawberry.
Laura address the vendor and orders the ice-cream for you. When she takes one of two exact similar looking chocolate ice-creams she hesitates and looks at Laura: “Are you sure Ma’am?”

Laura nods “It will not hurt her, will it?”

“No Ma’am, it will do her good.” The vender nods and gives the ice-cream to Laura, who gives it to you.
Eden and Laura have no ice, what is not surprising you. Laura sit down at a table, together with Janet and you, while Eden stands beside you and observe the surrounding.
“Mrs. Laura, why was I ignored, that is so rude of that bi… lady.” You caught your tongue in time to avoid another smack or worse.
“Sellers of sweets are asked to sell nothing to minors, to prevent bad teach and overweight of children. Therefore some, like this one, ignore kids and wait for an adult to place the order. It is not uncommon, but she could have explained it to you, that was a bit rude of her.” Laura explains.

You quickly eat your very tasty ice and sit back in your chair. Janet is still eating hers and sits straight and like a lady. “Why are you such a geek? Are you trying to make me look bad?” You spat at Janet.
Laura is about to say something, but Janet is faster.
“Susi, do not be stupid. I am a guest and I try to be accepted as an adult. I have been asked four times why I am not in a diaper since we are in the city and twice I had to show my trainers to proof that I will not pee on the carpets in the shops. If I would behave like you… I they would call child-service or my MOM and ask them to pick me up. It is a kind of self-defense.”

You have not been aware that it is so difficult for Janet, since you have never seen people talking to her. Now you grab her hand and apologies.
Now that Janet has her ice finished as well you get up again and take a last look at the two sections of ice, you had hoped to find the answer yourself, but now you turn to Laura you ask: “Why do they have two seconds? What is the difference?”

Laura grins and point at the kids section. “That ice contains more vitamins and calcium to help kids grow. Some varieties have additional increments, for example laxatives to keep the sweet tooth regular, while the adult section can contain alcohol and some artificial flavors.”

You lost it already when she mentioned laxatives, especially since you feel your tummy rumble a bit. “Laura, are you telling me I just ate some ice that will help me to go number two?!”

Laura sighs and gives you a little slap on your behind. “It is Mrs. Laura and yes, the chocolate will help you go number two quickly.”

You are angry at her and run out of the store, straight in the line of a bicycle. “WATCH OUT!!” You look to your right and see him coming, but your know it is too late. You close your eyes and… wait for the pain…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: An ice cream stand in the park

choices: Ask Mrs. Laura to introduce you a mom with a girl about your age
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You are ready, but when you hear a clash, you are untouched. You open your eyes, seeing Eden on her knees next to the bike: she stopped the bicycle before it can hurt you. The man on it has fallen too, but seems unscratched.
“Eden! Are you ok?” you shout, running to her.
“I’m fine, thank you, my lady.” she replies, getting on her feet again, then asking in a strict tone “And you, princess? Are you hurt?”
You shake you head, still trembling a little. She’s mad at you, and you can clearly feel it.
The man that was on the bike gets up, reaching you too “I’m sorry, when I saw you, it was too late.”
“Don’t worry, it’s not your fault. It’s mine.” you say, apologizing to him for this.
“It’s ok, little one. Just be more careful, ok?” he says, patting your head.
Laura and Janet reach you too, and Laura takes you by your ear.
“Princess! You should be ashamed of yourself!” she scolds you, giving you an hard smack on the bottom “I was scared to death! Look what happened!”
You are about to say that everything is fine, that you notice the broken bike and specially Eden’s left arm: she’s bleeding, even if it seems only a superficial wound.
“I’m sorry, Eden! I’m sorry!” you cry “I understand that you’re mad at me now!”
“It’s only a scratch, princess.” the knightess replies “I’m not mad at you for this, I vowed to die for you, if necessary. No, I’m mad at you because you’ve done a dangerous thing. And I am mad at myself because my reaction was too slow.”
“You know what will happen, don’t you?” Laura asks.
With a sad look, you nod, replying “I get … a spanking.”
“You know you deserve it. A tantrum, especially one that endanger you, will not be tolerated.” Laura says, taking you back in the ice cream store by your ear. She reaches the table where you were sitting before and takes you over her lap.
“Please, Mrs. Laura, can’t you spank me once back in the Palace?” you plead.
She shakes her head, removing your onesie and then your diaper, and saying “No, princess. Every punishment will be delivered on the spot.”
She takes out something from her bag, and you know what it is. When she leans the brush over your bottom, you’re certain of it. And then comes the first spank. It stings, but doesn’t hurt much more than the hand. It’s the normal brush, at least.
She begins to hit you with the brush, and after few hits you are already crying.
“Look, mama, look!” you hear a little girl exclaims “That girl is getting a spanking!”
You don’t see her, but judging by her voice you think she is 7 or 8 years old.
“Don’t be rude, little one.” you hear her mommy says to her “It’s obvious that she deserved it. Be on your best behavior or you’ll be next.”
The little girl pointed at you, put no other customer says anything in seeing your spanking: it’s quite a normal thing for them.
“Will you be disobedient again, princess?” Laura says, while still spanking you.
“No, no, I will obey, I promise!” you exclaim “I’ll be polite and good, please don’t spank me anymore.”
But she continues to spank. Raising you head, you notice that Janet is looking at you and feels clearly really uncomfortable, and she is grasping Eden’s right hand.
“Please, please, Mrs. Laura, stop! I promise to behave!” you sob.
She gives you another set of slaps, before stopping and asking, addressing a man out of your field of vision “Do you think it’s enough, sir?”
“A couple more strokes, maybe.” he replies. You know the voice: it’s the man that were over the bicycle.
The hairbrush lends another two times over your bottom, making you jump over her knees.
“What do you think, Eden?” Mrs. Laura asks again, this time to Eden “Has she received enough?”
“I would give her another set of five, Mrs.” the knightess says. She is still mad, it’s quite obvious.
“Another set, then.” Laura says, and then gives you other five slaps with the brush.
You are sobbing without control, while the handmaid stops her hand. You think it’s finally over, but then she asks “And you, Janet? Do you think that she had enough?”
You look at her: Janet is biting her bottom lip, and says, looking at you “I’m sorry, Susan, but you really scared me this time. What would have happened if that would have been a car instead of a bike?”
She looks at Laura, and says “I think she deserves another ten slaps at least.”
You resist the urge to yell “traitor” to her, while Laura spanks you again, because you know she is right: nothing serious happened but could have been.
After the 10th slap wanted by Janet, Mrs. Laura finally lets you stand up.
“Princess, you know why you have received this spanking?” she asks you.
“Because I disobeyed.” you sob.
“Only partially.” she replies “The main reason is that you endangered yourself, and you did it for nothing.”
You are still crying, aware that she is right. Laura hugs you, and then the same do both Eden and Janet.
You let them go and you are calming down. Mrs. Laura is dressing you back up, when you hear a boy yelling.
“Granny! Granny! I want an ice cream!” he shouts, stomping his food.
An old woman gives him a slap on the bottom, scolding him “Stop this nonsense this instant, young man, or your trousers will come down.”
The boy seems two years older than you, so seems 16 years old. That makes his tantrum look even more ridiculous. He’s wearing a t-shirt, and sweatpants. He’s quite tall, with short brown hair and green eyes.
“But I want one!” he says aloud and begins to hit with his open palms the window of the ice-creams.
“Enough, Samuel!” his grandmother scolds him, taking him to a chair “I’ve warned you, haven’t I?”
She takes him over her lap, then lowers both his trousers and his diaper, and begins to spank him with her hand.
He instantly begins to cry, saying “I’m sorry, granny! I’m sorry!”
You giggle. This one is a brat, without doubts, and deserves this. Or maybe you are a little frustrated for your spanking and you’re simply happy that someone else is getting the spotlight.
Mrs. Laura then says to you “Haven’t I said it’s rude to stare to a punishment, princess?”
“I’m sorry.” you reply, looking away and blushing.
“We still have time before the meeting with the mayor and then going back to the Palace for lunch.” the handmaid states “What would you like to do, princess?”
You see the boy (Samuel) being let get up, while his grandmother is still scolding him “Behave, little one, or we will repeat the lesson.”
Maybe it’s a good occasion to befriend a Calonian that not reside in the Palace. But is it worth it? It’s a 16 years old boy and a real brat (the most immature one you’ve seen so far). Maybe asking to Mrs. Laura to introduce you to a mom with a girl about your age would be wiser?
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Eden stops the bicycle before it can hurt you

choices: Ask Laura about her friend and her daughter.
Ask Laura about her own past.
Beg Laura to use the potty for number 2
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look at Samuel again and shake your head. He seems to be less mature than William – and that is quite a challenge. But on the other hand he seems to be innocent and cute. Maybe you should try it.
“Uhm, Hi, I am Susan. You are Samuel?” You simply speak to him.

He seems surprised, like his grandmother is and nod his head.
“Yes, that is me. I know you…. You are Princess… Susan?” He smiles and bows.
His grandmother sighs and looks at Laura, before she goes to your handmaid and begin to talk to her.

“I just got spanked as well, that is really hard, isn’t it?” You try to keep the conversation alive.

He shrugs and scratches his head. “With my granny I have a 50% chance that it works out when I throw a tantrum. She easily becomes embarrassed about my behavior and I get what I want. This time it was not working out.” He grins and you understands that his naughtiness is more of a strategy than really his true self.

“So you are not a total immature brat?” You asks.

“Well, you have to do what helps you. If I simply ask for ice, she ignores me. If I keep asking her again and again she force me to keep a pacifier in my mouth. Throwing a tantrum is something I can do within seconds and – as I said – I have a serious chance that it works out. With my mom I cannot do that. As soon as I act up the takes me home and locks me in the crib until I promise to be good. With granny I have much more options.” He smiles and does not think for a second that all this is strange.

Laura is coming to you and touch your back to get your attention. “Found a new friend, princess?”

You blush and look at your feet. “I thought it would be nice to have a friend outside of the palace.”

Laura nods and takes your hand. “That is true, I ask his grandmother for his contacts, so you can meet him again, if that is okay for you, Samuel?!”

He nods and suddenly begins to grin. “Sure, that would be nice. You can come around and watch me play soccer – or we eat an ice together, if I am allowed to.”

You nod your head, but have the feeling that this relationship will be difficult to maintain. He is not a total brat, as you thought before, but do you share some interests?”

Laura leads you out of the store, but only a few meters further she stops and calls out to a woman with her daughter.
“Victoria! We have not meet for weeks!” She turns to you and smiles. “Sorry Princess, I think we have a few minutes before we have to proceed. I only want to say hello to an old friend.”

You sigh and look at Janet, who is carrying two bags with the dress she had bought and a couple more items. “Is your tummy doing fine? I heard you ate laxatives?!”
You role your eyes and nod: “DO not remind me. I try not to think about it and only pray that Laura does not need to change me in front of the mayor. That would be really… oh fuck, look at her!”
You point your finger at Laura’s friend’s daughter.
She is about 15 years old with a C-Cup rack you would kill for. Her rich chest is on display, since she only wears a kind of sports bra that has some reins connected in the back. The poor girl is practically on the leash. Beside this, some sports shoes and a thick diaper, she wears some mittens that are marked with a big M. Last but not least she sucks on a pink pacifier that has NAUGHTY GIRL written on its shield.
“Princess… your finger… .” Eden warns you, before Laura sees you pointing at the poor girl. Quickly you take your hand down, but by then the girl has seen you and blush.

You would love to know why she is dressed like this and why it is allowed to punish kids in public – to this degree. It seems very cruel and reminds you of your nightmares. You would have never guessed that people do this for real, but you do not dare to talk to the girl. It looks like she is already in trouble and you do not want to make it worse for her.

Finally Laura is done talking to her old friend. “I am sorry Princess, we went to the same school when she got pregnant and took a break before she finished it.”
Those few words make your mind spin. Laura is not older than 34. Her friend has the same age. Her daughter looks like 15… so her friend got pregnant at 17?? How could that happen when kids are kept in diapers for so long? Or was her friend 18 and just immediately got pregnant??

The four of you walk further to the city hall. You…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Try to befriend Samuel

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You decide to ask Laura about her friend and her daughter. You’re too curious about it.
“So … your friend got pregnant when she was still in diapers?” you ask.
Laura looks at you with a surprised expression, then says “At 19? She was potty trained the year before. It’s however true that she got pregnant quite soon, but she was considered an adult already.”
“19? She is about your age, which is 34, and has a daughter who is 15 years old. So she must have been 17 or barely 18.”
“Take the count again, Susie.” Janet intervenes “If she is 34 now, 15 years ago she was 19, maybe almost 20, not 17.”
You blush, realizing that you had an intense calculation for nothing.
“Sorry.” you say, before asking “Do you know what has she done to earn such a punishment? It’s extremely embarrassing.”
“Yes, she told me about it.” the handmaid replies “She had naughty fun in a public restroom and got caught by a couple with children. That was really shameful, so Victoria had put her in Mittens with the M and for today she will stay next to her, thanks to the baby reins.”
“I would like to meet her.” you say “Maybe when she’s not punished.”
“Sure, princess. I’m sure Zoey, Victoria’s daughter, would be happy about it.” she says,
When you are near a street with cars running on it, Laura takes out from her purse what looks like a corsage with reins attached to it.
“It seems I cannot trust you in letting you free on a street.” she says “So you’ll stay next to me.”
You blush, realizing that would be exactly like the other girl.
“No, Mrs. Laura, please!” you say “I promise to be good!”
“It’s only for the road crossing, then I’ll remove it.” she explains “It’s this, or getting carried in miss Langdon arms. Be aware, however, that the second option will be preceded by another spanking.”
You go pale and shake you head, saying “No, no! No more spankings! I’ll behave.”
Laura smiles and puts you the corsage on. You feel strange, in being attached to her in this way.
Together, you cross the road, and once on the other side Laura removes you corset, like she promised.
“What this that hard, princess?” she asks, smiling and rubbing your hair.
You smile back: she super strict, but you really like her. She’s very kind.
During the crossing, however, you messed yourself, and you’re quite ashamed of this, even if it’s not entirely your fault.
“Are we going to meet the mayor, now?” you ask.
“Yes, we are.” she replies, sniffing the air “If you don’t need a change before that.”
Blushing, you nod, and say “I … I’d really like to. Thank you.”
She takes your hand, and lead you to a small palace with the signboard “City Hall” over the door.
Laura leads you inside, reaching a desk with a young man behind it.
“Yes, ma’am?” he asks, looking at her “Do you need something?”
“I’m handmaid Laura and this is princess Susan. We have an appointment with the mayor.” Laura replies “And the princess needs a change before the meeting.”
The young man (it’s about 23-24 years old, and not handsome at all) says to you “Welcome, princess. I’m glad to meet you.” then points to a changing table at the end of the room, saying “The changing station is right there.”
“What?!” you exclaim, going pale and blushing at the same time “Everyone will see me, there!”
“I’m sorry, princess.” the man says, with a sympathetic tone “But usually children are not allowed in the city-hall, so an entire room only for a changing facility would have been considered a waste of space. You can consider yourself lucky: two years ago, the changing table wasn’t’ at the end of the room, but right next to the main entrance door.”
“Princess, I don’t like this either.” Laura says “But you will not meet the mayor in a dirty diaper. Be a good girl and come with me.”
You look sad, ready for what you think it’s the ultimate humiliation (and it’s not even a punishment!) but then the man winks at you, saying in kind tone “Come on, princess. Be a good girl for your nanny, and I’ll let you have a lollipop after the meeting.”
You smile at him and thank him, before letting Laura leading you to the changing table. Eden follows you too, while Janet waits next to the receptionist desk.
Before being to far away from her, you hear the young man ask to her “And what about you, young lady?”
“I’m Janet. I’m a guest from the USA and I’m training pants.” you hear her reply.
“What a mature girl.” the man says. If they say something else, you don’t hear it.
Laura lifts you on the changing table, while Eden place herself under the handmaid, giving you her shoulders. She is not looking at your change, and this comfort you a little.
Mrs. Laura removes your onesie and then your dirty diaper. She begins to wipe you, when a small group of employees enter from the front door.
They take a quick look at you and you wish to disappear in the ground, but contrary to what you would have expected, they then proceed ignoring you.
Laura finishes to clean you up, before putting you in fresh diaper.
“Nice and clean.” she says, rubbing your hair. She then takes you down from the changing table and puts the onesie back on you.
“The mayor is waiting for us.” she says “We’d better don’t’ make him wait for long.”
“The mayor … is a male?” you ask, almost surprised. With every person of power that you’ve met so far female, you thought to meet a female mayor too.
“Princess, in Calonia we firmly believe in gender equality.” she explains “Politicians, royals, worker, official, knights. In every job and position, you’ll find both men and women of all ages, from young adults to old ones. There aren’t any of them in the Palace, but there are even male nannies.”
You are quite happy to hear this, since you are a believer of gender equality, but at the same time you’re happy to have nanny Rose as your nanny and not a male. That would have been quite embarrassing. Thinking better about it, William has a female nanny, even if he’s a boy. Having a nanny of the opposite sex must not be that uncommon.
Laura takes you in the corridors, holding your hand. Eden and Janet both follow you.
She stops in front of a door with a plate similar to the ones in the palace on it. The plate says “Mayor’s office”.
“Me and Janet will wait for you here.” Laura explains “The mayor wants to speak with you privately.”
“And Eden?” you ask.
“She is your bodyguard, so she can come.” Laura replies.
Noticing the doubt in your face, the knightess intervenes, explaining “An escort of a noble family member, like a royal family member like you are, it’s not considered a person during a private meeting. For example, in this case, the mayor will not greet me nor will say anything to me at all. I will be like a ghost.”
“But it’s unfair!” you exclaim “You ARE a person, not a ghost.”
“My lady, this s my job.” Eden says “This procedure has been introduced to allow escorts to protect the nobles even during a private meeting. If you insist that he treats me like a person during a formal occasion, I would not be allowed to stay at your side.”
“Can’t you wait outside, then?” you insist “I don’t’ like the idea of you treated like a ghost. It’s not a dangerous situation, right?”
“I could.” she says “But I will not do it. I vowed to protect you, and I will not leave you alone with a stranger, even if it’s a respectable person like the mayor.”
You nod, aware that you can’t ask her to fail her duties: that would shame her name.
“And I suggest you to behave during the meeting.” Laura concludes “The mayor has the authority to spank every naughty boy and girl of the city, and the Royal Palace it’s formally part of it.”
With that last advice, you then knock the door, and a voice of a middle-aged man replies “Come in.”
You open the door and enter, followed only by Eden.
The mayor is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Ask Laura about her friend and her daughter

choices: “One last stop before we go back… “
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You enter he room and find a very round man behind a big desk. It takes you a second to notice, but with his white beard and red jacket he looks a bit like Santa Clause.
“Hello Sir, I am Princess Susan and it is a honor to meet you.” You greet him and he comes around his desk and nods at you. He is very tall and in his shadow you step back, only to notice that Eden is standing behind you. Her presence make you feel a bit better and you shake his strong hand.

“Welcome Princess, It is a honor for ME to meet you. Most of what I heard about you helps me to look into the future with a smile.” He smells off after shave, what seems strange to you, since he is obviously not shaving his beard, but you are a girl and have no clue what smell you should expect from him.
“I see you had mixed feelings about Richard?!” You smile and follow him to his desk. To your surprise you find a normal looking chair for guests and one a bit smaller with a kitten-pillow laying on it. Blushing a bit you sit down on the kitten-chair and look up at him.

“Indeed the fact that Queen Charlotte found you is a relief for me. Lord Richard is a nobleman, nothing less – but for sure nothing more. He can spend his time and money in Monaco and leave us alone.” He smiles and continue the conversation with less political topics. He is very nice and kind and asks you about your life in the states and if it is difficult to adapt. You feel brave enough around him to be honest and tell him that the tradition is very strange for you, but that you are eager to adapt.
“That is very good to hear. Can I offer you a snack?”

Careless you say yes and he calls his secretary over the phone and ask her to bring a snack for a little girl. Only a minute later she comes in with a tray and place it on the desk.
His secretary wears a long dress in black that ends just below her knees. She smiles at you and winks. “Should I feed her Sir, it would be a pleasure.”

The mayor sakes his head and walks around the desk. He sits down on the second chair in front of the desk and takes a bib from the tray.
“Thank you Jenny, I do that myself.”

“As you wish Sir Preston.” His secretary says and leaves the room.

You have not paid much attention to the tray, but now you see a bowl with a spoon instead of the cookies you had expected.
“You will love this, it is mashed banana. I asked your Nanny for your favorite snacks and she told me that you would like this.” He smiles and ties the bib around your neck.

“I could feed myself, Sir.” You blush and feel a bit uneasy.

“Hush little princess, you are only a kid and I will not miss the chance to feed a sweat girl like you. How often do I have the chance to feed a princess? … honestly this is my first time. Now open up for the airplane.”
Sir Preston obviously is used to smaller children. You would guess that he has grandchildren, by his age. Still, he feeds you like an expert and waits patiently for you to swallow each spoon full. The mashed banana is very tasty, but you would have preferred cookies or cake – but maybe that is not healthy enough for a little girl.

When you are done he wipes your mouth and bows.
“That was very nice princess. I liked your little talk and would not mind to invite you from times to times.”

You feel quiet full, but smile as well. He is a very nice person and to meet him was way less difficult as you had expect it.

You and Eden leave his office. Outside Laura and Janet wait for you.
“Okay.” Laura says,…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: A very kind man

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“One last stop before we go back to the Palace.”
“I thought that meeting with the mayor was the last step for this morning.” you say, a bit surprised.
“That was the plan, yes.” Laura explains “But during your time with the mayor with met a person that was in the city hall today for coincidence, and she’d really like to speak with you.”
“Who are you talking about, Mrs. Laura?” you ask.
Laura replies, smiling “Someone that would like to be your friend. You will not be forced to meet her, of course. It’s not a formal meeting or anything, but I think would be good idea.”
You are now really curious, so you nod your head.
“Yes, I’d like to meet this person.” you say.
Laura smiles and takes your hand, leading you to door with a plate saying “chief councilor of the city council” on it.
“What a pompous title.” you say to yourself.
Laura knocks the door, meanwhile saying “I’ll wait here. You, Janet and Eden can all enter.”
You hear a voice from the other side of the door, a male voice: “Come in.”
You are surprised. Laura said that you were about to meet a “she”.
Laura opens the door, gently pushing you inside the room. Janet and Eden follow you, while Laura closes the door behind them.
In the room, you see a well-dressed and quite short man in his early forties, that greets you with a tired smile.
“I’m sorry for having requested your presence, princess.” he says “I tried to say to her that you were busy, but she insisted that she wanted meet you.”
Before you can ask to him who he’s talking about, a girl about your age jumps in your direction, hugging you and saying in a high-pitched voice “Hi, princess! I’m glad to meet you!”
The man sighs, saying “Please don’t choke her, Tabitha.”
The girl named Tabitha lets you go, then takes you hands in hers, saying “I’d really like to be your friend. Really, really much! Do you want me as your friend?”
You blush and take a look at her. She’s not much tall, and with a couple of breasts even smaller than yours. She has very long red hair, and two small eyes. Those are quite strange, because they are grey. She’s wearing a red infant bodysuit closed with snaps over her crotch, that doesn’t hide at all her thick diaper.
“Umh …” you say, a little hesitant “… before that, I think we should know each other better. For example, my name is Susan.”
Without waiting even for a second, she exclaims “My name is Tabitha, but my friends call me Tabby. I like playing with dolls. I cuddle them, but when they misbehave I spank them. Oh, and my dad is an important person of the city council. He has as boss only the mayor himself.”
Noticing your trouble with this girl so full of energy, Janet intervenes, saying “Nice to meet you, Tabby. My name is Janet. I’m the princess best friend and a guest here in Calonia.”
Tabitha immediately hugs her, saying “Nice to meet you too! The more we are, better it is!”
Then she looks at Eden and jumps at her, hugging her too, exclaiming “A Royal Knight! I’ve never seen one!”
You giggle, in seeing Eden becoming red like a tomato. She wasn’t expecting that for sure.
“Tabitha! Stop!” her father scolds her “Royal Knights are not for hugging.”
Tabitha looks at him, without letting Eden go, and replies “No, no! I hug who I want! Meanie dad!”, then sticks her tongue out to him.
The man reaches her, drags her away from Eden and gives her a hard smack on the bottom, saying “Do you want a spanking in front of the princess, Tabitha?”
She cries, saying she’s sorry.
“It’s okay, little one.” Eden intervenes, surprising you “No offence taken. But you should obey your daddy when he says something to you.”
Tabitha nods, then looks at you and say “You can invite me in the palace when you want! I’d really like to play with you!”
You nod, thinking that maybe she’s a better choice than Samuel.
You are about to say goodbye, when something crosses your mind. You bite your bottom lip, uncertain, but then you ask “Do you get spanked a lot, Tabby?”
You had expected her to blush or to tell you to mind your business, but she instead smiles, replying without problem “Oh, I’m spanked a lot! Yesterday I was spanked three times, got two mouth soaping and I spent almost an hour in corner time, with the nose in the corner and hands on the head. This morning daddy spanked me only once, for messing his desk. But usually I’m spanked by mommy of by the baby-sitter. I like her, but she’s too strict compared to mommy and daddy.”
She said everything (and it’s much more than you asked for) in a complete normal tone, without a trace of embarrassment, like if it’s a complete normal thing.
But then she asks you, taking you off guard “And what about you? I’m curious. Is a princess spanked as much as a commoner?”
You blush deeply, uncertain of what reply. Once again, Janet intervenes to help you, even if this time you would have preferred her to shut up: “Oh, she gets a lot of spankings. Before the meeting with the mayor she got a long and hard spanking by Mrs. Laura with the hairbrush for crossing the street without enough attention. And her potty mouth often gets her a mouth soaping. And not mentioning the times I saw her in locked clothes or in mittens.”
You blush again, exclaiming “Janet! Please!”
Tabby giggles, then says “It was fun meeting you, princess. Now I think I need a diaper change. I wetted myself a lot and if I wait too long to ask for a diaper change to a grown-up, I get a rash. And, consequently, a spanking.”
You nod, an after greeting her and her dad, you leave the office.
Outside, Laura asks you how the meeting was, and you tell her you’d like to invite her at the Palace sometimes, while you still have to think about Samuel. And you remember her that you’d like to meet Zoey, Victoria’s daughter, too.
“You want a lot of friends, uh?” Laura says, ruffling your hair “That’s a good thing. I’m sure the Queen will be happy about it. You know, when she discovered your existence, but before coming to America to pick you up, she was worried that you could be a sociopath without friends. We are all glad you’re not.”
You blush, realizing that in USA you have Janet and very few others as friends. Here in Calonia, however, you feel more at ease in meeting persons about your age. Maybe it’s because they are like big children? Or it’s because you feel more childish yourself? You’re not sure about it.
“Are we going back to the Palace, now?” you ask.
Laura nods, replying “Of course. There you’ll have your lunch, you’ll take you nap and then you’ll attend your class and go back to nanny Rose to tell her if you earned demerits. Then, you’ll have the rest of the day free.”
You shake your head, thinking that she doesn’t needed to explain your entire afternoon program, since you asked her only about the return.
All together you go back to the limousine (you are put in baby reins for the road crossing). Once secured in the kids seat, Laura and Janet takes place around you, while Eden sits next to the driver.
You then go back to the Palace. There, Laura lead you to your nursery, when you meet Meredith along the way.
“Hug attack!” she exclaims, hugging you.
You hug her back, asking her about her morning. You are eager to know about Marcus Grairven.
“The supply teacher is very kind.” she says, surprising you “He gave me few demerits and even helped me with clever advices to how to work on my shyness. He had that big scary paddle over the desk, but I didn’t used it. He said “I only use the paddle on naughty girls that deserve it”. I was surprised.”
You clench your first, thinking “That bastard! He paddled me and Janet because he hates me!”
On the other side, you are relieved in hearing that Merry didn’t get a paddling. Janet will not be paddled anymore, and you have Melissa’s note about the maximum strokes he can give you.
You greet Merry, and only when she’s away you think that William wasn’t with her.
Once at the nursery’s door you open it.
Inside, you see Rose, that smiles at you. She is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “One last stop before we go back."

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose is alone in the nursery and fiddle around with her French maid uniform. When she sees you, she quickly button op her top and smiles at you, still blushing a bit.
“Princess, it is nice to see that you are back in one piece. Now let’s get you feed and put to bed.”

You nod and go to her. She checks your diaper and smiles when she finds you dry and clean. This is how it should be when you are in the care of Mrs. Laura. Maid Alice is not around. You wonder if she is still working for Nanny Melissa or what she is doing. Maybe she is already working as a normal maid again?!
Rose seems to be preoccupied and runs around the nursery without doing anything with it. Every other second she presses her hands on her breasts and seems to be in pain.
“Nanny Fletcher, are you okay?” You ask her, really concerned.

“Uhm, I am very sorry princess. I was a stupid woman and took a medicine I should not have taken.” She comes to you and strokes your face. “I found some pills in the back of my medicine cabinet and took them. The title said Nurse-medication and by the increments it should be not much more than vitamins. But now by breasts are swollen and hurting and… “ She blushes even more. “Now I am lactating.”
With big eyes you watch her opening the buttons in the front of her uniform and show you her bra, with big wet spots over the nipples.

To see her in pain hurts your heart and before you re-think your spontaneous idea you blur it out: “Would it help if you nurse a baby? Would that take away the pressure?”

Nanny Rose smiles and nods her head. “Yes that would help me a lot. Oh thank you Susan!”
She give you a wet kiss on the forehead and before you know it, she lifts you up, carries you to the chair and sit you down on her lap.
“You are such a good little girl, I can be happy to be your nanny.” Rose says and pushes her bra to the side.

“I did not mean… mhhh.” You want to say that you were talking about a real baby, or another baby, not yourself, but Rose is so eager to get rid of the painful pressure in her breasts that she misunderstood you and pushes her nipple into your mouth. As soon as you tongue touch her flesh, you feel milk dripping and filling your mouth. In reflex you gulp down the warm, rich milk and find yourself nursing from her.
After the first shock is over you have already two mouthfuls down and shake yourself away from her breast.
“Rose! This is wrong, I should not nurse from you.” You say, before she gets hold of the back of your head and guide your mouth back to her nipple.
“Hush baby, there is nothing wrong with this. Many kids have a wet-nurse, even in higher age. It was not planned, but please help me out. I am not sure how long the effect lasts, but if might go away on its own.”
This is not the news you had hoped for. You have to admit that the taste is good, but to suck on her nipple feels simply close and even kind of sexual, especially since it makes Rose feel so much better.
Your sucking takes away her pain and replaces it with a very nice sensation that make her blush and slightly moan out whenever your tongue touch her nipple.
After several minutes she changes your position to the other nipple and again feeds you until her milk runs dry. When nothing comes out, she lowers you down and smiles.
“Oh thank you Susan, I know that was strange, but I was in real pain. Please do not complain about me.” Her eyes fill with tears and she starts to sob.
“I am sorry Susan, I am a bad nanny and stupid.”

You slide from her lap and hug her tightly.
“It was… strange, but I will not report you or anything. We can keep this a secret. Nobody must know about it.” You offer, not wanting your friends to know that you just nursed on your nanny.

Rose nods and buttons up her dress, covering her breasts. To your surprise she brings in a baby bottle and takes you on her lap again.
“Do I have to drink even more? I had a snack in the city and… your milk.”

“Please princess, we need to make sure you receive all that you need.” She begs you and obediently you finish the bottle as well. Then she put you down into your crib for your nap. Your stomach is full of milk and formula and before you fall asleep you feel the crotch of your diaper become warm and wet. Still, or maybe because of that, you sleep like a baby and wake up two hours later by Rose’ soft voice.
“Princess, Time to go to class. I heard that Mr. Grairven is in a good mood today. Try to be a good girl and you will be fine.”

You stretch and yawn and say hello to Janet, while Rose checks your diaper, but decide that you are not wet enough for a change. Outside in the hallway you and Janet meet Eden, who escorts you to your class. Janet is in a great mood. She is wearing one of her new dresses and spin the skirt all the time.
When you enter the classroom with her you find…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: alone.

choices: “Can I play with Merry and Willy?”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
(Chapter 100. Wow!)

Mr. Grairven is standing near the teacher’s desk. He’s reading a newspaper, smiling. His paddle stands over the desk, threatening as usual.
“Good afternoon, Mr. Grairven.” you say, entering with Janet. Eden waits at the door, like usual.
The teacher puts down the newspaper and looks at the clock, saying “Good afternoon to you too, princess. Good afternoon, Janet. Right on time, I see. The paddling seemed to be effective, after all.”
You resist the impulse to say him to fuck himself with a chainsaw, and reply “I will try to behave, today, sir.”
“I’m glad to hear it.” he says “After you two’s lesson, I thought that your friends would be two troublemakers too, but they are polite and diligent. I hope you will not corrupt them with your influence. Now, take position at your desks, so we will begin.”
“I have to give you this, first.” you say, and give him the note with Melissa’s signature that Rose gave you after your ... embarrassing moment with her. The teacher takes the note and read it.
“A maximum number of stroke, uh? I don’t agree, but I don’t have the authority to deny it.” he says, then looks at Janet “But you, miss, will get a paddling right now, for coming in my class dressed as a streetwalker.”
“I’m sorry sir, but I will not let you paddle me this time.” she says “First of all, I’m dressed in a dress that fits my age, not like a whore. And I’m a guest with a VIP-Card, so you have no authorization to paddle me against my will.”
He sighs, saying “I’m aware of that. I was only hoping that you wanted to submit to a little discipline. If you don’t want, I can’t force you.”
You laugh out loud, without thinking.
“Very well. Is seems that a paddling WILL occur, after all.” he says, taking his paddle.
You regret doing it, but you submit. After this paddling (that stings like hell), the lesson finally begins.
Today you find that your teacher is far more tolerant than last time, and gives you even some wise advice to how to handle a public speech. At the end of the lesson, he has paddled you two more times: the first paddling is for failing at math, like usual, the second one for speaking without permission.
When the lesson is finally over, Mr. Grairven gives you the note with your demerits. E gives one to Janet too.
“12 demerits for princess Susan, 7 demerits for Janet.” he says “Give this to your nanny, please.”
“I’m exonerated from the demerit system, sir.” Janet says to him.
Mr. Grairven shakes his head, replying “The way your nanny will administer it, or not administer it at all, it’s not my concern. I have the duty to give a note with your behaviour.”
After this, he gives a quick look at the newspaper, smiling.
“So, princess, will you be present at the great party?” he asks you.
“Party? What party?” you ask.
He look at you straight in your eyes, exclaiming “You don’t know about the party? Incredible. House Penrose-Glee, the cadet house of the disappeared Penrose House, which is the House of King Gregory, first king of Calonia, organize a party every year. It’s considered one of the most important parties of the country. Only the most important nobles are invited. My cousin assured me that he’ll have them invite me too, this year. We don’t know when the party will occur, yet, but it will be quite soon, I’m sure.”
You are surprised, and you are not sure if going to this party would be an immense pleasure or a total stress, so you aren’t sure if you’d really want an invitation.
“Janet.” you says to your friend “Can you wait for me outside? I need to tell something to Mr. Grairven.”
Janet seems confused, as Mr. Grairven himself. Your friend nods, greets the teacher and leaves the room.
“What is it, princess?” he asks, with a flat tone.
“I didn’t like you calling my friend a whore, just for having dresses that fit her age.” you tell him, sure of yourself thanks to Eden presence.
“Really?” he says “She’s a guest, so I can’t force her to change, but in Calonia, the tradition wants that children are dressed like children, until they are 18 years old.”
“Stop this charade!” you exclaim in his face “I know your secret: your Hose doesn’t respect the tradition! You are potty trained early like in the USA!”
Mr. Grairven shoot you with his glance, but he resists the temptation to choke you only because Eden is standing at the door.
“Little brat.” he whispers “How did you discovered it?”
“Your cousin, lord Richard, told it to me personally.” you reveal.
“That idiot!” Marcus exclaims, to your surprise “He’s totally incapable of keeping a secret. Just for pairing, I will tell you a secret too. I can’t stand him, nor can my sister.”
You look at him, with a surprised expression “Are you serious? You paddled me like a slave of cotton plantations for speaking ill of him, and you can’t stand him?”
“I paddled your diapered behind, princess, not your naked back. Don’t compare yourself with slaves of old, or with the maids of our residence: they could tell you what a true punishment is.” he replies “And I support my cousin, because is the only member of our House with the possibility to be king. If a Grairven become king, all of us will have a benefit. This doesn’t mean I like him. That arrogant man.”
You are surprised, and not just a little. Marcus is not a good person. He still think that whipping servants is right, and thinks only to his personal gain. However, he’s not evil like you thought the first time. And he’s a capable teacher. Melissa was right. Denying him the job only for his last name would have been unfair.
“I’m sorry, Mr. Grairven.” you say “I still don’t like you, but I now see you are different from your cousin. This doesn’t mean I will not try my best to be queen, though.”
He nods, replying “Only with a true rival House Grairven can thrive. Richard thinks that would have been better if you weren’t never born, to gain an easy access to the throne, but I think that he should earn it only defeating you. He forgot the ancient say of the founder of the House, “A man it’s strong only when he defeats strong enemies”. That it’s a Grairven way.”
You greet him, and leave the room.
House Grairven it’s a house of warriors, strong and determined. That always made them seems all evil at your eyes. You know see that they are simply bold and with a powerful will.
But Richard is rotten. You will never let him getting the throne.
You reach Janet, who is waiting for you, and aloud you say “Janet! Eden! I take a vow! I will be Queen, and Richard will bite the dust.”
The two looks at each other, and Janet giggles.
You return to your nursery, where you give Rose your demerits.
“12 demerits. I think that a spanking it’s necessary.” she says, reading the note.
“Please, nanny. He already spanked me for that.” you plea her.
But Rose shakes her head and sits down on chair, saying “I’m sorry, princess, but you need it. This spanking will be extra hard.”
Already crying, you lay yourself over Rose’s lap, ready to receive your spanking. Rose raises her arm, and gives you two playful swats over your diaper.
“Done.” she says, giggling.
“Nanny!” you exclaim, blushing “You tricked me!”
“I couldn’t resist, princess.” she giggles. Janet was mentally prepared to watch your punishment, and laughs instead.
You leave her laps, asking her:
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: A happy Mr. Grairven

choices: Rose asks you to help her out, again.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Do you know about the party?” You ask Rose.

She looks surprised and nods her head.
“Sure princess, It will be next Saturday and probably last until Sunday, haven’t you talked about it with Nanny Melissa?”
You shake your head and Rose explains more. “House Penrose-Glee invites the top 100 of the country each summer and has a wonderful party. Sometimes it is a Masquerade, sometimes it has special slogan, but it is always great.” She is smiling and her eyes are filled with joy and you wonder if she is invited as well or if she just imagines being there.
“Rose, will you go to that party as well?” You ask to be sure.
“That depends on the invitation, sometimes it is only for the invited person. In your case it would be you and Eden as your shadow.”

“I don’t like it if everybody is calling her a shadow or a ghost. She is a nice person.” You say, pouting.

Rose ruffles your hair and gives you a kiss on the forehead. “Oh cutie! Yes she is nice, but being a ghost means that she can go to that party and at least enjoy it a bit, while I have to see if you are allowed to bring your nanny or not. Sometimes they put a strict limit to the number of guests and then I cannot come – but if I am lucky, I am allowed to.”

You smile to her and suddenly imagine what it would mean if she is NOT allowed. “So, if WE are unlucky I go alone and nobody will change my diaper? Isn’t the party including drinks and will last very long?”

Rose laughs out and giggles: “One of their nannies would change your diaper, if they think it is needed. You should be more worried about the treatment of children on that party and hope that you will not get separated from the adults. That would make it way less enjoyable.”
You do not understand what she is talking about, so she explains: “You are a minor, but the princess, therefore they will invite you, but maybe they send all minors to bed at 9 to enjoy the rest of the party without kids. Then it could be, that they have a kind of sleepover with the other kids or they simply put you in a crib and tell you to sleep.”

“Couldn’t I go home? I have a limousine.” You grin, but Rose shakes her head.
“That would be very unlikely. If we are lucky I can come with you and when it is time for you kids to go to bed, I will tuck you in and stay with you until you are sleeping.”

This all sounds very unfair for you. If there is a party and you are invited you want to celebrate and have fun. “How was Queen Charlotte treated when she was a kid? I want the same for me!”

Rose shakes her head and laughs: “No, you do not want that. The minor princess Charlotte was parade in onesie and thick diapers, by reins from her Nanny Samantha. Then she was put in a playpen in a corner of the Party until 9, before her Nanny feed her a bottle and put her to bed in a locked crib, before Samantha changed from her strict uniform to a fashion dress and spend the rest of the night dancing and having fun.”

You try to match the picture of the old hack with a young woman dancing, but that does not work. Then you feel sorry for Queen Charlotte and decide that you better do not ask for the same treatment. “Okay, I will ask the Queen to double-check the invitation or ask the house Penrose-Glee to provide more details. If I can choose, I like you to come with me. The idea of another nanny changing me is… not nice.” You say, but mean “stupid”, at least.

You turn to leave Rose, to play with Merry, William and Janet, when…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “Do you know about the party?”

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Queen Charlotte appears at the door, walking in. She looks at you, passing by Eden and Janet.
“Susan!” she exclaims. She seem in the verge of tears and to your surprise hugs you tightly.
“Never do something like that! Never again!” she sobs, still hugging you.
“Your Majesty, please, a bit of self-control.” Rose intervenes, putting a hand on her shoulder “What happened?”
The Queen calms herself down a little, lets you go and grabs your shoulders.
“Laura told me about the incident! My heart lost a beat! You cannot put yourself in danger, princess. Promise me something like that will never happen again.” she says, clearly referring to the incident with the bike.
“The incident?” asks Rose sternly, making you going pale “What incident is she talking about, princess?”
“Umh ...” you stutter “... I had a little ... accident with a bike.”
She is clearly not satisfied with your answer, but as the Queen tries to say what happened, Rose stops her “No, your majesty. Her discipline is MY duty. She will tell me exactly what happened with her own lips, if she doesn’t want a mouth soaping.”
Blushing, you tell her everything that happened around the ice cream stand, concluding with “Mrs. Laura already punished me for this, with a hard and long spanking. Please, don’t punish me again.”
“Oh, cutie.” Rose says, ruffling your hair “I don’t punish someone that has already been punished, so I will not punish you for it. However, I should punish you for not telling it to me. This time, I will not do it, but if something like that happen again, your mouth will be washed with soap. It’s that clear?”
You nod, hugging her and saying “I’m sorry, mommy.”
That sentence come out from your lips in an extremely spontaneous way. You blush, immediately saying “I meant nanny! Nanny! With a lot of N!”
Rose giggles, replying “No offence taken, little one. Not at all.”
The Queen, on the other hands, looks sad. To try to console her, you hug her too, saying “I’m sorry for calling nanny Rose that way, mommy Charlotte.”
The queen gives you a tired smile. She understood that your sentence this time wasn’t spontaneous at all, but she appreciates the gesture.
