“Just promise me that you’ll try to stay safe.” the queen says. As you promise that, she greets you and leaves the room, stopping next to Eden for a moment saying “Good job. I’m happy we chose you.”
Eden puts her hand on the heart and bows a little, while the Queen goes away.
You greet Rose and leave too, with Janet and Eden. You’re going straight to Melissa’s nursery. If the siblings aren’t there, the nanny will for sure know where they are.
“Mommy Rose, uh?” Janet giggles, during the way.
“Oh, shut up.” you simply say to her, blushing.
You reach the nursery and knock.
“Come in.” Melissa says, without even asking who were knocking.
You open the door, and you see nanny Melissa and William. The nanny is the middle of the room (you now know, after spending time with her, that she puts herself there every time someone knocks), while Willy is hugging his stuffed bear, giggling. You look around, and find Merry too. She is in a corner of the room, with the nose in the corner and her hands on the head. She is wearing a t shirt, a thick diaper and nothing else. Her behind (the part visible, at least) is bright red. She also have a band around the back of her head, and you presume she is gagged with a pacifier.
“Hi, princess. Hi, Janet.” Melissa greets you, while Willy runs into you and stops next to your friend, greeting her.
“Hi, nanny Melissa.” you say “What is Merry punished for?”
“She wanted to see you once you were back from your trip.” the tall nanny replies “So she had the brilliant idea to slip away from the nursery in hiding.”
You feel bad for this, and says “So it’s my fault. I’m sorry.”
You were expecting Melissa to scold you and spank you for corrupting the prime minister’s daughter, but she shakes her head instead, saying “No, princess, don’t take blame for something you couldn’t control at all. It’s her fault, and her fault alone.”
The nanny come closer to you, and whispers to your ears, with a pitch so low that even you have trouble hearing her words “It’s my duty to punish her if she does something like that, but I like that she broke a rule for a friend. She’s always so shy. You are a good friend for her, but try not to get her too in trouble.”
You nod, while Janet and Willy both look at you in curiosity, as the nanny reaches Merry.
“You can go to play with the princess, if you want.” she says to her “But you’ll get your dress back this evening.”
Meredith nods, relaxing her arms and turning around. She is really gagged in a pacifier.
“I will remove the gag.” Melissa says, unlocking it “But you will be put in it again once you’re back.”
She nods again, and comes in your direction, trying to smile.
Before go, however, you ask to nanny Melissa “Nanny, can you change my diaper? I wetted myself during today’s lesson and I forgot to ask Rose about it.”
“And she forgot to check you? I really doubt it.” she states.
“I distracted her asking about the party.” you say.
Melissa sighs, replying “Ok, I will change you, but I want you to tell her that you had a diaper change from me.”
You nod, thinking that you will simply not tell her, so she will not know you had your diaper changed and you will be praised for having kept your diaper dry.
Melissa lifts you on the changing table, while your friends give you a bit of privacy leaving the nursery. Eden stands at the door, but doesn’t look in your direction.
Once you are in a fresh diaper, however, Melissa puts you in lockable plastic pants, something you wore only in your first day in Calonia, and says, locking it “I will give the key to Rose myself. I want to be sure you don’t lie.”
She then dresses you back up in your onesie (a green one, that Rose had put on you after your nap) and lets you leave the nursery.
Trying to don’t think about the locked plastic pants (and what Rose will say about your change), you try to have fun with your “crew”.
You run through the corridors, playing “tag”. After a while, however, William goes to slam against a floor clock. The clock sways, before falling down with a loud slam, getting into pieces.
“No!” Merry yells “Nanny Melissa will roast my hiney with the spoon for this! The hiney of all of us!”
Eden sighs, and intervenes “I suggest to leave, before someone sees this.”
“What’s happened?” you hear a voice.
Too late, dammit!
Before your eyes, a maid appears. You immediately recognize her: is the red haired maid from the laundry.
“Princess? The minister’s children?” she says, coming closer “What the hell happened here?”
“We’re sorry, it was an incident.” you say.
She sighs, replying “I should report this to the Housekeeper.”
Remembering that Mrs. Amelia is one of the three servants (excluding the nannies) with the authority to spank you (and to spank the siblings, you think) you plea here “Please, sweet maid. Don’t tell her anything.”
She bites her bottom lip, then says “I will let you choose, princess. You can all get a light spanking from me, like a maintenance spanking over your diapers, but you have to ask for it since I wouldn’t otherwise have the authorization to do it, or you can come to me to see the Housekeeper.”
You choose ...

1 - Let her spank you. It’s a light one, after all.
2 - Go to the Housekeeper. Maybe she will not punish you at all, but she could also punish you harsher than the maid.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Queen Charlotte comes in

choices: That you could try something on the butler.
That you have to try it alone.
That it is not worth to try it.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look at your friends and decide for them. “We take the light spanking by you, if you promise not to tell anybody about it.”

The maid nods and sits down on a nearby chair, patting her knees. “Then come to me ask beg me to spank you, my naughty little gang.” She grins and you go to her.
“Would you please spank me, I have been naughty and deserve it.” You feel very stupid to ask for a spanking, but if this would avoid further trouble you are willing to do what is needed.
Eden stands in the hallway and snickers a bit, obviously this is a rare situation for her as well, while you lay over the maids lay and receive ten slaps over your padded behind with her open hand. It is not hurting much, it is more the noise and the fact that you begged for this that makes it humiliating and a punishment.
After you it is the turn for Merry and William, while Janet stands at the site and bite down on her bottom lip. When it is her turn she hesitates. “I do not have a padded behind, at least not that much. Can you spank me extra light, please?” She raises the skirt of her sexy dress and shows her training pants.
You want to hold her back and tell her that she does not need to be spanked, but you are not sure if the maid would agree with that. Instead you watch her best friend receive ten slaps over her training pants and end up sobbing a bit.
Just when you think you are all done and can leave the crash site and the broken clock you hear steps approaching. “Guys, RUN!” You call out and William and Meredith run as fast as their diapers allow them to. Janet is still a bit weak on her legs and wipe her eyes when you pull her to her feet.
You look at Eden, that stands in the hallway like a lighthouse – visible for everybody, and curse.
“Fuck! Now we are screwed!” It is clear that whoever is coming has seen Eden, therefore it is only logical that you are caught already.
“Janet, move your long legs and take the exit to the garden.” You push and pull her off.
Finally Janet is snapping out of it and hurried off.

To your surprise the young maid follows her quickly. Now only you and Eden stand beside the broken clock. “I guess you will not take the blame, will you?” You ask the knightess and she shakes her head smiling a little, amused that you tried.

Then a tall shadow falls on you and you look up the black uniform of Mr Benedict Harper, the Head Butler. “Oh, the maid must have noticed who is coming and was afraid to be punished by him.” You think when you look at your feet and search for the right words.
“Good afternoon Princess Susan, I see you begin with some renovations?” He grins and looks at the pieces, which have been an antic clock, minutes before.
“Mr Harper, I am very sorry… I was…playing and slipped into it.” You lie straight into his face.

“You played? All alone – and slipped?” He asks, not believing your lie for a second. He looks around, but cannot see anybody else. Then he looks at Eden, but not even tries to receive and answer from her. He knows what her job is.
“And she was never in danger to get hurt?” he asks her instead.

“No Sir, not for a second.” Eden answers and bows her head.

“Well, so I only need to punish the princess for destroying an old piece of furniture that was worth as much as a small car?!” He scratch his head and you can feel your behind itching, expecting to be spanked again. Instead he shakes his head and begins to write down a note.
“You know, I noticed that some girls does not mind to receive a spanking – I would even say, some girls LIKE to get a spanking.” He grins and gives you the note. “But I am sure your nanny knows an effective punishment for you, little one.”

You look down on the note and see that he asks Rose to pick a punishment for breaking the expensive clock by slipping into it and lying to an adult. Then he ruffles your hair and walk on.
As soon as he is out of sight your friends come back and surround you. They ask what had happened and you quickly explain it to them.
Merry jumps at you and hugs you tightly. “Oh thank you for taking the blame. Melissa would put a lock on me when she knows that I have been involved.” Willy and Janet thank you as well.
“Does anybody know that I receive for breaking a clock?” you ask the siblings.

Merry shakes her head and even Willy that did a lot in the past, can only guess. “Maybe she makes you crawl for a day, but I am not sure if Rose would do that. I have only seen it once and it included a strange harness that looked… bizarre.” He shudders all over and you hope that Rose will not punish you like this.

You all walk down the corridor, back to the nursery, but stops outside.
“Come on guys I was hoping to receive a treat very soon, can’t we find a way to get rid of this note? Think about it!”
All three friend look at you, before they break out laughing. You blush and look at your feet.
Janet is the first to recover and pat your head. “Poor little girl, want to have her kitten scratched.” She giggles; before she notices that she is maybe the only one of you that has the liberty to have naughty fun whenever she wants. But you know that Merry just had her fun and by the lectures that Willy receive on a regular base – as Merry has told you – you know that he manage to cover naughty fun as “wet dreams”.
“Yeah, very funny, I am serious. Can’t we blackmail Mr Harper to make him forget about the note? It will for sure throw me back a few days.”

Merry and Willy stare at you in disbelieve. Only Janet seems to think about options, but in the end you all come to the conclusion…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Maid

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“You really want to ... blackmail him?” Meredith says, almost shocked.
You nod, replying “We know a secret about him.”
Janet, however, says “No.”
A single word, said with so much decision that makes you falter.
“We are not even sure if it’s a secret. Maybe everyone in the Palace know that.” she explains “And even if it is? Will you really blackmail the most important servant in the entire Palace? He would make you pay for that, you can be sure about it. And don’t forget that he saved you from Richard, once. You told me that yourself, remember? Is this the extent of your gratitude? Blackmailing?”
You blush, realizing that she’s right.
“Then what?” you ask “I should simply submit to yet another punishment? I spent last night in mittens. I’ve been spanked hard, this morning. I received paddlings during the lesson. I got spanked by the maid. I’m tired of been considered a naughty girl. I don’t know what Rose will do to punish me, but for sure she will put a lock on me.”
You begin to cry, and your friends hug you, trying to make you feel better.
“My naive princess, I wasn’t suggesting to submit to your punishment.” Janet grins “I was only suggesting to not blackmail the Butler.”
“So? What should I do?” you ask her.
She grins again, and winks at you, replying “Do you remember my surname back in school, in the USA?”
“Prank Queen?” you say, a bit hesitant “Aren’t you planning ...”
“A prank so sophisticated that he will change his mind about the note.” she confirms.
The siblings look at each other, then Merry exclaims “Big sis! You’re so naughty and clever!”
Janet takes it as a compliment, and smiles at Merry saying “Right?!”
“Children ...” says Eden, surprising all of you and making you all look at her “... as I said, I have no problem with your behaviour. But pranks can be dangerous. If I think, even for a moment, that this prank endangers the princess, I will stop you. With a spanking, if necessary.”
Janet nods, replying “Don’t worry, miss Langdon. My plan is not dangerous at all. It’s clever, but not complex.”
She nods, and let her speak.
“We should hurry, we don’t have much time before your dinnertime.” Janet says, and explains her plan.
In hearing to what she has thought to in few minutes, you are even more convinced than before that she is smart as a goddess of old, not only beautiful like one.
“First, we need a good dose of sleeping aid. Susan will take it from Melissa’s nursery. She will enter with an excuse and steal it. Meanwhile, William will look for Mr. Harper and will keep him occupied. Merry, for you I have this task: you must look for a glass and for water. When Susan will return with the sleeping aid, you will have to pour it into the glass. Then, William will try to show something to the Butler, trying to lead him back to the site of the incident. You will then appear, Merry, and you will offer him the glass of water.”
“You want put him to sleep next to the broken clock?” Willy asks “What good will do to Susan? And what will you do meanwhile?”
Susan grins, replying “I am the one with more freedom. I will search for the Palace cellar and I will steal a bottle of wine.”
Eden lets out a little noise that should remember a giggle, saying “You are really a little schemer, aren't you, Janet?”
“Your escort already read through my plan.” says Janet “I will spill the wine over his unconscious body and then I will wake him up.”
“You want blackmail him saying to retract the note or you will tell everyone he was drunk?” you intervene “Isn’t that almost identical to my plan?”
“No, my lady.” Eden says “She wants to make him think that he dreamed his encounter with us and that he broke the clock himself. Then you can destroy the note, and no one will ever know about it.”
Janet smiles brightly, and you all are amazed.
“Janet, you are a fucking genius!” Willy exclaims.
She nods, and concludes “I know, I know. But now we must act quickly, or your nannies will send a search party, armed with carpet beaters.”
And so you all scatter, to follow the plan. Eden follows you, and you are quite sure she is amused by this situation.
The plan ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Try something

choices: Waits with a special dinner for you.
Somehow know/feel that you did something naughty.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You arrive at the Kent’s nursery and knock on the door.
“Yes, please.” You hear Melissa say and enter the nursery. As always the Nanny is standing in the middle of the room. She seems surprised to see you.
“Princess Susan, I have not expected you. Is something wrong with Miss Fletcher? Are you under my care again? I was not informed about this.” She try to remember if something was told to her and she had forgotten it, but you quickly stop her self-torture.
“No Nanny Melissa, I am still under Miss Fletcher’s care. I am just here because… I forgot something… in the bathroom.” You know the medicine chamber is in there and you need an excuse to enter it – ideally without her.
“Oh, what could that be? I can get it for you, princess.” Melissa offers and turns to walk into the bathroom.
“NO! It is a bath, a little dolphin that I really like, I would like to take it… but I can look for it myself.” You run past her and enter the bathroom, but unfortunately Melissa follows you.
“Please let me help you, little one.” She smiles and pours out the box of bath toys on the thick carpet.
You look at the cabinet with the medicine, in Melissa’s back. She must go out now.
“Uhm, Merry told me that she is very thirsty today and I should ask you to prepare her and extra bottle of formula for dinner.”

Melissa looks up and seems surprised. “h that naughty little vixen, she will drench her diaper if she drink that much – well, I can make sure she does not leak… .” caught in thoughts about Merry, Melissa gets up and turn her back to you.
“Can you find the toy yourself and clean up afterwards, I make sure I have enough booster pads left over.” Melissa says and leaves you alone.
“Sorry Merry.” You whisper, quickly grab the dolphin and jump to the cabinet.
The sleeping aid is easy to find, you are just not sure how much you need. You take three pills and quickly go back to the carpet to clean up the toys.
Only seconds later Melissa comes back in.
“Oh, you are still cleaning up. Do you have your little friend?”

You smile at her and show her the dolphin: “Yes, I found him. Can I go back now?”

Melissa giggles and give you a, light smack on your padded behind, making you finch and wet yourself in surprise. “You naughty girl, leaving the hard work for me again. Well, you can go, but tell Merry and Willy that I am waiting with dinner.”

Quickly you walk back, with Eden in tow. Your friends are waiting for you and you quickly give the pills to Merry. “Here, he is a big man; I am sure he needs all three pills if one is meant for a kid like us.” Janet nods her head and Merry throws the pills into the water. With relieve you see them dissolve and leave no trace behind.

“Okay, Willy is at the clock with Mr. Harper, Merry, go to them quickly. We are running out of time.” Janet instructs and you, she and Eden watch your little friend walk down the hallway, balancing the glass of water.
“Now we wait.” Janet says and cross her fingers.

“Do you have the bottle of wine?” You ask her and she shows you the bottle, already opened. “I am so happy when this is ver. I am quite sure that I would be in deep shit if somebody see me with a bottle of wine, VIP or not.”

You wait for ten endless long minutes until Willy comes down the hallway, running and visible stressed. “Hurry up, he is not fully knocked out, it is now or never!”

Before Janet can react you grab the bottle from her and run into Williams’s direction. “Janet, you stay behind, I asked for the plan and I will be punished if this fails.”
Eden follows you to Mr. Harper. You are not sure how William did it, but the head butler is sitting right beside the broken clock and just slipped into a light sleep.
He kind of snaps at you when you pour the wine over his chest, before you leave the almost empty bottle in his hand. You cannot believe your luck that he does not wake up completely.

Eden is standing behind you and shakes her head. “You kids today.” She whispers, but grins. “You know that Miss Spencer will be furious?! Mr Harper has a bit of a history with drinking.”

Hearing this you feel very, very bad about your plan. “Couldn’t you mention this before?!” You hiss at Eden and get back to your feet. It is too late now; the only things you can do are run away and pray for the best. And that is what you do.

You almost run into your nursery when you remember the note and quickly rip it into little pieces and throw them away. Janet is waiting for you and waits for you to catch your breath. “it worked fine, he did not woke up. I only hope we do not get us into more trouble with this.” You are about to enter your nursery when Janet hold you back and whisper to you: “Hey Susie, you know that you can borrow my room if you are too desperate? I grand you some privacy and you can … play with your kitten.” She grins and you blush deep red.
“Th.. thank you, I will come back to you about that.” You whisper back and give her a quick hug.

Janet walks off to have adult dinner, while you enter your nursery.

Rose…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: It’s a complete success

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You enter in the nursery, and Rose is waiting for you, with your usual dinner already on the plate.
“Welcome back, princess.” she says, smiling.
Eden puts an hand over your shoulder, gives you a smile and leaves.
“It’s everything ok, princess?” Rose asks, when you are alone.
You nod, then asks her “Rose, can I ask you something?”
The nanny nods, saying “What’s the problem, princess? You know you can ask me everything you want.”
You blush, and decide to spit it out “I heard two maids speaking and I got curious. Did Charlotte ever broke something valuable in the Palace, during her childhood?”
You see Rose turn crimson, and after a moment she replies “I’d prefer not to tell, but since the maids simply can’t shut up, I will respond. Well, yes. We were 16, and we were playing tag. It was very funny, since I accidentally fall on Charlotte. We both ended up against a wall, and the ancient mirror on it fall down. We were lucky that we hadn’t hurt ourselves.”
“And your punishment?” you ask, with a mixed feeling. You are afraid, since her reply would have been valid for you too if you were discovered, but you are also genuinely curious about it.
“My mom was in the Palace, thanks to heaven.” Rose continues “So she took care of us instead of Samantha, or I don’t want even imagine what that hag would have done to us.”
“And you mom didn’t punish you?” you ask, almost disappointed.
“Don’t be silly.” she replies, giggling a little “I still remember that I had problem sitting down on my diaper for almost two days. And the harness. I will never forget it.”
“She spanked you that hard?” you gulp, but Rose shakes her head.
“Not at all. She used the Naughty Cream.” she says, reaching the wardrobe and taking out a jar of cream. The jar was next to the carpet beater, and you suspect that there is a reason for it.
“What is it?” you ask. It looks like a normal cream to you.
“The Naughty Cream.” Rose sighs “The greatest invention of the old Palace Magician, the grandfather of Amos and Nena. If you put it on a bottom, it will sting for days. Till the effect last, it’s like receiving a spanking for all day long. I don’t like this thing, so I think I’ll never use it. Don’t misunderstand my words, however: if you’ll REALLY deserve it, I will use it.”
You gulp, then run to Rose and hug her.
“I will not misbehave that much, nanny.” you say, almost sobbing.
She hugs you back, whispering “Oh, cutie. Don’t worry. I’m sure you’ll be on your best behaviour.”
You nod, aware that you are lying to her. You don’t like this sensation. You feel like if you’re betraying her trust. And the thought to have possibly ruined the relationship between Mr. Harper and Mrs. Spencer hits your conscience much harder than a spanking.
“Nanny Rose.” you say, beginning to cry “I’m a bad girl.”
She ruffles your hair, saying “Come on, princess. I know about your locked plastic pants. It’s not a thing you should be to ashamed of.”
You wants to tell her everything, from the moment you leaved the nursery till now, but you can’t do that. You’re too afraid that she will not trust you anymore if she discovers it. She will not discover what you did, and everything will be fine. This is what you think.
“Are you mad at me?” you ask, trying to stop your tears.
“For going to Melissa instead of asking me? No, I’m not mad. Only a little disappointed.” she says, still ruffling your hair “But it’s my fault. I didn’t notice that you were that wet because I got distracted talking about the party.”
You hide your face in her boson, while calming yourself down.
Rose gently lifts you up, putting you in your high-chair. She then spoon feed you and gives you your bottle of milk. Once finished, she gives you a kiss on the head and puts you next to the crib. She removes your onesie and puts in a romper. Then, she puts you in the crib.
“Goodnight, princess.” she says.
“Goodnight, nanny Rose.” you reply.
Once she has turned the light off and leaved the room, you hug Mister Rabbit very tightly and whisper to him “Am I a bad girl, Mister Rabbit? I should tell Rose about what happened? After all the problem we got through to not being punished? Oh? Do you think so? I agree. Thank you, Mister Rabbit.”
And you fall asleep.
The next morning, you feel an hand on your shoulder.
“Ten more minutes, please.” you reply, without opening your eyes.
The hand insists, and you hear a familiar voice saying “Come on, princess. You cannot sleep all day.”
You open your eyes, and you see Queen Charlotte bent over your crib, touching you to wake you up.
“Good morning, Susan.” she says, smiling “How do you feel today?”
“Hi, Charlotte.” you tell her “I’m glad to see you.”
She lifts you out of the crib, putting you on the changing table. Rose is nowhere to be found.
“Umh, Charlotte? Where is my nanny?” you ask, a little worried.
The queen removes your romper, unlocks and removes the plastic pants and begins to remove your diaper, wet and messy after the night, saying in a flat tone “Oh, I fired her. I don’t like how she was raising you.”
You turn crimson, and in a fit of rage you yell “You fired Rose?! How could you?!”
But, after an instant, you hear someone knocking at the door. Not the nursery’s main door, but the bathroom’s door.
“Yes, very funny, your majesty. Now open this door.” you hear. It’s clearly Rose, and is in the bathroom.
The Queen giggles, then says “Oh, you can wait here a little longer while I change the princess.”
“Charlotte!” you exclaim, surprised “That is naughty!”
She giggles again, finishing your change. She helps you coming down from the changing table, then she goes to the bathroom door and unlocks it.
Rose comes out, takes the queen by a wrist and gives her a loud smack on the bottom.
“Ouch!” the queen cries “Rosie! I’m the Queen, now! You cannot do that!”
She called her Rosie instead of Rose. You catch that is probably the nickname they used when they were kids.
“I can always report this to nanny Samantha, Lotty.” Rose replies, giggling “Or I can tell it to mommy.”
“No, no, please.” Charlotte says “Don’t tell anyone! Not to aunty Juniper and especially not to nanny Samantha!”
After this, the two women both burst out laughing. You laugh too.
The Queen ruffles you hair, saying “I’m sorry. I couldn’t resist the temptation. You were really mad at me for a moment, weren’t you?”
You nod, blushing “Rose is my nanny. I wouldn’t have forgave you if you would have fired her.”
“I’m glad to hear it, really.” Charlotte says “I want your childhood to be a little happier than mine.”
“But why your parents hired a nasty nanny like Samantha?” you ask, curious about it.
“She was very loyal to them, so they trusted her.” the Queen explains “But when I was young, the country had both a king and a queen, so my mother was used spending more time with me than the time I spend now with you (and I’m sorry about it, really). And there was aunty Juniper. I was used to call her that. She’s Rose mom. She was (and still is) an housewife, so she had time to raise both of us. Those are the main reasons. If I had to spend too much time with Samantha, my mother would have fired her, I’m sure of it. That is the reason I didn’t have a bad childhood.”
She looks at Rose, concluding “And the fact that I had and still have a wonderful friend.”
Rose bows, giggling. Then, she takes out your breakfast, while the queen says “I have to go, now.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Waits with the normal dinner

choices: You find Janet in her room.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Uh, STOP!” You shout out and put your hand over your mouth, since you called much louder than necessary. “Sorry, I mean… please wait queen Charlotte, I wanted to ask you something about the party.”
She turns and looks down at you. “Oh yes, the party. I am invited, you are invited and we can bring one additional person.”
You smile at Rose, but then you feel sad right away. “Only one? So it is either Janet or Rose? Or one William or Meredith? Why can’t I bring more than one?”

The queen shrugs and bends down to look you straight in the eyes. “We need to ask if Janet would be allowed at all. She is not a citizen of Calonia. For William and Meredith I can tell you that they will not come, I am very sorry. Prime Minister Kent is invited PLUS one as well and she will not pick one of her kids while the other has to stay behind. I am sure she will pick a handmaid of her Secretary to come with her. So it is either Janet or Rose.” She gives you a quick kiss on the forehead and turns to leave, but you grab her hand and hold her back.
“Can’t you take Rose and I take Janet? That would solve the issue.” You beg, with puppy eyes.

“Princess don’t!” Rose scolds you and pulls you back. “Don’t blackmail the Queen that is not fair. She can take whoever she wants and I will understand it, when she takes her handmaid.”

“But… but I don’t want anybody else to change me. That is embarrassing and the food – oh, can I sit at the big table with all you adults??” Rose and the queen giggles, but then the Queen shakes her head.
“I am sorry little one, but as far as I know the Agenda foresees that we will have music and fun from 1700 to 2100. Then the kids are separated, feed and put to bed, while the adults have the big banquette and eat and celebrate until midnight, before we dance and celebrate more.”
She smiles and is obviously looking forward to it, but for you it sound unfair.
“But I want to eat with you as well! I want to dance as well and I want to stay up all night!”

“You want a lot little one, but you are just a child and you will be treated like the other children as well. You will be feed, changed into romper and put to bed. That is the tradition. In the morning you get picked up by Rose, no matter if Rose was part of the Party or not.” The Queen explains patiently.

“BUT THAT IS NOT FAIR!” You stomp your feet and fold your arms in front of your chest. Queen Charlotte sighs and shakes her head. Then she looks at Rose: “Can you take care of her, I have to go now.” And she turns around and leaves.

“NO! I WAS NOT DONE!!” You shout after her, totally forgetting yourself and behaving like a total brat. Rose picks you up from behind and carries you to her chair, where she takes you over her knees. Very quickly your diaper is at your knees and her hand is turning your behind pink. “Princess, this is not the way you talk to an adult, especially not the queen. She was very patient and explained everything to you.” She keeps spanking you for a little while, until you start to cry and beg her to stop. Then she pulls your diaper back up and turns you around.
You almost expect her to breastfeed you again and you are not sure if you are happy of disappointed when she offers you a baby bottle instead.
“Sorry, I was a brat.” You whisper before you start to drink from the bottle. It is formula and you know that you will have some mush as well. When the bottle is finished you are put in the high chair, still only dressed in your diaper. You can see that Rose is not sure if she should put you in a regular onesie or a punishment one, because of your outburst with the queen, so you try to get on her good site. “Uhm, you are not lactating anymore?
Rose blushes a bit and shakes her head.
“NO little one, I only took the pills once and I do not plan to take them again – except you want me to.” She looks you in the eyes, but you shake your head.
“No, the bottle is enough – but it was not that bad either.” You say and blush again. “I guess the Queen was disappointed when I called you mommy after I nursed from you. But that was a… reflex, I do not know.”

Rose starts to feed you the mush and suddenly giggles.
“Maybe I should tell the Queen what happened and she can start to nurse you. Maybe then you call her mommy as well.”

You almost spit out the mush and shout: “IT IS OUR SECRET! YOU CAN’T TELL HER!”

Rose understands your anger, but still scolds you.
“Susan, stop shouting at adults right away or you wear the paci-gag for the day, I am sure you will not like that! I will not tell her that you nursed on me, but maybe I will suggest that nursing you would help you bonding with her.” She grins and you cannot tell if she is serious or not.

You continue to eat and when you are finished you ask her in a very low voice: “Will you hate me when I take Janet to the party?”

Rose lifts you from the high chair and gives you a long, thigh hug.
“Hush baby, I will never hate you. If you can take Janet, you should do it. We don’t know if she will have a second chance to go there, while you can invite me next year or the year after.”

She dresses you in a normal onesie, without a lock and with a fairy on the chest, before she let you go. In the hallway you are awaited by Eden.
It will be a normal day and you will have classes in the afternoon with Miss Spencer. In the morning you can play with Janet, while Merry and Willy have class. So, you look for Janet….
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Ask her about the party

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You find Janet in her room, playing with her console.
“Just one minute.” she says, without looking at you “I kill the Taurus Demon and I’m all yours.”
You look at the TV screen, saying “Dark Souls? Really? You already completed it twice.”
“This is Dark Souls Remastered!” she exclaims, without moving her eyes away from the game “I didn’t have the occasion to play it yet!”
While she begins to explain the big differences from the normal version from the remastered one, an explanation that you find completely boring, since you aren’t a serious gamer like her, and you look at Eden. She positioned herself out of the room, next to the door. She leaned her back on the wall, with arms crossed under her chest. She really look intimidating.
“Done!” Janet exclaims, shortly thereafter “Jump attack and resin! It always work!”
She close the game and comes to hug you.
“Everything ok, Susan?” she asks, hugging you.
You hug her back, replying “I started the day with a morning spanking for having a little outburst. Excluding that, seems that nobody discovered us about the clock or about our plan. And I have a big news for you.”
“Which is?” she asks, letting you go.
“Do you remember the party? The one Mr. Grairven told us about?” you ask.
“Yes, I do. I was present when you asked details to Rose, remember? So? Do you have news about it?” she asks back.
You nod, and say “I have an invitation and I can bring a person with me.”
She looks sad and, lowering her head, she says “Only one. I see. I hope you and Rose will have fun.”
“No, Janet!” you exclaim “Rose will come with me next year. For you, this could be the only occasion to come. I will bring YOU with me.”
She seems shocked, then smiles and hugs you again.
“Thank you, Susie.” she says, almost sobbing.
After she calmed down a little, you leave the room together.
“Janet, can I ask you something?” Eden says to her, catching you both by surprise.
“Of course, Miss Langdon. What is it?” Janet answers, looking at her.
“It’s about your adulthood.” she says “After this ‘vacation’ here, you’ll go back to America, right?”
Janet nods, not sure of where this is going.
“Well, I noticed both your attachment to the princess and your clever mind.” Eden says “If you want, when you turn 18, you can move here in Calonia and begin to train as a Royal Knight.”
You are surprised, but you like it. Janet eyes are glowing.
“Yes!” she exclaims “I’ll have a job!”
“First you must come of age.” the knightess says “Then you’ll have to submit to an hard training. It’s not a game.”
But Janet nods, with determination. She puts and arm around your shoulder, saying “I will the best knight of Calonia and I will protect you! I promise you this!”
You blush, then look at Eden saying “Is this an idea of yours?”
The escort nods, replying “Yes. Trust me, my lady, I’m not doing her a favour because she is a friend of yours. I really believe she can become a great knightess.”
You say to yourself, grinning “I’ll have Janet as a knight and for sure Merry as Prime Minister. I’m gonna be a great and happy queen!”
After this, you and Janet leave the hallway, with Eden behind you.
“What shall we do this morning?” you ask your friend.
She seems to think to it for a while, then says “We can play in the garden. A relaxing thing, after the long day you had yesterday.”
You nod, and you go straight to the garden. Once there, however, the sound of an explosion catches you attention.
“What happened?” you ask, a little shocked, wetting yourself for the fright. Janet boggled as well, and Eden moved her hand to the gun. The servants in the garden looks around, not knowing what happened.
Suddenly, from beyond a bush, you hear two voices.
“It worked! It worked!”
“Yes, and it has been for sure heard in the entire Palace, idiot!”
“Oh, shut up! I’m proud of myself! Maggot!”
“Bedwetter girl!”
“Spanko!”
Everyone in the garden sigh, including Eden (she removed her hand from the gun). Amos and Nena Campbell. They are arguing again. You are curious of what are they doing in the garden.
You suddenly see the two of them coming out from behind the bush, and they continue to argue.
Tired of it, you go closer to them, and ask Eden “Can you make them stop, please?”
Eden go closer to them, and catch them both by their ears with both her hand.
“Enough!” she scolds them “You may be adults, but I assure you that I will spank you nonetheless if you don’t stop this little show.”
Once she lets them go, they look at her and point each other with a finger.
“She started it!” Amos exclaims, and at the exact same time, almost synchronized, Nena exclaims “He started it!”
“And I finish it.” Eden concludes “Can you please explain the explosion?”
“Of course!” Nena says aloud, with the tone of a person that forgot she has just been scolded “I was testing my latest invention!”
“And I was trying to keep it under control. But I failed.” Amos adds.
“It is a complete success!” Nena continues, completely ignoring her brother “Come to see!”
She takes you by your wrist and lead you behind the bush. There, you see a small pool of yellow liquid on the grass, and broken glasses scattered all around.
“Umh ... so?” you ask, not sure of what is it.
“This, princess, is artificial pee!” she explains, excited “In adding the right chemical elements, I managed to create it!”
“And you are deliberately ignoring the fact that the test tube exploded in your hand in doing so.” Amos intervenes.
“Details. It’s not yet perfect, that’s all.” she replies.
Eden sighs, and intervenes too “I think this is your dumbest invention ever. Artificial pee? Why it would be useful?”
Nena swells her chest, saying proudly “Spankings are overrated. With this, you can make your child spend his time in a wet diaper, even if he doesn’t need to pee. It’s far better punishment method.”
“I still think spankings work better.” Amos adds.
You can’t contain a laugh, and the same it’s true for Janet. Eden, instead, sighs again, asking “And why you were testing it in the garden?”
“That was my idea.” Amos replies, proudly “Since I was certain that something would have gone wrong, I didn’t want the substance all around the laboratory. It may be artificial, but it’s still pee.”
Eden gives to both of them a slap on the bottom, ordering “Now you’ll got the Queen office and you will ask her to give you two a punishment.”
“Why? We are adults!” Nena exclaims.
“NOW!” Eden yells.
They both go pale and run toward the queen’s office.
You laugh. The little show was quite entertaining.
Now, you and Janet ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You find Janet in her room

choices: To try to fix the broken relationship.
That you should try to forget about it.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You decide to play with Janet in the garden. Sure she has a benefit with her thin training pants, but by now you are used to your extra padding and can run around very quickly. From playing catch to jumping over the stones in the pond you finish – a bit out of breath – with watching butterflies and other insects.

In the end you sit down on a bench and make a face: “I need a bath.” You sigh and Janet giggles.
“Oh, does the baby need to ask her nanny to be washed?!” she tease and tick out her tongue.
You do the same and grin, but then you see Miss Spencer walking into the garden.
The usually smiling woman looks quit sad and immediately you feel guilty and poke Janet in the site.
“Look at her, I think she is the real victim of our little trick.”

Janet smiles weakly, but then shakes her head.
“I would like to agree, but have you seen Mr. Harper lately? He looks much worse. I could bet that he is two inch shorter now.”

“So they had a fight?” You ask, feeling even worse.

“She had throwed his stuff out of her room and avoid him wherever she can. When I had dinner yesterday the maids where talking about it. She was furious that he was drinking again.” Janet says and quickly added: “He, I am feeling bad as well, but we did it for Meredith and William and if we row back now it will help nobody.”

You think about this for a long time until you response:
“We need to do something. Either we tell them the truth and beg for forgiveness or we try to get them back together one way or the other. I just do not know how… .”

Janet beside sighs and shrugs as well: “I never had to bring people back together.” Suddenly she freeze and look around the garden, to make sure that nobody can listen to her, but you. “Whatever we do, we should do it, before the spanko-maid breaks down and talks about it.”

“The spanko… oh, the red-head. Fuck I have not thought about her. Have you seen her since then?” You whisper back.

“No, I haven’t, but as I said, we should be active before she talks. As ad as Miss Spencer looks, that maid will feel bad as well.”

You nod your head and the two of you go back to the nursery. You like to have a bath before dinner and see if you can ask Rose for an advice. In front of the nursery Janet leaves you and you enter alone.
“Rose, can I ask you something?”

Rose comes closer and grins: “You want a bath, little one?”

You blush and sniff at your armpits: “Is it that bad?? We were playing… but that is not what I want to ask, at least not the only thing. Uhm… Have you ever tried to bring a couple back together after they had a fight?”

Rose takes your hand, guides you to the changing table and starts to strip you down to your birth suit. “No, I never tried that. Normally they either fix it themselves or… not. Are you talking about Miss Spencer and Mr Harper?”

You go pale and forget to breathe for a second: “You heard about it as well?”

She nods and lifts you into the bath tub, which is already half way full and still fills with warm water.
“I guess everybody heard about it. The maids and nannies are one big community. Nothing stays a secret for a long time. So you try to fix their relationship? That is so nice of you.”

Filled with guilt you nod, but feel a tear run down your face. Quickly you slide under the surface and hide it from Rose. You decide…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Play in the garden

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“I’ll try to fix their broken relationship. It’s my fault. I must make things right ... without being punished, if possible.” you think.
Rose finishes to wash you, than leads you out of the bathtub, saying sweetly “Princess, I didn’t mind washing you, because you really needed it. But normally a bath would be given before bedtime, not before lunch. So please, try to stay more clean in the morning from now on.”
You blush, realizing that you’ll have your lesson with Mrs. Spencer after your nap. You nod, and Rose lead you to the changing table. After diapering you, she puts you in a romper.
She smiles at you, and takes you to her chair. She sits on it and pats her lap.
“Please, nanny, not a spanking.” you beg her.
She look confused, and say “Princess, I want to give you your bottle. You didn’t do anything for getting a spanking. Or do you know something I don’t? Uh?”
You go pale and immediately sit on her lap, saying “No at all. I was afraid you’d give me a spanking for the bath thing.”
She sighs, replying “Princess, I may be strict, but I don’t enjoy punish you. Getting a little dirty isn’t a thing worth a punishment, at most a scolding.”
She gently puts the bottle full of formula in your mouth, and you begin to nurse from it. The thought of Rose nipples crosses your mind, but you manage to pull it off.
Once finished, Rose cuddles you a little, then puts you in the crib.
“I guess I will not be changed after the nap, right?” you ask.
She nods, replying “You just got changed, princess. I will change you again before bedtime, after dinner.”
You hug Mister Rabbit, while Rose puts a pacifier in your mouth.
“You seem really stressed about something.” she gently explains, doing it “Try to relax, little one. The pacifier will help you.”
She rubs your hair and leaves, after having turned the lights off.
You fall asleep, but you have a dream about the Butler being kicked out from Mrs. Spencer room.
When your naptime is over, you are awakened by Rose.
“Good afternoon, Susan.” she greets you, removing your pacifier with a smile on her face.
Her kindness makes you feel even worse. For what you did, you should be treated sternly, and not kindly. You’d really want to confess everything, now. But Janet is right: doing it will only have all the four of you punished for breaking the clock, having lied, getting the Butler in trouble, stealing the sleeping aid and stealing the wine. You don’t know what punishment you can receive with so many serious misdeeds, and you’d like to stay in your blessed ignorance about it.
No, you need to endure it and work to make them back together. This is the best thing to do. You think about the red haired maid. You should do it before she breaks down, or you could directly ask for help to her. After all, she respects you. You yet have to think about her involvement.
This train of thoughts is interrupted when Rose takes you out from your crib and removes your romper, putting you in a really embarrassing dress.
It’s a Japanese typical kindergarten uniform. It’s composed of a light-blue smock, a short black skirt that comes out a little from the smock (the smock is quite long, and covers almost entirely your butt), a pair of white socks that almost reach your knees and a pair of white shoes. She puts a yellow hat over your head and puts a yellow school backpack over your shoulders. As a finishing touch, she pins a cat-like sticker over your smock, with the sentence “My name is Susan. Princess in training.” written on it.
Rose then gently pats your padded bottom, saying “Now you’re ready for school, little one.”
“Nanny Rose!” you exclaim, blushing while looking yourself at the mirror “I’m not a kindergartener! And I’m not Japanese, either.”
“Oh, someone knows what she is wearing.” she giggles.
You blush, admitting “I was used to watch a lot of anime.”
She pats your hat, saying “If you want to watch something, you need only to ask. We can easily recover the DVD or Blu-ray box set of your favourite anime series.”
“Have you something already?” you excitedly ask her, completely forgetting your dress.
She shakes her head, saying “Nothing from Japanese animation, I’m afraid. But I’m sure to have seen somewhere in the Palace the complete collection of the Disney Princesses DVD.”
You blush even deeper, replying “Thanks. I’m okay.”
You greet her and open the door to leave, but the nanny stops you.
“Not until Miss Langdon is here, princess.” she says.
You sigh and wait. After less than a minute, Eden comes. She doesn’t make any comment about your kindergarten dress, and you begin to walk to reach Mrs. Spencer office, hoping that only few maids will see you dressed like this.
“Eden, do I should feel bad for what I did to the Butler?” you ask to your escort.
She shrugs, replying “You did something bad to another person for your personal gain. Yes, you should feel bad. However, tell everything now would be meaning getting all of your friends in trouble too.”
“What should I do?” you ask.
“I’m sure you already know it.” she simply replies.
You nod, saying “I must get them back together, without being punished.”
Eden gives you a weak smile, and says “That would be the best solution for everyone. The Queen will not punish Mr. Harper for a single trouble, you four all get away unpunished, and Mr. Harper and Mrs. Spencer will be together and happy again.”
You nod again, determined. After the lesson (and after taking the teacher’s note to Rose) you’ll speak with Janet, Merry and Willy, and together you’ll manage to create a plan.
Just outside of the classroom, Janet is waiting for you.
She grins, saying “I didn’t know we were held back to preschool. Have you packed an Onigiri for your afternoon snack?”
You stick your tongue at her, making her giggle. You enter together, while Eden waits at the door, like usual. You would be happy to see Mrs. Spencer instead of Mr. Grairven, but the sad look on her face ruins the moment.
Mrs. Spencer ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: To try to fix the broken relationship

choices: Go to your nursery to deliver the note
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You put on your best fake smile and look up at your teacher. "Good morning Miss Spencer." you say, but receive and icy glare from her.
"Good morning? It is already afternoon, have you overslept and just got up? You have a carefree life, don't you princess? The biggest challenge you face is "is my diaper wet enough to ask for a change?"." She monks you and Janet can not hold back a little giggle.
But a look from Miss Spencer makes Janet shut up right away.
"Sit down and read chapter 4 and 5 in your history books. You have 10 minutes." She says and sits down.

You notice that her dress is skintight and that she is not wearing "Protection" any longer. You are just not sure if that is because her bladder infection is finally cured or because of the broken relationship with Mr. Harper.

Sighing deeply you take your history book and flip through the chapters. Each one has ten pages, without big pictures or anything that would make it faster to read through them. You raise your hand to point out, that you would need more time... and wait... and wait.
Finally you just speak up: "Miss Spencer, could we have more time for the reading, because.. ". You start, but she interrupts you.
"If it is too much to read you should not waste time talking, especially not without being asked. 5 demerits!"

You gulp hard and look over to Janet, who tries to read as fast as possible. Maybe she had made the riser decision - as so often. You instead, try to argue for more time: "Mut Miss Spencer, more than 20 pages in 7 minutes?"

"It has been 10 minutes, but you prefer to fight with me and talk back instead of doing what you are told. 5 demerits and you suck your thumb until the time is over." Miss Spencer demands.

"What? But that is bad for the teeth... ." Janet pokes you with her elbow and raise her brow and you shut up, but it is too late.

"Talking back, still? 10 demerits for that!" Miss Spencer barks, she is in a horrible mood and you have to pay for it.

You continue to read, but barely make it through the first chapter when she get up and take Janet's and your book away. Then she asks questions about the text and Janet is able to answer 6 of ten. You instead fail after the third and can only guess with the next questions, since you haven't had time to read the text to be able to answer correct.
"7 demerit points for the wrong answers and 5 for not sucing your thumb as I told you. Did you had a messy diaper today, princess?"

Surprised you shake your head: "No Miss Spencer, is that an issue?"

"Maybe your blocked colon prevents you from learning, here drink this, it will help you with that problem." She takes a glass of water and throws a pill in it. The pill dissolves quickly and turns the water pink.
"It is an invention from the twins. They asked me weeks ago for a review and I think you are the perfect test subject today."

You look at the water that has a strawberry smell now and look at Eden. "Do I have to drink it, if it might be not save?" You ask her, hoping for a NO." Eden comes to you and niffs at the water.
"I know that - from people talking about it - if is... save, just not the laxative I would prefer." She says and goes back to her corner.

Sighing deeply you drink the water that is even tasting like strawberry, not bad at all.
Miss Spencer grins evil and bitter and continues the lesson, but only five minutes later you feel a little your diaper become warm and wet and a short time later your body gets rid of its waste, without pain and totally without control.
"This is what it feels like to me incontinent, both ways." You think and fiddle on your chair. While your diaper fills a hint of strawberry can be smelled and you wonder how the twins managed that.

Miss Spencer is continuing her lecture and quickly change to math, your most hated subject. Today it is extra hard, because you gain one demerit for each wrong answer. Like this you earn the number of 27 demerits within 20 minutes.
Finally it is too much for you and the anger about her unfair treatment breaks out in words: "Miss Spencer I know you have personal issues with your relationship, but Mr Harper did nothing wrong and it is not fair that we have to suffer under your bad mood."
Beside you Janet lift her arms and looks at the ceiling, mouthing "WHY?" - while Miss Spencer goes ballistic.
"HOW DARE YOU TALK ABOUT MY RELATIONSHIP? YOU HAVE NO CLUE WHAT YOU ARE TALKING ABOUT! I SUGGEST THAT YOU SHUT THE FUCK UP AND LEAVE ADULT STUFF TO THE ADULTS!!!"

"But Miss Spencer, I heard that Mr Harper hit his head at the clock and somebody spilled wine on him while he was blocked out. He loves you." You know it is risky to spread a rumour that is so close to the reality, but at some point you have to start project "re-unification".
Unfortunately Miss Spencer is not listening - or not ready for new ideas.
"PRINCESS SUSAN! SHUT UP!" She barks, rips open the top drawer from her desk and take out a pacifier with a strap.
"I wanted to get rid of this thing from Mr. Graivren, but now I can use it." She says, pushes the foul tasting nipple in your mouth and ties it place with the strap.

You reach for the strap, but the smacs your hands away.
"You keep sucking on the soapy dummy and learn to be quiet little girl!"

Fortunately the lesson is over and you and Janet, followed by Eden leave the room. You feel worrible in your wet and messy diaper - even when you smell like a strawberry cake. You can feel that you are constantly leaking into your diaper and hope that the effect does not last too long.

In front of your nursery you meet Willy and Merry. Both are heavy diapered and wear locks on their onesie, presents from the lesson with Miss Spencer. "Hi Susie, I see it was hard for you as well?!" Merry sighs and hugs you tightly. "Hm, but you smell good, what is that?"

Janet giggles and explains what had happened. Merry blushes and apologise for her words. "I I would have known that it is your full diaper I would have been more careful." She blushes and give your handing diaper a pat with her hand.
"But I like your uniform." She smiles.

You blush even more and poke Janet in the site to speak for you.
"I think Susie wants to bring Miss Spencer and Mr Harper back together. She mentioned that it was not Mr Harpers fault. That he knocked his head and that somebody spilled wine on him as a joke. We need to make sure that this rumour spread and find more ways to bring them back together - or you guys will be all incontinent and smell like strawberries."

You nod your head and look down at your note. You never had 53 demerits, not even with Mr Grairven. You hope that Rose will be generous and accept that you are already punished enough...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Is much stricter than usual

choices: Gives you a bath and changes you.
Gives you a bedtime spanking and doesn't change you.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
After looking around, you remove your strapped pacifier.
You lower your head, saying “If I don’t give this note to Rose now, she will punish me for sure.”
“Are you sure, Susie?” Janet asks “She gave you a lot of demerits.”
“How much, exactly?” William asks.
You blush, replying “53. I’m in trouble, am I not?”
The siblings go pale, and Merry says “I’ve never heard of getting so many demerits. I got 32, and Willy 28, and are the highest number we had ever got. We both got an enema and we were putted in locked punishment clothes with booster pads. And I was spanked too. But isn’t nanny Rose more lenient than nanny Melissa?”
You shake your head, replying “I got she same punishments as you for the same amount of demerits. I think that the system foresees standard punishments for a specific amount of demerits, and is therefore not at the discretion of the nannies.”
Janet touches her chin, thoughtful, then says “So, from 0 to 4 demerits, no punishment. From 5 to 10 you get a spanking. From 11 to 20 you get an enema. From 21 to 30 you get the enema plus the public shame, be it the locked onesies or a shameful walk, both of them in booster pads. More than 30, from 31 to 40 I guess, the same than before but plus a spanking. This is what I understood of the demerits system so far. This mean that, if the system goes in a straight line, you can expect different punishments from 41 to 50 and from 51 to 60.”
You strive for not burst out crying in front of them, and say “Rose will kill me!”
“Maybe you should let this run and go to her only for dinnertime.” Janet suggests.
“I don’t think is a good idea.” Willy intervenes “She’ll get the punishment for the demerits plus one for not going back immediately if she does that.”
“Yeah, it’s true.” Merry adds “If she goes now, maybe Rose will not punish her at all. I mean, it’s clear that Mrs. Spencer has not been fair. She was too angry.”
You nod, then look at Eden “You saw it, right? She was angry.”
Eden nods, replying “She was. But still, what to do with that note is up to your nanny.”
Sad, you give the soapy strapped pacifier to Janet, saying “Hide it somewhere, please. If I walk in with this, Rose will strap me in it for sure.”
Janet comply, taking the soapy pacifier in her pocket.
“Good luck with Miss Fletcher.” she says “I will take the twins with me and we will begin to spread the rumor. If you can reach us afterward, we will thing about a plan. Otherwise, I will see you tomorrow.”
“Umh … bis sis?” Merry intervenes “We aren’t twins. The only twins in the Palace are the magicians.”
“You are brother and sister, and of the same age.” Janet says, surprised.
“I’m almost two hours older than her.” Willy states “And I was born on 11 o’clock. She has been born after midnight, that makes us genetically twins but at the registry office only siblings.”
After this, she goes back to the main point. She takes the sibling and leaves, greeting you. The two Kent are quite fast for someone with all that padding.
You feel you diaper hanging. You’re wearing a smock and a skirt, with no pants. If it gets any heavier, it may fall down. Not wanting it, you open the nursery’s door.
Eden greets you too, and leaves, while you enter alone.
“Welcome back, princess.” Rose greets you, smiling.
You immediately begin to sob, grasping the note in your hand.
“Oh, princess, what’s happened?” she asks, coming closer to hug you.
As she does that, however, she smells the strange fragrancy coming out from your extremely full diaper.
“Princess, are you smelling like strawberries?” Rose asks, surprised.
You nod, and still sobbing you reply “Mrs. Spencer made me drink an invention of the Campbell twins. I can’t control myself. I’m incontinent! And my things smell like this!”
Rose cuddles you, saying “Hush, princess. I know what are you talking about. The effect will last till tomorrow morning. When you’ll wake up tomorrow, everything will be okay again.”
You nod, beginning to calm down a little.
“Now …” she says “… about your note?”
You lower your head, giving the note to her. Rose takes it, and you see her going pale.
“Princess!! How did you managed to get 53 demerits?! You should be ashamed of yourself!” she scolds.
“But nanny Rose! It’s unfair! She was angry on her own and …” you begin to say, but she interrupts you.
“She was stricter than usual. I get it. However, princess, how much strict a teacher should be its decided only by the teacher himself. I ignored Mr. Grairven note because he paddled you, but this is different.” she explains, still in her scolding tone “You will be severely punished for this. 53 demerits!! What are you, a donkey?”
“So, what will happen now?” you ask, trembling a little.
“First, you’ll get out of that diaper. It’s already full.” she takes you to the changing table, removes your clothes and lifts you on it, then removes your diaper.
Once you are naked, when she is cleaning you, a little jet of pee comes out from your crotch, centering Rose in the face.
“I’m mortified, nanny!” you immediately exclaim, but she sweetly hushes you.
“Don’t’ worry, little one.” she says, cleaning her face with a wipe and giggling a little “I know it’s not your fault.”
Once you’re clean (and you feel your tummy luckily empty), Rose states “First of all, I’ll put you in a thick diaper.”
Once done that, she takes you down from the changing table and makes you lean on it. She unfold the diaper, lowering only the back part of it.
“I’m sorry, princess.” she says, while you hear her opening the wardrobe “But you bottom deserves it.”
The carpet beater. She uses it 14 times on your buttock, before putting 3 booster pads in your diaper and closing it.
“Come with me!” she orders, taking you with her.
She puts on you the bib with the words NAUGHTY BABY and the clear and pink plastic pants with the word BRAT printed behind. Apart this and your diaper, you are not wearing anything else.
“No, nanny!” you cry “I’ve been punished enough!”
“53 demerits, princess.” she reminds you, taking out from a drawer something you believed been only a metropolitan legend.
“A dunce hat?!” you exclaim “Please, no!”
“Hush, princess.” she says “I don’t like this either, but you must learn to behave during schooltime. You don’t get an enema too just because Mrs. Spencer gave you the twin’s creation.”
You nod, while she puts the shameful hat on your head. She takes you out from the nursery, and leads you in the garden by your wrist with her right hand, while in the left one she carries papers and a pen.
Once in the garden, she makes you sit on a bench, giving you the pen and the papers.
“Write 1000 times: I must behave in class.” Rose commands “And with a good calligraphy, or I’ll make you restart again.”
You gulp, and begin to do what she has said, feeling extremely humiliated.
One of the maids in the garden giggles, saying “Has the princess been naughty!”
To your surprise, Rose exclaims “Shut up! A comment for anyone of you, and I will report it to the Butler!”
You smile a little, thinking that this punishment will at least ease your conscience for what have you done to Mr. Harper.
Once finished, Rose is pleased.
Once back in the nursery, you are wet and messy. Again. At least, you smell good.
“Hush, princess.” Rose says, once alone with you in the nursery “This is the hardest punishment I think you’ll ever get from me.”
She tries to look stern, but you see she’s almost crying. She doesn’t like it, it’s quite obvious.
It’s dinnertime, and Rose …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Go to your nursery to deliver the note

choices: You enter and say that you spilled wine on him
One of your friends does something
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
After all the punishment you had to endure today you really hope that it is over now and you get cleaned up and can relax in your crib, but your shameful day is not over jet.
Rose put you in the high chair and feed you mush and a bottle of formula. You are already restless and can't wait to be changed into a fresh diaper.
Finally Rose picks you up and lay you on the changing table.
"Ah, finally!" You sigh. "Rose, I can't believe I was in a dirty diaper for the past hours, I am looking forward to a fresh one like crazy."

Rose freeze and couches. "I am sorry Susan, but I can't change you. With 53 points that is not an option before tomorrow morning. I even have to give you a final spanking. That is why you are on the changing table." She says.
With your legs high in the air she spanks your messy behind with a paddle.
It hurts, even through the diaper, but the worst part is the humiliation and the fact that you will stay in that diaper until tomorrow morning.
"Not fair, not fair, not fair.... " You whisper by yourself, until Rose silence you with a pacifier, but at least a normal one.

You starts to suck on it and find some comfort in it, while Rose picks you up and put you in your crib.
At least Mr Rabbit is waiting for you and you can hug and cuddle him as much as you like.
"Good night princess, I will wake you up in the morning and make sure you get cleaned up as soon as possible." She looks quit sad and quickly leaves the room.
The spanking has exhausted you and you fall asleep quickly...


As promised Rose wakes you up early and cleans you up. Against her own rules she baths you and make sure every inch of you is clean. She is almost overdoing it and you feel arousal when she wash your behind and crotch - but as professional as she is, Rose makes sure you do not find release.
She diapers you, feeds you and dress you in a pink onesie with a Pony on the chest. You do not receive a lock and wonder if William and Meredith are as lucky as you, or if Melissa is forcing a lock on them for the next days.
"That you for not putting a lock on me, Miss Fletcher." You thank Rose and she hugs you tightly.
"Oh, my little girl. Yesterday was horrible and I am as happy as you, that it is over." She says and rubs your back

Today is wednesday and you wonder if some preparations for the party have to be made, but since Rose does not mention anything you concentrate on Miss Spencer and Mr Harper.
In the corridor you meet Eden and to your surprise you find Merry and Willy, next to Janet.
"Hey gang, no class this morning?" You ask the "twins".

They are both in punishment onesie with a lock at the collar and look very jealous at your pink pony onesie.
"No, Miss Spencer has canceled the morning class on short notice and told us we have class together with you later."
that surprises you and you and your friends sneak to Miss Spencers, dorm-room.

You can hear her and Mr Harper having a fight behind the door and you don't even need to press your ear against the door to understand them.

"I did nothing wrong - as far as I know. I had a blackout and when I woke up my head was hurting and I sat on the broken clock. I don't remember getting a bottle of wine and I don't remember drinking it. That is the truth!" He says in a firm voice.

"Oh Ben, how can i believe that? You have been drinking for years and promised me that it is over and then you are found like this." Miss Spencer barks at him.

"Haven't you heard the latest rumours? Somebody spilled the vine on me. I haven' measured it, but I had at least half a bottle on my uniform - and as you remember - I never spilled anything when I drank." He tries to be funny and you hear Eden behind you sigh. "Not clever." She whispers and quickly steps away from the door. As a royal knight she does not want to be found eavesdropping.

"YES I REMEMBER! You never missed a drop, you made sure to get everything in your mouth." Your teacher snaps at him.
"Who should pour wine on you? Who would do that?? Even the knights are afraid that you spank them!!!"

Maybe you should step in now and confess that you did that, because you thought it is funny. You would need to invent something about the origin of the wine, not to endanger Janet, but that is the price you would need to pay.

While you think about this you hear Miss Spencer sigh.
"Okay okay, I see that you still want me and I have the reputation to be fair." William beside you gasps and shakes his head, but you ignore him. Instead you continue to listen at the door.
"I tend to believe your words if you accept that I will punish you like one of my students."
You clap your hand over your mouth and suppress a giggle.

"You want... WHAT?! YOU want to punish ME? Do you think that is smart little lady." Mr Harer says cheeks.

"After that you can be the grown up again and IF YOU ARE LUCKY I become your little girl again, but that would be AFTER I punish you." Miss Spencer says.

You bite down on your bottom lip. One the one hand you want to see what she has in mind to punish him, on the other hand he is innocent and might not accept her offer. Maybe you really should tell them that you spilled the wine on him... .
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Gives you a bedtime spanking and doesn't ch...

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Unfortunately, you can’t come up with everything to justify the wine. You then decide to wait. You’ve done everything so far to protect Janet and the Kent siblings, not only yourself. If he accepts the punishment, everything will be okay. If he doesn’t, you’ll need to come up with a plan. Luckily for you, you have Janet on your side, and maybe you can ask some tips to Eden. You really hope he simply accepts.
Breathless, you wait for Mr. Harper reply.
“No, Elisabeth. I will not submit to it.” he suddenly says, in his stern tone.
You grit your teeth. Why can’t something be easy for a change?
“What did you say?” the teacher asks.
“If I had done something wrong, to get your forgiveness I would accept every punishment, even to get around in the Palace wearing a diaper and nothing else or get spanked by the youngest maid in the Palace.” you hear him state “But I assure you I am innocent, and I will not let anyone punish me for something I didn’t done. Not even you.”
You hear Eden sighs again, whispering “He is a proud man. His greatest strength, but also his greatest weakness.”
“Fine!” Miss Spencer exclaims, angrily “Get out of here! And never show yourself here again!”
You and you friends decide to leave, to avoid getting caught by him.
Once away enough, you say to them “Dammit. It was so close.”
“Why haven’t you entered? It was a good opportunity so say something.” Willy says.
Janet shakes her head in your place, replying “No, without thinking accurately about what to say. A wrong answer to an unexpected question and he would have discovered much more than we want.”
“So? We let them with her broken relationship?” Merry asks, looking sad about it.
“No.” you immediately say “My conscience sting enough. Rather than that, I confess everything!”
You pause, then add “But I don’t want that either. So we must come up with a plane to get them together.”
“Susan, it’s not simple task.” Janet says.
“Oh, come one. The Prank Queen doesn’t have a plan?” you tease her.
She sighs, replying “I’m still thinking about it. Only the four of us aren’t enough, for what I have in mind.”
In hearing this, you have an enlightenment and exclaim “Samuel, Zoey and Tabitha! They can help us!”
But Janet shakes her head “You can invite them to befriend them, it would be funny, but it will not help us. They surely can’t stay in the Palace for long, and plus I don’t trust someone I just met with a complex plan.”
“Umh …” Merry intervenes “… who are these people?”
“Children we met in the capital.” you explain “I wanted to invite them in the Palace, so the four of us can befriend them.”
“Zoey and Tabitha are hot?” Willy asks, but receiving a slap on the bottom from Janet immediately afterward. He doesn’t get a reply.
“Sorry, Willy.” you think “Janet is a jealous person.”
Then you look at your friend, telling her “We can use the red-haired maid. I mean, she’ll get in trouble too if we are discovered, and she respects me.”
“She spanked you after forcing you to ask for it.” Janet notices.
But you reply “And everything would have ended there, if Mr. Harper wasn’t in the same fucking corridor in the same fucking moment! Think about it. Another maid would have simply informed the Housekeeper, while a footman would have informed the First Footman (I never met him, now that I think about it), and we would have got a severe punishment. She gave us a choice, a choice that gave us the possibility to get a very light punishment. And she gave that choice because she respects me.”
Janet seems convinced, as she states “Ok. We can use her. But we’d need someone else. Two other persons at least.”
“What is your plan?” you then ask.
But Janet makes another sign of denial, saying “I’m still working on it. First, I need to know who we can count on.”
You think about someone else that would be useful. Not Eden, since she follows you everywhere.
“We can ask the scientist.” Willy suggests “If we confess to them, they can help us. I’m sure they are uninterested in our discipline.”
You shake your head, saying “For what I saw so far, they are strict disciplinarian, despite their strange attitude. Amos is a spanko, and Nena is always looking for alternative punishments to spanking.”
Merry intervenes too, saying “We should confess to someone that doesn’t care about discipline, someone that would only have a gain in making things better for the couple. Someone like …”
You all look at each other, and in the exact same moment you all exclaim “Alice!”
“We can convince her quite easily. I’m sure she will be happy to get things better for them, since the Butler mood has repercussion on her work.” Janet says, touching her chin “But if she doesn’t want to help us, we can easily blackmail her with something that wouldn’t get us in trouble.”
“Ok. The four of us, the red-haired maid and Alice.” you say “We need another one, right?”
Eden sighs, saying “I can ask a favor to a couple of Royal Knights, if your plan requires persons that do small things.”
Janet smiles, saying “Perfect! I will think about a plan today!”
“When we will act, big sis?” Merry asks.
“I still don’t have it.” Janet replies “I think I will tell you about it tomorrow.”
You nod, deciding to let her think. You simply play for the rest of the morning, with Janet losing at every game you play because she is concentrating on the plan.
After a while, you find yourself in the garden. William is playing in the pond, jumping from a stone to another, while Janet sits under a tree with a thoughtful expression. You and Merry, on the other hand, are sat on a bench together.
“It’s a shame.” Merry says.
“What?” you ask.
“You smelled so good yesterday.” she replies, smiling brightly. She really thinks it, she’s not teasing you about it.
You put an hand on your crotch. Under the onesie, you feel your wet diaper. Doing it, you reply “Yeah, now I smell like pee and not like strawberries, but I pee normally and not like an incontinent person or a little toddler without bladder control.”
She takes your hand and rests hear head over your shoulder, asking “Zoey and Tabitha are hot? Or cute?”
You nod, replying “Zoey has C-Cup. I would kill for having it. Tabitha has a AA-Cup, but she’s very cute. She’s friendly and I think she’s a bit overactive.”
Meredith blushes, saying a little hesitant “But you still … prefer me, right?”
You hesitate yourself. This feeling is something still strange for you.
But then you reply “You’re special for me, Merry.”
Merry hugs you, rubbing her head against your cheek.
“You’ll always be my princess.” she says.
Thinking that the atmosphere is getting too sugary, you say “And you’ll always be my little girl afraid of the children-eater toilet.”
She poke your side, giggling and saying “I’m still sure of it. Nanny Melissa says that if you’re not of age, the toilet may eat you. That is why they invented the diapers. To keep us safe.”
You’re 100% sure that is not the reason for inventing diapers, but you decide to not break her illusions. But something else comes in your mind, since she is so naïve.
“Do you believe in Santa Klaus, Merry?” you ask her.
Surprisingly, she nods, replying “Of course. Santa delivers presents to good children, while Krampus delivers spankings to naughty children.”
You resist the urge to laugh, and say instead “Have you ever been spanked by Krampus?”
She shakes her head, replying “No. But once he left a note to nanny Melissa. She showed it to me. He wrote her to punish me for been a brat during the year, since he was too busy to do it himself.”
You know for sure that Melissa had wrote it herself, but once again you decide to shut up.
You see that is lunchtime, so you greet your friend and go back to your nursery. Once at the door, you hear Rose talking with the Queen herself.
You …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You wait and see/hear

choices: “We might be late, but can start right now.”
“I... am still working on the plan.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You stop at the door and listen to the voices of the Queen and Rose talking
“Are you sure they will use that on the guest children as well?” Rose asks.
“I am absolutely sure. The twins just sold the automatic changing table and the automatic high chair to them – and we can hardly argue that those things are not safe if they come from the palace.” Queen Charlotte says.

“Oh those twins I hope that fixed the last bugs before they delivered the machines. Your majesty, maybe I should to with Susan and change her myself. I would feet better.” Rose suggested.

“No, Susan has selected Janet to go with her and we cannot change that now. I think we have to trust into the invention of the Campbell's. As hard as might be.” Queen Charlotte sighs and a break occurs. Susan is about to enter the nursery when the Queen continues in a much lover voice. “I have so little time for Susan, I think we will never really grow together.” She sighs.
“I was so jealous when she called you mommy, I could have screamed in physical pain. I mean... I know I am not her mother but... I would really like to get closer to her.”

You bite down on your bottom lip and feel sorry for the Queen. It is not her mistake either and you HAVE a real mother – she can only not be in Calonia – but she would like to get closer to the Queen as well. Maybe she should call her mommy, even just to make her happy.

Rose starts to say something, but Eden interrupts your eavesdropping and cough.
“Princess, normally I do not say anything, but it is lunchtime for you and for me as well. If you do not mind I suggest that you enter the nursery and the two of us can eat something.”

You hiss at Eden to be quiet, but when you press your ear at the door again Rose has already finished her sentence and hear steps coming closer.
Quickly you open the door and see the surprised face of the Queen, that was just about to open the door.
“Oh, hello Susan, are you coming for lunch? I helped Rose to prepare the bottles for you.” She smiles weakly, but then walks on. “I am sorry, I have an appointment.”

You run to Rose and hug her. “Hi nanny Rose, did the Queen really helped with my lunch?”
