Rose giggles and lift you into your high chair. “Yes she did, she mixed the formula and even prepared a second bottle for her growing princess.” You smile weakly, knowing that you will be a very wet princess later one, but you still appreciate the idea.

Rose feed you both bottles in the high chair and you wonder why you can not sit on her warm lap, but maybe she feels quietly about your good relationship and holds you on distance for the moment.
After you are feed the two bottles Rose puts you down in your crib and give you Mr Rabbit to cuddle. She lowers the light and wishes you a good sleep. You wonder what you part of the discussion of Rose and the Queen you have missed, but you only think about it for a short time, before you fall asleep.

When you wake up your diaper is already wet and you ask Rose to change you.
“Little princess, what have we agreed on, based on your diaper changes?” Rose lectures you.

“That I will not ask to be changed, except I am at the leaking point?!” You sigh.

“Exactly. And be smart. When I change you now I cannot change you after your lesson – and depending on Miss Spencer's mood, you will like a change after class.”

You nod and suddenly feel much less enthusiastic to continue your day. You really hope that Janet has developed a good plan - and that it will work out.

You are dressed in a new onesie with a smiling sun on the chest and meet Eden, Janet, William and Meredith in the hallway.
“Hi! Please tell me your plan is ready to be executed, I am not sure if I can stand a grumpy Miss Spencer for the second day in a row. According to the fight she had with Mr Harper she might be in an even worse mood.”

Willy and Merry, both in locked punishment onesie nod eagerly and all of you, even Eden look at Janet.

Janet smiles weakly and says...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Eavesdrop

choices: You meet someone, and you lose some time
Nothing happens and you reach your friends
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“We can start my plan right after the lesson.”
You smile, asking “What have you thought to, Janet?”
“First, you three, we need to be all free. So, you must try to earn lee demerits possible during today’s lesson.” she says “After it, I will explain my plan.”
“Can’t you say it right now?” Willy asks.
She shakes her head, replying “You need to concentrate on the lesson. For now, I can only anticipate you that we will give the Palace a ghost to catch.”
You don’t know what she is talking about, but you all decide to trust her, and go to class.
You knock at the class door, and you enter as you hear “Come in.”
Inside the classroom, Miss Spencer is waiting for you.
“1 demerit to any of you for coming late.” she says, while you all go to your seat. Eden waits at the door, of course.
“Good start.” you think, ironically.
The lesson is hard to follow. You all try your best to don’t irritate the already angry teacher. You all get demerits for mistakes, but you all stay in your best behavior, without giving her reasons to scold you. You don’t talk back and passively accept every critic from her, always waiting to be called for saying something.
You must however focus really hard to don’t intervene when she says to Merry “Meredith, no one will ever love you if you stay that shy.”
“But … but …” she says, before starting to cry.
“See? Do you think someone would want a crybaby like you?” she says.
“Enough!” you burst “This is unfair, Miss Spencer! You can be strict as you want, but you can’t make a girl cry with comments like those!”
You expect her to give her a lot of demerits for this outburst, but instead she says “Very good. I was really asking myself you four were yourselves or a bunch of little robots.”
You blush, realizing that she may be much stricter when angry, but never completely unfair.
“Come on, Merry, stop crying.” she says “I was only joking. You are a beautiful girl.”
She tries to calm down, and you rub her back.
The lesson continues, and at the end of it Miss Spencer call you all at her desk.
“You must focus much harder.” she says, sternly and in an angry tone “You all get an extra demerit for earning so much demerits.”
You resist the urge to tell her to stick those in her butt, and you listen as she gives you your note.
“For William, we have 18 demerits. For Meredith we have 11 demerits and for the princess only 7.” she explains.
You feel lucky. Ok, for behaving perfectly good they are a lot, but it’s still better than you expected. Maybe even because she gave demerits to three person and not only to you, so she hadn’t focused on you only.
You greet her and leave the room, don’t want to irritate her further.
“11 demerits!” Merry cries “I’ll get another enema, and after behaving perfectly.”
“Yeah, me too.” Willy adds, quite sad “And we got the maintenance spanking before the lesson. I really hope your plan is good, Janet.”
Janet nods, saying “It is. Now I will tell it you.”
You think about the spanking Rose is going to give you for your 7 demerits, but then you focus on Janet, saying “We’re listening.”
“So …” she says “… who would have a gain in damaging the Butler’s reputation?”
“Umh … no one?” you say.
She shakes her head, replying “Try harder, Susie. What would have happened to you if Mr. Harper wasn’t there to save you?”
“Richard would have beaten me like a drum and now you would be able to cook eggs on my behind.” you say to her “But what this has to do with… wait a minute! You want to blame Richard for the prank?!”
Janet giggles, replying “Yeah. We can adjust everything and even stain Richard’s reputation.”
“It’s dangerous, Janet.” you say “You don’t know him.”
“I agree.” Eden adds “Janet, attacking lord Richard’s reputation can put you all in serious trouble, much serious than getting a punishment from the nannies.”
“Only if he discovers it.” she replies, smiling “But what I have in mind won’t leave the Palace and will not hurt is public image. That would be interesting, but I agree too that would be too dangerous.”
“Ok, big sis.” Merry says “Can you give us the details?”
“Not now.” she replies “After your punishments we will come back together to discuss it. During your trials, I will gather Alice and the maid with red hair. We will all meet together in my room.”
You nod, and the group scatters. You go straight to the nursery, hoping for a quick thing. Eden waits you out, while you enter.
Rose greets you, saying “Welcome back, princess.”
You run to hug her, saying “I’m sorry. I got some demerits. Can you punish me, please?”
You really hope to accelerate the process, this way.
She looks surprised. Without knowing what to say, she takes the note, then sighs in relief.
“7 demerits? A quite normal number, I must say.” she states.
You don’t admit that getting so few demerits cost you a lot and wanted to break everything after the lesson to take out your stress.
“Rose! Just give me my spanking!” you say, freeing on her your frustration.
Rose gives you a slap on the bottom, replying sternly “Princess, calm down and I’ll use the hand. Insist again and I will take the carpet beater.”
You instantly calm yourself, saying “Sorry, Miss Fletcher.”
She nods, then takes you to the changing table. She removes your onesie and your wet and dirty diaper, cleaning you up. Once you’re cleaned, but still naked, she lifts your leg in diaper position, and gives you a good amount of smacks, turning your behind red quite fast. Luckily, she is only using her hand.
“I’m sorry, little one, but I you need what is going to come.” she says.
“What are you talking abo… OUCH!”
Before you can finish your sentence, she gave you four hard smacks on the upper thighs, making you gasp in pain.
“You must remember to be polite, little princess.” she explains, putting you in a fresh diaper after rubbing a good amount of baby oil and used a good amount of baby powder.
She takes you down from the changing table and puts you back in your onesie, letting you go to reach Janet.
You go to meet her. During the way …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “We can start after the lesson.”

choices: I can show you my dress for the party.
I can grant you some “private time”, she winks.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Fortunately you face not a single person and Eden escorts you to Janet’s room quickly.
In side you find Meredith, William, Alice, the foxy maid, two knights and for sure Janet. Willy and Merry still look like they have been crying minutes before and the dropping diapers tell you that they have suffered under another enema by Melissa. You really hope to bring the teacher and the butler back together – for your own sake, but mostly for the “twins”.

Janet lifts her hand like a real leader and everybody quiet down.
“Thank you for coming everybody. We have an issue that requires a combined effort to be solved. Because of a great misunderstanding of the situation we created some… trouble that finally leaded to a break in the relationship of Miss Spencer and Mr Harper. We feel responsible to fix this and - as I said – we need your help for this.”
Everybody is nodding their heads and you understand that Janet has already talked to the “New” Team-Members.
“The plan is this: Since we cannot confess what the real cause was, we need to blame it on somebody externally and nobody is more suitable for this than Lord Richard. He wanted to beat the princess up before, what was prevented by our dear Mr Harper. We will use this to set crumbs that will show everybody that Lord Richard hired somebody to trick Mr Harper to damage his reputation.”

You wait for somebody to speak up and question her, but to your surprise everybody agrees with her plan. It is obviously that nobody likes Lord Richard and has no issues with blaming him. Still you feel the need to say something: “I… I really want to thank you all for your support. I know this is not the most elegant way to handle the situation, but in the end it will help us a lot and since we only spread rumours and not blame Lord Richard with hard facts he cannot do anything about it.”
You smile weakly and feel really uncomfortable with all eyes on you; therefore you are happy when Janet takes over again.
“Every single one of you will spread one information only. Do not overdo it, just stick to the fact you pretend to have observed, the rest will be handled by me.” The turns to the knights: “You will report to your boss that you have seen a suspicious, new, tall footman. You have followed him during your shift but could not find evidence that he did something forbidden. You took over shifts from each other and when the second shift took over you found the unconscious Mr Harper. Since then you have not seen the footman anymore.” The tow knights nod their heads.
Then Janet turns to the foxy maid: “You found a bottle of wine missing from a top shelf in the cellar, which will eliminate kids and small persons from the list.”
To the laundry maid she says: “You will report that you basically washed a whole bottle of wine out of Mr Harper’s uniform and that it is basically not logic that he got drunk from a little sip.”
To William and Meredith she says: “You got a hard part: Take away the sleeping pills and hide them somewhere, where they can be found easily. Be careful that Melissa does not find you and pretend to know nothing when she find the medicine missing.” Willy nods firmly, but Merry sobs and looks uneasy. You go to her and hug her tightly: “Hush baby, it will be over soon. No more stress and no more enema’s for cosmic high demerits.” You whisper to her and she hugs you back tightly.

“The Princess will report that she broke the clock while she played and has no clue why the butler was sitting in the pieces.” Janet continues and you go pale. “WHAT? Can’t we say that the footman broke the clock?”

Janet thinks about it and then shrugs: “It would be better if you did the damage, but we can try to say it was the footman. Still, play B will be that you confess the broken clock.”
You smile weakly, hoping you can avoid that.

“I will walk around the palace and collect all the information like Detective Conan.” She grins and waits. When nobody smiles or says anything she sighs and explains: “I will play detective and report to The Queen, Mr Harper and Miss Spencer. Then it is up to them to believe it or not.”

Everybody nods and spread out. You are left behind with Janet. “And now?” You ask.
Janet shrugs: “I need to wait a bit,…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Nothing happens and you reach your friends

choices: Throw a little tantrum during the projection
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
… during this time, I can show you my dress for the party.”
You nod eagerly, replying “I’ll be glad to see it. Oh, Janet?”
“Yes?” she says.
“It’s a good plan.” you say to her “I’d really like to be smart as you are.”
Janet puts her hands on your shoulders, saying “Oh, Susie, stop that. I’m just good in making pranks and plans, I’m not smarter than you.”
You nod, trying to tell her that you believe in her words. It’s true that you are comforted by them, but you still think that she is really smart.
You hug her, and she rubs your back. She then leads you to the other side of her room, while you look at Eden. She is positioned outside of the room, in her intimidating pose.
Janet takes you at her wardrobe, opening it. She takes out a beautiful dress.
“Mom packed this for great occasions. I’m glad she did, or I would have used the new one.” she explains, showing the dress to you.
It’s really beautiful. It’s a black long dress, with golden decorations at the height of the chest (you are sure it will exalt her boobs even more). The dress is opened under the armpits, and return to be just above the waist. The golden pattern there starts again, revolving around the skirt-like part like a snake around a prey. It ends at the end of the dress itself, running through the length of the skirt. The thing you are more jealous of is the upper part: it covers very poorly the shoulders, and leaves the skin naked from the neck to the upper chest. This will make Janet’s upper boson visible. The skirt part reaches at maximum the knees, and Janet shows you a pair of wonderful shoes.
“These are news.” she says “I bought them the other day. They were on sale.”
The shoes are high-heel sandals, completely golden. The upper parts looks like if they are full of flowers.
“So, Susie? What do you think?” she asks.
You are so astonished by this beauty things that the only thing that come in your mind is “Please, can I try it on?”
She smiles, and gives them to you.
“Only for a minute, then you must take it off, or you will crumple them.” she says.
You remove your onesie (Janet helps you with the zip) and your diaper (it would be horrible under the dress).
“Do not pee on the carpet, baby princess.” Janet giggles, giving you a wink.
You stick your tongue at her, and put the dress on. Then, it’s time for the shoes. You look yourself in the mirror, and you find yourself more beautiful than you usually think you are. The only problem is that without a bra the upper part looks a bit too ... uncovered. Not that there are much to show, you think.
“So, princess Susan of Calonia?” Janet says, giving you grin “Do you think Merry would like you if she sees you dressed like this?”
You blush deeply, looking at her and exclaiming “What?!”
“Oh, come one, Susie.” Janet giggles “We are best friend. I noticed that with her you have ... unusual behaviours.”
You lower you head, asking “You noticed, eh?”
Janet laughs, saying “Oh, Susan, Susan, Susan. You’re that type of girl, uh?”
“I’m not still sure of it myself.” you admit “This feelings ... they are so strange.”
Janet sighs, then saying “I don’t understand you, though. Girls don’t have penises.”
You look at her with wide eyes. You would shout at her for saying that word with so much nonchalance, but you restrain yourself and say, in a calm tone “Really? I didn’t notice. What a news.”
She giggles again, but she then goes serious as she says “Merry is a good girl. I’m sure she likes you too.”
You have no secrets for Janet, but still you feel uneasy in speaking of this, so you try to change the topic, saying “The party will be incredible, right?”
“I really hope so.” she replies “Maybe I can find a sweet boy with a VIP card too that is not in diapers. That would be interesting. A prince form a foreign country, perhaps. I don’t know, like Germany or Italy.”
“Sadly to break the illusion.” you say, quite sad “But children will be sent to bed early.”
She winks at you, replying “I have a VIP-Card. I’m quite sure they will let me enjoy the more interesting part of the party.”
You think that this is a possibility. Her VIP-Card can grant her a different treatment, it’s possible.
“Can you remove the dress now?” she says, suddenly “I’d like it to be perfect for the party.”
You remove everything, finding yourself naked once again. You then take the diaper you had put on the bed, to put it on once again. Once done that, you put the onesie back on too, helped by Janet.
“Do you think that the plan is working?” you ask her.
She nods, replying “I hope so. Now you should go back to your nursery.”
“But it’s still quite early.” you complain.
“I need to move too.” she says “And you can’t be seen around the Palace on your own with the plan running on. ”
“Why?” you ask.
“The rumours will start to run soon. You need an alibi.” she explains “Spend your time with Miss Fletcher. This will protect you.”
You nod, saying “Ok. I will ask her to see a movie together.”
Janet puts her hand on your shoulder, saying “Ok. I move too, now. If everything goes as I planned, tomorrow the entire Palace will be sure thinking that Richard has infiltrated a fake footman here.”
You greet her, and go back to your nursery. While Eden leaves you, you enter. Rose is cleaning the room with a mop, and is surprised to see you so soon.
“Princess?” she asks, looking at you “What’s happened?”
“Nanny, I’d like to see a movie.” you say, trying to look more innocent as possible.
“A movie?” she says, surprised “I thought that the Disney princesses movies didn’t interested you. Since you didn’t give me any title, I didn’t ordered anything to watch.”
“A Disney princess movie it’s okay, I guess.” you say, blushing.
You are afraid that she’ll go suspicious, but she giggles instead, saying “Oh, princess. So you like them. You were only trying to act tough, weren’t you? There’s no need to. You’re so cute.”
She reaches you and picks you in her arms, beginning to walk away from the nursery.
“Roooose!” you say “I can walk!”
As a reply, she cuddles you, saying “Hush, princess. I like carrying you in my harms, you know it.”
You shut up, while she carries you to a room you have never entered. It’s plate says “Movie house”.
Inside, the room looks exactly like a movie house. There are chairs, a projector and a big screen. It’s like been in a cinema!
Rose puts you on a chair (a normal one, for once), then reaches the projector. She puts a Blue-ray disc into the compartment for it and the movie title screen begins.
Rose reaches you once again, makes you stand up and sits down, placing then you with your bottom over her knees, hugging you and cuddling you.
The movie is Cindarella. It’s good, but also kinda boring.
You ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: I can show you my dress for the party

choices: Are allowed to quickly see your friends.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You sit on Rose’ lap and watch the movie – but you have seen it a couple of times already and that has been years ago. So it is quiet boring to only sit there and watch the repetition of the repetition of the… .
You fiddle around a lot and try to distract yourself, when Rose gives you a little slap on your naked legs. “Princess, stop that. Relax and watch the movie. You have asked for it.”

You bite down on your bottom lip, but can’t sit still. “Can we have popcorn? Or peanuts?” You ask, looking for something to keep your hands busy.

“You will not mess around. I just cleaned everything up and like to keep it this way.” Rose sighs and keeps holding you. You move around more and try to slip off her knees, but she hold you close and give you another little slap. “Susan! STOP THAT!”
After a few more minutes she offer you a bottle to nurse from and you agree, happy about anything. Therefore she gets up, stops the movie, prepared a bottle and continues the film when she is back.

Not really thirsty you suckle on the nipple of the bottle. You try to blow bubbles into the formula and finally manage to blow a good amount of formula pass the nipple and all across the floor.
Surprised you lift the bottle up and it slips from your hands, falling down and spilling even more formula.
“Princess! Oh, no!” Rose scolds you and quickly gets up. She set you down, away from the puddle of formula and quickly picks up the bottle that was still leaking out.
“Now I need to wipe the floor again!” Rose sighs and does that right away, while you stand beside her and look at your feet.
“Uhm,… sorry.” You whisper and take the baby bottle from Rose, while she grabs the mop again.

Rose is really angry and speaks to herself while she cleans your mess away. “Oh I hope the medicine is working fast, then you have less chances to spill milk around my nursery.”
Surprised you look at her and blush a bit. “Did you take the lactating medicine again?

Rose finishes her floor and grin at you. “Oh, not me, I gave it to the Queen, she was very sad about your lack of bonding. And I thought… “.

“YOU DID WHAT?” You shout at her and approach her. While you do that you slip on the wet floor and fall on your padded behind. The shock of the impact makes you wet yourself and you whimper when you feel your diaper grow warm and wet.

“Princess, are you okay?” Rose is over you and picks you up.

You nod, but rub your behind. “I am fine, but why have you done that? Are you stupid?”
You regret your foul mouth right away, first of all because of Rose’ disappointed face and second, because she takes you over her knees, spanking your diapered behind.
“You need to learn to respect elders, stop to shout at them and argue them!” She says and lads one slap on your behind with each word.
When she stops you have tears in your eyes and sniff. “Me sorry.” You say, still grumpy.
Rose nods, but put a soapy pacifier in your mouth and ties him in place.
“One way or the other, you will lose that potty-mouth.” She says and takes you back on her lap.

Spanked and drooling on your onesie, you finish the Disney movie, before she place you in the high chair and takes the pacifier out again. “Are you a good girl again?” She asks.

“Yes Miss Fletcher.” You say quietly. She brings you mush and a fresh bottle of formula and while she feed it to you, you wonder when or if the Queen will really have you nurse on her.

After the dinner you…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Throw a little tantrum during the projection

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look at Rose, saying to her “Miss Fletcher ... I’m really sorry.”
“For fidgeting during the film, raising your voice at me and making a mess on the floor?” she asks, sternly.
“No. I mean... yes, for that too.” you reply “But I’m sorry for calling you stupid. I’m really sorry about that. You’re not stupid, you’re the best nanny in the country.”
Rose pats your head, and you notice that her eyes are a little teary.
“Oh, princess. You’re a good little girl.” she says “Quite unruly and bit naughty, it’s true, but you’re sweet and kind. Without that potty-mouth of yours, your behaviour would improve drastically. I’m sure you’ll be wonderful Queen, one day.”
You blush, then ask her “Do you already know what will I wear at the party?”
Rose nods, saying “Of course. Your dress is already ready. Do you want to see it?”
You nod. As Rose opens a wardrobe, you hope that is nothing too embarrassing.
To your surprise, Rose shows you a dress that is indeed childish, but also quite normal. And you must admit that is a good dress. It is sleeveless and pink. The upper part is similar to a bodysuit, while the lower part is a skirt made of tulle, but less transparent than usual, decorated with printed red flowers. The skirt is long, and will for sure reach the ground once wore. And the dress, despite completely covering the boson, will leave your shoulders naked.
“Do you like it, princess?” Rose asks.
You nod, replying “A lot. Thank you, nanny Rose.”
She smiles, putting it away.
“Umh ... nanny?” you ask “Have you any news about the party?”
Rose looks sad for a moment, then replies “Yes, I have.”
“It’s a good news?” you ask her.
She bites down her bottom lip, replying “Point of view, I guess. You don’t have to be changed by another nanny.”
You already know that. But since you don’t want to admit you eavesdropped, you carefully listen to her.
“The Campbell’s inventions have been sold to House Penrose-Glee. The Queen told me that they will use it on the guests children, such as you.” she explains “So you will not have another nanny change you, you should be happy about it. But I don’t like those things. I only hope they fixed them perfectly.”
You look at her in the eyes, asking “Do you know how many guests there will be?”
“They invite 100 persons every year.” she replies “And everyone of them can bring a guest. So there will be 200 guests, or few less if someone goes alone.”
“And there will be a lot of boys and girls?” you continue to ask.
She giggles, making you blush, as she says “You mean children, right? As far as I now, you are the only child invited, but you can expect that a lot of parents brings their children.”
“So, I must expect to see at least 20 or 30 boys and g... I mean, children.” you say.
Rose nods, replying “Those are the expected numbers, yes.”
“Plus the bodyguard, right?” you ask.
She smiles, rubbing your head “Yes, of course. Miss Langdon will keep an eye on you during the entire party, just as Mr. Maverick will do with the Queen.”
“Mr. Maverick?” you ask, since you have never heard this name before.
“It’s a veteran Royal Knight. You already met him. He accompanied the Queen in America with three other knights.” she explains.
One of the Men in Black. When you saw them back then, you would have expected them to be anything, like members of a private security agency or something like this. For sure, you wouldn’t have expected them to be Royal Knights. You even saw one of them in the silver amour, at the entrance of the palace. He was quite young, though, so he for sure wasn’t Mr. Maverick.
“They look good in armours.” you say, suddenly “In a black suit, they were a little frightening.”
Rose giggles, replying “Yes, I suppose they are. But the journey in the USA was kept quite secret to the rest of the world. If four knights in silver armours would have been seen there, Americans would have gone suspicious.”
You nod, as she takes out from the high-chair and puts you in a romper.
“I will change you tomorrow morning, princess.” she says, putting you in the crib “I don’t know when the Queen will effectively take the medicine, or how long it will take to have effect, since every woman is different, but I expect that you’ll behave when she’ll come to breastfeed you.”
You nod, extremely embarrassed. With Rose at least was an accident. That a woman WANTS to breastfeed you looks quite ridiculous in your eyes.
You hug Mister Rabbit, while Rose turns off the lights and leaves.
You are about to fall asleep, when you hear voices outside of the door.
“What’s happened? What are you doing here?” Rose asks.
“It’s about the incident of the clock.” a voice replies. You immediately recognize the voice of nanny Melissa “The Queen told maid Sophie to spread the voice, and everyone that hear it must spread it as well.”
“I still don’t catch what are you talking about.” Rose says.
“A footman in Palace wasn’t one of the servants of here.” Melissa replies “It seem that he tried to damaging Mr. Harper reputation.”
“Someone has infiltrated the Palace?” Rose replies, worried “That is preposterous. Are you sure?”
“I found the sleeping aid in my nursery misplaced.” Melissa explains “One of the maid said that, considering the wine spilled on the Butler’s robe, it was spilled on him on purpose. Alice reported that a bottle of wine has gone missing. I don’t think Mr. Harper would have stolen it. He would have simply ask for it, since he is authorized to drink it. And last but not least, two royal knights reported a suspicious footman. These voices beginning to run through the entire Palace. Even Janet has heard some of it. The Queen linked all, and now is quite worried.”
“So, a mysterious footman entered the palace and putted Mr. Harper to sleep after having stolen the bottle of wine and the sleeping aid from your nursery? Then spilled the wine on him next to the broken clock?”
“That is the conclusion the Queen came to.” Melissa replies “And she thinks that there is just a person that would have some gain in doing such things.”
“Lord Richard.” Rose whispers, angry “That bastard. But without evidence, we can’t sue him or anything.”
“The security around the building will be intensified.” Melissa concludes “But we must spread the voice to everyone in the Palace. If this footman is still here, we will catch him.”
You hear footsteps going away from the door, while you fall asleep.
You sleep like a log, without having strange dreams nor nightmares.
In the morning, Rose wakes you up. She seem less cheerful than usual.
“Good morning, Princess.” she says “I have a good news and a bad one.”
“The good one, please.” you say, still yawning.
As she takes you out from the crib and leads you to the changing table to change your wet and dirty diaper, she says “Miss Spencer seems to have forgiven Mr. Harper.”
You smile, brightly. Janet plan was a success, after all.
“The bad one ...” Rose continues, after removing your romper and while changing your diaper “... is that everyone should be careful, now.”
“What’s happened?” you ask, fully aware that she’s talking about the fake footman that doesn’t even exist, if not in Janet’s mind.
But Rose just says “Don’t worry your little head about it. The grown-ups will take care of everything. You should think only to play.”
As she finishes to change you, she puts you in a new dress. It’s a white dress with short sleeves, completed by a skirt-like part that arrives just at your knees. It’s full of pinks decorations and with the sentence “Mommy’s Princess but also a true princess” printed on the chest.
“You are so cute.” Rose says, patting your head while you blush.
You’ll have your lesson in the afternoon, so your morning is free. Merry and Willy, on the other hand, will have free the first part of the afternoon.
After waiting for Eden to come, maybe you can go to play with Janet. Or you can look in the Palace’s library to search some information about the former parties of House Penrose-Glee.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Talk to Rose

choices: You find Rose and the Queen
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You want to talk and play with Janet, so you go to her.

Inside her room, Janet is reading a book.
“Hey… sine when can you read?” You tease her and she sticks out her tongue. “I need to prepare for the party. I am familiar with birthday parties and family stuff, but not with an event like this.”

You look at the book and nod your head. “Good idea, I thought about that as well.” You smile weakly.

“You did not, do not lie to me or your nose will grow.” Janet grins. She knows you too well.

“Okay, I am not that wise, but when you are done with the book you can give me some advises, maybe.” You sit next to her and lean your head against her shoulder.

Janet sighs and ruffles your hair. “I will – mommies princess.” Janet teases and starts a pillow-fight. You are getting into it, but then you jump back and lift your arms. “Stop, I give up, I promised Rose to stay clean and not smells like a NBA-Player after a match.”

Janet lifts her hand to make Loser-sign in front of her forehead, but nods.
“Okay, different topic: Worship me, because me genius plan has worked out! Mr Harper and Miss Spencer have been seen talking to each other and I am confident that they will spend the night together. I should take money for this!” She grins and Eden gives her a “thumbs up”.

You thank her as well and the two of you starts to play a video game. After a while Janet speaks up again: “So, you and Meredith, when should I arrange something for the tow of you? Hu?”

You blush deep red and in the video game you are shot by Janet’s avatar. “Janet, stop that. We talked about that already. It feels different with her, but I cannot put my finger on it. Yes, it was kind of erotic to bath with her and the kiss… .”

“WOW! The what? What happened in the bathtub? What kiss? Give me input!” Janet pause the game and look at you. You realise that you haven’t talked about it with her, for a good reason and just blurt out a secret of you and Merry.
“I… I don’t want to talk about it.” You whisper and blush even more.

“Well, I can force you.” Janet grins and you slide away from her. “No, you will not. I am the princess,… NOOOOO!”

But Janet jumps at you and starts to tickle your sides. You laugh out uncontrollable and try to shake her off, but she is too good at this and rides you like a bull, continuously tickling you. You giggle and laugh and feel your diaper become warm, while you pee yourself. On the top of your lungs you call for Eden, but your bodyguard only shrugs and shake her head.
Finally you give up. “Okay, okay, I tell you what happened.” You say, gasping for air.

Janet promise you to keep it a secret and you tell her what happened in the bathtub, leaving some details aside. You only confess that Merry played with herself and kissed you, leaving out that Merry had a big O and you tried the same afterwards – even when Janet saw you with the mittens on.
Janet listens carefully and grins from ear to ear. “So you do not mind her having no penis, you just fall for her sexy ass and amazing eyes.”

“I really like her eyes and have no clue why she hates them herself. Her ass?? Yes, you are right; even with the thick diaper on it is cute.” You say with dreamy eyes and Janet claps her hands and slides off.
“Oh, I guess I can be happy that you don’t try to get me laid.” She grins and sticks out her tongue. “Should I be jealous at Merry? I mean, I have the bigger tits and longer legs, but if that it is not what you are looking for?!”
You throw a pillow at her, but she avoids it and keeps grinning at you. “Okay, so we need to arrange some private time for you and her, maybe in the bathtub again or alone in the crib?!”

“Janet stop, this is not funny. Either it happens or not. Don’t try to force it on us. You know how shy Merry is.” You get really frustrated with your best friend.

“Well, not so shy when she kisses you.” Janet replies and you can see her working on a play. To prevent further idea’s from her side you continue to the game and shot her avatar. That brings Janet back to the reality and you continue to play until it is lunch-time.

Eden had a great time watching you two and still smiles when she escorts you back to the nursery. In the nursery…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Play with Janet

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose is there, waiting for you with a big smile. The Queen herself stands next to her, smiling too.
While Eden greets you and leave, you feel a little anxious.
“Good to see you, princess.” Queen Charlotte greets you “I was hoping to give you a little snack before your lunch, today.”
You blush deeply, fully aware of what is going to happen.
Trying to joke a little, you say “If I chose to get a spanking instead, can I go without having lunch?”
The Queen seems going sad, saying “So ... you’d really don’t like it.”
You try to smile, completing your joke with “Oh, you weren’t talking about a mouth soaping? If it is something else, it will be fine.”
Rose giggles, and the Queen cheers up.
She comes closer to you and take your hand, leading you to the chair that Rose usually uses to give you your bottle (and where she also breastfed you) and to deliver spankings.
The Queen sits down, patting her laps and saying with a smile “You can sit here, princess.”
Still blushing, you sit on her lap, while she begins to take her dress and her bra aside, revealing her naked nipple. She shoves it in your mouth, and you begin to nurse from her.
“Isn’t this sweet, little princess?” Charlotte asks, sweetly, while you swallow her milk “Who is the most adorable little girl in the country? You are, Susan.”
You continue to sucks her tasty milk, since it runs dry. She then takes you to the other nipple, making you nursing from it as well.
During the nursing from the second nipple, the Queen sings a sweet lullaby and cuddles you in her arms.
You must admit that it feels good. Her milk is indeed tasty, and a peaceful sensation surround you entirely.
Once her second nipple has ran dry, she removes your mouth from it, but continues to cuddle you and to sing for you.
Rose gives her your bottle full of formula, and she puts it in your mouth. You suck it all, thinking that nurse from a bottle, despite being a very childish thing, it’s better than being breastfeed.
Once the bottle is empty, Charlotte takes you to your crib. Putting you down, she says “Enjoy your nap, Susan. Rose will watch over you, as usual.”
“Charlotte?” you call her, hugging Mister Rabbit.
“Yes, princess?” she says.
“Thank you ... for caring about me.” you simply say, before closing your eyes.
She pats your head, and you hear her leaving the nursery with Rose.
“Are you worried?” you hear Rose asking.
“About the mysterious footman? Yes.” the Queen replies.
Unfortunately, they go away as they speak, and you don’t catch anything else. So, you relax your body and fall asleep.
After some time, Rose wakes you up.
“Good afternoon, sleepyhead.” she says, smiling.
“Can I have change, nanny?” you ask “I wetted myself during the morning, and during the nap I wetted myself more and even pooped a little.”
She smiles again, taking you out from the crib and saying “Of course, princess. I can change you, but this mean that you will not have another diaper change until bedtime.”
You nod, aware of that. However, you don’t want to leak during class.
“Yes. I know.” you simply say.
She lift you in her arms and takes you to the changing table. There, she change you, very professionally as usual.
Once you’re in a fresh diaper, she puts you in the clothing you’ll wear for the afternoon. It’s sailor uniform, white and blue, with even the typical sailor heads. It’s the same outfit (female version, of course) that was wearing the spanked boy at the shop.
“I have a good news.” Rose says, while dressing you “Can you promise me to behave today afternoon and all day tomorrow?”
You nod, replying “I suppose I can. Why?”
“Well, if you do, tomorrow evening I can take you in the basement, lock the door and you can ... play on the rocking horse.” she says, smiling.
You blush, but you are happy at the same time.
You hug her, saying “I’ll be an angel!”
She gently pats your diaper, replying “I know you’ll be. But remember that angels don’t throw tantrums and don’t have a potty mouth, ok? And they get few demerits during their lessons, too.”
You nod, while she finishes with “And angels that don’t behave get visited by Krampus at the end of the year.”
“Rose!” you exclaim “I grew up in America. You can’t expect that I believe in this.”
She giggles, saying “Well, you can tell him that he doesn’t exists when you see him in December, princess.”
You know that there is no Krampus, but still you pretend to be scared by her words. You greet her and leave, once Eden arrives.
On the way, you meet Janet. Together, you reach Miss Spencer’s office.
There, you see the Butler coming out from it.
“Good afternoon, Mister Harper.” you greet him.
He seems in a bad mood, but very politely replies “Good afternoon to you too, princess. I’m sorry, but I’m quite busy.”
“Are you worried about the rumours?” Janet asks.
He nods, replying “The Queen strengthened the security. The problem that this caused to me is in the background, now. I’m much more worried about the Palace safety.”
He greets you and leave, while you knock the door and enter the classroom as Miss Spencer gives you permission.
She is back at her normal self. Strict, of course, but much more calm.
The lesson, today ...

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The lesson today is very interesting, at least for Janet.
Well, not the interesting in the way that the topics are new or something you had never heareda bout, but interesting in the meaning of “what you like to know about your friends”.
You are not sure how to describe the topic itself, it would be fair to call it a mixture of biology and sociology, under the main topic of sexuality.
“Today we talk about sex. Sexual orientations. Saver Sex and the right age for sex.” Miss Spencer starts.
With only that words you blush deep red and Janet burst out laughing hard. It needed the threat of being banned from the classroom before she calms down again.
For you, it was torture. Whenever Miss Spencer talks about bi- or homosexual preferences Janet pokes you in the side and giggles, while you blush more and more until you are sure you look like a tomato. To make it worse Miss Spencer notice that and understands, that you are already fixed on the female gender and keeps telling you, that this is okay and fine for her, the palace staff and the country – as long as you get pregnant or adopt a child at one point.

“Now, after we are done with that topic, lets talk about saver sex. Princess, you should be safe in more than one way, but Janet I like you to listen carefully, we don't want to find you in the newspapers because you got pregnant on your vacation in Calonia.” Now it was time for you to laugh and giggle, what Miss Spencer stops with the simple three words: “5 demerits, princess.”

But it was still funny. Miss Spencer introduced various ways of protection and has Janet put a condom over a realistic looking dildo. At first with her hands and then with her mouth. Your laughing earns you two more demerits, but it was worth it to see Janet blushing while she tried not to gag on the dildo.

When it comes to the right age for sex you feel a bit stupid. Miss Spencer really points out that Janet can do it, basically right now and that this is okay – but you have to wait until you are 18. You point out, that is not so easy going in the united states, but Janet pokes your side and shakes her head to make you shut up. It seems like she put her hopes into the party and does not want somebody to know that she is not old enough according to the laws of her own country.

After that funny part Miss Spencer goes more into the biological part of a pregnancy and why it is better to wait with that until the body is ready for it. For sure she points out that the body is not ready before, but absolutely ready after the 18th birthday – something you can only shake your head about.

Finally the lesson is over and - even with the laughing, only earned 9 demerits. A results you are very happy about.
Outside of the classroom you talk with Janet.
“Okay, what are we doing alter on? I would like to spy on Miss Spencer and Mr Harper to check if they are really together again, but we can do something else as well.” You let Janet decide and she picks to...

“You really want to investigate on the couple, uh?” she asks.
You nod, saying “I’d like it. But if you decide otherwise …”
“No, it’s okay.” she says “We’ll spy them to make sure everything is alright. Even if, with Miss Spencer talking about sex for the entire lesson, I think this is now just a formality.”
She said the last sentence of her phrase giggling.
“Ok, then.” you agree “I’ll catch you later, and then we’ll go on a spy mission.”
“You need to give the note to Miss Fletcher first, uh?” Janet asks.
You blush a little, replying “If I delay it, it will only get worse. A quick punishment and then I’m free.”
Janet hugs you and greet you, leaving.
Escorted by Eden, as usual, you reach your nursery. Inside, Rose is waiting for you.
“Hi, princess. How was the lesson for my little sailor?” she greets you, referring to your clothes.
“Nanny, I got nine demerits.” you say, giving her the note “They are not a lot, right? To prevent me to play with the rocking horse, I mean.”
Rose takes the note and reads it. She then smiles, saying “You haven’t lie, they are 9 indeed. And yes, they aren’t much. I consider you a well-behaved girl.”
You smile too, happy about the possibility to finally relieve yourself tomorrow evening with the rocking horse, but then she goes serious.
“Still, nine demerits mean a spanking, princess.” she says.
You gulp, and reach the chair without hesitation, surprising Rose a little.
“I’m ready …” you say “… to get my spanking.”
Rose reaches the chair too and sits on it, then drags you across her knees.
“Very good, princess. I’m pleased that you now see that a little discipline does only your good. I’m happy that you’re accepting our tradition.” she says, pulling down your pants and your diaper (that is a bit wet after the lesson).
“No, I’m not.” you think “I will never simply accept that this is ok. I still think I’m too old for spankings. But the quicker it is, the better it is.”
Rose spanks you with her hand, giving you a considerable amount of spanks. Not a too high number, but enough to make your bottom quite red. And, of course, making you cry.
“Done.” she proclaims, once finished the spanking.
She puts the diaper and the pants back on their place and lets you sit on her knees, hugging you tightly, cuddling you while you’re still sobbing.
“Hush, little one.” she sweetly says, rubbing your back “A little discipline never killed anyone. I don’t like spankings, but with them you’ll develop into a wonderful Queen, one day.”
You hug her back, holding her close. You really like Rose. She is strict, but she’s always so caring.
“I’m sorry, nanny.” you sob.
“It’s okay, my little sailor.” she says, still cuddling you “Nanny loves her beautiful angel, even if she is a bit naughty.”
“No, that’s not was I mean.” you say, without stopping completely to sob “I’m sorry for my first day here.”
“Oh? For the incident with the press and for misbehaving in Miss Kent’s office? It’s ok, you got the carpet beater for those.” she says.
You shake your head, stating “No. What I’m sorry about is thinking that you were mean. I didn’t know you back then. I’m sorry for that.”
“Oh, cutie!” she says, continuing to hug you “It was your first day. It’s normal for someone grew up in another country to see our strict discipline as unfair.”
“I still think it is.” you whisper, hiding your face in her boson “But back then I was ignorant about your caring side.”
She rubs your head, concluding with “You’ll appreciate our culture, sooner or later. For now, I’m just happy that you see me as a loving nanny.”
You nod, while she lets you go. You greet and leave the nursery, followed by Eden.
While reaching Janet once again, something comes in your mind, and you ask to your escort “Eden, where you spanked a lot in your youth?”
You were expecting her to not reply or at least to blush, but in a completely natural way she states “Of course, my lady. My father never spared me the hairbrush. My mother was often away, but when she was at home I was spanked at least twice a day. Without counting the others punishment.”
“Mouth soaping?” you ask.
She nods, grinning a little and saying “I was really a potty mouth back then. Mouth soaping was the punishment I got more times in my childhood. I was quite a tomboy, you know.”
You reach Janet room, and you enter. Janet greets you, and like a cold shower she asks “Do you need some time for yourself? I can wait outside.”
You shake your head, saying “That will get me in trouble.”
“Oh? Weren’t you needing it?” she asks “Or are you so afraid to get in trouble to give up without trying?”
You blush, and decide to tell her the truth.
With a sigh, you say to her “In others circumstances, I will gladly accept. But getting in trouble now that Rose will give me permission to do it would be stupid.”
She freeze for a moment, then burst out laughing, saying “Your nanny will give you permission to do that? How will it happen?”
You blush even deeper, replying “Well … with a rocking horse.”
Janet laughs really hard now, and you yell at her to make her stop “Janet! It’s not funny!”
In doing this, you wet your diaper more. Now the wetness indicator tells that a change can be performed, even if it’s not strictly necessary yet.
Janet stops laughing and hugs you, saying “I’m sorry, Susie. I know I shouldn’t tease you. But you must admit it’s a funny thought.”
You admit it is, and hug her back.
“Now, are you ready for our espionage mission?” she asks.
You nod, and you leave the room together.
While looking for the couple to spy, you meet someone in the hallways. Two people, talking to each other.

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You hear two voices from beyond the door. One belongs to Miss Spencer, while you don’t recognize the other one. It’s not Mr. Harper’s voice, for sure, since it’s a female voice.
“So, everything it’s okay now?” the unknown woman asks.
“It is.” Miss Spencer replies “That Grairven! For his schemes, I almost lost my love.”
“Mr. Harper is a wonderful man.” the other woman says “I’m really glad that everything it’s okay again.”
There is silence for a while, then Miss Spencer says “Tell me, Julie. Why have you come here?”
The woman named Julie replies “In the Palace everyone was worried about Mr. Harper mental health. I mean, he was becoming the shadow of himself because of the incident.”
“I know, I wasn’t easy for me either.” the teacher says “But this difficult time proved itself useful, because I’m now even more sure that I can trust the man I chose.”
“Your engagement was planned to be announced, before the incident.” the other woman says, making you and Janet look at each other, surprised “What are you planning to do now?”
“They were about to make it official.” you whisper to your friend. She nods, without replying.
Suddenly, you lose your balance. You are about to fall against the door: this will open it and you will get caught. Before this happens, however, Eden catches you.
You thank her, and continue to eavesdrop (for the scare, you messed your diaper a little).
“Now everyone is worried about Richard’s spy.” Miss Spencer says “Once everything will go back to normal, we will make the announcement.”
You hear Julie greeting Miss Spencer, so you decide to hide beside the corner. You look at her while she leaves, curious about this person.
Almost disappointed, you see a common maid on her early thirties, like many other in the Palace.
You are about to leave yourself, when you notice something strange.
Julie look around, to make sure no one is there. You are well hidden, so she doesn’t notice you.
To your surprise, she takes an hairbrush out from her French maid outfit and begins to spank herself.
“Bad girl, Julie, bad girl!” she says to herself aloud, in a scolding tone, but giggling a little “You should mind your own business!”
After some slaps, she then puts away the hairbrush and leaves the hallway.
You and Janet look at each other, and you both burst out laughing.
“Self spanking?! That is new.” you exclaim.
Janet adds “So there ARE people that likes it.”
“Nothing strange.” Eden intervenes “Spankings are not a such uncommon fetish. That is true in Calonia, too. Of course, kinky spankings and punishment spankings must always remain separated.”
You nod, but you don’t agree. To your eyes, liking spankings is simply impossible.
Still lost in your thoughts, you almost collapse when Janet says “Maybe I can try it with Willy.”
“Janet!!” you exclaim “If you like spankings so much, I can ask Eden to put you across her knees! Even better, I can ask Rose to give you all of my punishments!”
Janet giggles, saying “Oh, Susie. I was joking. When you discovered that you were the princess, you got much more serious than before.”
You blush, then hug her saying “I’m sorry.”
She hugs you back, then lets you go.
“So, little sailor, do you need a change?” she asks.
You blush again, replying “Yes. Back in the nursery I’ll ask Rose about it.”
“You know, I still miss my hairs.” Janet says “Down there, I mean.”
“Me too.” you admit “And the embarrassing thing is that I didn’t even notice their disappearance before Rose told you.”
A cold silence envelop the entire hallway.
“Now I should go back to Rose.” you say, after a while “It’s almost dinnertime, and I need a change and a bath.”
“I see.” Janet says “I need to use the toilet, too.”
You greet her, and Eden escorts you to Rose’s nursery.
Your diaper is very wet now, and even messed a little. You are eager to get a bath and go into a fresh one.
You reach the nursery and enter, greeting Eden. You don’t understand why, but she doesn’t leave.
Inside, a big surprise awaits you. The nanny, in fact, is not alone. She has a boy over her knees and she is spanking him. A boy you immediately recognize.
“Willy?!” you exclaim “What’s happening?”
The nanny looks at you, and you see that is nanny Melissa and not nanny Rose.
“Princess?!” she says, surprised “What are you doing here?!”
You now see why Eden didn’t leave. You didn’t reach the right nursery. This is Melissa’s one. How could you make such a mistake?
“I’m sorry.” you say “I made a mistake.”
Melissa puts William down. He is crying.
“What’s happened?” you ask.
“Willy pushed his sister.” she explains “And I see that you haven’t yet learned to knock the door before enter in a room.”
“I’m sorry.” you say.
Melissa …

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Melissa reaches out and takes your hand. She pulls you into her arms and sniffs the air, before she checks your diaper. “Oh princess, I see you used your diaper very good, both wet and messy.”

You blush and try to pull away from her.
“I know, I was on the way to Nanny Rose. I was just too deep in my thoughts and entered the wrong door.”

Melissa holds your hand tightly and pulls you back.
“I am sorry princess, but walking in without knocking, interrupting a punishment, I think you need a small punishment as well.”

You see Willy wiping his eyes and see Merry in the crib, looking over the rails. She looks very cute, like a puppy and you blush when you notice that you stare at her. That moment of distraction is enough for Melissa to pull you over her lap and lift the skirt of your sailor dress. “A little spanking never hurts.” She says, more to herself than to you and begins to spank your padded behind. You wiggle on her lap when the little mess spread around and you feel the squishy, wet diaper be pressed against your crotch. You deeply regret that you had wiggled on her mal, because now she is basically spanking your… crotch and because she is spanking you very lightly, this sends confusing feelings through your body. “Oh, please stop Nanny Melissa.” You moan out and Willy giggles. He stands beside his sister in the crib and look at you, while your face gets redder and redder. He is whispering to Merry and both of them grin at you.
When it is over you are breathing heavy and look at your feet to avoid looking at Nanny Melissa, Willy or Merry. “I hope that teaches you to knock the next time.” Melissa says and gives your behind a final little slaps, sending you over to Eden.
The knightess takes your hand and guides you to the door, where she stops and coughs slightly.
“Uhm, I am very Sorry Nanny Melissa, thank you. Bye Merry, bye Willy.” You say and Eden leads you out.
Outside she leads you to a bench and you slide down on it, with weak knees. Sitting down in your messy diaper is no fun, but you need some rest before you can face Rose and thankfully Eden knows that. “My friend had a nanny that used to spank her like this all the time – and worse. She told me about it and I think we should wait a few minutes before you get changed by Miss Fletcher.”

You blush and nod your head, to ashamed to say anything jet. You are not sure if it happened by accident or if Nanny Melissa did it with intention, but you want to “cool down” before you get changed and have to answer embarrassing questions. You are so aroused that you would accept Janet’s offer on the spot and have some minutes alone – but you want to be a good girl and earn your reward. It takes you a few minutes to come down and thank Eden.
“Thank you, I… I needed that break. I don’t want to get in trouble with Rose for something I haven’t done.”
Eden nods her head and smiles down at you. She is a good friend by now and trying to keep you out of trouble when she could.
“Your friend… her nanny… why have she done that to her?” You ask your guard and Eden blushes a bit, making you think that her “friend” might be herself. “Well, that nanny liked to tease my friend and telling her that she likes to be in a wet diaper. To prove that, she gave her “love-spankings” – like she called them – and made … my friend climax in her wet diaper. Then she got punished for being naughty, for sure.”
You nod your head feeling sorry for Eden’s… friend. You can be very happy that Rose is such a good nanny.

Finally you walk to your own nursery, double-check that it is really the right door and enter.
Inside you find…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Gives you a light punishment

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Nanny Rose is waiting for you, alone. Eden greets you and leaves you with her.
“Nice to see you again, princess.” she says, coming closer.
While you greet her back, she checks your diaper, saying “It’s very wet. I’m surprised it didn’t leaked.”
You blush while she takes you to the changing table and lifts you on it.
Rose begins to remove your clothes and to un-tape your diaper. While she is cleaning you, you decide to ask her “Nanny Rose, can I ask you a question about the Queen?”
She nods, replying “You’re always free to ask questions, little one. If I can answer, I will.”
“Charlotte came in America to make me princess because she can’t bear children.” you say “She told me that. But this doesn’t explain why there isn’t a king. Is she still unmarried?”
Rose finishes to clean you up and lets you sit, still naked, on the changing table. She sighs, and says “No, little one. Queen Susan was happily married with a local nobleman named Roy. He became known as King Roy the Wise.”
“What’s happened to him?” you ask her.
Rose seems to go sad for a moment, and says “A sudden heart attack, two years ago. Queen Charlotte was so desperate for her loss that I was afraid she would do something stupid. However, she stood up. She managed to administer the country alone, and rejected every suitor. Then, recently, she discovered that her cousin had a family on his own, and a daughter that one day would have inherited the throne.”
“That’s me.” you say “I wonder why my dad never told me about his Calonian origins.”
“You knew him well?” Rose ask, making you go sad too.
“Not so well, I must admit. He passed away when I was six.” you say to her.
She hugs you tightly, cuddling you in her arms.
“I’m sure he and king Roy know are talking to each other, and he is saying how proud he is of his daughter.” the nanny says, still hugging you.
“I’m not a little kid anymore, nanny.” you say, while your tone gets a little colder “I don’t need to believe in heaven.”
She doesn’t reply, catching that you don’t like talking about it. Instead, she changes completely the subject, saying “You really need a bath, don’t you?”
You nod, and she takes you to the bathtub. She washes you accurately, and at the end you’re fresh and clean, and you smell really good.
After diapering you, she puts you in the high-chair, where she feeds you with baby mush and with a bottle of milk. After the dinner, she puts you in a white romper.
“Do you want a pacifier, for tonight?” she asks.
Without even realizing it, you nod. She puts a pacifier in your mouth, then puts you in the crib.
Rose rubs your hair, saying “Good night, princess.”
“Nanny Rose?” you call her, speaking with difficulty behind your pacifier.
“Yes, cutie?” she asks.
“Tomorrow evening ... remember that you promised it.” you say.
She giggles, replying “Of course, princess.” before turning the lights off and then leave the room.
You hug Mister Rabbit, and quickly fall asleep.
During the night, you have confused dream. You see your dad face, vanishing in the mist. And nothing more.
The next morning, Rose wakes you up.
“Good morning, princess. Ready for a great Friday?” she says, smiling.
You nod, while she takes you out from your crib.
After she had removed your pacifier, with a wet sound, you say “I wetted and messed myself during the night.”
“I can smell it.” she says, giggling and patting the back of your diaper “A little change and then a healthy breakfast for beginning the morning in great style.”
She proceeds to change you, and gives you your breakfast while you’re dressed only in your fresh diaper.
After this, she lifts you out from the high-chair and dresses you up.
She dresses you in sailor-fuku, smiling sweetly.
“You’re very cute, princess.” she says, rubbing your hair.
You hug her, and once Eden has reached the nursery, you great your nanny and leave.
The Kent’s siblings have lesson in the morning, so you decide to reach Janet.
During the way, however, you see the Queen coming in your direction.
“Hi, Charlotte.” you greet her.
She is sweating, and with a quick smile she says “Hi, Susan. I’m in a bit of a hurry, so ...”
“Queen Charlotte! Stop running away!” a male voice says aloud.
A Royal Knight appears in the hallway and reaches the queen with few movements.
“Queen Charlotte! I can’t believe you’re trying to sneak away like a disobedient child. Aren’t you supposed to be an adult?” the knight says.
He is a quite old knight, with a big scar under his left eye.
As he appears, Eden does a military salute.
“Please, I am busy in administering the country. Can’t I skip practice this week?” the queen pleas, looking at him.
The knight shakes his head, replying “A member of the Royal House should train a lot, you can train only once a week just because your are alone on the throne, but you can’t skip it.”
“Oh, is she’s going to train?” you say “Can I see it?”
“Well, I don’t think ...” Charlotte begins to say, but the knight interrupts her.
“Of course, princess.” he says “You’ll train too once you’ll come of age, so it can’t hurt.”
With this words, he leads both you and the sighing queen (and Eden) to the training area.
You sit on a bench, with Eden beside you.
While the queen is changing herself in the locker room, you ask Eden about that royal knight.
She explains to you “That man is Joel Rames. He is the High Captain of the Royal Knights. He’s quite old, now, but once he was the most skilled knight in the kingdom, and maybe even of our history. No one has ever defeated him in single combat, not even me nor Maverick. And ... he was my master during my training.”
You thank her for the explanation, and the queen finally comes out from the locker room.
She is beautiful. She’s wearing the same armour that Eden is wearing too, only that hers is not silver, but golden.
Queen Charlotte takes out a rapier, while High Captain Joel takes out a long sword. They are training weapons, without sharp edges and with covers on the tips. They begins to spar.
The Queen is ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Nanny Rose

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The Queen is very good. With her elegant way of walking and her whole way of behavior you would not have expected it, but she is very agile and able to jump around the training field. She is clearly using the benefit of her younger age to find weak spots in the defense of the elder knight.
“She is good.” You whisper to Eden, who nods her head.
“She is, but she is not very economic with her energy.” The knightess points out.
You two continue to watch the fight and after about ten minutes you see that Eden is right.

Queen Charlotte was able to hit Joel a few times, but now she is sweating and her moves become less agile and she is forced further and further into a defense-position. The high captain is able to it her on the upper arms twice and she moans out in pain and has issues to lift her arm.
“Isn’t he going too hard on her?” You ask Eden, but she shakes her head. “Do not worry princess, he knows exactly how hard he needs to hit her, not to cause serious damage. Tomorrow morning the Queen will not even have a bruise and can move her arm like always.”
You really hope she is right. The Queen would not be happy to go to the party, looking beaten up.

Queen Charlotte lifts her rapier and tries to block the heavier weapon of the knight, but is pushed back. Then she slides to the side and poke him in the side.
“Ha! It took you so long to find out that avoiding a direct hit might be smarter.” Knight Rames snaps at the queen and steps back, holding his side.

Queen Charlotte wipes some sweat from her forehead and smiles weakly. “I thought I test my strength with you, old man. – Was not so smart, I have to say.” She gasps for air and rubs her upper arm.

The knight chuckles and shakes his head. “One day you learn that you don’t need to be as strong as you opponent, if you are clever.”

After a little break, the two of them continue for another 15 minutes. The whole lesson does not even last 45minutes, but you can see that it is a great workout for the Queen and she walks off to take a shower, like her trainer did.
“And Janet will fight like this as well?” You ask Eden on your way to your friend’s chamber.
“For 4 hours a day, plus fitness-training, plus theory. It is not so easy to become a knight.”

In Janet’s room you tell everything to your best friend and she listens carefully, until you end and she give you a little smack on your arm. “Hey!” You complain.
“For not taking me with you, brat.” Janet grins and sticks out her tongue.

For the rest of the morning you and her play video games – Mortal Combat – and have a great time.
“Only lunch, one lesson and then you have a bit fun?!” Janet grins, while she beats up your avatar with her avatar.
“I only hope miss Spencer is in a good mood today. I don’t want to lose this opportunity because she and Mr Harper had a fight about something stupid.” You growl.

A while later, Eden escorts you back to your nursery where Rose feed you and put you to the crib for your nap. You wonder where the Queen is and ask your nanny. “Rose, did the queen stopped to take the medicine? I am not unhappy about it, I just wonder about it.”

Rose grins and tickles your sides through your bright pink romper. “The Queen notices that it might be not the ideal way to tighten your relationship and stopped to take the lactating pills. And she had two… accidents where she ended with a moist bra during meetings when she was too busy to nurse you or pump off the milk. She will find something else to spent time with you, little one.”
You are happy to hear that. You really like the queen, but you feel simply too old to nurse on breasts.

After a peaceful sleep with Mr Rabbit Rose dress you in an onesie with the pattern of a ladybug. You blush, but secretly like it, because you love ladybugs. Outside, you meet Eden and Janet and the knightess leads you to your last lesson for the week.

Miss Spencer is…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Actually quite good

choices: In his thirties and quite eccentric
In his forties and quite severe
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Once that Miss Spencer has given you permission, you an Janet enter the room. Miss Spencer is smiling, which is a good sign.
“Good morning, Miss Spencer.” you greet her.
“Good morning to you too, princess. Good morning, Janet.” she says and points at your chairs with a finger.
You immediately sit down, like Janet does, and the lesson begins.
“So, you’ll attend the Penrose-Glee party tomorrow evening.” the teacher says “I must be sure that you know the formal etiquette for such an important social event.”
The lesson is quite boring, but extremely useful. She gives you a lot of information about the etiquette to follow during a party in Calonia, about the guests and about the host. In particular, she speaks a lot about the main organizer of the event, lady Penrose-Glee herself.
You raise your hand, and when she gives you permission to speak you ask “Are you invited too, Miss Spencer?”
She shakes her head, replying “I’m not a noble, princess. As a teacher I have quite a name in the country but, technically speaking, I’m a commoner.”
You nod, while Miss Spencer resumes her lesson. After speaking about the party, the last part of the lesson focus on math, your nemesis. You try the best you can to answer to the teacher’s question, and at the end of the lesson she’s pleased.
“Very well, princess. Very well indeed. I was right, after all: you need only to believe in yourself and focus hard.” she praises you.
You are quite happy yourself. You managed to get better and better at math in just few days. It’s quite obvious for you that it’s because school system in Europe (or maybe only in Calonia, you’re not sure about it) works much better than in the USA. You even managed to stay focus even when you were wetting your diaper during the lesson.
Miss Spencer then lends you a note, adding “And you were well behaved too: 3 demerits for today’s lesson. You can be proud of yourself. As your teacher, I am proud of you.”
You take the note, smiling.
“Umh … miss Spencer?” you then say, a bit hesitatingly.
“Yes, princess?” she asks.
“Can I … hug you?” you ask her.
She looks at your, surprised, then replies “Well … just once, okay?”
Smiling, you hug her. She hugs you back, while Janet giggles a little.
Miss Spencer lets you go. You greet her and march right to your nursery followed by both Eden and Janet.
“Nanny Rose! Nanny Rose!” you exclaim happily, entering in the nursery and running to hug your beloved nanny “I managed it! I got few enough demerits to avoid a punishment!”
Rose hold you in her arms, cuddling you and saying “Very well done, princess. Can I see the note, please?”
You give the note to her, and she looks at it. Smiling, she hugs you again.
“I’m very proud of you.” she says “You are a very good girl.”
“Can I spend the rest of the afternoon with my friends?” you ask her.
Rose nods, smiling, and replies “Of course. And if you don’t get in trouble during your playtime, once you’ll be back here I will keep my promise.”
Janet giggles again, but you’re too happy to let her ruin your mood.
You greet Rose and leave the nursery. You go straight to Melissa’s one, knocking at the door. The tall nanny gives you permission to enter, and you open the door. You see that Melissa, that is standing in the middle of the room, is alone.
“Good to see you, princess.” she greets you “Have you finally learned knocking?”
You blush, remembering the embarrassing spanking she gave you yesterday and trying to forget it at the same time.
“I was looking for Merry and Willy.” you say to her.
“I think they are in the garden, princess.” the nanny replies “You can reach them if you want.”
You thank her and leave. While reaching the garden, Janet says to you “Do you want me to take William away? In this way you’ll be alone with Meredith.”
You become the color of a tomato, and instantly reply “Janet! I already told you no!”
“Aww, are you afraid that the cute little Merry could rape you if you are alone?” she teases you.
Knowing that she really cares about you and simply enjoys teasing you a little, you decide to ignore her while reaching the garden.
You find Meredith and William playing together. They’re chasing each other, maybe playing tag or something like that. You’re happy to see that they are in normal clothes and not in punishment ones.
You look at Merry, in particular, and you notice that she has ribbons in her hair that make her look super cute.
You reach them, and as she notices you Meredith immediately jumps at you and hugs you tightly.
“Hello, Susie.” she says, whispering at your ear.
You notice that Willy has run toward Janet, and you can’t avoid thinking that they could be an interesting couple.
“Do you have something in mind for the afternoon?” he then says, looking at you.
“Nothing in particular.” you reply “Today I’ll be on my best behavior. Rose promised me a reward and I want it.”
William catches very quickly what are you talking about: he giggles and says “Oh, the princess wants to be good to be naughty.”
You make him the sign to shut up using your hands, and he decides to do it.
For the afternoon, you could simply play in the garden. Or maybe you can ask around to know the First Footman, since you have never met him so far. You decide to change things a little, and go for the second option.
“I’d really like to meet the First Footman. I never saw him.” you say to the others “Do you want to come with me?”
They all agree, and you begin to search.
You look for a footman and decide to ask him about his boss.
The footman you meet first is quite young and is cleaning an hallway with a mop.
“Excuse me …” you say “… can I ask you something?”
He looks at you, surprised, and says “Of course, princess. What do you need?”
“I’m looking for the First Footman. Do you know where we can find him?” you ask.
He touches his chin and takes a thoughtful expression, then replies “I think he is in dining room. As far as I know, he wanted to check the royal kitchen. But be aware that is quite nervous today.”
You think that meeting him while he’s nervous maybe isn’t that smart, since he is one of the servants authorized to punish you, but the curiosity gets too strong.
You quickly reach the dining room, and you find a man inside.
The man is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: In a great mood today

choices: Got a note from Mr. Collin.
Is holding the key for the basement.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The fist footman is wearing a black uniform with a golden cordon over his right shoulder. He is inspecting the setting of the table and looks surprised with he sees you, Janet, the twins and Eden.
“Good afternoon Princess Susan, I was not aware that I need to prepare your highchair as well. I thought you are still feed by your nanny.” He looks for the nearest maid and is about to give her orders, when you stop him.
“No, you are right. I… am still feed by my nanny, Mr… ?”

“Oh, I Maximilian Collin, the first footman, princess.” He smiles and bows in a perfect aristocratic way.

You smile and relax a bit. “Oh, you are the first Max I meet in Calonia. I really like that name.” You smile and try to befriend him –with no success.
“It is Mr. Collin or first footman. Only my mother is calling me Max, Princess Susan.” He says a bit angry.

“Uhm, I am sorry Mr. Collin, I will remember that. Are you preparing the table for dinner?” You feel stupid right after the words are out, but wait for his reply.

“Yes Princess, I am – and now that I remember you are not even allowed to be here. If the order has not changed, what I doubt, then you are banned from the dining room for bad behavior and throwing a tantrum.” Mr. Collin says and looks even stricter than before.

You blush and quickly look at Janet. “Uhm, yes, I only wanted to show the room to Janet, my best friend.” Janet’s eyes go wide and you see her shaking her head slightly, but it is too late.

“Princess, Miss Janet is using this dining room on a regular base, are you trying to pull my leg?” he pulls out a chair from the table and pat his lap. “Princess, are you aware that I have the authority to punish you? If yes, than I kindly ask you to lap over my knees.”

“What? But I…” You bite down on your bottom lip and look at your feet. “I did not mean to trick you. I only wanted to meet you.” You say, but Mr Collin is still patting his knees. Sighing, you go to him and lie over his lap.
“It is good that you accept my punishment, Princess. I am pleased that you learned to follow instructions.” He says and give your behind five slaps over your diaper. It does not hurt at all, it is only to make you know your place. You decide you do are not eager to become his friend. As soon as he let you up from his lap you greet him and leaves the room.

“Susie, I eat her almost every day, twice sometimes.” Janet says when you are in the hallway.

“I noticed that.” You say grumpy and stop for a moment. You are happy that is did not happen over his lap, but now you flood your diaper with a hissing noise. Janet is shaking her head and rolls her eyes.
“Really? You want to ride the rocking horse in a soaked diaper?”

Merry giggles and blush a bit, but does not say anything, while William grins from ear to ear.

You have not thought about that and your facial expression slips. You did not had the chance to hump anything so far and do not know if the feeling would be worse or maybe even better when the diaper is wet. Unsure if you should ask to an extra-change you waddle back to your nursery.
“I only hope Mr. Collin does not report anything to Rose.” You whisper to Janet and she giggles. In front of your door, she ruffles your hair and takes Williams hand.
“We go back to the garden to play. You can have… fun.” She winks at you and pull William with her.
Meredith hesitates for a moment, but then she jumps at you and give you a quick kiss on the lips. “Think of be when you do it.” She whispers into your ear and quickly runs off. You are left with Eden, while your cheeks turn bright red. “Merry, the kinky little vixen.” You think, say goodbye to Eden and enter the nursery.

Rose is waiting. She…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: In his forties and quite severe

choices: “Once there, a maid will feed you anyway.”
“You will be allowed to feed yourself.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose is smiling brightly, and you see she is holding a well ornate key. You catch that is the key of the basement.
You jump at her, hugging her and saying “Nanny, if I have done something wrong, will we go in the basement anyway?”
She seems confused, and says “Well, princess, it depends. What have you done this time?”
You decide that saying all to her could avoid you a punishment for lying. Mr. Collin would tell it to someone anyway, you think.
“I wanted to meet the First Footman, so I reached him in the dining room. But I didn’t know I was not allowed there and I lied about it. So Mr. Collin spanked me after seeing through my lie.” you say, almost crying.
To your surprise, Rose giggles and pats your head, saying “Oh, princess. Your curiosity is admirable. I really like that trait of yours, but it has the tendency to get you in trouble. Why haven’t you simply said that you wanted to meet him instead of lying? He would have not spanked you and he would have been pleased.”
“I … I don’t know. I said the first thing that came in my mind.” you admit.
“And that is the real problem, princess: you never stop long enough to think about what you’re about to say or do. Is this tendency that created a problem with the press at your landing and the main reason you get in trouble so often.” she explains, in a firm but not scolding tone.
“I’m sorry.” you say “I’ll try my best to get better.”
“I know you will.” she says, cuddling you “You are a smart little girl, princess.”
“So … can we go?” you try, afraid that now she has changed her mind.
Luckily for you, she nods instead, saying “Yes, princess. We can go in the basement.”
“Can I get changed, first? I am quite wet.” you say to her, but Rose shakes her head.
