“Well, it is only better, don’t you think? And this way I don’t need to change you twice in so little time.” she says, giggling a little.
“Twice?” you ask.
“Oh, princess!” she exclaims “Did you think I’d let you all night in a the diaper where you reached climax in? Absolutely not!”
You blush, getting what she is saying. Rose takes your hand, and takes you to the basement holding it, while in the other hand she twirls the ornate key.
Every maid and footman that you come across gives a look to the key and giggles. Every single one. You are sure that they know what is going to happen.
“Rose, can’t you hide the key at least?” you ask.
She shakes her head, replying “Oh, it’s part of the tradition. When a child is taken to have naughty fun, everyone that come across the child concerned should know it. As everyone in the palace will know about your menarche when you’ll have it.”
You blush deep red, maybe even deeper than usual, and say “Roooose!”
She giggles, saying “Well, it’s the first sign that you are going to become a woman, after all.”
“Rose, I already had it!” you exclaim, blushing.
“Oh, really?” she says, surprised “It’s a shame, I would have really liked to take care of it. Well, let’s think about naughty fun, shall we?”
With this sentence, you are at the basement’s door. Rose opens it with the key and let you in. You are ready to be left alone with the rocking horse, but she follows you and lock the door behind her, leaving the key in the keyhole (to prevent nanny Melissa to enter with one the Kent’s using her key, you think).
“Are you going to watch me?” you ask, blushing again.
“It’s obvious.” she states “I need to check on you to see that you don’t do anything wrong.”
You’d want to complain about it, but you’re afraid that she can change her mind. You nod and walk right to the rocking horse.
The horse is brown and looks really cute, with a saddle on his back. The horse itself is stuffed and fluffy, but the saddle is really hard.
Rose removes your ladybug onesie, leaving you only in your diaper. Then, she helps you getting on the saddle.
You press your crotch against it, and you begin to ride the horse. You feel a good sensation running through your body. It’s quite embarrassing that Rose gives you advice of how to do it correctly, but you must admit that following them only increase the pleasure you feel.
After a not so long time, your body reaches its climax, while your already wet diaper welcomes something that is not pee, something that Amos has once called pussy juice.
You moaned harder and harder, and now you are exhausted but feel extremely good. You let your body fall on the back of the horse.
“Very good, princess.” Rose says, clapping her hand and making you feel a little ashamed “That was an excellent naughty fun session. I’m sure your mommy would be proud.”
You’re quite sure that the answer to this is a no, but you don’t give and weight it.
“What have you thought about during it, princess?” she asks, smiling.
You reply without thinking “To a beautiful girl.”
You immediately blush, realizing what have you just said. At least, you didn’t make Meredith’s name.
Rose giggles, saying “Oh, you have that kind of preference.”
“It is not a problem, right?” you ask, without looking at her in embarrassment.
“Why should it be a problem? We are not in the middle-age anymore, you know.” she says “Calonia is very liberal on the matter.”
You’re glad about it, and you’re so happy of your climax that you don’t make a fuss when Rose picks you up and carries you back to the nursery holding in her arms.
She puts you down in the nursery, saying “Now, princess, it’s bath time. It will put you in a fresh diaper afterward. Then you’ll have your dinner and you’ll go to bed.”
She does just that. Once cleaned, in a fresh diaper and then in the high-chair to get your dinner, the door of the nursery opens.
“Your majesty.” Rose greets the queen, who has entered.
“I have good news for you, Susan.” she says, looking at you “If you promise to behave, you can have dinner in the dining room with me.”
You are happy about it, and say “Yes! Thank you, Charlotte!”
As Rose takes you out from the high-chair, smiling, the queen says …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Is holding the key for the basement

choices: Call for Rose to change you.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Once we are in the dining room, a maid will feed you.” Queen Charlotte says and takes your hand.
“Oh,… “ You say surprised, but suppress any more words that can only bring you into trouble. You don’t want to be feed at all – and being feed by somebody else but Rose sounds bad to you.

In the dining room you smile weakly when you see the first footman again. He smiles friendly, but you have issues to trust him. “Your majesty, princess, welcome.” He greetings Charlotte and you.
Charlotte leads you to a high chair and let go off your hand. “Is this a new model” she asks Mr. Collin and he nods and lift you in it. Once you sit down he pushes the trap to your tummy and you find your hands trapped below the tray. “Yes my queen, after the last incident we got something new for the princess. Something that should prevent her from throwing her food across the table.”

You blush deep red and try to wiggle your hands out, but they are stuck. “That is ages ago.” You complain but only earn a strict gaze from Mr. Collin. “I mean, I am still sorry for that.” You correct yourself.
Charlotte giggles and takes her seat, across the table, but very close to you. Closer than the last time, while a maid enters and carries a tray with a steaming bowl of mush and a baby bottle.
“Princess Susan, I am Liz and I have the duty to feed you tonight.” She says and picks up the bowl and spoon.

“Yes, let us start.” Charlotte says and starts to eat herself, while the first spoon approaches your mouth. You see the orange mush steaming and pull back to blow at it to cool it down. Some mush drops down on your brand new onesie, staining the pure white fabric.
“Oh no, I forgot the bib.” Liz curse and pulls something from her apron pocket. She tries to wipe the stain away, but gives up quickly, before she ties the bib around your neck.

Charlotte laughs out and smiles at you: “Aw, a little piggy, that is cute.” She smiles.
Blushing deep red you try to look down and see the bib, but the smiling face of the pink pig is not visible for you. Grumpy you take the next offered spoon from Liz and let her feed you.
Liz is feeding you faster than Rose did and you finish the bowl quickly. You don’t like her pace and the fact that you have no breaks to talk to the Queen.
“If you are that hungry, I can bring you more.” Liz says and you nod, only to have some time alone with the Queen.

“Are you looking forward to the party? I know Janet is super excited and I am as well. I am only concerned about the automatic changing table and crib that the Campbell’s sold to the house Penrose-Glee. I heard that the software is far away from being easy to handle. I only want to avoid that it ruins a wonderful night.” You already see Liz returning with a fresh bowl of mush and speed up your words. “I was super impressed by your skills in the training area as well, and I am happy that you don’t take the medicine any more, I think we can spent time together in a different way, you know?!”

“Open up for the airplane.” Liz smiles and continues to feed, or better – stuff you with mush.

Queen Charlotte smiles weakly and takes her time to answer, while spoon after spoon is pushed into your mouth.
“I am also happy to spend more time with you. Rose’ idea with… feeding you directly was nice, but difficult to maintain.” She blushes and takes another bite from her delicious smelling Chicken-Leg.
“I do not worry about the invention of the Campbell’s, they always give out a manual with all their inventions. I am more concerned that Lord Richard will be around and might cause some trouble. I will not address the case with the spy since I cannot proof it, but our relationship is very bad – as you know.”

Liz is switching from the bowl to the baby bottle and holds it for you in a high ankle. The formula comes fast and some if it is dipping down your chin. You feel very much like a baby, helpless as you are.

“Other than that I am looking forward to the party as well and hope Janet and you will have a good time. I talked to Laura and she told me that Zoey and Tabby will be at the party as well. Uhm, not AT the party, but you will have an hour or two between the party and your actual bedtime. Their parents are invited and I asked them to bring their girls. I hope that is in your interest.” Queen Charlotte says and takes a sip of red wine.

Liz is smart enough to lower your bottle and allow you to answer. To your embarrassment you belch from the air you gulped down, before you can answer: “Sure, that will be great, even when it is only an hour or two.”
As soon as your words are out Liz stuff the bottle back into your mouth and you have to hold back to shout at her and tell her how stupid she is. Without being able to do anything you see the Queen getting up, walking around the table and give you a kiss on the forehead. “Goodnight Susan.” She says, while you just finish the rest of your baby bottle.

“Aw, that was a nice dinner, wasn’t it?” Liz grins and helps you out of the high chair. She really think that she did a good job and you only hope that she learn to feed you nicer or that Rose can feed you the next time – in the dining room. Liz guides you to the door, where Eden waits for you. Tired from the long day and all the food you take her head and let her guide you to your nursery, where Rose tucks you in.
“Rose, can you feed me next time? Liz is… just not good at it.”

Rose smiles down at you and gives you Mr. Rabbit. “Aw, she will learn it. It would bad for her if I take over from her.”
You could not care less, but hold our tongue.
Rose switches off the lights and you try to fall asleep.

Almost an hour later you have cramps and fill the seat of your diaper completely. “Oh… shit.” You whimper and try to find a comfortable position. Your dinner had went right though you and now you face a long night in a full diaper. You decide to…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “Once there, a maid will feed you anyway.”

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You gather your breath, and call aloud for your nanny.
“Nanny Rose!” you shout “Can you come here?”
After a very short period of time, Rose comes in the nursery, breathless. She is wearing just her nighty.
“Princess, are you ok?” she says, coming next to your crib, worried.
“Umh ... can you change me, please? I can’t sleep like this.” you say.
You see Rose expression change dramatically.
“You called me here for changing your diaper? Really, princess?” she says, sternly “You know the rules. You’ll be changed tomorrow morning.”
“But it stinks, and it’s messy!” you complain, aloud “You can’t leave me like this!”
“Enough, little one.” Rose says, in her scolding tone, calm and stern “I suggest you to sleep, princess. This is just a tantrum, and you know that I don’t stand them.”
“Nanny, just this time. Come on! Do it!” you say to her.
“I give you three possibilities, princess.” the nanny replies, making the sign of three with her fingers “Option one: you sleep peacefully like the little angel you are capable of being. Option two: continue with this tantrum and get a spanking. Option three: beg me very politely to change you, not like a spoiler brat like this, and I will do it. Be aware, however, that option three will be followed by a suppository.”
You quiet down, saying “I’m sorry. I’ll sleep.”
She rubs your hear, and says “A very good choice, little one. And please, don’t yell at me or at another grown-up. It is rude, and rudeness is punished.”
She puts a pacifier in your mouth and leaves. You suck at it, hugging Mister Rabbit. After a while, you finally fall asleep.
You feel a warm hand waking you up in the morning. You open your eyes, and to your surprise you see queen Charlotte, smiling at you.
“Good morning, little angel.” she says, sweetly.
“Good morning to you too, Charlotte.” you reply, yawning.
At least, that is what you think of saying. With the pacifier in your mouth, none of your words is understood.
Charlotte giggles, removes your pacifier and then you repeat the sentence.
Still smiling, she lift you out from the crib, taking you to the changing table holding you in her arms.
“Oh, my little princess is poopy.” she says, as she puts you on the changing table “Time for a diaper change.”
Rose isn’t around, and while the queen changes you, you ask to her “Have you locked Rose in the bathroom again, Charlotte?”
She giggles, replying “No, not this time. I simply told her that nanny Melissa wanted to speak with her.”
As the queen finishes to put you in a fresh diaper, Rose enters in the nursery, a bit angry.
“Your majesty.” she says, sternly “If you want to change the princess, you can do it without tricking me outside. Really, sometimes you behave like a little girl.”
“But it’s more funny, this way.” the queen giggles.
She’s always so busy and must act in a manner appropriate with her role, which takes with absolute seriousness and devotion. It’s natural that she needs to let it go sometimes. Rose is her best friend, so it’s natural to do it with her.
“Funny, uh?” Rose says, apparently serious but trying her best to don’t giggle “Well, I can ask to nanny Samantha what does she think of your funny pranks, Lottie.”
“Please, Rosie, don’t do it.” the queen replies, faking a cry.
You three then all laughs together, and the queen takes you down from the changing table.
“Charlotte, can you explain to me exactly how the party will work? I’m a bit confused.” you ask.
The queen nods, and explains “There will be music and fun from 17.00 to 20.00. Then, the children will be separated from the group and will go upstairs. They’ll let you have two hours of fun with the other kids, from 20.00 to 22.00. After that, it’s bedtime for you.”
“Bedtime at 22.00?” you say, surprised and happy “Can I really stay awake an hour more than usual?”
“Just for this time, little one.” the queen says “I asked House Penrose-Glee to make an exception. Don’t get used to it.”
You hug her, saying “Thank you, thank you, thank you.”
She smiles and pats your head, then continues saying “Between 17.00 and 20.00, children will be left at the care of their caretaker. I’ll let you socialize and have fun, but many children will be in playpens or just next to their parents. So, I suggest you to socialize with adults during the time of the party, since you’ll have two hours with the kids later. Always be polite and, please, if you see lord Richard don’t run to provoke him.”
“Zoey’s and Tabitha’s parents are invited, right? Are they noble?” you ask.
The queen nods, replying “Zoey’s father is, as Tabitha’s mother. Their consorts became nobles too, with marriage.”
She gently moves you way from her, saying “Now I must go, princess. Rose will dress you up and then you are free.”
“One last question.” you say “The party starts at 17.00, so I must prepare in the early afternoon, right?”
The queen nods again, and explains “Yes, princess. It is correct.”
“And that is the reason I don’t have lesson today!” you exclaim, happy. But Rose shakes her head, while the queen greets you and leave.
“No, princess.” Rose says, once you’re alone “You don’t have lesson because you have two free days.”
“But I had to lesson last Saturday. I remember it well, becouse Mr. Grairven gave me my first paddling.” you state.
“That is because you spent the entire Friday afternoon grounded in Melissa’s nursery and you skip a lesson.” Rose explains.
You are happy to hear it, though. This mean that you have only 5 lessons per week.
Concluded that, Rose proceed to dress you up. She puts you in white dress, whose lowest part remember a skirt. The skirt-like part is just long enough to cover your diaper. If you’d bend over, everyone will see it. It has long sleeves and a pink band around the neck the almost seems a little scarf. On the chest is printed a strawberry, and under it is printed the sentence “Don’t spank me, I’m cute”.
“Remember that being cute won’t avoid you punishments if you misbehave.” Rose says, giggling.
You greet her and leave (after the arrival of Eden).
You decide to go to see Janet. You find her ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Call for Rose to change you

choices: Melissa is angry at you and Janet
All adore Janet’s and your dress/makeup
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You find Janet in her room, sitting in front of a mirror and playing around with a big makeup kit. When she turns around she looks like Cleopatra, especially the eyes – and you laugh out hard.
“Oh Janet, you look… gooood.” You grin and she makes a sore face.

“Hey, I asked some maids to help me, but they say that a kid should not wear makeup at all. I am happy that I received the makup-kit.” Janet snaps. Then she remembers something and comes to you. “Aaaand? Was it good yesterday, could you get rid of some pressure?”

You blush deep red and nod. “Yes, it was good – but that is all I say about it!”

For sure Janet tries to get more details, but you keep quiet and try to bring the makeup to her attention again. You think it is enough that Rose knows that you thought about a girl. If you tell Janet that you thought about Merry, while you rubbed yourself off on the saddle, she would not stop to press you for more – shameful – details and insist that you try something real with Merry.
“Hey, can you put a nude makeup on me. Nothing drastic, only underlining my… natural beauty?” You blush about your own words. Normally you don’t think you are beautiful, but at least Janet is distracted from other topics.
“Sure, I try my worst.” Janet grins and starts to work on you.

“When do you get changed? I guess after lunch, hu?” Janet asks you and feel insecure.
“I am already dressed. I don’t think they change me again – except when I make my dress dirty.” You say, blushing.

Janet sits bag, the facial brush in her hand and sighs: “What a waste. I had hoped they put you in a sexy Lolita-dress.”
You give her a little slap for that. “Pah, I look good and innocent. You are the only Lolita on the party and I hope you get in trouble for it.” You stick out your tongue, but don’t mean it.

“I look great! And I look mature. It is NOT Lolita-style!” Janet insist and needs a minute to calm down again.
She is about to continue when you whisper: “You are only pissed off because Willy is not there.”

Angry and blushing deep red Janet gets up and walks up and down the room.
“You BITCH! That is unfair! You could make out with Merry when you had the guts to do it. I CAN NOT! Maybe you have not noticed it, but he is diapered 24/7!” She sits down and sighs. “And he is to cute, still. – I have no clue how that will work out.”

“You can ask to change his diaper. Then you have access to the part of him that is interesting you.” You grin. It was meant to be a joke, but Janet seems to think about it, before she nods. “Hm, that could even work! Thanks Susie, not I wipe the lipstick-penis from your cheek.”

“WHAT?!” You quickly look into the mirror and sees that she was joking. Basically she is already down with your makeup – and she had done a great job, making you look more sensual and still pure.
“Thanks for the makeup. I hope Rose let me wear it later on as well.”

After this you help Janet with her makeup. She tries out different styles, but then sticks to a medium heavy “painting”, making her look a bit older, so she could pass for a young looking adult and not a teenager. “We should visit the twins, I want to see Williams reaction when he sees me with the makeup and my dress.” Janet suggested and slide into her dress. She does not wear a bra under it and very skimpy panties. From the side you can see half of her naked breasts when she lift her arms and you beg her not to overdo it at the party. She put on heels and you suddenly lack a full feet of height, compared to her. “You look very mature.” You have to confess. “And very sexy.”
Janet thanks you and joins you and Eden in the hallway.

Smiling from ear to ear you knock at Melissa’s nursery and wait for her to let you enter.
Janet and you step in, seeing William, Meredith and Nanny Melissa and wait for the reactions.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: In her room

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Seeing the tall nanny surprised expression, you are suddenly sure that it was a bad idea. She will spank you right there, then she will tell everything to Rose.
You are surprised yourself when Melissa giggles instead, and says “Oh, how cute you are, princess. Janet, you really look beautiful.”
You smile, and Merry jumps at you, giving you a hug.
“It’s true! You are very cute.” she exclaims.
Janet goes straight to Willy, then looks at nanny Melissa and says “Miss … Melissa?”
“You can call me nanny Melissa, Janet, no need for miss. Just to be clear, however, my surname is Mason.” the nanny says, with a smile.
“I was thinking that I could help you in the nursery sometimes. I don’t know … maybe change Willy?” she suggests, making the boy blush.
Melissa giggles, replying “Sure, Janet. Tonight, after dinner, lay in your bed and have a pleasant dream about it.”
Janet seems a bit disappointed, but it was a foregone answer.
“Janet.” the nanny says, this time with a serious tone “You have a lot of freedom, but don’t exaggerate. Willy, here, is submitted to Calonian tradition. He’s a little kid.”
You don’t agree with her, and you decide to say it.
“But he isn’t a real kid, right? He’s 14 like me.” you say, without thinking enough on your sentence.
“Princess, are you trying to get a mouth soaping?” Melissa says, making you shut up immediately “Until you turn 18, you ARE kids. And this mean you too, princess.”
You feel a little ashamed, and say to her “I’m sorry, nanny Melissa. I spoke without thinking.”
The nanny smiles at you and pats your head, saying “Don’t worry, princess. I know it is difficult for you to adapt, ma you must learn to watch your tongue when you speak with grown-ups. I’m sure Rose already told you that you should watch your temper.”
You instinctively hug her, and Melissa hugs you back, cuddling you a little. Her embrace is warm, but you think that Rose’s hugs are the best.
“Have fun, tonight.” she whispers, letting you go.
You thank and greet her and leave the room, followed by your “crew” and by Eden.
“Do you want to play for the rest of the morning to a very interesting game?” Willy says, catching your attention.
“Which is?” you ask.
Before he can answer, however Merry jumps on the spot, saying “Oh, I know it, I know it! It’s Palace hide-and-seek!”
“Exactly!” William exclaims “Palace hide-and-seek! It’s a good game to play it with a lot friends. The four of us is enough, but with more it would be even better.”
“Palace hide-and-seek?” you ask “What do you mean?”
“I think that they mean a hide-and-seek with the entire Royal Palace as playground.” Janet intervenes.
The “twins” nod simultaneously (which is very cute, you think) and Willy says “You’re the best, Janet! You caught it in a blink!”
“I will invite the friends from the city, one day of next week.” you say “Maybe it would be wiser do it when they are here too.”
Your idea is accepted with enthusiasm, in particular by Willy, eager to know Zoey and Tabitha.
Noticing his enthusiasm, Janet decides to provoke him a little “Oh, there will be Samuel too, right? I like him. It’s a cool guy.”
“Ehy!” William exclaims, blushing “I’m better than him!”
“But … you don’t even know him.” Merry intervenes, shy.
“He is a commoner!” William exclaims, surprising you “I’m the son of the Prime minister!”
Surprising you even more, Merry stomps her foot and exclaims aloud “Stop that! Mommy hates when you speak like that! You are better than this!”
William seems so calm down, saying a little apology.
“You should not speak like this.” you add, calmly and a bit disappointed by his reasoning “Commoners, nobles, royals … we are all people.”
The climax of your surprise comes when Willy begins to sob and hugs you, saying between sobs “I’m sorry. It’s stronger than me. I live in the Royal Palace and I often consider myself like I’m the prince. You are right, I should not do it.”
You hug him back, and both Janet and Merry hug the both of you.
While the four of your are hugging each other, you can clearly hear a passing maid saying “Oh, how cute they are.”
You separate each other from the embrace, and finally Merry says “By the way, I haven’t complimented you for the makeup. And you wear a beautiful dress, Janet.”
“Thanks. Now that you remember me, I’d better change myself.” she says.
You accompany Janet in her room, and she comes out with a everyday clothing, saying “I will put it on again in few hours, but for now I stay like this.”
“Any idea of what we should do before lunchtime?” you then ask.
Merry takes word “I have an idea. You wanted to meet every staff member of the palace, right?”
You nod, replying “I’d really like it.”
“Well, I don’t know every staff member, but there are two people I’m sure you haven’t met yet. With them, I’m almost sure that you’ll have met every important servant in the Palace.” she explains.
“Two people, uh?” Janet intervenes “Who are you talking about?”
“Well, the Palace Librarian and the Royal Chef.” Merry says.
“Oh, I know them both!” Janet exclaims, then looks at you and adds “It would be a good idea, Susie.”
You look at Eden, looking for approval, and she simply nods.
However, you say “I’d like to, but I’ll do that another time, maybe next week, after the party. After meeting the First Footman, I think I’ll be a little more careful.”
“Ok, then we are left with two options.” Janet says “Go to my room (we are just out of it, after all) and play videogames or play in the garden.”
“I think videogames are fine.” you say.
The siblings agree, and the four of you decide to play with videogames.
“I suggest a little bet to get everything more interesting.” Janet says with a disquieting grind “After every match, the winner spanks the loser.”
You and the siblings look at each other, surprised.
Then, with the siblings support, you say …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: All adore Janet’s and your dress/makeup

choices: You meet somebody in the hallway.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
„Okay, I agree“, you say, and before Janet can say another word you point at Merry. “I play against her and you against Willy.
Meredith claps her hands and jumps up. “Juhu, I play with Susie!” She is already hugging you, when she understands what this can mean. “Uhm, but you don’t spank me hard, will you?” She pouts in a cute way.
“No baby, and only over your diaper.” You grin at her.

William sighs and shakes his head. “I think this is super unfair, Janet is playing all day long, maybe even at night.”
“Hey, I am sleeping at night, like you do as well. It will be a fair match – and we take turns, so in the end everybody plays against everybody.” Janet says and grabs the controller. “Come to my side cutie-but, time to earn a spanking.” She grins at Willy and he sits down beside her.

You are very good at driving simulations, but Janet picks a fighting simulation, because the rounds does not take as long as it would take to drive around a circuit. “Okay, best of three!” She says and her avatar flies at Willi’s and literary rips his ass apart. Within 17 seconds she wins.
“Ups, I am sorry, I guess I am very good at this one.” She grins and starts the second round. This round does only last a few seconds longer and she grins from ear to ear when she slides back, put the controller aside and pats her lap. “Looks like little Willy receive a spanking.” She grins.

William lay across her lap and she slides rub her hand over his padded behind in a sensual way. “Such a cute little behind.” She grins and begin to smack him. She is very unexperienced with this and not sure how hard she should or could beat him, but after a while she knows how to make William tense up with each slap.
When she is done he has a red face and rubs his behind. “Damn it, you will be a hell of a nanny, if you like. By ass is glowing through the diaper.”

Now Merry and you play against each other and the match is very tight, but she loses after three rounds and lay across your lap, very willingly. You notice that her legs are not tight together and you wonder if she is doing that by intention.
Like Janet you have no clue how to give a “good” spanking and cannot bring yourself to really slap her. You are so bad that Merry complains about it. “Harder Susie, I cannot feel anything.” She whispers and you try it a bit harder, but give up quickly. “Sorry Merry I am not good at this.” You apologize and hug her.

The next match is William against you. You lose and William can show that he is already strong… . In the end you have tears in your eyes and Merry is holding your hand, while her brother is warming up your behind. You end up wetting yourself and that makes William laugh out and end the spanking. “I guess our princess has enough.” He grins and you stick out your tongue at him, while Meredith hugs you and rub your behind. You lay your head against hers and inhale the sweat smell of her hair.

Watching Merry and Janet play against each other is interesting. They both wants to win and it looks bad for Janet, when William comes from behind and tickle her sides. “Hey, not fair!” She complains when Merry wins.
“Don’t worry sister, I make it nicely.” Merry grins and take Janet over her knees. She is not in diapers and almost jumps off Meredith’s lap when the first slap hits her panties. “Hey, careful!”
Merry shrugs, but says that she is sorry, before she grabs Janet tightly and let a thunder of lighter slaps rain down on Janet’s behind. Almost unnoticeable her hand goes deeper and almost hit Janet’s crotch.
“Wow, wow, stop it!” Janet shouts and wiggle off Merry’s lap. She has weak knees and blush deep red. “We don’t do that!” She snaps at Merry and press her knees together.

“I have no clue what you are talking about.” Merry grins.

You have the feeling that you have missed something and ask William what was going on, but he simple grins and shakes his head.

Eden is coughing slightly and you know it is almost time for lunch.
“Okay, two last matches. Again Willy, Janet and Merry and me?” All your friends agree and you watch Janet play with William. This time the rounds last very long and you see Janet’s character behave very defensive. She manages to lose against William and lay over his lap with a wide grin. “Give it to me, baby.” She teases him.
Her behind is a bit red from Merry’s spanking and William is not less enthusiastic. But this time Janet lays perfectly still and accept the fast slaps of William.
Her face is all red when she gets up and she is panting a bit, while she presses her knees together. Finally, you understand what has been happening in front of your eyes. “Hey you gave her a love spanking.” You whisper to William and he grins, nodding slightly.

The match against Merry is a bit senseless. You WANT to lose and having that in mind the matches last quiet long. The issue is that Merry wants to lose as well and fights quit bad.
“Have you finally understood it?” She whispers and pokes your side.
“So it was your idea from the beginning?” You ask back.
“I have Janet a hind, how we can have fun without being stopped by the adults.”
You like her more and more and finally manage to lose against her.
Copying her position, you lay over her lap, with your legs slightly parted. She let her hand slide over your padded behind and press on your wet crotch. “Oh, that will feel good.” She whispers and lift her hand to spank you.

“I am very sorry to interrupt you, but we have a tight schedule today and Rose asked me to bring the princess back in time. Can you please end this and we go back.” Eden speaks up and comes to you.
You and Merry blush quiet deep and you almost beg Eden to let Merry give you the promised spanking, but then you take a look at the clock on the wall and sigh. “Oh fuck… okay.” You sigh and get up from Merry’s lap.
You hug her and she press a kiss on your cheek “Next time, Susie.” She whispers to you and you go to Eden.
Again you feel betrayed especially since Janet, William and Meredith are allowed to play a bit longer.
Grumpy and pouting you let Eden escort you to Rose…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “Ok. I agree.”

choices: You ask a lot of questions
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
In the nursery, Rose is already waiting for you.
You see her walking nervously up and down in the nursery. As she sees you, she immediately takes you under your armpits and lifts you in the high-chair, dismissing Eden in your place.
“You can go now, miss Langdon.” she says to her, while taking out two bottles of formula “I take care of the princess from now on.”
Eden greets you and the nanny and leaves, while Rose looks at you saying “You could have arrived a little earlier. If it wasn’t for Eden, you would have been late, wouldn’t you?”
“You’re right, I’m sorry.” you apologize “I was playing with my friends and I got carried away.”
Rose sweetly pushes the first bottle in your mouth, and you begin to suck it.
“I’m not scolding you, princess.” she says, rubbing your hair while you suck on the bottle “You must only be more aware of your schedule.”
You finish the first bottle, and let her taking it away.
“I’m not getting a spanking, right?” you ask, while she comes closer with the second bottle.
As the nanny gently puts the second bottle in your mouth, she says “Don’t be silly, princess. I spank you only when you misbehave. It is not that I like it, you know.”
When you have finished the second bottle too, Rose takes you out from the high-chair, removes your clothes, puts you in a cute romper and puts you in the crib.
“Now you’ll take your nap. I’ll wake you up in two hours like usual, at 14 o’clock. Then, after your diaper change, you’ll take a bath. I want be sure that you are perfectly clean.”
“Then it’s dressing time?” you ask.
She nods, and says “Yes. At 15.30 we will leave the Palace. We’ll be at Penrose-Glee Manor perfectly on time, at 17.00.”
“An hour and half?” you say, surprised “It’s so distant from here?”
“Penrose-Glee Manor is not in the capital. Not only it is officially in another city, but it is in fact in open countryside.” she explains, then giving you a kiss on the forehead.
“Nanny Rose?” you say to her, before she leaves.
“Yes, princess? Do you need something?” she asks.
“Can I take a photo of myself with Janet one of this day? I’d really like it in front of the throne, dressed in adult clothes.”
“It’s a really bizarre request, princess.” Rose says, surprised, before asking “Why do you want such a photo?”
“So Janet can show it to my former classmates.” you explain “I’d really like to make some of them jealous. But if they see me in diapers, they’ll laugh at me.”
Rose giggles, replying “I think that we can do it. Just once, though.”
You thank her, and she turns the lights off and leaves. You hug Mister Rabbit, falling asleep.
When Rose wakes you up (perfectly on schedule) your already wet diaper is now on the verge of leaking, and is a little messy.
“Good afternoon, princess.” Rose says, smiling brightly like usual. You really like her smile, warm and pure.
“Nanny!” you say, with a happy voice, starching your arms in her direction.
Rose giggles, and taking you up she says “Oh, someone is happy to see me. Are you ready for going at the party, princess?”
You nod, while she takes you to the changing table. You are very happy when she removes your wet and dirty diaper and cleans you up. Once you’re clean, but still naked on the changing table, the nanny exclaims “Now it is bath time!” and takes you in the bathroom.
She fills the bathtub. Once full, she helps you enter in it. You follow her instruction like a puppy: you’re too excided for the party, it would be a terrible idea getting in trouble now.
As she washes you, you distract yourself playing with the rubber dolphin you took from Melissa’s nursery back when you stole the sleeping aid. Something done to avoid you a punishment, and that almost ruined a relationship in return. At least, everything turned out fine.
Once perfectly clean, she takes you out from the water and dries you up with a towel. When you’re dry, she takes you back in the main nursery’s room and back on the changing table. There, as usual she puts on you a lot of cream and then puts you in a thick diaper.
“Nanny, can’t I have the normal diaper and not the thick one, please? Just for tonight!” you plea her.
But Rose shakes her head, saying “I’m sorry, princess, but you will wear thicker diaper till the queen says otherwise. Tonight is no exception.”
You sigh, while she finishes the diapering procedure. Then, she makes you stand up and begins to dress you up in the dress you’ll wear at the party.
While she does that, you ask her “I almost forgot! What do you think of my makeup, nanny?”
“After your sleep it is almost disappeared, princess.” she says “But I can put some more on you, if you want.”
You nod and, once you’re dressed, Rose puts some nude makeup on your face, with the movements of a true makeup artist. When she has finished, she lets you look at yourself at the mirror.
You are almost amazed. The beautiful dress she showed you back when you first asked about is looks even more beautiful on you, and you feel beautiful too with it on. It is accompanied by a pair of golden ballet flats shoes. The golden color is not tawdry, but elegant, since it is the color of true gold, and not that golden tonality that golden things normally have. The part that you like more is lowest one, that is like a skirt of tulle: it is far less transparent than usual and quite wide, so it not only hides your diaper almost completely, but makes even difficult to say you’re wearing one. Of course, looking better at it will reveal the bulge around your lowest section. And the makeup on your face is almost invisible, but makes you look cuter.
“This is me?” you say, amazed.
“Of course.” Rose says, smiling and putting her hands on your shoulders “Now we must go, princess.”
She takes your hand and escorts you out of the nursery and through the hallways. Every maid and footman that you cross compliments you and your outfit. Despite the diaper, you finally feel like the princess you are.
Rose takes you out of the Palace, guiding you to a royal limousine. It is not the same that got you on the city, is another one, much bigger. It must carry more people, after all.
The other that will go at the party are already there.
Janet is beautiful, like you already saw her.
The queen wears a beautiful light blue dress that looks MAGNIFICENT on her.
Lady Kent is there too, and she wears a simple but still elegant black dress.
Behind the Prime Minister there is a small woman dressed with a elegant dress, that doesn’t fit on her, since is seems stolen from a bit bigger woman. You catch that she must be Lady Kent’s secretary.
There is Eden too, dressed like usual in her silver armour. Next to her there is another knight.
He is a bit elder than Eden, and has a really intimidating expression and a short beard. He’s wearing a silver armour too, and you immediately recognize him as one the Man in Black you saw in America. You realize he must be Mr. Maverick.
The last person that is present is placed next to the queen, and is dressed exactly like Mrs. Laura. You realize that she is an handmaid too. She’s younger than her, thought, maybe just a little older than maid Alice. She has a shy smile on her face that makes you giggle.
“Welcome, Susan.” The queen greets you “Let me introduce you the others.”
She takes your hand and takes you next to them, saying “You already know Lady Kent, and of course Eden and Janet too.”
She leads you in front of the male knight, saying “This is Mr. Maverick, my escort.”
“Umh … nice to meet you.” you say to him.
He doesn’t reply, just nods.
The queen then introduces you the other two women: “This is handmaid Patricia. She has been chosen to accompany me in this year edition of the party.”
The handmaid takes a bow, saying “I’m honored, princess.”
“And this is miss Justinia. She is Lady Kent’s secretary.” the queen concludes, taking you in front of the last woman.
The secretary shakes your hand, but doesn’t smile. She seems even stricter than miss Spencer, and you’re not eager to find out if it is true or not.
You all get in the limousine, except Rose. While you are getting in your children’s seat, Rose, from out of the car, says aloud “And remember to behave, princess.”
You smile at her, and the car finally leave the palace.
During the long journey …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Rose is already waiting inpatient

choices: The pacifier falls out of your mouth
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You try your best to sit still and not bother the adults in their conversations, but after a while they are done with her talks about politics and the menu of the night and you get bored.
“Hi, I am… the princess Susan… as you know… do you know Maid Alice. She had worked for the Kent’s for a while and helped out Nanny Melissa.” You try to start a conversation with Handmaid Patricia.
“Yes Princess, I know her. She had some… issues for a while… and as far as I know it was because of you. Anyway, now she is back to her regular duties. I was almost afraid that she would be chosen to go today, but she is still… not ready for that.” She says and blushes herself. Although, not as much as you.
You just addressed a sensitive topic. Obviously, Maid Alice is still under “training” for her special issues and the palace does not want to embarrass itself with another guest in diapers – or trainers, whatever is true right now.

Ashamed you look at the Queen, but she is still talking to Mrs. Kent, that leaves only Miss Justinia for you. “And you are working for the Queen for a while?”
“For all my life, princess.” She says in a cold voice.

“And you like your job?” You press on.

“I like it a lot, especially when I can print out and staff docents of documents because a spoiled princess ruined them with hot chocolate, that days are the best.” Miss Justina is not a fan of you. And you try to talk to the Queen.
“Do you know what Zoey and Tabby will wear? I want to make sure I recognize them at the party.” You interrupt her discussion with Mrs. Kent.

“I am not aware of her outfit, but I am sure you will find them – and Susan, it is rude to interrupt adults, please do not do that.” Queen Charlotte scolds you.

“Maybe we should bring her straight to the nursery section, if she can’t behave.” Miss Justina suggests.

“WHAT? NO! I am a guest, you are only a PLUS ONE, you can stay behind.” You spat at her and make all heads in the car turn. Janet stares at you and tries to overplay the situation. “Hey Susie, be cool. It is a long ride and a bit boring, but if you look out of the window you can see how beautiful your country is. You have super high trees and lakes and… “ Janet is really trying her best to distract you…

“I sit in the MIDDLE, in a BABY seat, I cannot see a SHIT!” You shout at your best friend. It is true that your seat is far away from being idea to watch out the windows, but your reaction is premature and childish.

“SUSAN! Stop your tantrum or you really go straight to the crib when we arrive.” Queen Charlotte says. Miss Justina digs in her bag and pulls out a pacifier with a strong vanilla smell. She looks at the Queen and after Charlotte nods, she pushes the sticky nipple into your mouth.

Furious you try to spit the pacifier out, then you try to pull it out, but is stays firmly in place, while a nice vanilla flavor fills your mouth.
“Susan, calm down and … stop to pull at the pacifier, it will stay in your mouth for one to two hours. We call them time-out pacifier and they are very sticky. Just suck on it and the effect will go by faster. Your behavior is not acceptable and you can be happy that we do have no space to give you a spanking. Now, calm down and enjoy the ride.”

Angry you suck on the pacifier that is firmly glues to your lips, while you can play with the nipple, with your tongue. You are almost sure that this is another invention of the Campbell-twins.
After a while you have calmed down and have to remind yourself to suckle on the nipple. For sure you do not want to arrive at the party with a pacifier stuck in your mouth... .


When the car arrives at Penrose-Glee Manor…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You ask a lot of questions

choices: You find Zoey and/or Tabby first
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
… you feel a hand touching your shoulder.
“Susan, wake up, sweetheart. We have arrived.” The queen says.
You slowly open your eyes, realizing that you fall asleep during the journey (and you wetted yourself, but not much).
All the other are already out of the car, leaving you alone with the queen.
Charlotte removes your pacifier, and says sternly “I really hope you’ll behave, Susan. This is an important party. It is a mundane occasion, but you must know that even a mundane occasion can create a scandal for the Royal House if you behave poorly. Did you get it?”
You nod, a little ashamed, and reply “I’m sorry, Charlotte. I was bored and I throw a tantrum. I’m sorry about it, really. I know I behaved childish.”
The queen smiles and pats your cheek, saying more sweetly “I’m glad you learned your lesson, Susan. Now we’ll go in, and I expect to see a very polite princess.”
Saying that, she free you from your baby seat and helps you coming down from the car.
Penrose-Glee Manor is huge! The stereotype of a countryside manor, with a garden so big that you could play soccer in it.
Guests are in the garden as well, drinking and eating pretzels, but you catch that the majority of them are inside. The party already started, even if you’re on schedule.
When you enter in the manor, you hear music pervades it. It is a sweet music, not something you’ll hear at the disco, but still is not a boring classing music. A man dresses elegant come closer, and the queen gives him a slip of paper. He read it, and says aloud all of your names, the invited follow by his guest. When is your turn, he announce “Princess Susan Petersen of Calonia, accompanied by miss Janet Brown from the USA.”
You enter inside, and the festive air conquest you immediately. There are a lot of guests, and they all seem relaxed. They are talking, or dancing, or drinking. With the corner of the eye, you notice that there are kids of various age in a playpen in the corner of the big room you entered. The queen encourages you to socialize, so you greet her and leave.
You expected Eden to follow you, but she and Mr. Maverick reach the first floor and watch the party from above, from a great balcony that overlooks on the party’s main room. There are other people in armours with them (leathers armours, mainly) and you get they must be the escorts of the noble present at the party.
When you are speaking with a plump and sweet middle-aged lady that wanted to know you, you hear the man at the door announces something you knew would happen, but you hoped it did not happen: “Lord Richard Grairven, accompanied by Lady Gwendoline Rainecourt.”
You look at him, and your jaw almost falls down. Richard, handsome as always, is dressed in a light blue clothing with red details that makes him look a prince charming from fairy tales, and he’s accompanied by the most beautiful lady you have ever seen. The woman that the announcer called Gwendoline is tall and slim, with long blonde hair that seems made of gold, moves her top model-like body with elegance and she’s dressed in a black adherent dress that empathies her body and shows partially her legs, boson and shoulders. However, she seems looking at everyone with sufficiency.
They are both followed by two men in armours. The one that follows the woman is dressed in leathers armour like many escorts, but the one that follows Richard wears a threatening black iron armour.
You try to distract yourself, resuming your conversation with the sweet lady, trying to ignore the comments of the other guests that say how handsome Richard is.
After a while, you decide to go at the bar, where drinks are given. The man behind the counter greets you, but laughs when you ask a glass of wine, giving you a bottle of milk instead. Don’t wanting to get in trouble, you greet him and begins to suck at it, when something unexpected happens.
Richard himself reaches the bar and asks for a shot of whisky. As he drinks it, he notices you.
“Princess.” he says, with a cold and soft voice “I didn’t know House Penrose-Glee invites potty pants these days.”
“You’d better watch yourself.” you reply, soft voiced too “I’m not defenseless as you think.”
“How, what can you do?” he whispers, with a evil grin “Whet yourself? Oh, sorry, I think you already done that.”
You smile evilly too, whispering “You’ll see.”
With this, you put the bottle down and begin to cry aloud, rubbing your eyes.
“Why you’re so mean? Can’t you leave me alone?” you sobs aloud.
Voices from guests begin to arrive: “Is that lord Richard?” “Has he made the princess cry?” “What? What’s happening?” “Why is he bullying her?”
Richard is furious: you are damaging his reputation, and you are really curious of how he will react now.
“Little monster.” he whispers.
After this, however, he makes a large and kind smile (the fakest you’ve ever seen), and says aloud with a sickly sweat voice “Oh, I’m sorry princess. I didn’t mean to bother you talking about politics affairs. Now, now, don’t throw a tantrum. Here, if you stop crying I give you this.”
Saying this, he takes out a lollypop from his pocket, holding it out to you.
Again, the guests whisper around you “He’s a kind guy, uh?” “I knew it.” “What a gentleman.”
Knowing that refusing it would make you look like a spoiled brat, you stop your cry and take the lollypop, greeting him.
Richard pats your head, and you must resist the temptation to bite his fingers. At least, the guest now whisper things like “The princess is so cute.” “What a polite girl.” “She’ll be a wonderful ruler.”
You reach the queen, that was watching you.
“I’m sorry.” you say “I thought it was a good idea.”
“It was.” the queen admits “If Richard hadn’t that lollypop with him, you could have managed to damage is reputation. But he’s provident. And please, Susan: it was a good idea, it’s true, but I must ask you to avoid to take initiative without asking a grown up first.”
You nod, and she encourage you to have fun. You decide to look for Janet.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You are fast asleep

choices: Standing at the bar, drinking champagne.
Talking with the knights and guards.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You look for Janet, but out of the blue something jumps at you and almost make you fall to the ground. “SUSAN!” You hear a high voice shout in your ear.
It is Tabby in her usual, energetic way. She is only a little bit shorter than you, but she behaves like you could carry her around – what might be true, if you would do more sports. Right now, you can only set her back down as fast and careful as you can. She wears a pink ballet dress with a tulle skirt, that does nothing to hide her diaper – or the pink skin of her upper legs that clearly shows that the wild child has been spanked recently.
“Hi! Have you just arrived? I was at the bar, but you have been gone already, you forgot your bottle! Or was that intended? I took a sip from it, so we had an indirect kiss. Oh it is so cool that you are around. Have you seen Zoey already? You will not believe it…. .” She is talking and talking, but then you see Zoey and you cannot help but grin.
The beautiful girl is at this great party, dressed in a pink romper and plush booties. Her long legs are bare and slightly spread by a very thick diaper. On her chest you can read “spoiled brat” and at her neck she wears a little lock. “Hi. I… my mom thought I need a reminder in good behavior and made me wear this – even after I was a perfect angle for the whole week. She said I was only good because I wanted to wear something mature and sexy.” Zoey says, blushing deep red.
You feel really sorry for her and give her a hug.
While you hug her, Tabby is hugging the two of you and you can hear surrounding adults “Ahhh” and “Ohhh”, since you are so cute together.
Quickly you break up the embrace and try to cheer Zoey up again.
“Hey, let us meet next week. I invite you to the palace and we play hide and seek and have a great time with Janet and the twins. – By the way, have you seen Janet?”

Zoey shrugs and Tabby is looking strange at you as well, then you realize that they never seen her. “Uhm, sorry for that. She is as old as me, but allowed to wear mature clothes, heels and makeup. Just look for the youngest adult you can find, that should be her.” You suggest.
You don’t want to spent too much time looking for her, but officially she is your PLUS ONE and you want to make sure she is having a good time.
Looking up you see Eden, looking down at you. You think about asking her for help, but first: you are not sure if you are allowed to walk up the stairs, to her and second: shouting up at her is for sure NOT an option.
You continue to walk through the other guests, but walking alone is not faster than walking together with Tabby and Zoey. Almost every person that notice you wants to talk to you and you need almost an hour to pass from one side of the room to the other. Frustrated you watch out for Tabby and Zoey, but they are nowhere to find – just like Janet. For the way back, you walk at the side and finally you see Janet.
She is…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You find Zoey and/or Tabby first

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You find Janet at the bar, with a glass of champagne.
When you reach her, she greets you with a smile “Ehy, Susie! I saw your scene with Richard. Brilliant!”
“Why are you here alone, drinking?” you ask “I thought you were hunting for singles noblemen.”
“I am.” she grins “Look. There are three of four that are looking at me and at my glass of champagne. I’m showing that I’m not a little kid, and they are showing interest in me for this. After I’ve done, I’ll go to speak to the youngest and more attractive of them.”
“How old do you think he is?” you ask her, a bit skeptical.
“The one that I look at is very young, I think barely 18. But he seems out of diapers, so it’s okay.” she says, smiling “And now he saw that the princess speak with me. I’m sure he will be even more interested in me.”
“Umh … maybe I should let you alone with your prey?” you ask.
Janet gives you a wink, replying “Thanks, Susan. You’re really a friend.”
You smile, but before leaving her alone you say to her “Remember that William is still at the palace.”
“What happens in the jungle, stays in the jungle.” she says, still grinning.
You decide to let her alone. You enjoy the party for his entire duration, speaking with a lot of guests and with different children. Tabby reached you after a while, and Zoey just after her. You so had the opportunity to introduce to her properly, since before tonight you saw her just once when she was strapped in a pacifier.
You really like her: she’s the perfect balance between Merry’s shyness and Tabby’s extremely easygoing attitude. She’s serious, calm and collected, but still quite easygoing and sweet.
You really enjoy the party a lot, almost forgetting your problems with Richard and the throne, till 20.00. By then, you have wetted you’re diaper more. You’d really like a change, but still you’re afraid of it, so you are unsure of what hoping for exactly.
When the big clock of the room says that is 20.00, ringing aloud, the adults gather all the children in a corner of the room, before resuming with the party. The queen escorted you there personally.
You, Tabitha and Zoey find yourself with a bunch of other kids, at least 22/23 of them, boys and girls with an age between 12 and 17. Janet is nowhere to be found. She was right, after all: she can enjoy the rest of the party with the adults. You are happy for her, but you’re still jelous.
A quite tall woman (every woman you seem doesn’t seem so tall to you, actually, after seeing Melissa) is at the center of the group. She is dressed in an outfit similar to the one the maids at the palace wear, but much more tight and short. You catch that is not a French maid outfit, but a Japanese maid one’s. She has long black hair and green eyes and she’s quite young, maybe 25 or 26.
“Children! Pay attention to me, please!” she says aloud “I’m nanny Melody, and I will take care of you till tomorrow morning. I will escort you in the children room, where you will be allowed to play till 22.00, then it’s bedtime.”
You raise your hand, and nanny Melody says “Yes, princess? Is there a problem?”
“I have to questions.” you say “The first one is about changing. You, know, diapers. Will you change us?”
You already know the answer, but you hope that she says something more, like the setting of the machines.
“I would have done that if lord Penrose-Glee hadn’t buy those machines from your palace. They will take care of changing you diapers if needed and feeding you before bedtime.”
“What will you do, then?” a boy ask. He’s 17, and clearly not happy to be with you kids.
“I will make sure that you all behave correctly.” the nanny says “As you are guests of the manor, and I’m the nanny of it, I have full permission to spank naughty children that misbehave. Now, the princess had another question, right?”
“Yes.” you say “How should be call you? Ma’am? Miss?”
She smiles, replying “Oh, I like politeness, but nanny Melody is ok.”
You smile at her, while she takes you all upstairs. She makes you line up in pairs, making you use one hand to hold you companion one’s and the other hand to hold the shoulder of the child in front of you. You have no idea of who have ahead, but your companion is Tabby. You fill like a kindergartener, while you walk like this just in front of the escorts. You see that Eden has her and on the rapier, and looks at Richard’s escort with suspicious eyes when you pass in front of him.
When the entire column has passed, Eden moves herself and closes it.
You finally reach the room, and you are amazed. He’s a big room with a lot of cribs for two, and two high-chair (the automatic ones) are next to each crib. All of those things are at the border of the room, while in the corner there is the diaper changing machine.
The central part of the room (a big part) has a padded floor, and with a lot of toys of various types.
“Remove your shoes, kids. Unless you have plush booties, of course.” nanny Melody says, and you remove your shoes. Many other children do that, but many other don’t, and you realize that plush booties weren’t so rare between the kids at the party.
The nanny then notices Eden, that is standing at the opened door, and says to her “I’m sorry, miss, but I think you’re in the wrong room.”
“No, miss, I’m the princess’ escort.” she explains, looking around to ensure that the room hasn’t other entrances.
“You can watch the door, then.” the nanny replies “But I can’t allow you inside, I’m sorry.”
“That’s ok.” the knightess agree “But if the princess calls me I will enter, taking the door down if necessary.”
Without giving the nanny time for answering, Eden closes the door behind her, closing herself out of the room. You think that her biggest issue is Richard’s escort, and you are happy that she’s there: than man in black armour frightened you.
The nanny sits on a chair in the corner, and begins to read a book. You notice a big hairbrush lying on the small round table next to her, and you are not eager to use it.
A line forms in front of the diaper changing machine, and so you decide to wait a little to use it too. While some kids go there, other are playing. You notice that a girl about your age is alone, almost in a corner, and you decide to reach her.
When you do, you notice that she is doing something strange. Meditating, perhaps?
“Hey, hi! I’m princess Susan.” you introduce yourself, but she doesn’t reply. You decide to touch her shoulder, and her reaction is wild.
“You interrupted my meditation!” she yells, and jumps at you to hit you. You fall on the ground, with the girl on you, but then she is taken up by nanny Melody, that takes her to the chair and spanks her bare bottomed OTK with the hairbrush. She cries after few slaps, since they are hard, and the nanny gives her a lot of them.
“Being the host doesn’t give you permission to assault guests, young lady!” the nanny scolds her, during the spanking.
As she lets her go, the girl come straight to you, saying an apology.
You accept it, and ask “Are you the daughter of lord Penrose-Glee?”
“I am.” she replies, still sobbing a little “And nanny Melody is my nanny.”
“Why have you assaulted me like that?” you ask “What where you doing?”
Taking a dramatic pose and suddenly stopping to sob, she exclaims “I, young lady Penrose-Glee, virgin of the dark, married with the void, was looking into the future!”
“And ... did you see it?” you ask, sceptical.
“Of course!” she says, proudly “As always!”
“Blossom!” her nanny calls her “Do you want a mouth soaping too?”
Blossom goes pale, saying that she’s sorry. Then says “Well, I never saw anything so far. But I will, one day!”
You smile at her, and then decide to play with Zoey and Tabby.
You go to them ...
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Standing at the bar, drinking champagne

choices: Try to have fun with Zoey.
Wait for Zoey to make a move.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
As strange as Blossom is, it might be smart to befriend her – and how boring would the world be if everybody was normal?! Therefore, you ask her if she wants to join, Zoey, Tabby and you.
“I already know that you would ask that.” She says in a dramatical way.
Nanny Melody comes closer and Blossom hides behind you. “I mean…. Yes.”

But her fear is unfounded, since her nanny walks over to the automatic changing table, where a boy just received an automatic spanking and is complaining about it.
“Your machine is broken! I did nothing wrong! I was a good boy all day long!”

“Any your name is?” Nanny Melody asks. After hearing his name, she checked his data on a little tablet. “Well Jonny, it looks like your nanny asked to give you this spanking. She attached a file to your information to make sure you receive it. Let me see… “. She moved her finger down on the table and announce quiet loud. “Dear nanny Melody, Little Jonny refused to clean up his toys and was rude to his grandparents, please make sure he receives a good spanking and remind him to be a good boy. PS: make sure that he is not masturbating, he is a little wanker.”
Some kids around laugh out, while others blush and look down. They probably fear that their nannies or parents added similar files to their information-package.
“It looks like the machine was too soft on you, little Jonny.” Nanny Melody says and put his hands in locked mittens. “Now you can go back to your little friends and look forward to dinner – you have additional information for that as well.” The nanny grins and pats his diapered behind. Pouting the boy goes back to his friends, while Tabby looks very angry.
“Oh no, I should have known it! My daddy didn’t punish me all morning and I was so stupid and even teased him about being to lazy to spank me.” Zoey in her punishment romper and Blossom in her short, white dress look at her and shake their heads.
“You act to bratty, people could thin you like to be punished.” Zoey says, clearly unhappy with her strict mother. But Tabby shrugs it off: “Maybe you are right, but I see it as a game between me and my parents and maybe you have not noticed, but I am quite energetic and love any kind of interaction. I basically don’t care if my daddy reads me a book or spank my behind. Important is, that he spends time with me.”
You still think this is stupid: “Have you tried to be a good girl and spent… pleasant time with your parents?”
Tabby sighs and for the first time she looks sad: “I did, but then they say “Good girl, keep going.” And that was it. If I am a brat, I get much more attention from them.”
Slowly you begin to understand her and when you think about it, she might not be the only kid with that feelings. In the USA you go alone all day and have freedom to do what you like, but you only spend a few minutes with your parents. You don’t even miss them much, because you have been very independent. In Calonia you spend a lot of time with your nanny and – as you noticed during the time with Nanny Melissa – you miss her very quickly.

Your thoughts drifted off you’re a while and you don’t notice that Zoey and Blossom get changed by the automatic changing table. You only notice it when Zoey is waddling even more than before, still, she seems happy. “Ha! Two booster pads to make sure I do not leak. It could be much worse.” She grins. Since she has been in a romper already the changing table does not change her clothes. In Blossom’s case it does. When she comes back her dress is replaced with a white romper with a cute looking angle on her chest. The last one of your friends to get changed is Tabby… .

“Tabitha, would you please get changed. I have directions to get you changed before dinner.” Nanny Melody orders.
“Wish me luck.” Tabby says and approaches the machine… .

All wishing luck did nothing to prevent her from receiving a spanking, similar to the one Jonny got before. In addition, she receives an enema and a diaper, as thick as Zoey’s. Still, she smiles when she comes back to you. “My daddy did not forget me.” She smiles and rubs her round belly. “And now I am pregnant.”
Your diaper is quite wet by now, but since you don’t have to get changed right now – and you don’t trust the machine, you decide to wait a bit longer. The first younger kids are looking tired and get feed by the automatic high chairs and put in the cribs. The tops of the cribs are locking automatically and some kids cry in fear, but Nanny Melody is able t calm them down. She as a bunch of stuffed animals for the kids to cuddle with, while some kids simple hug each other and fall asleep in warm embraces.
Tabby’s round belly is flat again, therefore her diaper in swollen and forcing her to crawl on all forth. She does not mind that at all and is constantly talking with Blossom, who in return is talking about her visions and dreams, whenever Tabby is taking a breath.
