“Come in.” Rose says, and the door opens up.
Janet is now dressed normally, and is followed by Eden, that looks much more relaxed than in the morning.
“Miss Langdon came in my room to pick me up.” Janet says, looking at Rose “She said that you asked her to take me here with her. It’s something wrong, miss Fletcher?”
“Did you forget, Janet?” the nanny says, quite sternly “You accepted to get a mouth soaping, remember?”
She nods, and lets Rose taking her next to the sink.
You don’t like seeing this, but is at least best that when she gets spanked. Rose makes the water run from the faucet and puts the bar of soap under it. Then, holding Janet still with the other hand, she proceeds to wash her mouth with soap. Janet makes horrible faces, and drools a lot. She even stomp her feet to distract herself during it.
When Rose has done, Janet exclaims “This taste awful!”
“Of course. Soap doesn’t have a good taste, and Calonian soap is designed to taste even worse and to be completely non-toxic, so it can always be used on children that lie, swear or drink.” Rose explains “In your case, this is for getting drunk.”
She then takes Janet in a corner of the room and make her put her hands on over the head, saying “Twenty minutes of corner time, Janet. You must think to what you did.”
Janet comply, and Rose takes you out from the crib. As she puts you down, she says “You can go to see the siblings and spend your Sunday afternoon with them, if you want. Janet will reach you after her corner time.”
You nod and try to walk, but you fall on the ground for the excessive padding.
“I suggest you to crawl, princess.” Rose says, taking out two fluffy things similar to kneepads and putting then around your knees “This will make you your knees don’t get hurt in the process.”
Ashamed, you crawl out of the nursery. When you are in the middle of the first hallway, you look at Eden and ask her “Can’t you take me in your arms? This is too humiliating.”
“Your nanny said you to crawl, my lady.” she replies “It is true that is not my job to discipline you, but I can’t interfere with her orders for your education.”
Your face is red like a tomato, especially when in one of the hallways you cross Mr. Collin.
“Hello, princess.” he says, looking at you.
“Good afternoon, Mr. Collin.” you say, without looking at him, and he simply passes away.
You finally reach nanny Melissa’s nursery, and you ask Eden to help you getting up to knock. With your escort help you get on your feet (you peed more during the journey between the two nurseries) and you knock.
When Melissa says that you can come in, you see her standing in the middle of the room (like usual), and the siblings still sleeping in their crib.
“I was about to awake them.” the nanny says, without making more comments on your clothing “You came right on time, princess.”
The twins had peed a lot during their nap, and the tall nanny decide to change them, saying to you that you can stay and watch if you want (this makes both siblings blush).
You decide to …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Rose adds something to your lunch

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
After being so close to anther girl you like to have the chance to see Merry naked, for sure.
“Yes please, I like to wait inside.” You say very polite, crawl over to the high chair and use it to get back on your feet.
Nanny Melissa is watching you closely and smiles down at you, while you crawl across the room. “You look very cute, while you are on all forth, princess. Sometimes I miss that I don’t know you longer and missed your early years, but when I see you like this, I don’t need much imagination to picture you as a little toddler.”
You thank her for her kind words, but blush deep red. You would have stayed at the spot where Eden had let go off your hand, but your new position if only a few steps away from the changing table, what will guarantee you a perfect view. On the naked twins.
Merry is the first in the row and her nanny lift her on the changing table. She opens the buttons in crotch of Merry’s romper and strips her down to only her diaper, what makes you smile a bit. You like the perfect round breasts of Merry. They are a bit bigger than yours, but not enough to make you feel bad about yours. Sure, Zoey’s are bigger and perfect in every way, but exactly that makes you feel so insecure if you compare yours with hers.
“You are really soaked little one, if you keep drinking so much juice in the morning, I will add booster pads into your diaper.” Melissa says as she untaps the wet diaper. She rolls it up and holds it in her hand for a few seconds. “It is all cold and clammy, so you wet yourself right after you lay down, little one.” Melissa says, half scolding.
Merry blushes and avoids to look at Susan. “You know I can’t help it, nanny. When I lay down and relax is just comes out.” Meredith whispers, while Melissa slides a fresh diaper under her behind. Hearing her makes you feel sorry for her and again you see that your nanny was right in every way. Other kids your age, like Merry have almost no control and you – the princess – feel mature because you can hold it in for hours.
Melissa takes a bottle of oil and rubs it in her hands, before she begins to massage it into Merry’s crotch. Her skin looked a bit red before and her nanny wants to make sure she does not get a rash.
Fascinated you look at her working hands and notice a fresh warmth between your legs. You can’t tell if you just leaked into your diaper again or if it is arousal.
You would love to change Merry’s diaper and rub oil over her crotch – for a long time.
Suddenly you feel her eyes on you and blush.
Meredith’s cheeks are flushed as well. What her nanny is doing, is feeling very good and you would like to know what she is thinking right now.
She winks at you and slides her thumb into her mouth, sucking it slowly.
“Her perfect little mouth…” You think and break the eye-contact, blushing deep red.
Nanny Melissa is done with the oil, adds a bit of cream and tapes Melissa in a fresh diaper, before she is dressed in a pink onesie that has a bunny-tail.
“Eastern is coming.” She grins and gives Merry’s behind a little slap, before she lifts her off the changing table. Merry is coming to you and lays her hands over your mitted hands, binding them to the high chair.
“You have been naughty, Susan?!” She whispers and you are not sure if she is talking about the last night or about the way you watched her.
Her grip is tightening up and she comes even closer. “Seeing you so helpless is giving me a little thrill.” She whispers and you blush deep red. Nanny Melissa is busy lifting Willy on the changing table, complaining that he is getting too heavy for her and you use her distraction.
“If that turn you on, I should tell you that Nanny Rose gave me diuretics. I am helplessly wetting my super thick diaper – that is so thick that I can’t walk in it.” You whisper back in a low voice.
Merry is biting down on her bottom lip and makes a little “meow”, while she grins at you.
“You are a kinky girl, Meredith Kent.” You say and lean over to kiss her.

“HEY GUYS, WHAT HAVE I MISSED?” Janet is walking in, totally unaware that she just interrupts a sexy chat of Merry and you. A second later she freezes and look at William. Like his sister he had shows signs of rash and got a similar treatment like his sister. The difference is, that it is VERY obviously that the likes it.
“Howls Pony I am shocked!” She jells out and William slaps his hands in front of his face.

“Miss Janet, if you can’ keep your unwanted remarks to yourself, you better leave.” Melissa snaps at her.

Janet blushes deep red and apologizes. She comes to Merry and you and grins. “Have you seen that? I guess the noble yesterday could not offer something like this.”
You sigh and Merry does the same. She knows what her brother looks like, down there and you could not care less.
“Ah, sorry, wrong audience.” Janet grins and slaps you back. “What about you, saw something sweet and juice as well?”
“JANET! SHUT UP!” You shout at her. “ARE YOU IN HEAT?!”

“Girls! Up to the corners, all of you – yes, Janet as well – and stay quiet for a while.” Melissa barks at the three of you. She sighs and finish to change William. He is put into a white onesie with a bunny tail as well.
“Really? Isn’t that a bit girly?” He complains, but only receive a slap on his behind.
“If you complain more you will wear bunny ears as well, young man.” Melissa scolds him.
“Okay, you can leave now, all of you. Go playing, but behave!”

Janet and William run out, while Merry walk next to you, while you crawl on all forth.
“Sorry for being so slow.” You apologies to her.
“It is okay, you look almost perfect.” She grins and run to her nanny.
A few seconds later she comes back and touch your behind. “What?” You ask and see the cat tail, attached to your onesie.
“Two rabbits and a cat, do you think Janet your wear a dog-tail? Merry grins.

“It would suit that bitch.” You grin and look forward. Your best friend is holding hands with William and you wonder what the four of you could do today.
“Hey, we could do roleplaying.” Merry suggests.
“It might be a bit childish, but we can play…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Stay and watch

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“It might be a bit childish, but we can play family.” Merry suggests.
You blush, but you like the idea. Both William and Janet agree.
“Can I be the mom?” you ask, making all of your friends laugh.
“Ehy! Stop!” you exclaim “It’s not funny!”
“Sorry, Susie.” Merry says, wiping her eyes from little tears born from excessive laughing “But you can’t really expect to be the mom while crawling on the floor wearing a double diaper.”
You blush again, aware that she’s right.
“Well, I suppose I can be the mom.” Janet says “I’m the grown up here, after all.”
She takes Willy’s hands, making him blush, saying “And of course William will be the dad. We will be very strict, but very caring too.”
Merry hugs you, saying “We will be sisters, then.”
“I have a better idea.” Janet intervenes “You could be a visiting cousin, Merry.”
Meredith nods, interested in the interesting turn of events.
“We will go to your room, right?” you ask, looking at Janet “We aren’t going to play family in the middle of the hallway.”
Janet grins, replying “That would be interesting, but I think my room is a better idea.”
You all agree, and reach Janet’s room (quite slow, since you’re forced to crawl).
Once inside, the game immediately begins.
“Susan!” Janet exclaims putting her hands on her sides “I talked with your teacher today!”
You try your best to don’t laugh, and say “Oh, no, mommy! She always lies!”
“Oh, the teacher lies?” ‘mommy’ Janet says “That’s enough, young lady! You earned yourself a good, old fashioned spanking. Come over my knees!”
You crawl to her, and Janet takes you on her knees, then gives you two playful swats on your plastic pants.
She then scolds you, saying “Have you learned your lesson, young lady?”
“Yes mommy! Please, no more!” you exclaim, faking a cry.
Janet makes you sit on her knees, and you hug her with your mitted hands, while she begins to cuddle you, saying “Mommy doesn’t like to spank her little angel, but you must learn that school is important.” she says.
William then makes his entrance, saying aloud “Dears, I’m home.”
“Welcome, dear.” Janet welcomes him “How was work today?”
“Tiresome.” he replies “I had to sign a lot of paperwork’s. Being the Prime minister is difficult, but I know I do something really important. And you my dear?”
Janet smiles at him, replying “Oh, I spent all day at home. Being an housewife is difficult too, even if I can spend a lot of time with my naughty angel.”
You take your hands toward Willy, saying aloud “Daddy! Daddy! Hug!”
Willy come closer and hugs both you and Janet, saying “Did little Susan behaved today?”
“She just received a spanking, dear.” Janet says.
William looks at you with a fake stern look that makes you giggle a little, saying “You always create trouble with mommy, uh? Feel lucky that I don’t put you in locked onesie this time, missy.”
“No, the locked onesie no, please daddy!” you cry.
“Hush, little one.” Janet cuddles you “Daddy said that this time he will not put you in that.”
Merry then decides to make her entrance too, and says in a cute voice “Aunty Janet! Uncle Willy!”
“Oh, look at who the stork let us on our door.” Janet says, smiling at her “Come closer, dear.”
Meredith reaches you, saying “Cousin Susie! I’m Merry! Mommy said that I’ll spend some days with you.”
You smile at her, saying “Welcome, Merry! Do you want the special welcome of the family?”
Merry nods, and Janet puts you down, before patting her laps.
“A welcome spanking, then.” she grins.
You think that Janet is turning into a spanko, but you keep this thought for yourself.
“But aunty!” Merry says, stomping her foot “It’s not right! I didn’t do anything!”
“Very well, it seems that the welcome spanking just turned itself into a punishment spanking. Dear, can you fetch me a hairbrush?” Janet says.
Willy lends his hand toward Janet, and she pretend to take something from him.
“Thank you, dear.” she tanks Willy.
He grins, looks at Merry and says “You’d better lay on auntie’s lap, if you don’t want to get worse.”
Pretending to be an unruly child, Merry stomps her foot again and crosses her arms at her chest, saying “No! You’re mean! I’m a guest!”
“Merry.” Janet says, in calm and stern tone “Now you’ll get your spanking, or a mouth soaping will follow.”
Sighing, Merry lies over Janet laps to receive two playful slaps.
“And that this can be a lesson for you, young lady!” Janet scolds her.
Merry is doing her best to don’t laugh, and Janet puts her sitting next to you and says to you “You can play with your cousin, while mommy and daddy have a private moment.”
With this, Janet takes William’s hand and takes him at the corner of the room, almost out of your field of vision.
“Merry special attack!” Meredith suddenly says, hugging you and giving you a kiss on the mouth.
You hear Eden giggling at it, but she immediately stops.
You kiss Merry back, and you see with the corner of the eye that Janet and William are kissing each other too.
Merry’s kiss is delicate and sweet, completely different from the one full of lust that Zoey’s gave you last night.
Suddenly, while you’re still sharing a long kiss with Merry, Janet comes closer and says “Ah, ah, ah! No kissing, little girls! You’re cousins!”
You play home for the entire afternoon. It is very funny, but at the end you’re quite tired.
“This was a wonderful afternoon.” you declare aloud “But I think I’d be better going back to my nursery. Rose promised that she will take me out of all this after dinner, but I must get a bedtime spanking from the queen too.”
“The queen herself will spank you?” Merry says, blushing a little “It’s a great honor, Susie. You should be grate for it.”
“It’s a spanking, I’d prefer avoid it completely. Sadly, I can’t.” you try to put a hand on your plastic pants to feel if your diaper is soaked or not, but whit mittens you can’t catch it. For sure it’s full of pee, and you popped quite a lot as well.
Then William adds “But the queen is like your mommy, here, right? You should be grateful that she come to see you, even if is to administer a punishment. I don’t remember last time mommy punished us.”
You understand it. It’s similar to what Tabby said at the party. Still, it’s note the same for you. You really like Charlotte, but it’s inevitable that you feel closer to Rose than to her, since the queen is not your mother.
“Well, I’ll thank her for her time, even if is for a spanking.” you say “But I really hope to get no spankings at all tomorrow.”
With these words, you greet your friends and crawl out of the room, making giggle them all.
You’re almost at the nursery, when you meet someone in the hallway.
It is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Play family

choices: Will last a few more days.
Is already over, you are getting used to diapers 24/7.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Mrs Laura looks down at you and laughs out a bit, what makes you blush again.
“Oh, I am sorry princess. I did not mean to embarrass you, but you look so cute – and funny thing, you look almost like little Zoey when I left her an hour ago.”

“You have seen her? I heard what her nanny said about her punishment, but only a part of it. I could hardly believe she will really be punished so harshly for some simply naughty fun.” You look up at the handmaid.
“Well, Zoey has a long history in getting in trouble for naughty fun, that is the reason her mommy and nanny are so strict with her. I had a tea with Zoey’s mom and saw the little one in a baby bouncer. She is thickly diapered, like you and her hands are in mittens as well – but hers are always tied down, to make sure she is not rubbing her crotch with them.”

“So, she is punished, just like me?!” You say, a bit relived that Zoey is not treated soooo bad.

“Well, she will receive this treatment for three days, even at school, where her classmates will tease her merciless. She can’t go to her soccer-training and will lose her position in the coming match. She is punished enough I would say.” Mrs. Laura says.

Since you are in the palace you have forgotten that other kids go to usual schools. Sure, they will all be in diapers, but it is not hard to imagine that Zoey will be bullied a lot if she is defenseless in mittens and thick diapers.
“Oh… I was not aware that she is not homeschooled – or playing soccer. I am sorry for her.”

“She will survive it, princess, like you will.” She ruffles your hair, but quickly steps back when she catches the smell coming from your diaper. “Don’t let me hold your back from getting changed princess, you need it badly.”

You wish her a nice day and continue your journey to the nursery.
Rose is already waiting for you and has you out of the diaper in a few minutes. The bath that follows takes much longer and is very relaxing. Smelling fresh and tried up in huge fluffy towels you walk back to the main room. You are a bit afraid to be without a diaper, since you are not sure if the diuretics still effect you, when you see the Queen coming in and sit down on the wooden chair.
“Princess, I hope you have not forgotten about your punishment.” She says in a strict voice.

“No, Queen Charlotte, I haven’t.” You bow your head.
You look at her beautiful blue dress and turn to Rose. “Uhm, Nanny Rose, I fear that I will leak when I am spanked. Could you put me in a diaper, so I do not make a mess on the Queens nice dress?”

Charlotte looks down on her dress and smiles at you. “Thank you for liking my dress. I like it as well, but do not worry.” She says, takes a thick nighttime diaper and lay it over her knees. “If you should leak, the diaper will absorb it. So, I can give you a nice bare bottom spanking.”

With the diaper on, it would hurt less, but you still go to her, let your towel fall to the ground and climb on her lap, stark naked.
“Thank you for spending your time on my punishment. I am sorry that I am such a bad girl, that we can not spend time on nicer things.” You say and really mean it.
Charlotte is surprised about your words and hesitates to spank you.
“I would love to spent more time with you as well, Susan.” She says, clears her throat and begins to spank you.
Anybody can see that she would rather hug you, that spank you and therefore she only gives you ten halfhearted slaps, before she pulls you into a tight hug, pressing the air out of your lungs.
“Oh Susie, you will be a very good Queen one day. You learn quickly and are good with words – if you think about them. Would you mind if I put you in a diaper now?”

For sure you do not mind, even when Rose is better at it. Charlotte needs more time and you blush deep red when Rose tells her that she has to add two booster pads, because you always wet yourself so much during the night.
Thickly padded Charlotte takes the pink roper from Rose and put in on you. You are happy that you don’t get the mittens back on and can hold your bottle yourself after you are put in the high chair for your dinner.
“Good night now, I am very sorry, but I have to go. I have an official dinner with the deputies of the noble houses.” She sighs and turns to leave.
“Good night mommy.” You say to her. You are not sure if you overdo it. After last night you want her to be happy and you know that the little “m-word” is pushing her buttons.
Overjoyed she looks at you a blow you a kiss. “Good night Susie. Be good.”

Rose lifts you out of the high chair and lay you down in bed.
“Uhm, nanny Rose, are you sad when I call the Queen mommy? I mean… the two of us a re still closer. It is just… I want her to be happy.”

Rose lifts her nose and makes a snorting noise. “PAH! As if I would care. I can be the meaning nanny in the world if that helps you to feel closer to the Queen.”
Shocked you look at her and feel your fresh diaper grow warm and wet. “Rose… I… .”
But then Rose giggles, sticks out her tongue and tickles your sides.
“Aw, cutie pie, do not worry. I am happy to be your nanny. I still love you and I am not jealous if you call my good friend mommy. We all love you and want you to be happy.”

Relieved you takes Mr. Rabbit in your arm and wiggle your behind under the sheets.
“Uhm, I still pee a lot and with close to no warning. Will the effect last longer?”

Rose gives you a kiss on the forehead and lay your overnight bottle in your arm. “Well princess, the effect… .”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Mrs. Laura, the handmaid

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“The effect will last a few more days.” Rose says.
You blush, but knowing that you cannot do anything about it, you simply say her goodnight and close your eyes hugging Mister Rabbit. It takes short for falling asleep.
The next morning, a hand wakes you up. Yawning, you open your eyes and you see queen Charlotte smiling at you.
“Good morning, sunshine.” she says, sweetly.
You stretch her arms toward her, saying “Hi, Charlotte! Can I have a morning hug?”
She smiles even more brightly, lifts you up from the crib and hugs you tightly, whispering kindly “As you command, my princess.”
You stay like this for a while, then the queen lets you go, saying “I will perform the morning change, if you like.”
You nod, but you instinctively search Rose with your eyes. You see sitting down on her chair, smiling.
You then look at the queen, saying “No problem at all.”
The queen lifts you on the changing table, removes your romper, makes you lay on your back and un-tapes your diaper.
“Oh, my little princess is very wet and messy.” she says, with a voice that would have suited if used to talk to a toddler “Let’s get her nice and clean.”
Charlotte proceeds to remove your dirty diaper and to clean your back and crotch. Once you’re cleaned, she rubs baby oil and baby powder on you and put you in thick diaper.
“Can’t I still have a normal one, please?” you ask, but Charlotte shakes her head.
“No, Susan.” she says, taping the diaper close “You’ll wear thicker diaper since I think it’s okay. And furthermore, with the diuretic still doing its job it would be non wise to put you in thinner diapers.”
Once you’re diapered, Charlotte puts you in the clothes you’re going to wear for the morning.
It is a little kid jammies, like the one in the shape of a unicorn Rose once made you wear. This is large too, but is in the shape of a lion (and as the color of one, too), with a tail and a hood that seems surrounded by a mane, with ears and eyes too.
“These jammies are embarrassing!” you say, as she dresses you “Can’t I wear something else?”
Both Charlotte and Rose giggles, and the queen says “I would never deny my cute little princess the privilege to wear cute little clothes.”
She takes the hood up and gives you kiss on the forehead, before greeting you and leave.
As she has gone, you decide to investigate on Calonian school system. Since you have a private teacher, it’s something you’re quite curious about.
“Nanny Rose, can I ask you something?” you ask.
Rose nods, replying “Of course, princess. What do you want to know?”
“It’s about school. I’d like to know how it works in Calonia, since I have a private teacher.” you say.
“Well, Calonian kids spend a lot of time in school, like the students in the USA, I think. The only difference is that public school has a different … setting.” she says,
“What do you mean?” you ask.
“Well, in Calonia children start in kindergarten and compulsory education last till one is 18.” Rose explains “But elementary school, secondary school and high school work exactly like kindergarten. The only differences are the subjects. A high school kids studies algebra, for example, but still have nap after lunch and a little playtime.”
“And the punishments?” you ask “Are the kids subjected to corporal punishments?”
Rose shakes her head, saying “No. Since it would be difficult to control every teacher to ensure no one abuse his role as educator, corporal punishment are forbidden in public schools. They use the demerit system, the same that Miss Spencer uses on you and the siblings. Teachers can spank in private schools, however. There, they use paddles, like the one Mr. Grairven has.”
“And the bullies?” you ask “Mrs. Laura told me that her classmates will tease Zoey.”
“Just a bit, since humiliation is a part of the punishment.” Rose explains “But if someone exaggerate, he or her will receive demerits. And just to give a complete explanation: headmaster (or headmistress) can paddle students, under some circumstances, so if someone really exaggerate too much, that someone gets a paddling. Our system, with parents that strictly control kids activity at school thank to the demerit system and occasional paddlings from the school headmaster, ensure the smallest quantity of bullies in the entire world. Bullying is almost not a problem at all, here.”
You listen to her carefully, and you’re happy to hear that bullying is not a problem here, but sad thoughts suddenly envelop your mind and you begin to cry.
“Princess, what’s happened?” Rose says, surprised, and immediately hugs you.
“I was thinking about a friend of mine.” you say, calming down “She was forced to change school because of bullying. I never saw her again. I’m happy to hear that here bullies are properly treated.”
Rose cuddles you in her arms, saying “Bullies usually do that because at home they don’t get enough attention. In Calonia, kids are always given the attention (and the discipline) they deserve.”
You let her go, and when Eden comes to pick you up you greet the nanny and leave with the escort, looking for Janet.
When you reach her room, however, you hear her talking. You decide to eavesdrop, curious to know who is she talking too.
“No, mom, I’m not surrounded by male slaves that wash my feet!” you hear her exclaim, and you realize that she is talking with her mother at the phone “And yes, I’m still virgin, thanks for reminding me that.”
You decide to knock and, when you enter, Janet …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Will last a few more days

choices: Plan a date for you and Merry?”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Janet looks really pissed of and roles her eyes about another tirade of her mother. She holds her hand over the mouth-part and whispers to you.
“Her imagination is going while. She got her fingers on a Calonian online-newspaper and I was stupid enough to tell her that I was on the party as well. Now she is going ballistic.”
She put her ear to the phone again and nods her head.
“Yes Mom, I am still listening. … No I am not sounding annoyed, I am sounding like always … not I am NOT always annoyed by you… maybe I am now. WHAT? Oh, you know why… I… I… Whould… I… . MOOOOOM!” She gives up and press the phone into your hand. “Good luck with her.”

“Hello Mrs. Brown, It is me Susan.” You try your luck.
Mrs. Brown is still furious, but calms down a bit. What is very nice, since she was shouting before and you could not understand her at all.
“Hi Susan, I am sorry I must sound like a lunatic, but I spend hours reading online about your… country and I always had the impression that you are very… strict with children. I was even afraid that my little Janet would be punished according to your harsh rules. Pah, I was so worried that I thought about ordering her back to the state, but NOW!” Her voice is getting louder again.
“Now she tells me that she went to the party and was treated like an adult! I know that that means! I am 33 and have a 14 years old daughter that will turn 15 soon. She does not need to repeat MY mistakes!” You can tell that she is close to tears, therefore you decide to tell her about the last days, including all embarrassing details. Janet goes pale when you tell her mom, that she Is wearing training pants for most of the time and got spanked a couple of times.
“But what about the party?” She asks again.
Now it is getting difficult, since you don’t want to lie.
“Well, Janet was under the strict eyes of the Queen and a high number of guards. She never behaved in a way that would be against our strict rules. Yes, I saw her holding a glass of Champagne to impress a boy that was a few years older, BUT she never left the party with him and – as you can tell – she is sober and does not have a hangover.”
Mrs. Brown is not saying anything and when the silence stretch you continue.
“Really Mrs. Brown. Janet is behaving very well. She became a good friend of my personnel guard and they offered her to work as a knightess, when she likes. Everything is fine.”
Suddenly Mrs. Brown is starting to cry loud.
“Okay, Thank you. Thank you Susie, I was only afraid that my baby would have a baby soon.” You turn the phone away and press your hand over your mouth to suppress your laughing.
“Ahm, no, To be honest – the boy she has her eyes on for most of the time is diapered all around the clock for the next four years. Therefore it is very unlikely that you will become a grandmother soon.”

Janet is boxing your arm for that, but you quickly step away. Her mother is giggling now.
“Okay, that sounds good. I am sure she will not sleep with him as long as he is not potty trained.”
You have heavy doubts, but you can suppress a rube answer.
“Okay Susie, give Janet a kiss from me. I call her later again. Bye!”
She hangs up suddenly, but you keep the telephone at you ear and begin to fake the discussion on.
“Oh yes, I think as well that Janet should be in diapers as well. Yes, that would make is absolutely save.”

“What?! MOM!” Janet runs to you, but you step away and keep the telephone.
“Yes, she should be punished as well – EVEN STRICTER?? If you think so, Ma’am.” You grin and finally Janet is able to rip the phone out of your hand.
“Mom, really? Mom? MOM?!” Janet looks at the phone and notice that the call has been ended half a minute ago.
“SUSAN, YOU BITCH!!” She jumps at you and pins you down on the ground. Eden is so surprised that her hand goes to her sword, but then Janet grins and begins to tickle your sides.
“You naughty little kitten, I will teach you to play pretend with me.”

And she tickles you merciless for a few minutes. Until she smells something.
“Oh Susan, really? How long will you stay in that diaper?” She asks and jumps off you.

You are ashamed yourself, but blame her. “It was your fault! You sat on my tummy and tickled me!”

Janet shrugs and helps you to your feet. “Whatever you say, little kitten.”

“I am a lion!” You pout, blushing.

Janet looks amused.
“Sure you are – Meow Meow!” She grins and plays with your tail.
“Hey, what are we doing today? Do you plan to stink up my room or will we…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Gives the phone to yuo

choices: “It was terrible. He only spoke about politics.”
“We arrived at the kiss, nothing more.”
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Do you plan to stink up my room or will we prank an adult?” Janet says.
“Prank an adult?” you say, shocked “The last two times your pranks created us only trouble.”
“Well, when we replaced Miss Spencer underwear we were unlucky, that’s all. And she and the Butler shared a lot of fun with that, after it. And the one with the wine wasn’t really a prank, but more a plan, like the one that I thought to solve the problem afterward creating a fake Richard’s agent.” she replies “Now I was planning something much more innocent, harmless and fun.”
“I’m listening.” you say, looking at her “But if I think it’s too much, I’ll will say no.”
With a grin, Janet takes out a red whoopee cushion.
“I was thinking to embarrass someone a little.” she says, still grinning.
“Where the fuck you got that, Janet?” you ask, surprised.
“No bad words, or you get a mouth soaping.” she teases you, before answering “I bought it in the capital, when we went outside.”
“And who are you planning to use it on, tell me.” you say.
Janet grins again, and says “The prime minister’s secretary, miss Justinia.”
“She’ll make our behinds bright red if she discovers us, are you aware of this?” you tell her.
But Janet shakes her head, replying “She will never discover us. I have a perfect plan.”
You are a little afraid of the stern secretary, but she made you suck on a time-out pacifier, after all, and you think that a little payback is needed.
As you two march toward her office, followed by Eden, who doesn’t make any comment on the situation, Janet asks you “Maybe we can call the ‘twins’, before preparing the cushion?”
“They are with Miss Spencer for their morning lesson.” is your answer, and the conversation dies there.
When you finally reach Lady Kent’s office, you see that the door next to it has a plate with “Prime minister’s secretary” written on it. That is the right door.
Janet knock at it, and nobody replies. Your friend looks at you, grinning, and opens the door. You enter in the room, and you notice that it is a much smaller copy of the minister’s one.
With few movements, Janet hides the cushion between Justinia’s wooden chair and the chair’s thin pillow.
You hear that someone is coming, and you immediately start to panic.
“What shall we do, now?” you exclaim, but keeping a low tone of voice, while in the excitement you wet yourself more.
“Don’t worry.” replies Janet, opening a big wardrobe “Let’s hide here.”
You reach the wardrobe and enter in it with Janet.
“Eden!” you call you guard “Please, hide with us.”
You see are amused about the situation, and she complies. Once she’s inside the big wardrobe, you all hide among the clothes and Janet closes the door. You can’t see anything, but you can hear what happens.
The office door opens up, and two persons come inside.
“I will print these documents as soon as possible.” you hear the first voice saying. It’s clearly miss Justinia.
“Thank you, Justinia. But first, I’d like to talk about the request we got the other day.” replies the other voice, clearly belonging to Lady Kent.
They speak of something you don’t fully understand, since Justinia sits down and a loud fart (created by the cushion) is heard.
“I’m sorry, Lady Kent!” you hear her say, with a mortified tone.
“That’s not a problem, don’t worry.” lady Kent’s reply.
Miss Justinia stands up, to take a paper, judging by the sound, and when she sits down again another fart is heard.
“I’m desolate, really!” she exclaims.
Janet giggles a little. She positioned it so well that the secretary hasn’t even realized that she’s not doing it herself.
Once again, Lady Kent says that is not a problem, but then it happens again.
“Justinia, maybe we should discuss this after you have gone to the bathroom?” you hear the Prime minister suggest.
“But I clearly don’t feel the need to go!” the secretary exclaims “This is strange!”
You hear the Lady sighing and leaving the room. You do your best to don’t giggle, but then you hear the fart sound again, this time however followed by the secretary’s sentence “Well, well. Someone is having fun behind my back. This cushion was responsible for that!”
After saying these words, she leaves the room in hurry, yelling with full lungs “PRIME MINISTER!”
Don’t wanting to get in trouble, and thinking that you had enough fun, you leave the room with Janet and Eden.
Once safe in another hallway, you and Janet bursts out laughing. You see that even Eden is giggling a little.
“Prime minister!” Janet mocks the secretary imitating her voice, imagining the rest of the conversation “It was a cushion! Someone pranked me! If I catch them, I will spank them till they are sore!”
You laugh, and reply “She doesn’t even thought to look in the wardrobe. It was a so obvious place to hide that I was scared she would have done that first.”
“Ah, I know people like her too well.” Janet replies, winking at you “First they think about apology to their superiors, and only then they search the culprits.”
You immediately stop to speak about the prank when you see an old maid dressed in more complicated clothes than the other. You immediately recognize Amelia, the Housekeeper.
“Good morning, Mrs. Amelia.” you greet her.
Amelia smiles at you, replying “Hello to you, princess. I’m glad to see you. I never had the opportunity to speak with you, so far.”
“I saw you only once, in the garden.” you remember “You were talking to maid Alice.”
You don’t add anything else, since you don’t want to tell to the only female servant in the palace (nannies excluded) with the authority to spank you that you eavesdropped their conversation.
Mrs. Amelia pats your head, on the hood, smiling, and says “What a cute little lion.”
You blush, thanking her. She then adds “Are you behaving, princess?”
“Of course!” you reply “Nanny Rose spanks me if I don’t.”
She smiles again, then greets you and leaves saying “I’m quite busy, princess. I hope we can spend a little more time together, next time.”
You greet her too, and you must admit you’re surprised. As in the only occasion you saw her she was scolding Alice, you thought she was stern like Mr. Collin. She’s IS severe, for sure, but maybe she’s more Rose-like.
Janet puts an hand on your shoulder, saying “The prank was successful, and we still have time before lunch. What do you think we should do, little kitten?”
“I’m a lion, not a kitten!” you exclaim, in a cute voice.
“Of course, Nala.” she teases you, playing with your tail “You’re a wild and ferocious lion that hunts in the savanna, not a little kitten that is made wear a diaper to don’t pee on the carpet.”
You blush furiously, replying “Well, my mom doesn’t know. Yours knows that you’re in training pants.”
“Ehy! That was a low blow!” Janet exclaims “You even said to her that I have my eyes on a diapered boy!”
“Well, it’s the truth.” you say, candid “Did you prefer that I told her that I didn’t know what happened exactly between you and the pray you were looking after? Or that you got drunk, even if not so much, and got a mouth soaping for it?”
“Okay, okay.” Janet sighs “You really want to know what happened with the young noble.”
You nod, and Janet replies …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: "Prank an adult?"

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Janet sighs and her shoulders sinks down.
“It was terrible. He only spoke about politics.”
She lifts her arms and looks very frustrated. I was sweet mouthing him for hours, I told him how good he looked and that I liked his haircut and everything. But his answer was always the same.”

You nod your head, eager to hear more. “Yes, what was he saying?”

“My mom gave it to me. My mom told my hairdresser what to do. My mom sends me to a course to learn this and that. My mom got an invitation for me. My mom this, my mom that!!! I was surprised that he did not bring her over and asked her if it was okay for him to talk with me.” She huffs.
“Really, he was such a mommy-boy, I could hardly stand it. Unfortunately, there were a few singles around that where not far to old for me, so I was stuck with this boring baby. Honestly, William is more grown up than him. I asked him if he likes to kiss and make out a bit, but he was only giggling like a school-girl and blushed deep red. It was such a waste of time. Therefore, I started to drink more and more until I had an excuse to go to the toilet and leave him behind.”
She comes to you and hugs you. “Oh Susie, I think you had a better night in the crib with… Zoey, wasn’t it, than I had with this – so called – noble.”

You rub her back and comfort her, but secretly you are glad that she did not make out with a noble – or anybody else. Sure, Janet is more mature than you and during that night, she looked like an adult, but she is only a few months older than you. You wish that her first time is something special and not a drunk one-night-stand in the wardrobe of a party.
The two of you talked some more about the twins and that it would be fun, but strange at the same time if the four of you would build up relationships. While you talk, Janet is mixing a series of Alcohol-Free Cocktails. Something that she wanted to try after sitting at the bar for so long. Even Eden receive one Virgin Margarita.
The side effect is, that your best friend runs to the bathroom twice, before lunch and you feel your diaper becoming a soaked mass. You feel the wetness soaking it completely and you wonder if it might leak if you continue – but the cocktails are so tasty – especially after you where drinking formula for most of the time – that you don’t deny to try another one.

Finally, it is time for lunch and when you get back on your feet your bladder let go of more pee and you diaper hang heavy between your legs.
“Uhm, you did not messed up my sofa, did you?” Janet asks, as she see you waddling to the door. But neither your lion-costume or her sofa has any spots.
“As long as I am standing it is fine. Maybe I had a drink to much.” You blush and ask for Eden’s hand to keep the balance. For a second you think about crawling, but with the costume you are looking like a baby already. You don’t want to make that expression even worse.

Back in the nursery Rose is giving you a suspicious look.
“Hello Susan, why do you waddle like that? Did you have a messy accident?”

“No nanny Rose, I am only soaked because I tested some of Janet’s cocktails.” You say, blushing.

Carefully, Rose pulls down the zipper of your lion-dress and pokes the soaked diaper. “Oh, Susan, If you plan to make the diaper leak, tell me so and I add some booster pads into it.” She scolds you and strips you down. She even takes off your diaper while you stand, to make sure that you do not leak on the changing table. Then, she lay you down on it.
“We better put you in a fresh diaper right away, I don’t want you to leak… “ She starts to say, when you feel a sudden pressure and release a stream of pee on the changing table on onto her uniform.
“I am sorry! I am sorry!” You call out, pressing your hands on your crotch and try to stop the flow.

Rose sighs and quickly wipes your hands off with a towel, before she put you in a double diaper with booster pads. The padded you normally receive when you had an enema.
“No, please not, I have class after lunch and must be able to walk!” You pout and receive a light slap on your thighs for this.
“Hush baby, I put the pads on your knees, so you can crawl. If you drink so much you must life with the padding.” She says sternly, clearly angry that you peed on her beloved uniform.
Thickly diapered, you are feed your lunch – what takes longer today, since your tummy is already full of the drinks Janet made you. But Rose insist that you take your formula, since you need the nutrition.

You feel bloated, when you lay in your crib and hug Mr Rabbit, but still, you manage to fall asleep quickly.
When you wake up your diaper is warm and wet and you blush when you notice, that you wetted so much during your sleep. “Nanny Rose, can I be changed? I am already wet and I don’t want to wear such a thick diaper.” You complain.

“Princess Susan, do you want to receive a spanking or will you stay quiet now. It is decided and you will stay in your diaper until dinner.” Rose insisted. She has changed her uniform and put you in your lion onesie. This time with additional knee pads.
You try to walk a few steps, but land on your knees quickly. The diaper makes it impossible for you to walk. “ROSE, PLEASE!” You pout.

“Last warming princess! Stop your whining!” Rose says and to underline her words she is pushing a pacifier in your mouth, one that has whispers painted on the shield and makes you took even more like a little lion. The whole situation is really annoying you and you feel your anger rise. “Why can’t I be treated like a normal teenager?!” You ask yourself and spit the pacifier out.
“I don’t want to paci!” You say.
Rose tries to stay calm. She picks the pacifier back up, cleans him and hold him in front of your mouth.
“Susie, you will be late for class if you continue to misbehave. Take your lion-pacifier and crawl off, or you are in trouble, young lady!”

You…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “It was terrible. He only spoke about politic...

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You simply can’t accept this. The temporary loss of bowel control, Rose’s stern words, the fact that you’re forced to crawl … you pout, refusing to accept it.
“Please, nanny.” you say, trying your best to don’t burst crying in front of her “I’m not throwing a tantrum. I only ask to be treated a little more maturely.”
Rose expressions seems to change, but she still uses her scolding tone: “Susan, you’re a child, here, and you should be treated like one. I don’t like to spank you, you know it, but I will if you don’t stop this little show.”
She pushes the pacifier in your mouth, and you let her do it. However, you can’t hold back anymore and begin to cry.
“Nanny, please!” you say, behind your pacifier “I’m sorry! I’m the princess! I can’t bear this for 4 years!”
Rose hugs you tightly, whispering “I know that is difficult, princess, I know. But you’re strong, you’ve demonstrated it a lot of times. Do you want me to carry you in class in my arms?”
You hide your face in her boson, and when you’ve calmed down a little you hug her back and nod, whispering behind your pacifier “Yes, thank you. I’m sorry. I love you, nanny.”
Rose ruffles your hair and lifts you in her arms, carrying you to the classroom.
You completely relax in her warm embrace, and you whisper “I’m sorry for wetting your uniform.”
Rose giggles, saying “All is forgiven, little one.”
You see that Eden is following you (you didn’t even realized she had joined you), and you’re glad to have her as your guardian angel.
When you reach the classroom, Janet is already waiting. Seeing you in Rose arms, she greets you but doesn’t comment.
The nanny knocks the door, and when she enters, still holding you in her arms, miss Spencer is really surprised.
“Rose?” she says “What’s happened to the princess?”
“She was overwhelmed by her emotions and needed a little calm-down-time, so I carried her here in my arms, Elisabeth.” Rose replies, holding you tightly.
You were expecting miss Spencer to laugh at you or call you immature, but very sweetly she instead comes closer and says “Sometimes happens with little girls. Do you want to skip lesson for today, princess? We can recover it Saturday.”
You shake your head, and reply something. Rose removes your pacifier, and you say again “No, thank you, Miss Spencer. I’m okay, I can follow the lesson.”
Rose puts you down on your chair, behind your desk, gives you a kiss on the forehead and whispers “I will wait you in the nursery after the lesson.”, before greeting miss Spencer and leave.
While miss Spencer takes position behind her teacher’s desk, Janet puts a hand on your shoulder, whispering “It’s okay, Susie. You’re wonderful.”
She doesn’t even know what the problem was, but she tries to console you anyway. You really appreciate it.
So the lesson begin. Miss Spencer is back to her normal strict self, but you are attentive and you try your best to answer to every question.
Once the lesson is finished, miss Spencer calls you at her desk. You have to
“Very good princess, very good indeed.” she says, giving you a note “I noticed quite a constant progress in you. You got only 2 demerits, which are very few. Focus a little harder and you will achieve to obtain 0 demerits, which is worth a reward.”
“A reward?” you say, surprised “With 0 demerits I get a reward?”
Miss Spencer nods, saying “As you noticed, it is a difficult thing. But I’m quite sure you can do it.”
You smile at her, taking the note from her, and decide to ask “Have you always been a private teacher, miss Spencer?”
The teacher nods, replying “I was formed to be a private teacher, princess. I never taught in a public school.”
You wanted to ask how was to teach in a Calonian school, but her answer destroyed the possibility to ask her that.
You greet her and slowly crawl out from the room in your wet and dirty diaper, followed by both Janet and Eden.
“What’s happened, Susie?” Janet asks “Something happened between you and your nanny?”
You shake your head, replying “Nothing, really. I was simply overwhelmed by the thought to have this wet and dirty diaper for the day.”
Janet nods, but doesn’t say anything. She saw that you were very sad for it, and she teases you only when it’s funny for both of you.
When you arrive at the nursery, Eden opens the door for you and you crawl inside.
“Welcome back, princess.” Rose greets you with her kindest smile “I hope you feel better and that the fussiness is gone.”
You blush, but crawl to her saying “Can I have a hug?”
Rose smiles again, and take you in her arms, hugging you tightly.
“It’s okay, princess. I love you, you know it.” she whispers, then says with a more serious tone “How the lesson went?”
You smile too, now, and give her the note saying “Here!”
Rose takes the note, reads it and then she exclaims “You’re my little angel! 2 demerits! I’m so happy that I don’t have to give you yet another spanking.”
Blushing, you add “Miss Spencer also said that maybe I can manage to achieve 0 demerits and get a reward. What is the reward, nanny?”
Rose giggles, replying “Oh, you can choose it, princess. You can have an extra naughty fun session, ice cream after dinner for a week or a trip to the amusement park.”
You smile, excited, and exclaim “Really!? One of that!? They are all wonderful things!”
Rose giggles again, pats your head and says “Oh, you little ones. It takes you very short to cheer up and forget your worries. I’m almost jealous of it.”
You think that now you can leave, but Rose says “I have a little surprise, but I will give it to you only if you promise to behave. Will you promise it, princess?”
You nod, answering “I promise! I’m sorry for before, really!”
Rose smiles, and takes out from a drawer a gift box.
“Surprise!” she says, smiling.
As you take it, Janet comes closer, curios herself. You open it, and you find a Blue-ray discs box set. The cover shows five girls (magical girls, you catch) dressed in battle gears, under the words “Puella Magi Madoka Magica”. It’s a Japanese anime! You know it, but never saw a episode.
You jump at Rose, hugging her and saying repeatedly “Thank you, thank you, thank you!”
She pats your head, saying sweetly “We can watch some episodes after dinner, if you want.”
You nod, thanking her again and then leaving with Janet (still crawling and still followed by Eden, of course). You got so excited that you even forgot to ask Rose for a diaper change. But then you think that she wouldn’t have done it anyway, so it’s only for the better.
You crawl straight to Melissa’s nursery, but when you knock and then enter, you discover that …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Continue to pout
