1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Melissa is alone in the nursery, stacking new diapers into the changing table. She is so absorbed by it, that she did not even went to the middle of the room to greet you, like she normally does.
“Oh, hello princess. I was hoping that it is you, other wise I would be in trouble now.” She grins.
You have doubts that somebody, not even the Queen, would complain when Nanny Melissa is NOT waiting, standing in the middle of the room, but you don’t question her – too dangerous.
“Hello nanny Melissa, where are the twins?” You ask.
“Oh, they have earned so few demerits, that I send them out to play right away. I allowed them to get dirty, since they will have a nice bubble bath later. It is the reward for earning only 3 demerit points, each.” She smiles, very proud of her charges.
You smile and bite down on your tongue, not to point out, that you got even less, that would be rude. “Oh, that is impressive. So, they are in the garden?”
“I guess so, it is the best place to get dirty. William likes to skip a few stones when he is crossing the pond. Today he will do it until he slips and end with his padded behind in the water.” She says. It is obviously that she loves the twins, even when they can be a handful.
“Okay, we go and meet them.” Janet says and turns to leave.
“You, mean: You walk and the little lion crawls.” Melissa laughs. “Oh, you are so cute, princess. Rose has some great ideas!”
You smile weakly and try to catch up with Janet as she wants to see it, when William falls into the water.
Outside, in the garden the two of you find the twins sitting on the bench. Meredith’s shoes are dripping wet and William is covered in mud from the knees down. “Aw, we missed the fun.” Janet pouts.
When you arrive, William is giggling at your outfit, while Meredith comes to you, knees down and pats your head – or the fur covered hood. “Susan, you are such a cute little kitten. I could cuddle you all night long.” She says – and for the first time today you don’t mind it. You even press your head against her hand and imitates to purr.
“Aw, look at this, I guess she likes you.” William giggles and you snap at his pointing finger.
“Hey, bad kitty!” Merry scolds you and you whimper, only to be kissed all over the face by her. “Aw, it is fine, I am not angry at you.”
You all laughs out not and discuss what to do now.
“Hey, if you are okay to play with us, we can get all dirty and all bath together.” William suggested.
Your initial reaction is to laugh it off. You are boys and girls and your nannies would not allow it – but for the adults you are only kids as well – and you bathed together before… .
“Okay, we try it. I want to get out of this warm lion-costume anyway – not to mention the thick diaper.”
“Yes, why do you have to wear that?” William asks and Janet tells him about the cocktail-tasting that went a bit overboard.
“I am sorry for you Susan, but when we play catch, you will be a dirty little kitten quickly and Rose has to give you a bath – and if you are luck, we can all bath together.” He grins.
You look at Janet to see if she is fine with that idea. Especially after the disappointing party, she has her eyes back on William and therefore she nods.
“Okay, then it is decided. We play catch and I start the first chasing – all have to be on all forth.” You smile.
Meredith and William simply fall to there knees and crawl away from you, while Janet takes off her shoes and is more careful. Her skirt is not that long and as soon as she is on hands and knees it slides even further up and reveals her training pants.
You start to chase her, but she is quick and you are handicapet by your thick diaper, that is even wetter and less comfortable by now. Already sweating you call out in William’s direction. “Wow, look at Janet’s ass!”
Your plan works. William is very distracted, instead of avoiding you, he tries to get a better view on Janet’s behind and like this you can touch him. “One down!” You call out and try to catch Merry.
Like Janet, she is faster than you, but she is teasing you more. She slows down to let you catch up with her. Her padded behind in front of you, you chase her around the pond, until she miss-steps and falls flat on her face. Luckily, she is on the grass and she does not hurt herself.
“GOT YOU!” You slap her behind and make her blush.
Janet has won the round and now she has to chase the three of you. At first you fear that she is going straight to you, since you are so slow, but she is aiming on William and the two of them have a long fight, before she finally smacks his behind. So far relaxed you look at Merry and the two of you crawl into opposite directions.
Janet is fair and chase Merry down within a few minutes.
“Okay, I am done!” You call out, panting hard. You turn over and lie on your back. Arms and legs of the lion-outfit are covered in dirt and you are 100% sure that you will be bathed tonight. The only question is where and with whom?

Exhausted the twins go to their nursery, while Janet, Eden and you go to yours.
After knocking on the door, you enter and see Rose’ surprised face.
“Jesus, what happened to you? Are you hurt?” She is really worried, since you look like a mess, but you smile at her and grin from ear to ear.
“We placed catch with the twins and to make it fair all of us went on all fourth.”

“Oh, I can see that… . Aren’t you aware that cats and lions are very clean?” She smiles and shakes her head. “Now you need a hot bath to get you clean again.”

Janet blushes a little, but raise her voice.
“Uhm,… could we bath together, like Susie, me and… the twins? They will take a bath as well.”

“Oh.” Rose says and thinks about the request.
“Well,…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: The siblings aren’t there

choices: Maid Sophie, with a message from the queen
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
“Well… I see no reason why not.” Rose says, smiling.
You thank her, as she lifts you in her arms saying “Let’s go to Melissa’s nursery, then.”
Normally you’d object to it, saying that you can walk on your own, but since you crawled all afternoon you let her do that without fussing. And you’re eager to get out of the filthy thing around your waist. You wear a double diaper with booster pads, after all, and despite all the padding is already in the verge of leaking thanks to the diuretic that is still in action.
Rose leads you to Melissa’s nursery, holding you in her arms like she did when she took you to the afternoon lesson, and in the exact same manner, you hug her tightly. Janet is behind her, while Eden is gone.
Rose knocks at the nursery’s door, and you hear from the other side “I’m a little busy. Who’s there?”
“I’m Rose, with the princess and Janet. Can we enter?” Rose says.
Melissa says that you can go in, and Rose opens the door. When she enters, you see that nanny Melissa is stripping Meredith, who is lying on the changing table.
“Are you here for a bath together? The siblings told me that they proposed this to her.” Melissa says, looking at Rose while finishing the procedure of stripping Merry down “I’m sorry for not having greeted you properly, without taking a dignified position, but I was busy finishing with our little lady Kent.”
You see that Merry blushes a little, but nothing more. And you think that nanny Melissa is really obsessed with the position thing.
“Don’t worry, Melissa.” replies Rose, going closer to her and putting you down next to the changing table “I think that taking good care of the children is much more important than the royal etiquette.”
“Where is William?” Janet asks, suddenly.
“He’s in the bathroom, ready to take a bath.” Melissa replies, taking Merry down from the changing table, completely naked with only her thick glasses on, and then says to her “We now go to reach him, while Rose takes care of the princess.”
Melissa has caught that Rose prefers taking care of you herself. But you don’t even listen to that, though, because you’re to busy looking at Merry naked body. While Rose and Melissa are still talking (something about your lion onesie, you don’t catch what exactly), Merry notices that you’re staring at her. You both blush, but then she does a sexy pose, moving her hand on her side.
While you are getting excited, Melissa takes Merry’s hand and leads her to the bathroom. Rose then lifts you up on the changing table. She removes your onesie, and giggling she says “The lion is changing his fur.” while doing it, and then removes the knee pads too.
When you’re only in your diapers, she makes you lie on the changing table on your back, and proceeds to remove everything. Once you’re naked, she cleans you up and then takes you down from the changing table. You’re quite embarrassed in being naked next to Janet, even it already happened before.
Your BFF giggles, but immediately stops when Rose says “Ok, Janet’s turn.”
“I can undress myself, miss Fletcher.” she says, blushing.
Rose pats her head, saying “Janet, I think you can call me nanny Rose, now. ”
“Unless you’re naughty.” you giggle, remembering that even you must call her miss Fletcher when you’re punished.
Rose giggles too, and the says to Janet “I won’t force you, of course. But I think it would be for the best.”
Janet is convinced, and lets Rose lift her on the changing table. Rose removes her nice dress (that you really envy) and takes her training pants down.
“It’s a little wet.” she says, making her blush and you giggle “It’s just some drops, sometimes it happens to adults too, especially when the drink too much. Well, nothing so serious to put you back in diapers. Unlike the giggling princess, here, that is one of the heaviest wetter I have ever seen.”
The parts reverse immediately: Janet giggles, while you blush.
“Rooooose!” you exclaim, while she takes Janet down from the changing table, still naked too.
Rose giggles only, and takes both yours and Janet’s hand with hers, leading you to the bathroom. Inside, William and Merry are both there, naked, standing next to the full bathtub.
You see with the corner of the eye that Janet and William stare to one another. You then notice that Merry is doing the exact same with you, making you blush, but you stare at her too.
The two nannies help you all enter in the bathtub, and Melissa overturns the chest full of rubber toys in the water.
You enjoy a relaxing bath, next to Merry. You look at each other often, blushing.
Rose is washing your back, when she says “Princess, if you feel the urge tell me immediately. I don’t want you to pee in the bathtub.”
You blush more, while the other three laughs a little.
“Hush!” Melissa scolds them “There is nothing shameful about it!”
You are so happy to be cleaned up that you play with Merry, staging a conversation with two rubber toys (you have a frog, she has a goldfish). Willy stages a battle between two of his instead, but you notice that he looks often toward Janet’s naked body. And your BFF simply enjoys the bath, without doing anything, simply looking at William time to times.
When you’re all clean, the nannies takes you out from the bathtub and dry you off using towels.
“There.” Melissa says, once you’re all dry “The children are okay, now.”
They takes the four of you to the changing table, and Janet goes first. Rope takes out for her a pull-up, but is much more childish than usual. It is not a blank pull-up, like the others that Janet wore during her time here, but it is a Cindarella pull-up.
“Is this really necessary?” she asks, embarrassed.
“I’m really sorry, Janet, but these we have.” Rose replies “We don’t have so much pull-ups that fits you, since here children your age are diapered. So, for this time, you have to wear them.”
“Can’t I have my underwear back, then?” she asks.
Rose shakes her head, saying “Not even your VIP-Card gives you that permission, Janet. You’re a minor, after all.”
She sighs, and Rose adds “Look, Janet, I don’t like your attitude right now. I can’t spank you, but I can take away your game console.”
“What?” she exclaims “No, please! If you have to punish me, spank me instead!”
“If you wish that.” Rose says “I give you three choices: the Cindarella pull-up, a diaper or a punishment, and since you wish to be treated like a Calonia, that would be pat-pat on the bottom.”
Janet blushes (especially after Rose’s extremely childish way to refer a spanking), saying “The pull-up is fine. Thank you, Rose.”
Rose smiles at her and put her in training pants, followed by a nice and mature yellow dress.
“There.” Rose says, taking her down from the changing table “No one will be able to see it. Was all that fussing needed?”
Janet hugs her, saying “I’m sorry, nanny.”
Her childish reaction makes you giggle, before remembering that you usually do the same.
Rose pats her head and then proceeds to diaper you too. She puts you in a thick diaper, but not double and with just one booster pad. She then puts you in a pink romper with the sentence in red letters “I’m a cutie pie” printed on it.
While Melissa dresses up the siblings, Rose asks to you “It has been a long day. Now we’ll have dinner and then, if you want, we can watch a couple episodes of the new anime.”
You smile at her, nodding. You greet your friends as she leads you back to your nursery. The nursery, however, isn’t empty. Inside, there is …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: I see no reason why not.”

choices: To bring you to your crib.
To let you sleep in her huge bed, with her.
To continue until you wake up again.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You are surprised to see the queen.
“Your majesty!” Rose greets her queen and good friend. “I have not expected you to be here. Didn’t you have another of your sooo interesting dinners?” She says sarcastic and makes quotes with her fingers.
Charlotte makes a sour face and nods a bit.
“In theory you are right, I had a meeting-dinner, but I told Miss Kent to take over for me, since I would like to spend more time with the princess.”
Her words send mixed feelings through you. One the one hand, you are grateful that she is here, but if that means that Miss Kent cannot see her children, it hurts you a bit.
“Uhm, thank you, my queen.” You smile and give her a weak hug.

“Hey, what is wrong, I thought you would be a bit more enthusiastic about my present.” Charlotte looks a bit hurt. You tell her your concerns and she understand it right away.
“Oh, how careless of me to separate a loving mom from her kids.” She goes to the wall next to the door and press a hidden button. Only seconds later Maid Sophie comes in, looking breathless.
“Yes my queen?”

“Sophie, please cancel the dinner and make sure everybody receives my apologies. It was a small round anyway, nobody will be too upset.” The Queen orders. Sophie nods and runs off.

“Thank you my Queen.” You say and hug her again, very tightly this time.

“Oh, that feels like a hug!” She smiles, rubs your back and gives you a kiss on the head.

“Oh, you smell very good.” The Queen remarks and you blush a bit.

“All kids a sparkling clean from the bath tub. Susan will have dinner now and then we will watch an anime series, if you like, we can watch it together.” Rose offers. Charlotte shrugs, but agrees.
Then she feeds you a bottle, while Rose takes over the spoon feeding.
With the single chair and the TV you only face a space-issue, when it comes to the Movie-time.

“Why don’t we go to my private chamber, I have a three-seater and a big screen.” The Queen offers and you happily agree.
With you in the middle, Rose and your right and Charlotte on your left you start to watch the series together. At least that is the play. But the wild playing in the garden, the bath and the dinner makes you very tires and therefore you fall asleep quickly – even while you really like the Series.
Charlotte likes the series as well and talks to you from time to time, but after a while you don’t answer her any longer.
“I think the little princess is in dreamland already.” Rose whispers and smiles down at you.
The Queen is watching you sleeping for a bit and then suggests…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: The queen

choices: You find her in her room
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
The queen winks at Rose, that simply giggles. She takes you in her arms, while the nanny stops the TV. You are so sleepy that you don’t even fully realize what’s happening. Almost completely asleep, you abandon yourself in Charlotte’s embrace, whispering “Sleepy, mommy.”
She pats your head, smiling brightly, and puts you down on something soft. You close your eyes, and you feel a hand ruffling your hair while Rose’s kind voice says “Good night, princess. I’ll see you in the morning.”
You then hear the sound of a door, and nothing else for a while. Then, you feel something warm pressing against your body, especially around your shoulders, like a warm embrace. It is a spreading a sensation that makes you feel protected. Protected and loved.
The sleepy sensation finally goes away, when you really fly into dreamland.
You have a peaceful night, without nightmares. Maybe one of them most peaceful night you’ve ever had.
The next morning, you feel a warm hand touching your shoulder. You open your eyes, yawning, and you see that the hand belongs to Charlotte. The queens is gently shaking you with her right hand, while she has the left one around your body. You blush, realizing that you’re hugging her and probably you’ve done that all night long, pressing your wet diaper against her.
“I’m sorry.” you whisper, but she smiles and ruffles your hair.
“Good morning, Susan.” she simply says, holding you close to her.
You notice that she is wearing an elegant yet simple and surely comfy pajama, red and with blue details.
“Did I fell asleep?” you ask, a little embarrassed.
Charlotte nods, saying sweetly “Yes, but it’s a natural thing for a kid, don’t worry.”
You blush, and say “I like the series. I’m sorry for falling asleep.”
“Oh, don’t worry. You’ll resume it from where it interrupted, next time.” she says “I like it too, I must admit. Madoka herself reminds me of you.”
You giggle, replying “But I don’t have pink hair.”
“That’s because you don’t live in an anime.” the queen giggles too.
You like staying like this, hugging her. Despite the diaper around your waist, that you still don’t like and maybe never will, despite the childish things that you think you’re too mature for … you are happy to be here.
You are about to say it to the queen too, but a voice interrupts you “Your majesty, both you and the princess need your breakfast, and you have a lot of things to do.”
You recognize the voice of Mrs. Laura, while the queen sighs.
Charlotte looks over your shoulders, behind you, saying “Oh, can’t I spend the morning with the princess?”
You try to suppress a giggle, in hearing Mrs. Laura sighing behind your back.
“Your majesty, please, don’t make it difficult.” she says.
Charlotte giggles, winking at you, and then gets up. She helps you coming down from her huge bed (the biggest you’ve ever seen). You look at the handmaid, and say, after yawning “Good morning, Mrs. Laura.”
The woman takes a little bow, and replies “Good morning to you, princess.”
You are then let sit on the bed, while Laura helps Charlotte dressing up for the day. It’s a process so slow that feels almost like a ceremony.
When the dressing time is over, the queen claps her hand. The door opens, and you see three women dressed like Laura enter in the room. You recognize one of them as Patricia, while you’ve never seen the other two. You catch that those are the queen’s handmaids too.
“Mrs. Laura, can I ask you something?” you ask to the handmaid you know better.
Every head in the room turn toward you, and Laura says “Only if it is a quick thing, princess. We all have to go.”
You nod, then ask “The handmaids answer to the Housekeeper and to the Butler like the other maids? I’m curious about it.”
Patricia giggles, but stops when the two unknown handmaids give her a bad look. Laura instead says “We deeply respect them, and we’re asked to listen to them, but we answer only to the queen herself.”
With your question answered, Charlotte come closer to you and rubs your hair, saying “I’ll be pretty busy. But I promise you that I’ll spend all my free time with you, Susan.”
You smile at her, and she leaves the room followed by the four handmaids. Immediately after they are gone, Rose enters in the room.
“Good morning, princess.” she greets you, smiling.
As you see her, you run at her and hug her tightly.
“Nanny Rose! Nanny Rose!” you exclaim.
“Oh, someone is happy to see me.” she says, hugging you back “Come on, princess. Back to the nursery. You need a new diaper.”
She lifts you up, saying “You don’t mind if I carry you, right? You know that I like it.”
You hug her again, saying “No problem, nanny.”
She then carries you back in her nursery. Once there, she puts you on the changing table, removes your romper and your diaper, before putting you in a fresh one.
Once you’re diapered, Rose puts you in a pink dress with a skirt made of tulle that doesn’t conceal your diaper at all. It’s so transparent that not only everyone will see your diaper, but they’ll even notice if you wet yourself. It’s quite embarrassing, but at least it’s not like the jammies.
You feel full of energy this morning, even if you don’t know why. It’s because you’ve slept so well, maybe?
After having fed you your breakfast, Rose pats your head, saying “I’ll wait you with your lunch. Don’t get in trouble in the morning, princess.”
You nod, greet her and leave the nursery. Eden was already waiting for you outside of the door.
“Eden!” you call her, as you see her “I’m ready to conquer the world!”
The knightess is surprised, but then she gives you a smile and says “If you say so, my lady.”
And then you leave with her.
You then reach Janet’s room, to spend time with her.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: To let you sleep in her huge bed, with her

choices: Miss Spencer is smiling all the time.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You burst into Janet’s room and hope to find her surprised, but to your dismay, you don’t find her at all.
“Where is she?” You ask Eden, but your guard does not know it. In a funny gesture she list her feet and looks underneath it. “Not here, princess.” She smiles at you, but you are still not happy.
The two of you search for a long time and finally you find her in the lab of the Campbell twins.
“SUSAN! HELP ME!” She calls for you and when you see her you stop and can’t help to laugh out.

Janet is trapped in a crib, dressed in pink onesie that bulges over a thick diaper.
“What happened?” You ask her, when you finally reach her.

Your best friend is blushing and warns you, not to get too close to the changing table.
“The cursed piece of trash is not switched off, but on standby. I found the door unlocked and snooped around a bit. I was looking for something cool to play tricks on somebody or make my life at home easier, when I am back in the states. Suddenly a red beam was scanning me and the arms lifted me off the ground. It noticed that I am minor and not dressed as I should be… . Hey, that is not funny!”
She interrupts her speech, when she finds you covering your mouth and suppressing giggles.

“I am sorry, but you look very funny.” You reply and ask her to continue.

“Since I was not dressed correctly I got punished with a spanking and an enema and put in this diaper and onesie until I am picked up by an adult.” She pouts and wiggles with her padded behind. “That is two hours ago. I have no clue where this useless scientists are, but when I find them, I will… I don’t know.” She sighs. The smell that comes from her tells you, that the enema is already out again and therefore you ask Eden to get her out of the crib.
Eden, as an adult is allowed to do that, by the machine.

“Should we have you changed by the automatic changing table?” You ask Janet, but she makes sure to keep a big distance between herself and that invention.
“NO, thank you. I rather get cleaned up by a human. I received a spanking already. Have you seen my dress?”

Eden and you search around, but find nothing. Disappointed Janet leaves the room quickly, followed by Eden and you. The walk back to yours and her hallway is embarrassing for Janet. Many maids are crossing the way and all know her as the only mature kid. Now, in her full diaper she has to explain a lot, until she is so angry about all the grinning people, that she starts to dash, as fast as her diaper allows it and runs straight into Rose’ nursery.
“Hello Miss Fletcher, I am sorry to bother you, but would you PLEASE clean me up?!” She says, almost falling over.

Rose looks surprised, but nods her head and quickly get the full diaper off her. This time Janet does not complain about the Cinderella training pants. She only blushes when she is dressed in similar to you.
“Can I change into my own clothes when I am out?” she asks Rose.

“Hm, you can, but you will need to hurry. Maybe you haven’t noticed, but you will have an extra lesson before lunch, since the princess has planned to invite a few friends. Miss Spencer will teach you two and the twins about the rules for external visitors. No worries, it will not take long.” Rose explains.

You had totally forgotten about that, and therefore you and Janet are still in the same dressed, when you meet the twins.
“Hi” You greet them. “Sorry for taking away your teaching time, I guess you will have to work longer the next time to compensate this?!” Merry and William, both dressed in green onesie nod their heads.
“Yep, that is the plan. Miss Spencer sent us out for a 5 minute break to prepare the room with four desks.”

The lesson starts and…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: You find her somewhere else

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You sit at your desk, and so do the others. Miss Spencer is smiling, and you hope she stay in good mood.
“Good morning, miss Spencer.” you greet her, and the same does Janet.
“Welcome, girls.” she greets you too “As I was saying to the Kent’s siblings, I need to tell you about the rules for external visitors.”
You raise your hand, and when the teacher gives you authorization to speak you ask “When will my friends come to the Palace, miss Spencer? Nanny Rose didn’t say when will it happen.”
“Oh? She must have forgot that.” miss Spencer replies “They will come today after your nap. That’s is the reason for the extra lesson.”
“Ehy! Does it mean I don’t have a normal lesson today?” you ask, excited.
“Yes, and that is why tomorrow you’ll have lesson both in the morning and in the afternoon.” she says “Unless you prefer recover the lesson Saturday?”
“I prefer having my Saturday free, thank you.” you reply “I’ll take the two lessons tomorrow.”
“Even if it mean I’ll get punished two times for demerits if I get too much of them.” you add, speaking in your mind.
“Ok. We can start, then.” the teacher concludes her introduction “Since it’s an extra lesson I will not give you demerits, but make me angry and I will spank you after we finish.”
She said it smiling, so you are not sure if miss Spencer was really saying that she would spank you if you misbehave in the extra lesson or if she was joking. You aren’t eager to find it out, though, so you decide to stay on your best behavior.
Miss Spencer is still smiling, and you think that is because her relationship with the Butler is going well.
“Now, about the meeting that will occur, you must know that before you can spend the afternoon playing with your friends, a series of procedures must be followed.” the teacher explains “Every guest group, in this case every kid with his or her caretaker or caretakers, will present itself in the throne room, where they will be greeted by the persons that will spend time with them in the Palace. Since you are kids, Queen Charlotte and Lady Kent must be present as well, with both Miss Fletcher and Miss Mason.”
“Miss … who?” you ask, don’t recognizing the second surname.
“She’s talking about nanny Melissa.” Merry intervenes “She already told you once her surname is Mason, right?”
“Exactly!” miss Spencer exclaims, a bit too enthusiastically “You’re so clever, Meredith. I’d give you merit points, if I could.”
She is really happy today, and you bet she gave few demerits to the siblings too. You’re almost bothered that you don’t have lesson today but two lessons tomorrow. But then you remember you’ll spend time with a lot of friends, so you’re happy anyway.
“As I was saying, you must greet the guests in the throne room.” the teacher resumes “After all of the guests are properly greeted, you kids will gather in the centre of the throne room with your caretakers, and then all of you will get your maintenance spankings.”
“What!?” you and the twins exclaim, simultaneously.
“It’s the rules, kids.” miss Spencer says “When a lot of children are left alone for an entire afternoon, a maintenance spanking must be administered to ensure good behavior. Don’t worry, though. Since it’s part of the tradition and not an actual punishment, it will be on your diapers and even lighter than a normal maintenance spanking.”
You think that the this maintenance spankings purpose is not to cause pain, since it will be extra light, but to cause embarrassment. Being spanked all at the same time will wipe away the security that is normally born when you’re in a group, the normal thought “If we are many, they can’t punish all of us.”. It’s really a clever think to do, you must admit.
Janet raises her hand, and when give permission she asks “I will get it too?”
The teacher shakes her head, replying “Of course not, Janet. Despite your current outfit, that I don’t know if is wore to show your appreciation for our tradition or because happened something that I don’t really want to know about, you are still a guest.”
After saying that, the teacher giggled. Janet is relieved, but blushed for the outfit remarks.
You raise your hand again, and say when given permission “How the spanking will work?”
“Well, chairs will be positioned in the middle of the throne room to form a circle that looks at the inside of the circle itself. Then, you will all be placed over your caretakers lap for the light and quick spanking. You three and the guests too, of course.” after explaining this, she looks at Janet and adds “I suggest you to pay attention to the procedure. A group maintenance spanking is interesting to see, especially for the synchronization the spankers normally have.”
Embarrassing. That is what this procedure is. It’s really perfect to ensure well behavior without actually punish the kids. You are not eager to it, but at least you will play with your friends after that.
“Once the procedure is over, the rest of the meeting will be followed by adults.” miss Spencer concludes “One day I will explain that part too, since you will need it too, but for now just know that after the group maintenance spanking is finished, you can greet the caretakers and leave. You will spend the afternoon completely alone, without grown-ups.”
“Except Eden.” you add, mentally.
Still smiling (and you’re really glad to see her like that), the teacher dismisses you all.
Meredith and William both greet you and leave, to have their lunch. Willy grinned at Janet outfit, but didn’t say anything.
The same then does Janet, saying that she will go to her room for a quick outfit change and then she will go to the kitchens to eat too. Once you’re alone with Eden, you go to the your nursery to have your lunch as well.
Once there, Eden greets you and leaves. As you enter in the nursery, you must admit that the time just before lunch is quite sad, since everyone greet you like you’ll see them an eternity later, even it will be just few hours.
“Welcome back, princess.” Rose welcomes you, with her usual smile.
You run to her, hugging her and saying, almost sobbing “You will never leave me. Right, nanny?”
She seems confuses, but then ruffles your hair saying “Never, princess. When I’ll be an old woman and you will be our queen, I will take care of your child too, if you’ll let me do that.”
You hug her more tightly, saying “Of course! You’re the best nanny of Calonia!”
You really like the queen, but Rose is so different. Maybe it’s because she takes care of all of the time, but you are really close to her.
After this, she gives you your baby bottle of formula making you sit on her lap (you don’t get yet why sometimes she takes you on her lap while others she puts you in the high chair), removes your dress and puts you in a romper and puts you in the crib, saying “I will change you after your nap, princess.”
You greet her, and fall asleep hugging Mister Rabbit.
After a while, Rose wakes you up and changes your wet and dirty diaper just as promised.
“I think that the diuretic effect is going weaker.” you say, as she puts you in a new diaper “I feel more control, now.”
“Good.” she comments “As I said, the diuretic isn’t a punishment. I really hope that you now know how a Calonian child feel.”
You nod, as she dresses you in a nice dress: a shirt with a jeans overall, which legs come just below your waist. You diaper is indeed concealed, but the bulge is extremely obvious.
As Rose lead you in the throne room (that you never saw till now) to make you meet your friends, you ask her who will administer your maintenance spanking, and she replies …
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: Miss Spencer is smiling all the time

choices: Play capture the flag or something else.
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
Rose smiles at you and says: “The Queen volunteered and I could hardly say something against her.”
A quick smile cross your face, as you realize, that Charlotte is doing a lot to spend more time with you, even if it is a maintenance spanking.
Inside the huge throne room you see the Kent’s already waiting with Melissa, Zoey, with her nanny and more nannies standing behind Tabitha, Blossom and even Samuel. All are dressed in very childish, but still nice looking outfits. Even Zoey, that usual suffers under the strict hand of her nanny is wearing a skintight leotard and a short skirt. She looks stunning again, especially beside Tabby. The cute girl is in a red dress that goes down to her knees, underneath that she wears additional thighs in the same color. She looks a bit angry, what might be because of the leather reins she is wearing. You smile and can guess that she was very hard to control without those. Her blonde and good looking nanny has a stressed expression on her face and chats with Zoey’s nanny.

You have no time to greet when, before a knight by the door clears his throat and announce the queen. All eyes point in the direction of the door and wait for the Queen to enter. Charlotte comes in a midnight blue dress. Everybody bows and greets her in one voice.
Smiling, she raise her hands and greets her citizens back.
“Welcome everybody and thank you for the warm welcome, but this is not about me. It is for the kids to have a good time, therefore we should not waste their playtime and start with the required procedure.”

Everybody nods and walk to the chairs that wait in a big circle. The Queen takes your hand from Rose and winks at you. “It will be loud, but not hard.” She promises.
She forms a king of cup with her hand and give you ten slaps over your padded behind. It is indeed loud, but you can hardly feel anything through your diaper and denim overall.
When you get to your feet again you see that Merry just swapped the place with Willy, since Melissa is spanking them both. Zoey is sniffing a bit and Samuel and Tabby looks fine. She is very happy that her nanny has the reins removed and eager to run around. But everybody is waiting for Melissa to finish the spanking of Merry. When she is done, the Queen nods at the other adults and they all let go of their kids.
“SUSIE!!” Tabby runs over to you and hugs you tightly. The rest is walking slower, but in the end all your friends surrounds you. Janet is coming to you as well and Samuel is at her side right away.
“Hi, do you remember me? Because I remember you! I love your dress!”
He is wearing a cute sailor uniform that hides his diaper well. You could hardly tell that he is wearing one, if we would not be surrounded by a cloud of baby powder. Janet, who changed into a light pink dress that ends halfway down her tights and looks great on her only smiles weakly, before she looks at you.
“So Susan, you are the host, what will be play now? Hide and see in the whole palace. Something like “capture the flag” with teams – or do you have another idea?”

Still hugged by Tabby you think about it, before you decide to…
1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.title: “The queen, of course.”

1112122222231311212221131113122112211122.content:
You clear your throat, saying “Well, maybe a little introduction would be the best idea. I am the only one that knows everybody, after all.”
Meredith and William, in fact, don’t know anyone beside you and Janet, the same Samuel. And Janet never met Blossom, nor spent time with Zoey and Tabitha.
You see that Meredith has blushed deeply. She feels much more secure around you now, but, shy as she is, she is clearly in discomfort around so many new faces. As were expected, however, Tabby leaves you and jump between everyone, saying aloud “I’m Tabitha! My friends calls me Tabby! I’m 14! My mom is a noble, my dad is right hand of the mayor of the Capital, and I like playing! I love playing, indeed! My motto is ‘never behave’! I get a lot of spankings, but I don’t care!”
Zoey sighs, and puts a hand on Tabby’s shoulder, saying “I know it’s not your best trait, but can’t you stay quiet for 10 minutes?”
“I never stay quiet, that is a thing dead do!” Tabby replies loudly, smirking at her.
You notice that, during her presentation, Merry laughed a little. It’s a good sign.
As a perfect counterpart of Tabby, Zoey takes a deep and respectful bow, saying in a perfectly controlled voice “My name is Zoey, and I’m 15. I’m the daughter of a noble man, and I am the opposite of Tabitha, here, since I always behave, so I get spanked rarely.”
“But weren’t you spanked just after the party for masturbating, like you usually do? Lying is punished with mouth soaping, you know?” Tabby intervenes innocently.
Zoey’s face becomes red as a tomato. She stomps her foot, saying “Tabby! Shut up!”
That last part ruined her perfect (and boring) presentation, and you all laugh while she pout a little crossing her arms under her chest. Her big chest.
You noticed that Merry looked at her, giving her attention especially to Zoey’s big breasts. You really don’t want to scold her for this, thought, since what happened between you and Victoria’s daughter.
The third visiting girl takes a step forward, and does a dramatically pose positioning her right hand on her right side and stretching forward her left arm with a open palm directed toward the ceiling, then says with her deepest tone possible “Thou have the honour to speak with young lady Penrose-Glee, a blossom of rose, Blossom the herald of a new age, born a decade and four years ago. Spanked a lot, even if her visions show to her the path she must takes. She see in the future of all of you great things.”
She looks at you, and adds “The virgin of the dark, raised by wolves, sees your future, young princess. I see … that you … will have your diaper changed before bedtime!”
You blush a little, while the others laugh. That is not even a prediction, is a completely evident thing!
After Blossom presentation, that made her get strange looks from everyone that hadn’t yet met her (the siblings, Samuel and Janet) it’s the visiting boy’s turn.
“I’m Samuel. I’m 16.” he simply says, smiling, especially looking at Janet and Zoey “Well, technically speaking, I’m a commoner. I don’t have noble family members, so I feel a little out of place. But I’m glad to spend time with you. And I’m spanked quite a lot, too.”
After his simple and strangely respecting presentation, you look at the siblings, encouraging them to present themselves with a movement of the head.
Willy doesn’t hesitate a second: he takes a step forward and says with a calm and strong tone “I’m William Kent, son of the Prime minister. My friends call me Willy. I’m 14, and the girl with glasses is my sister. I live in this palace, and I’m glad to meet all of you. I’m not spanked that often, for Calonian standards.”
You notice that while speaking he positioned himself between Janet and Samuel. You giggle a little.

That last sentence made all go quiet, but the silence is immediately followed by a laugh from everyone. Except you, that didn’t expect her to blurt out something like that.
The shy Meredith takes your hand, while looking especially at Zoey. And now you only hope that she doesn’t say anything stupid. Zoey, however, didn’t notice that.
You’re happy to see that no one laughed for your relationship with her, but just for the way it came out.
“Well, I knew it of course.” Blossom says. You’d really like to know why she is so interested in seeing the future, but for now you decide to don’t ask.
“So now everybody know everybody.” Janet says, then looks at you and asks “What do you suggest to do? One of the two previous ideas or something else that just came in your mind?”
You look at her, replying “Hide and seek in the entire palace sound exciting.”
You see William smile, and then add “Yes, I vote for that.”
Everybody agree, and you say …

12122.content:
Before they can get a good look at you, you casually turn around and walk down the street. You walk slowly, as running might catch their attention. Despite passing off as calm and casual, you still get an uneasy feeling that they might catch on. After all, you are walking all alone with a backpack over your shoulder, and your high school is the only one in the area. Due to it being locked down, the police might get suspicious of you.
As you slowly march down the street, you occasionally gaze at the police car out of the corner of your eye. Before long, it starts advancing down the road, getting closer and closer. You simply walk along nonchalantly as if nothing is wrong.
Eventually, the police car passes you, and you ease down a bit. However, when it is about twenty feet in front of you, it stops. You pause nervously for a moment, and then continue. Soon, the cop in the passenger seat opens his door and steps out. He moves onto the sidewalk and gazes at the house in front of him.
You just walk by him, but your interest is caught by his behavior. You remark casually "Everything alright, officer?"
He turns to you and says "Yes, young lady. My partner and I are investigating a disappearance. We believe this house may have something to do with it."
"The house itself, or the people who live in it?" you ask.
"It could be both," he answers. But you notice he doesn't look you in the eye. He looks at you and then at something else every other second. Right then, you notice that the house has a sign in front of it that says "For Sale" followed by the contact information of a local realtor. You look back up at the cop and notice that he is nodding at something. You turn around and see his partner standing on the other side of the car, holding up a full-scale photograph in the air. Looking closer, you see that it is you.
You quickly realize that the policeman was lying about the house, but was telling the truth about the disappearance.

1212221.content:
You make it up to your boyfriend's front door and ring the doorbell. No one answers. You ring it again. You press your ear up to the door to see if you can hear footsteps approaching. When you can't, you pound for fist at the door, whispering desperately "Please, answer it. For the love of God, please!"
Soon, you hear someone coming closer to the door. You sigh in relief, but all of a sudden, the police car comes down the street. The driver stops in front of the house when the passenger spots you at the door.
"Oh, no," you mutter under your breath. You pound on the door louder, and hear someone call out "I'm coming, I'm coming!"
Just as the policemen get out of their car, the front door is opened by your boyfriend, Harry Tucker.
"Susie?" he says, a little stunned to see you, "What's wrong?"
"Harry, please, help," you plead, pointing over your shoulder "They're after me!"
Harry looks up, surprised. He asks you "Why? What did you do?"
"Nothing!" you insist, "I don't know what I did, but they're after me!"
He decides to answer your pleas and steps in front of you, as if to defend you from the cops.
The two of them approach the front door, but one of them stops and says to the other "Hey, Max, isn't this your house?"
The other one studies it for a moment and then states "Actually, it is, Chris."
You and Harry are both surprised to hear this, but then one of them gets closer and says "Harold, everything is alright."
You soon recognize the driver as Maxwell Tucker, Harry's cop father.
"Dad, what's going on?" Harry asks his father. "Why are you after Susie? What did she do?"
"She didn't do anything wrong, Harry," Maxwell assures his son, "We were just dispatched to escort her back home for her own protection."
"My protection?" you say, "From what?
"I don't know the full details of it all, Susan, but please, don't be alarmed," remarked Chris, the other cop, "We just have our orders to get you home safely."
You sigh and reluctantly agree, saying "Very well. And I'm sorry I kneed you in... that one area, sir."
He chuckles and says "Don't worry about it."
Before you go along with the two officers, Harry tells his father "Dad, can I come along? If there's Susan's in any danger, I want to make certain she's safe."
Maxwell shrugs and says "Alright, Harry. Get with her in the back."

You and Harry scoff as you approach the front door. Finding it unlocked, you step inside. Your mother is sitting on the couch in the front room with a well-dressed woman. There are also four men in black suits standing around the room.
The woman smiles at you and says "You must be Susan."
You slowly nod and say "Yes, ma'am. That is my name. This is my best friend Janet and my boyfriend Harry."
Both Harry and Janet smile and nod their heads in acknowledgement. Janet still has her arm around your shoulders and Harry still has his arms wrapped around your upper body protectively.
"Mom, what's going on? Why were the police looking for me?"
"That's something I'd like to know, too." Harry adds in, "I know that truancy is regarded as a misdeed, but all this police work and media attention seems a little over-the-top."
"This is about something much more important than that, my dears," the woman replies, "Take a seat and we will explain."
You, Janet, and Harry nod and sit down on the couch across from the woman and your mother.
"Susan, I am Queen Charlotte of Calonia," the woman begins.
"Calonia?" you remark, "I've never heard of such a place."
"It is a very private country," the Queen explains, "But I assure you that it is real."
"I don't think she's lying, Suze," says Janet, "I remember reading this one article about a country called Calonia joining the United Nations."
"Alright then," you say, turning back to Charlotte "May I ask why you are here in America, Your Majesty?"
"It is simple, my dear," she replies, "You are my heir to the throne. You are legitimately a princess."
You are totally unprepared for that answer. "How can that be? I have no royalty in my family!"
"On the contrary," Queen Charlotte corrects you, "Your father was my cousin. That makes you my closest living relative."
"You really have no other heir?" you ask in amazement.
"I once had a son," she replies calmly, "He and my husband - the King of Calonia - disappeared years ago. I have never remarried and have remained childless since. You are indeed my heir."
You appear to be breathless. This is all so much to take in at once. You stand up and bow before Queen Charlotte. Getting the same idea, Janet and Harry do the same thing.
Charlotte just chuckles, says "There is no need for that, my dears," and lets you get back on your feet.
You turn to Janet and Harry. They smirk at you.
"So, 'Princess Susan?'" remarks Janet, "That has a nice ring to it."

You soon arrive at home. There are more police officers, photographers and TV crews on your front lawn. Strangest of all is a limousine.

The officers hold the crowd back as you make your way to the front door.

"Susan!" Your mother demands. "Where have you been?"

"I just went shopping." you say. "What is going on?"

"Come into the living room." she holds her anger back, apparently whatever is waiting in the living room is more important than her desire to shout at you. You don't know if that's a good or bad thing.

"No, really." You ask your mother. "Who is this crazy woman."

Your mother cringes at your insult to the guest. "She really is the Queen of Calonia."

"I've never even heard of it." You say. "Where is it?"

"It is a very small country in Europe." the Queen explains. "We don't get noticed much by the rest of the world."

"And you flew here to see me?" you ask. "Why?"

"After me, you are the next in line for the throne." she says simply.

"If I was a princess I think I'd know it." You argue.

"Your father was my cousin." She explains. "As I am unable to bear children and you are my closest living relative, you will be our next queen."

You look at your mother and she just nods.

"Where's going now?" You ask, excited.

"Yes." She says. "For your own safety you can't stay here."

info.brief_description: You're surprised to discover that you're the princess of a country you've never heard of.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are a 14 year old girl named Susan who discovers that she is the heir to the throne of Calonia, a small European nation you've never heard of.

You will need to adjust to the new culture. Especially the tradition that children aren't potty trained until they turn 18.

If you are adding to this story please keep it in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That is keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story (Susan) is refered to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices Susan can make, not events outside his control. Eg "Which door will you open? 1) The red door 2) The green door" is good but "What do you find behind the red door? 1) An over-sized nursery 2) The prime minister." is not.
